en-mt: Cytokine Storm is a type of reaction to a systems flare and is described by the seizure of these seraceous (rows) cytokine: TNFα, IL-1β, IL-2, IL-6, IFNΑ, IFNβ, IFNγ, and MCP-1.

sourceString: These cytokines induce immune cells to release a vast number of free radicals which are the major cause of ARDS and multiple organ failure.
targetString: እዞም cytokines ናይ ምክልኻል ዋህዮታት ብምምንጫውን ናጻ ራዲካላት ብምፍናውን ARDS ከምእውን ብርክት ዝበሉ ሕማማት ኣካሊታት ዘስዕብ ።
en-mt: hese cytokines cause ARDS and a number of diseases by the release of immune cells and the release of free radicals.

sourceString: Immunosuppression is essential in the treatment of cytokine storms, especially in severe patients.
targetString: እቲ ዝተዳኸመ ናይ ምክልኻል ዓቅሚ (Immunosuppression) ኣብ ክንክን ሳይቶኪን ስቶርም፡ ብፍላይ ኣብቶም ኣብ ሓደጋ ዘለዉ ተሓከምቲ።
en-mt: The weakened immune response (Immunosuppression) in the care of cytokine storms, especially in patients at risk.

sourceString: Corticosteroids and tocilizumab, an anti-IL6 monoclonal antibody, have been used to treat cytokine storm.
targetString: ኮርቲኮስትሪዮይድ ን ቶኩሊዙማብ፡  anti-IL6 ሞኦክሎናል ጸረ-ነፍሲ፡ ነቲ ናይ ሳይቶኪን ሽግራት ክፈትሕ ይኽእል።
en-mt: Corticostrioids and toculizumab anti-IL6 mooclonal anti-psychiatry can solve the cytokine problems.

sourceString: Other immunosuppression treatments for cytokine storm include the modulation of T cell-directed immune response; the blockade of IFN-γ, IL-1, and TNF; JAK inhibition; blinatumomab; suppressor of cytokine signaling 4; and HDAC inhibitors.
targetString: ካልኦት ናይ ኢሚኖሳፕረሽን (immunosuppression) ምክንካናት ን ማዕበል ሲኮታይን (cytokine)፡ ምምዕርራይ ናይ T cell-directed ናይ ምጽዋር ዓቅሚ ግብረ-መልሲ፡ ብላከይድ (blockade) ናይ (IFN-γ)፡ , IL-1, ከምኡውን  TNF; ምኽልካል  JAK ፡ ብሊናቱሞማብ (blinatumomab)፡ ምጽቃጥ ናይ  ሲኮታይን (cytokine) ምልክታት 4፡ ከምኡውን HDAC ተኸላከልቲ።
en-mt: Other immunosuppression care for wave sykotaine (cytokine) modification of T cell-directed resistance response (counter- ifn-γ), IL-1, and TNF; Blocking JAK blinatumomab, pressing sikotaine (cytokine) symptoms 4 and HDAC blockers.

sourceString: Steroids, as immunosuppressants, were widely used in the treatment of SARS to reduce the severity of inflammatory damage.
targetString: ስተሮይድስ (Steroids) ከም ኢሚኖሳፕረሽን (immunosuppression)፡ ንምክንካን SARS ብብዝሒ ይስረሓሎም ኔሩ፡ በዚ ድማ ብሰንኪ ነድሪ ንዝመጽእ ጠንቂ የጉድል።
en-mt: SARS were widely used to care for immunosuppression, reducing the cause of inflammation.

sourceString: However, steroids at high dosages were not beneficial to severe lung injury in SARS and COVID-19 patients.
targetString: እንተኾነ፡ እንተኾነ ልዕል ዓቀን ናይ ስተሮይድ ነቶም ናይ ሳንቡእ ጉድኣታት ኣብ SARS ን ኮቪድ-19 ተለከፍቲ፡  ጠቃሚ ኣይነበረን።
en-mt: However, the use of steroids was not beneficial for those infected with SARS and COVID-19.

sourceString: Instead, they may cause severe side effects, especially avascular osteonecrosis, dramatically affecting the prognosis.
targetString: ኣብ ክንድኡ ግን፡ ብዙሕ ጎድናዊ ሽግራት ክፈጥሩ ይኽእሉ ኢዮ፡ ብፍላይ ድማ ኣቫስኩላር ኦስተንክሮሲስ (avascular osteonecrosis)፡ነቲ ክንክን/ሕክማዊ ደገፍ ኣዝዩ ዝጸልዎ ኢዩ።
en-mt: Instead, it can cause many side effects, especially avascular osteonecrosis, which greatly affects the care/medical support.

sourceString: Nevertheless, short courses of corticosteroids at low-to-moderate doses have been recommended to be used prudently for critically ill COVID-19 patients.
targetString: እንተኾነ፡ እቶም ተሓከምቲ ናይ ኮቪድ-19፡ ነቶም ሓጸርቲ ኮርሳት ናይ ኮርቲኮስትሮይድስ (corticosteroids)፡ ካብ ታሕቲ ናብ ላዕሊ ብዓቀንን ጥበብን ክንጥቀመሉ ይመከር።
en-mt: However, COVID-19 patients are recommended to use the short courses of corticosteroids from the bottom up wisely and wisely.

sourceString: At the time of writing, no effective antiviral therapy has been confirmed.
targetString: ኣብዚ ንጽሕፈሉ ዘለና እዋን፡ ዝኾነ ዝተረጋገጸ ጸረ-ቫይረስ መድሃኒት ኣይተረኽበን።
en-mt: At the time of writing, no confirmed anti-virus drugs have been found.

sourceString: However, intravenous administration with remdesivir, a nucleotide analog, has been found to be efficacious in an American patient with COVID-19.
targetString: እንተኾነ፡ ናይ ረመደሲቪር (remdesivir) ምሕደራዊ ምትእትታው ኒክለታይድ ኣናሎግ (nucleotide analog)፡ ኣብ ሓደ ኣሜሪካዊ ተሓካሚ  ናይ ኮቪድ-19 ውጽኢታዊ ኮይኑ ተረኪቡ።
en-mt: However, the remdesivir regulatory nucleotide analogy has been found to be effective in a U.S. patient for COVID-19.

sourceString: Remdesivir is a novel antiviral drug developed by Gilead initially for the treatment of diseases caused by Ebola and Marlburg viruses.
targetString: ረምደሲቨር (Remdesivir) ኖቨል ጸረ-ቫይረስ መድሃኒት ኮይኑ፡ መጀመያ ብ ጊልያድ ፡ ን ምፍዋስ ሕማማት ኢቦላ (Ebola)ን ሙልበርግ (Marlburg) ቫይረስን ተባሂሉ፡ ዝማዕበለ ኮይኑ፡፡
en-mt: Remdesivir was developed by Gilead as an anti-virus drug for the treatment of Ebola and the Marlburg virus.

sourceString: Later, remdesivir also demonstrated possible inhibition of other single stranded RNA viruses including MERS and SARS viruses.
targetString: ድሂሩ፡ ረምደሺቨር (remdesivir) ካልእ ሓጹር ክህሉ ከም ዝኽእል ኣሚቱ፡ እዚ ድማ ናይቲ ንጽል ስትራንድ ዝሓዘ ቫይረስ ን MERS ን SARS ቫይረስት ዘጠቃለል ኢዩ.

sourceString: Based on these, Gilead has provided the compound to China to conduct a pair of trials on SARS-CoV-2-infected individuals, and the results are highly anticipated.
targetString: ብመሰረት እዚ: Gilead ንቻይና ጸምዲ ፈተነታት SARS-CoV-2- ከተካይደሉ ብምባል ነቲ ቀጽሪ ከም ዝገደፈትላን ብዙሕ ውጽኢታዊ ክኸውን ተስፋ እተገብረሉን ምዃኑ እዩ።

sourceString: In addition, baricitinb, interferon-α, lopinavir/ritonavir, and ribavirin have been suggested as potential therapies for patients with acute respiratory symptoms.
targetString: ብተወሳኺ ጽኑዕ ሽግር ምስትንፋስ ንዘለዎም ሰባት barictinb, interferon-, lopinovir/ritonavir ክምኡውን ribavirin ከም ተወሰኽቲ ሕክምናታት ተመልኪቶም ኣለዉ።

sourceString: Plasma from recovered patients and antibody generation

sourceString: The collection of the blood from patients who recovered from a contagious disease to treat other patients suffering from the same disease or to protect healthy individuals from catching the disease has a long history.

sourceString: Indeed, recovered patients often have a relatively high level of antibodies against the pathogen in their blood.
targetString: ብልክዕ፡ እቶም ዝሓወዩ ተሓከምቲ ዝለዓለ መጠን ናይ ጸረ-ነፍሳት ኣንጻር ናይቶም ሰበብ-ሕማማት ኣብ ደም ኣለዎም።

sourceString: Antibodies are an immunoglobulin (Ig) produced by B lymphocytes to fight pathogens and other foreign objects and they recognize unique molecules in the pathogens and neutralize them directly.
targetString: ጸረ-ነፍሳት ኢሚኖግሎቢን (immunoglobulin) ኮይኖም (lg) በቶም B ሊምፎቻይትስ ኢዮም ዝምስርሑ፡ እዚ ድማ ነቶም ጠንቂ ሕማማት (pathogens) ካልኦት ብደገ ዝመጹ ነገራትን ምቍዋም ኢዩ ስርሑ፡ ኣብቶም ሰበብ/ጠንቂ ሕማም ዘለዉ ሞለኩልስ የለልይዎምን የጥፍእዎምን ድማ።
en-mt: Antibiotic immunoglobulins (lg) are made up of B lymphochitis, which prevents pathogens and other outside sources, which detect and destroy molecules in the cause of the disease.

sourceString: Based on this, plasma was collected from the blood of a group of patients who recovered from COVID-19 and was injected into 10 seriously ill patients.

sourceString: Their symptoms improved within 24 hours, accompanied by reduced inflammation and viral loads and improved oxygen saturation in the blood.
targetString: እቲ ምልክታቶም ኣብ ውሽጢ 24 ሰዓታት ተመሓይሹ፡ እዚ ድማ በቲ ዝጎደለ ነድሪን ቫይረሳዊ ጽዕነትን ከምኡውን ናይ ኦክሲጅን ቅጸት/ምምላእ የጠቃልል።

sourceString: However, verification and clarification are necessary to propose the method for large-scale use before specific therapies are not yet developed.

sourceString: In addition, given the therapeutic effects, some disadvantages associated with the plasma should be considered carefully.

sourceString: For example, antibodies can overstimulate the immune response and cause cytokine release syndrome, which is potentially a life-threatening toxicity.

en-mt: For example, antibiotics can overstimplit the immune system, causing the saitykin to break down the syndrome, which leads to death.

sourceString: The concentration of antibodies in the blood is usually low, and the demand for the plasma is large to treat critically ill patients.

sourceString: It is difficult to develop and produce specific antibodies rapidly enough to fight against a global epidemic.
targetString: ፍሉያት ጸረ-ነፍሳት፡ ነዚ ዝኸይድ ዘሎ ለበዳ ክጻረርዎ ዝኽእሉ፡  ከተፍሪን ከተማዕበልን ኣዝዩ ከቢድ ኢዩ።

sourceString: Thus, it is more critical and practical to isolate B cells from recovered patients and identify the genetic codes encoding effective antibodies or screen for effective antibodies against essential proteins of the virus.
targetString: ስለዚ፡ ነቶም B ዋህዮታት ካብ ዝሓወየ ሕሙም ክትፈልዮም ዝቐለለን ተግባራዊን ኢዩ፡ በዚ ድማ ነቲ ጀነቲካዊ ኮዳት ናይቶም ውጽኢታውያን ጸረ-ነፍሳት ኮድ መግበሪ፡ ወይ መከላኸሊ ን ኣንጻር ውጽኢታውያን ጸረ-ነፍሳት ኣንጻር ኣገደስቲ ፕሮቲናትን ፡ከተለልዮም ይኸእል።
en-mt: It is therefore easier and more practical to distinguish the B cells from a recovered patient, thereby identifying the genetic codes of the effective antibiotics, the food code or protection and against effective antibiotics against essential proteins.

sourceString: This way, we can readily scale up the production of the antibodies.

sourceString: TCM has been used to treat a variety of diseases in China for thousands of years.

sourceString: However, its effects largely rely on a combination of multiple components in a formula that varies depending on the diagnosis of a disease based on the theories of TCM.

en-mt: Most of the effective parts are not yet known or are only known, because it is difficult to isolate and isolate such parts and their ultimate success.

sourceString: Currently, due to the lack of effective and specific therapy for COVID-19, TCM has become one of the major alternative treatments for patients with light to moderate symptoms or for those who have recovered from severe stages.
targetString: ኣብዚ እዋን ን COVID-19 ዝኸውን ፍቱንን ውጽኢታውን ሕክምና ስለዘየለ ምልክታት ሕሙማት ንምሕዋይ TCM ሓደ ካብቶም ዓበይቲ ቅያር ሕክምና ኮይኑ’ሎ።
en-mt: Due to the lack of effective treatment for COVID-19, TCM is one of the biggest changes in treatment for the healing of patients.

sourceString: For example, Shu Feng Jie Du capsules and Lian Hua Qing Wen capsules were found to be effective for COVID-19 treatment.
targetString: ከም ኣብነት፡ ናይ  ሹ ፈንግ ጀይ ዱ (Shu Feng Jie Du) መድሃኒት  ከምኡ`ውን ናይ ሊያን ሁዋ ኪንግ ወን (Lian Hua Qing Wen) መድሃኒታት፡ ን ክንክን/ምፍዋስ ናይ ኮቪድ-19 ውጽኢታዊ ኮይኑ ተረኺቡ።
en-mt: For example, the Shu Feng Jie Du drug and Lian Hua Qing Wen medicines have been found to be effective in treating COVID-19.

sourceString: Top cure rates in the treatment of COVID-19 patients were observed in several provinces in China that used TCM in 87% of their patients, including Gansu (63.7%), Ningxia (50%), and Hunan (50%), whereas Hubei province, which used TCM in only approximately 30% of its COVID-19 patients, had the lowest cure rate (13%).
targetString: ኣብ ብርክት ዝበላ TCM ዝጥቀማ ኣውራጃታት ቻይና እንተላይ Gansu (63.7%), Ningxia (50%) ክምኡውን Hunan (50%) ልዑል መጠን ምሕዋይ COVID-19 ማለት 87% ካብ ሕሙማት ምሕዋዮም፡ ኣብ ሕሙማት COVID-19 ኣስታት 30% TCM ጥራይ ኣኣብ ዝተጠቕማ ኣውራጃታት Hubei እቲ መጠን ምሕዋይ ዝወሓደ (ማለት--13% ጥራይ ) እዩ።
en-mt: In many Chinese provinces that use TCM, including Gansu (63.7%), Ningxia (50%), and Hunan (50%), the high rate of COVID-19 recovery, which is 87% of the patients, is 30% TCM in COVID-19 patients, and Hubei provinces where only about 30% TCM have used it, the recovery rate is lower (that is, only 13%).

sourceString: However, this is quite a rough comparison as many other impact factors such as the number and severity of the patients should be included in the evaluation.
targetString: እንተኾነ፡ ብከምዚ ምውድዳር ከቢድ ኢዩ፡ ምኽንያቱ ካልኦት ረቃሒታት ከም ቁጽርን ሓደገኝነትን ናይ ሕሙም ኣብቲ ጸብጻብ ክኣቱ ኣለዎ።
en-mt: However, it is difficult to compare in this way, as other factors, such as the number and responsibility of the patient, must be included in the report.

sourceString: On February 18, 2020, Boli Zhang and coworkers published a study to compare western medicine (WM) treatment alone with combined treatment of WM and TCM.
targetString: ለካቲት 18, 2020, Boli Zhang ሰራሕተኛቱን ኣብ ዘውጽእዎ መጽናዕታዊ ጽሑፍ ምዕራባዊ መድሃኒት ንበይኑ ምስ ውሁድ ሕክምና TCMን ምዕራባዊ ሕክምናን ኣወዳዲሮም።
en-mt: On February 18, 2020, Boli Zhang and his staff said in a research paper that they compared western medicine alone to compound treatments of TCM and Western medicine.

sourceString: They found that the times needed for body temperature recovery, symptom disappearance, and hospitalization were remarkably shorter in the WM+TCM group than in the WM only group.
targetString: እቲ ነቲ ኣካላት ናይ ሕሙም/ተሓካሚ ናብ ንቡር ደረጃ ናይ ሙቀት ክምለስ ፡ ምልክታት ክጠፍእ፡ ከምኡ`ውን ሕክምና ክውድእ ዝወስደሉ ግዜ፡ ኣብቶ ናይ WM+TCM ጉጅለ ካብቶም ናይ WM ዝሓጸረ ኢዩ።
en-mt: he time it takes for the patient's body to return to normal temperature, symptoms disappear and complete treatment is shorter than that of the WM+TCM group.

sourceString: Most impressively, the rate for symptomatic worsening (from light to severe) was remarkably lower for the WM+TCM group than for the WM only group (7.4% versus 46.2%) and the mortality was lower in the WM+TCM group than WM only group (8.8% versus 39%).
targetString: ኣዝዩ ኣገራሚ፡ እቲ መጠን ምውሳኽ ናይቲ ምልካፍ ብዘይ ምልክታት (symptomatic) ኣዝዩ ገዲዱ (ካብ ፈኪስ ናብ ሓደገኛ)፡ ኣብ WM+TCM ጉጅለታት ምስቶም ናይ WM ጉጅለታት ብምንጽጻር (7.4% ኣንጻር  46.2%) ፡ ብጉሉሕ ትሑት ሓደገኝነት ኣለዎ፡ እቲ ናይ ሞት ሓደጋ ድማ ኣብቶም WM+TCM ጉጅለታት ምሶም ናይ WM ጉጅለታት ብምንጽጻር ዝተሓተ ኢዩ (8.8% ኣንጻር  39%)።
en-mt: Surprisingly, the increase in the rate of the infection without symptomatic (from mild to dangerous) has significantly reduced risk in WM+TCM groups compared to WM+TCM groups (7.4% vs 46.2%), and the risk of death is lower compared to WM+TCM groups (8.8% vs 39%).

sourceString: Nevertheless, the efficacy and safety of TCM still await more well-controlled trials at larger scales and in more centers.
targetString: እንተኾነ፡ እቲ ውጽኢትን ውሕስነትን ናይ TCM፡ ኣብ ዓበይቲ ደረጃታትን ማእከላትን ፡ ግቡእ-ቁጽጽር ዘለዎም ፈተነታት ክግበሩ ትጽቢት ይገብር።
en-mt: However, the results and safety of TCM are expected to be conducted at large levels and centers with proper control.

sourceString: It would also be intriguing to characterize the mechanism of actions and clarify the effective components of TCM treatments or their combinations if possible.
targetString: ነቲ ኣሰራርሓ ናይ ምንቅስቃሳትን ምንዳፍን፡ ከምኡ`ውን  እቶም ውጽ ኢታውያን ዝኾነ ኣካላት ናይ TCM ሕክምናን ናታቶም ሕውስዋስን ምንጻርን፡ ኣዝዩ ኣሸጋሪን ሕልኽላኽን መስርሕ ክኸውን ይኽእል ኢዩ።
en-mt: Designing and designing the procedure, as well as the effective treatment of TCM and their organs can be a very difficult and complex process.

sourceString: Patients with suspected or confirmed COVID-19 mostly experience great fear of the highly contagious and even fatal disease, and quarantined people also experience boredom, loneliness, and anger.
targetString: እቶም ምስቶም ብ ኮቪድ-19 ዝተለኽፉ ወይ ዝተጠርጠሩ ሰባት ዘለዉ ሕሙማት/ተሓከምቲ ብሰንኪ ሓያል ናይ ምልባዕ ብቅዓት ናይዚ ቫይረስ ከቢድ ፍርሒ ኢዩ ዝስመዕም፡  እቶም ዝተወሸቡ ሰባት ድማ ኣዝዩ ይስልችዎም፡ ጽምዋ ይስምዕም፡ ከምኡ`ውን ይሓርቁ።
en-mt: patients/patients with people who have been infected or suspected of COVID-19 feel a serious fear due to the strong spread of the virus, and those who are infected are very angry, lonely and angry.

sourceString: Furthermore, symptoms of the infection such as fever, hypoxia, and cough as well as adverse effects of the treatments such as insomnia caused by corticosteroids can lead to more anxiety and mental distress.
targetString: ብተወሳኺ፡ ምልክታት ናይቲ መልከፍቲ ከም ረስኒ፡ ሂፖክስያን ሰዓልን፡ ከምኡ`ውን ሕማቕ ጽልዋታት ናይ ምክንኻን ሕክምና ከም ኢንሶምያ (insomnia)፡ ብ ኮርቲኮስትሪዮይድ (corticosteroids) ዝመሓላለፍ ናይ ጭንቀትን ሕማም ኣእምሮን ከምርሕ ይኽእል።
en-mt: In addition, symptoms of the infection, such as hypoxia and cough fever, and poor care effects, such as insomnia, can lead to anxiety and dementia, which is transmitted by corticosteroids.

sourceString: In the early phase of the SARS outbreak, a range of psychiatric morbidities including persistent depression, anxiety, panic attacks, psychomotor excitement, psychotic symptoms, delirium, and even suicidality were reported.
targetString: ኣብ ናይ ፈለማ ገጽ ምልዓል ሕማም ሳርስ ብዙሓት ከምኒ ጭንቀት፥ ተርባጽ፥ ምርባሽን ሳይኮሞቶር ምጭናቕን ሕማም ኣእምሮን ሃተፍተፍ ምባል እንተላይ ነፍሰ ቕትለት ዝኣመሰሉ ስነኣእምሮኣዊ ሕማማት ከም እተራእዩ ተጸብጺቡ።
en-mt: It was reported that on the first surface of SARS, many people were diagnosed with mental illnesses such as anxiety, depression, psychomotors, anxiety and mental illness, including suicide.

sourceString: Mandatory contact tracing and quarantine, as a part of the public health responses to the COVID-19 outbreak, can make people more anxious and guilty about the effects of the contagion, quarantine, and stigma on their families and friends.
targetString: ከም ኣካል ናይቲ ን ለበዳ COVID-19 ዝወሃብ ዘሎ ግብረመልስ ህዝባዊ ጥዕና ግድነታዊ እለሻ ምትንኻፋትን ውሸባን ሰባት ብምትንኻፍ ውሸባን ምንጻልን ዝመጽእ ዘየድሊ ስምዒታት ከስዕበሎም ይኽእል እዩ።
en-mt: As part of the public health response to the COVID-19 pandemic, unnecessary feelings of isolation and isolation can lead to unnecessary contact and isolation.

sourceString: Thus, mental health care should be provided to COVID-19 patients, suspected individuals, and people in contact with them as well as the general public who are in need.
targetString: ስለዚ፡ ነቶን ተሓከምትቲ ኮቪድ-19፡ ነቶም ጥርጡራትን ምስ ልኩፋት ዝኾነ ርክብ ዝነበሮምን ወላውን ነዚ ክንክን ዘድልዩ ሓፋሽ፡  ኣእሙረኣዊ ናይ ጥዕናዊ ክንክን ክወሃብ ኣለዎ።
en-mt: herefore, COVID-19 patients should be provided with new mental health care to those who have suspected and have had close contact with them, and who need this care.

sourceString: The psychological support should include the establishment of multidisciplinary mental health teams, clear communications with regular and accurate updates about the SARS-CoV-2 outbreak and treatment plans and the use of professional electronic devices and applications to avoid close contact with each other.
targetString: እቲ ሳይኮሎጂካል (psychological) ደገፍ ፡ ናይ ኣእምሮ ደገፍ ዝህቡ ናይ  ክኢላታት ጉጅለ  ምፍጣር፡ ነጻ ርክባት ምስ ስሩዕን ቁኑዕን  ሓበሬታታት ናይ SARS-CoV-2 ምስፍሕፋሕን ናይ ምፍዋስ መደባትን ከምኡውን ተጠቃምነት ናይ ሞያዊ ኤለክትሮኒካዊ መሳርሒን ኣፕሊኬሽናትን (ነቲ ምቅርራባት ኣብ መንጎና ዘሎ ንምውጋድ) ዘጠቃለለ ክኸውን ኣለዎ።
en-mt: The psychological support should include the creation of an expert team of experts providing mental support, free contacts with regular and accurate information of SARS-CoV-2 expansion and treatment programs, and the use of professional electronic devices and applications (to eliminate the attachments between us).

sourceString: Effective vaccines are essential for interrupting the chain of transmission from animal reservoirs and infected humans to susceptible hosts and are often complementary to antiviral treatment in the control of epidemics caused by emerging viruses.
targetString: ውጽኢታውያን ክታበታት ነቲ መንገዲ ምትእስሳር ናይ ምምሕልላፍ ፡ ካብ እንስሳ  (መዕቆርቲ) ወይ ልኹፍ ሰብ ናብቶም ጥርጡራት ኣኣንገድቲ ናብ   ንምስቱርጋም/ንምግማት ኣዝዮም ኢዮም ጠቀምቲ፡ ከምኡውን ነቲ ጸረ-ቫይረስ መድሃኒታት (በቶም ሓደሽቲ ቫይረስ ዝፍተሩ ነቲ ለበዳ መቆጻጸሪ)፡ ኣዝዮም ኢዮምጠቀምቲ።
en-mt: Effective vaccines are highly used to predict the transmission of transmission from animals or infected animals to suspected carriers, and anti-virus drugs (controlling the pandemic by the new virus).

sourceString: Efforts have been made to develop S protein-based vaccines to generate long-term and potent neutralizing antibodies and/or protective immunity against SARS-CoV.
targetString: ነቲ ኣብ S ፕሮቲን ዝተመርኮሰ ክታበት ንምምዕባል ጻዕርታት ይግበር ኣሎ፡ እዚ ድማ ነቶም ጸረ-ነፍሳት ንምጥፋእ ዘኽእል ነዊሕ ዓመታት ዝቕጽል ዕቁር ዓቅሚ ዘለዎን ኣንጻር SARS-CoV ድማ ክከላኸል ዘኽእል ናይ ምክልኻል ዓቅሚ ክፈጥር ዘኽእልን ኢዩ።
en-mt: Efforts are being made to develop the S protein-based vaccine, which will have the potential to eradicate antibiotics, which will last for many years and will create immunity against SARS-CoV.

sourceString: Live-attenuated vaccines have been evaluated in animal models for SARS.
targetString: ዝተቓጠኑ ክትባታት ኣብ እንስሳታት ሞዴላት ሳርስ ተፈቲኖም ኣለዉ።
en-mt: Vaccines have been tested in animals, SARS models.

sourceString: However, the in vivo efficacy of these vaccine candidates in elderly individuals and lethal-challenge models and their protection against zoonotic virus infection have yet to be determined before a clinical study is initiated.
targetString: ይኹንምበር ኣብቶም ሕጹያት ሽማግለታትን lethal challenge models ከምኡውን መጠን ምክልኻል ለበዳ zoonotic ቫይረስን ቅድሚ ክሊኒካዊ መጽናዕቲ ምጽፋፉ ክጣለል ዝግብኦ እዩ።
en-mt: However, it is important to note that the elderly and lethal challenge models and the rate of preventing the zoonotic virus pandemic should be discouraged before writing a clinical study.

sourceString: This is probably because SARS died down 17 years ago and no new case has been reported since.
targetString: እዚ ድም ምናልባት SARS ቅድሚ 17 ዓመት ብሙማቱን ብድሕሪ ኡ ድማ ዝኾነ ሓዲሽ ግዳይ ብዘይ ምርካቡን ኢዩ ክኸውን ዝኽእል።
en-mt: his may have been the case when SARS died 17 years ago and no new cases were found after it.

sourceString: In contrast, sporadic cases and clusters of MERS continue to occur in the Middle East and spread to other regions owing to the persistence of zoonotic sources in endemic areas.
targetString: ብንጽጽር: ዘይስሩዕ ኩነታት ከምኡ’ውን ክላስተራት MERS ኣብ ማእከላይ ምብራቕ ክኽሰትን ብምኽንያት ኣብዞም ቦታታት ዘሎ ሱር ዝሰደደ ህላወ zoonotic (ካብ እንስሳ ዝብገስ ሕማማ) ናብ ካልኦት ዞባታት ክላባዕን እዩ።
en-mt: Due to the relative irregularities and the spread of MERS clusters in the Middle East, the zoonotic presence (animal-derived disease) in these places will spread to other regions.

sourceString: Vaccination strategies have been developed for MERS by using inactivated virus, DNA plasmids, viral vectors, nanoparticles, virus-like particles and recombinant protein subunits and some have been evaluated in animal models.
targetString: እቲ ናይ ክታበት መደባት፡ ካብ MERS ብዘይ ንጡፍ ቫይረስ፡ DNA ፕላስሚድስ፡ ቫይራል ቨክቶር፡ ናኖፓርቲክለ፡ ቫይረስ መሰል ነገራት ከምኡ`ውን ሓውሲ ፕሮቲናትን  ከምኡ`ውን ኣብ እንስሳ ብምፍታን ኢዩ ማዕቢሉ፡፡
en-mt: he vaccine programs have been developed by testing from MERS without an active virus, DNA, plasma, viral vector, nanoparticle virus, material rights and proteins, and animals.

sourceString: The development of a safe and effective vaccine against SARS-CoV-2 for non-immune individuals is an urgent and critical task for controlling the ongoing epidemic.
targetString: እቲ ምዕባለ ናይ ውሑስን ውጽኢታውን ክታበት  SARS-CoV-2፡ ነቶም ናይ ምጽዋር ዓቅሚ ዘይብሎምን ነቲ ዘስፋሕፍሕ ዘሎ ለበዳን፡ ህጹጽን ኣስጋእን ኢዩ።
en-mt: he development of a safe and effective SARS-CoV-2 vaccine is urgent for those who are unable to cope and the spread of the pandemic.

sourceString: However, it is challenging to overcome the difficulty because of the long period of time (averaged 18 months) needed for vaccine development and the dynamic variations of CoVs.
targetString: ይኹንምበር ብምኽንያት ንውሓት ግዜ (ብማእከላይ ገምጋም 18 ኣዋርሕ) ምቅይያራት እቲ ቫይረስን ክትባት ንምድላው ዘድሊ ግዜን እቲ ብድሆ ብቐሊል ዝሰዓር እይኮነን።
en-mt: However, due to the length of the virus (average 18 months), changes in the virus and the time needed to prepare for the vaccine, the challenge is not overcome.

sourceString: As a novel disease, COVID-19 has just started to manifest its full clinical course throughout thousands of patients.
targetString: ከም ሓድሽ ሕማም መጠን COVID-19 ምሉእ ሕክምናዊ ኣንፈቱ ኣብ ኣሽሓት ሕሙማት ከግህድ ጀሚሩ ኣሎ።
en-mt: As a new disease, COVID-19 has begun to spread its entire medical care to thousands of patients.

sourceString: In most cases, patients can recover gradually without sequelae.
targetString: ኣብ ዝበዝሑ ሕማማት ሕሙማት ቀስ እናበሉ ብዘይ sequelae ክሓውዩ ይጅምሩ።
en-mt: In most cases, patients begin to recover gradually without sequelae.

sourceString: However, similar to SARS and MERS, COVID-19 is also associated with high morbidity and mortality in patients with severe cases.
targetString: እንተኾነ ምስ SARS ን MERS ብዝመሳሰል፡ ኮቪድ-19 ነቶም ኣዝዮም ዝተጎድ ኡ ሕሙማት ቀሊፉ ናይ ምቅታል ባህራት ኣለዎ።
en-mt: However, in the case of SARS and MERS, COVID-19 has the ability to kill the most affected patients.

sourceString: Therefore, building a prognosis model for the disease is essential for health-care agencies to prioritize their services, especially in resource-constrained areas.
targetString: ስለዚ፡ እቲ ናይ ፕሮግኖሲስ/ትንቢት ንድፊ ናይ ሕማም ምስራሕ፡ ነቶም ተከናከንቲ ጥዕና ነቲ ኣገልግሎቶም ቀዳምነት ንምሃብ (ብፍላይ ኣብቲ ቀረባት ዘይብሉ ቦታ) ኣዝዩ ኣገዳሲ ኢዩ።
en-mt: herefore, the design of the prognosis/prediction of disease work is very important for health care providers to prioritize their services (especially in areas where there is no nearby).

sourceString: Based on clinical studies reported thus far, the following factors may affect or be associated with the prognosis of COVID-19 patients (Table ​(Table33):
targetString: ብመሰረት ዛጊት ጸብጻብ እተኻየደሎም ክሊኒካዊ መጽናዕቲታት እዞም ዝስዕቡ ረቛሒታት ንቅድመ ግምገማ ሕሙማት COVID-19 ከጸልዉ ይኽእሉ እዮም (ሰሌዳ 33):
en-mt: According to the latest clinical studies, the following factors may affect the pre-assessment of COVID-19 patients (Table 33)

sourceString: Age: Age was the most important factor for the prognosis of SARS, which is also true for COVID-19.
targetString: ዕድመ፡ ዕድመ ነቲ ናይ SARS ትንቢት ምስፍሕፋሕ ካብቶም ኣዝዩ ኣገደስቲ ረቃሒታት ኔሩ፡ ኣብ ኮቪድ-19 ውን ከምኡ።
en-mt: Age was one of the most important factors in the spread of SARS prophecy, as well as in COVID-19.

sourceString: COVID-19 mainly happened at the age of 30-65 with 47.7% of those patients being over 50 in a study of 8,866 cases as described above.
targetString: ኮቪድ-19 ኣብ ክሊ ዕድመ 30-65 ዝበዝሐ መልከፍቲ የስዕብ፡ ካብዞም ዝተጠቅሱ ክሊ ዕድመ ድማ እቶ 47.7% ካብ 50 ንላዕሊ ኢዩ ዕድሚኦም፡ እዚ ኣብ 8,866 ልሕፋት ዝተገብረ መጽናዕቲ ኢዩ።
en-mt: COVID-19 causes more infections in the age group of 30-65, and 47.7% of those mentioned age are over 50 years old, a study of 8,866 lepts.

sourceString: Patients who required intensive care were more likely to have underlying comorbidities and complications and were significantly older than those who did not (at the median age of 66 versus 51), suggesting age as a prognostic factor for the outcome of COVID-19 patients.
targetString: ጽዑቕ ክንክን ዝጠልቡን ተጓደንቲ ሕማምት ዘለዎም ተሓከምቲ ብዕድመ ካብቶም ዘይብሎም ዕብይ ዝበሉ ምዃኖም (ብገምጋም 66 ምስ 51) ዕድመ ኣዝዩ ኣገዳሲ ከፋል ገምጋም ተሓከምቲ COVID-19 ምኻኑ ዘመልክት እዩ።
en-mt: Patients with intensive care are older than those without (averaged 66 with 51) and the age of COVID-19 patients is a very important part of the assessment.

sourceString: Sex: SARS-CoV-2 has infected more men than women (0.31/100,000 versus 0.27/100,000), as described above.
targetString: ጾታ፡ ከምቲ ኣብ ላዕሊ እተጠቕሰ SARS-CoV-2 ካብ ደቀንስትዮ ዝያዳ ደቂ ተባዕትዮ ተላቢዑ ዝርከብ ሕማም እዩ (0.31/100000 ምስ 0.27/100000 ኣወዳድር)።
en-mt: Gender is a disease that, like the aforementioned SARS-CoV-2, is a disease that is more male than women (compare 0.31/10000000 to 0.27/1000000).

sourceString: Comorbidities and complications: Patients with COVID-19 who require intensive care are more likely to suffer from acute cardiac injury and arrhythmia.
targetString: ጎድናዊ ሕምማትን ምትሕልላኻትን፥ ብሰንኪ COVID-19 ዝሳቐዩን ኣብ ጽዑቕ ክንክን ዝርከቡን ሕምማት ብመጒዳእቲ ልቢን ኣሪትሚያን ይሳቐዩ እዮም።
en-mt: Side effects and complications from COVID-19 and intensive care patients suffer from heart damage and arithmean.

sourceString: Cardiac events were also the main reason for death in SARS patients.
targetString: ናይ ልቢ ሕማማት ውን ቀንጢ ጠንቂ ሞት ናይ SARS ተሓከምቲ ኢዩ ኔሩ።
en-mt: Heart disease was also the cause of death for SARS patients.

sourceString: It has been reported that SARS-CoV-2 can also bind to ACE2-positive cholangiocytes, which might lead to liver dysfunctions in COVID-19 patients.
targetString: SARS-CoV-2 ምስ  ACE2-ኣወንታዊ ቾላንጊሳይትስ (cholangiocytes) ክጥመር ከም ዝኽእል ተሓቢሩ፡ እዚ ድማ ናይቶም ተሓከምቲ ኮቪድ-19 ጸላም ከብዲ ካብ ስራሕ ወጻኢ ክገብር ይኽእል።
en-mt: SARS-CoV-2 can be associated with ACE2-positive cholangiocytes, which can cause COVID-19 patients to lose their liver.

sourceString: It is worth noting that age and underlying disease are strongly correlated and might interfere with each other.
targetString: ዕድመን፡ ሕዱር ሕማማትን ነንሓድሕዶም ዝተኣሳሰሩን ክልቲኦም ድማ ዝጸላለዉን ኢዮም።
en-mt: Age and disease are intertwined and both affect each other.

sourceString: Abnormal laboratory findings: The C-reactive protein (CRP) level in blood reflects the severity of inflammation or tissue injury and has been proposed to be a potential prognostic factor for disease, response to therapy, and ultimate recovery.
targetString: ዘይንቡራት ተረኽቦታት ላቦራቶሪ፥ ኣብ ደም ዝህሉ መጠን C-reactive protein (CRP) ኣብ ቲሹ ዘሎ ጉድኣትን ረኽሲን ግብረመልሲ ሕክምና ናይ ምሕዋይ ምልክት ወይ ናይ መርመራ ረቋሑ ውጽኢት ክኸውን ይኽእል እዩ።
en-mt: Abnormal laboratory findings: C-reactive protein (CRP) in the blood may be a sign of recovery or a test result of damage and infection in the tissue.

sourceString: The correlation of CRP level to the severity and prognosis of COVID-19 has also been proposed.
targetString: ዝምድና መጠን CRP ምስ ጽኑዕነትን ኣፈናዊ ገምጋምን COVID-19ንእማመ ቀሪቡ ኔሩ እዩ።
en-mt: he relationship between crp levels is close to the strength and efficacy of COVID-19.

sourceString: In addition, elevated lactate dehydrogenase (LDH), aspartate aminotransferase (AST), alanine aminotransferase (ALT), and creatine kinase (CK) may also help predict the outcome.
targetString: ብዘይካዚ elevated hydrogenase (LDH) aspartate minotransferase (AST), alanine aminotransferase (ALT) creatine kinase (CK) እቲ ዝድለ ውጽኢት ክርከበሎም ይኽእል እዩ።
en-mt: In addition, elevated hydrogenase (LDH) aspartate minotransferase (AST), alanine aminotransferase (ALT) and creatine kinase (CK) can be obtained with the desired results.

sourceString: These enzymes are expressed extensively in multiple organs, especially in the heart and liver, and are released during tissue damage.
targetString: እዞም ኢንዛይማት ኣብ ብዙሓት ህዋሳት ብዝተፈላለይ መልክዕ ኢዩ ዝቀርቡ፡ ብፍላይ ድማ ኣብ ልቢን ጸላም-ከብድን፡ ቲሹ (እኩብ ዋህዮ) ክጉዳእ እንከሎ ደም ናይ ምንዛዕ ባህሪ ኣለዎም።
en-mt: hese enzymes are present in many senses in a variety of forms, especially when it comes to the heart and liver tissue.

sourceString: Thus, they are traditional markers for heart or liver dysfunctions.
targetString: ስለዚ፡ ልቢ ወይ ጸላም-ከብዲ ካብ ስራሕ ወጻኢ ኣብ ዝኾናሉ እዚኦም ባህላውያን ኣመልካቲ ኢዮም።
en-mt: In other words, when the heart or stomach is out of work.

sourceString: Major clinical symptoms: Chest radiography and temporal progression of clinical symptoms should be considered together with the other issues for the prediction of outcomes and complications of COVID-19.
targetString: ዓበይቲ ክሊኒካዊ ምልክታት፡ ናይ ኣፍልቢ ራድዮ-ግራፊ ከምኡ`ውን ግዝያዊ ምቕጻል ናይ ክሊኒካዊ ምልክታት ምስቶም ካልኦት ጸገማት ኣብ ግምት ኣእቲካ ነቲ ግምት ናይ ውጽኢትን ምትሕልላኽ ናይ ኮቪድ-19ን።
en-mt: Consider major clinical symptoms of chest radiography and temporary continuation of clinical symptoms along with other problems to consider the estimate of outcomes and transmission of COVID-19.

sourceString: Use of steroids: As described above, steroids are immunosuppressant commonly used as an adjunctive therapy for infectious diseases to reduce the severity of inflammatory damage.
targetString: ኣጠቓቕማ ስትሮይድስ፥ ከምቲ ኣብ ላዕሊ ኣተጠቕሰ ስተሮይድስ ሕማም ናይ ምክልኻል ባህርያዊ ትዕድልትና ዝዕንቅፉን ብተለምዶ ንሕማማት ተላገብን ብነድሪ ዝስዕብ ዕንወትን ንምንካይ ከም ተወሳኺ ሕክምና ኮይኑ ዘገልግል እዩ።
en-mt: he use of steroids, as mentioned above, is used as an additional treatment to reduce infectious diseases and inflammatory disasters, such as steroids that hinder our natural immune system.

sourceString: Since a high dosage of corticosteroids was widely used in severe SARS patients, many survivors suffered from avascular osteonecrosis with life-long disability and poor life quality.
targetString: ሕማም SARS ዝጸንዖም ብዝሕ ዝበለ መጠን መድሃኒት cortcosteroids ብምውሳዶም ካብቶም ዝሓወዩ ብርክት ዝበሉ ንነባሪ ስንክልናን ሕማቕ ህይወትን ተቃሊዖም እዮም።
en-mt: As a result of taking more cortcosteroids and taking cortcosteroids that have been diagnosed WITH SARS, many of those who recover are exposed to permanent disability and poor life.

sourceString: Thus, if needed, steroids should be used at low dosage and for a short time in COVID-19 patients.
targetString: ስለዚ እንተደኣ ዘገድስ ኮይኑ እቶም ኣስተሮኢድ፡ ኣብቶም ናይ ኮቪድ-19  ብ ትሑት ዓቀን ኣብ ጥቕሚ ክውዕሉ ኣለዎም፡፡
en-mt: herefore, if necessary, the vaccines should be used in low doses of COVID-19.

sourceString: Mental stress: As described above, during the COVID-19 outbreak many patients have suffered from extraordinary stress as they often endured long periods of quarantine and extreme uncertainty and witnessed the death of close family members and fellow patients.
targetString: ናይ ኣእምሮ ጸቕጢ ፡ ከምዚ ኣብ ላዕሊ ዝተጠቅሰ፡ ኣብቲ ግዜ ምስፍሕፋሕ ናይ ኮቪድ-19 ብዙሓት ካብ ልኹፋት ተሓከምቲ ናይዚ ቫይረስ፡ ኣዝዩ ከቢድ ጭንቀት ከም ዝሓለፉን፡ እዚ ድማ ብሰንኪ እቲ ዘይተወሰነ ግዚያት ናይ ውሸባን፡ ምርኣይ ሞት ናይ ቀረባ ቤተ-ሰብን ካልኦት ተሓከምቲን ፡ ክኸውን ይኽእል።
en-mt: Mental stress, as mentioned above, during the spread of COVID-19, many of the infected patients experienced extreme anxiety, which may result from the unlimited quarantine and sight of close family members and other patients.

sourceString: It is imperative to provide psychological counseling and long-term support to help these patients recover from the stress and return to normal life.
targetString: ነቶም ተሓከምቲ ናይዚ ቫይረስ፡ ሳይኮሎጂቻልን ነዊሕ ዝጠመተ ደገፋትን ብምግባር ካብ ጭንቀት ከነገላግሎምን ናብ ንበር ሂወቶም ክንመልሶም ንኽእልን።
en-mt: With psychological and long-term support, we can help patients recover from anxiety and return to their lives.

sourceString: According to demographic studies so far, COVID-19 seems to have different epidemiological features from SARS.
targetString: ብመሰረት ዲሞግራፊክ መጽናዕትታት፡ ክሳብ ሕጂ፡ ኮቪድ-19 ምስ SARS ብምንጽጻር ዝተፈልየ መልክዕ ናይ ለበዳ (ኢፒዶሞሎጂ) የርኢ ኣሎ።
en-mt: According to demographic studies, COVID-19 is showing a different form of epidemiology compared to SARS.

sourceString: In addition to replicating in the lower respiratory tract, SARS-CoV-2 can efficiently replicate in the upper respiratory tract and causes mild or no symptoms in the early phase of infection, similar to other CoVs that cause common colds.
targetString: ከም ተወሳኺ ናይ ምብዛሕ  መስርሕ ኣብ ናይ ምስትንፋስ ሻምብቆ፡ SARS-CoV-2 ብብዝሒ ኣብ ላዕለዋይ ሻምብቆ ናይ ምስትንፋስ ይባዛሕ፡ ኣብ መጀመርያ ደረጃ ናይ ሕማም ድማ ውሑድ ወይ ትሑት ምልክታት ይገብር፡ ምስቶም ካልኦት CoVs፡ ሰዓል ምልክት ዝገብሩ ተመሳሳሊ ኢዩ።
en-mt: In addition to the respiratory system, SARS-CoV-2 increases in the upper respiratory system and performs few or low symptoms in the early stages of the disease, similar to those who sign up for other CoVs coughs.

sourceString: Therefore, infected patients at the early phase or incubation period can produce a large amount of virus during daily activities, causing great difficulty for the control of the epidemic.
targetString: ስለዚ ኣብ ናይ መጀመርያ ደረጃ ወይ ኣብ ምንቃሕ ዘለዉ ልኩፋት ሰባት፡ ኣብ መዓልታዊ ሂወቶም ብ ኣሽሓት ዝቕጸሩ ቫይረስ ከፍርዩ ይኽእሉ፡ ነቲ ናይ ምቁጽጻር መስርሕ ናይ ለበዳ ድማ ዓቢ መሰናኽል ክፈጥሩሉ ይኽእሉ።
en-mt: As a result, infected people in the early stages or in the early stages of the virus can produce thousands of viruses in their daily lives and create a major obstacle to the control process of the pandemic.

sourceString: However, the transmission of SARS-CoV was considered to occur when the patients are severely ill, while most transmission did not happen at the early phase.
targetString: እንተኾነ እቲ ምትሕልላፍ ናይ SARS-CoV፡ እቶም ተሓከምቲ ኣዝዮም ምስ ሓመሙ ኢዩ ተራእዩ፡ ወላካ ዝበዝሑ ተመሓላለፍቲ ሕማማት ኣብ ናይ መጀመርያ ደረጃ እንከለዉ ዝኾነ ምልክትት ኣይግበሩ።
en-mt: However, SARS-CoV transmission has shown patients to become seriously ill, and most communicable diseases do not show any symptoms when they are in the early stages.

sourceString: Thus, the current outbreak of COVID-19 is much more severe and difficult to control than the outbreak of SARS.
targetString: እዚ ኩሉ ምስፍሕፋሕ ናይ ኮቪድ-19 ካብቲ SARS ኣዝዩ መስፋሕፍሒን፡ ንክትቆጻጸሮ ድማ ኣዝዩ ኣሸጋርን ኢዩ።
en-mt: All of this is much more widespread than the SARS and much more difficult to control.

sourceString: Great efforts are currently underway in China including the lockdown of Wuhan and surrounding cities and continuous quarantine of almost the entire population in hopes of interrupting the transmission of SARS-CoV-2.
targetString: ኣብዚ ሕጂ እዋን ኣን ቻይና ዓበይቲ ጻዕርታት ይካየዱ ኣለዉ፡ እዚኦም ድማ ምዕጻው ናይ ዉሃንን ኣብ ከባቢኣ ዘለዋ ከተማታትን፡ ከምኡ`ውን ቀጻሊ ምዕጻው ናይ ዝበዝሐ ክፋል ህዝቢ፡ ነቲ ምትሕልላፍ ናይ SARS-CoV-2 ንምግታእ።
en-mt: Now, An China is making major efforts, including the closure of Wuhan and its surrounding cities, and the continued closure of a majority of the population to curb the transmission of SARS-CoV-2.

sourceString: Although these actions have been dramatically damaging the economy and other sectors of the country, the number of new patients is declining, indicating the slowdown of the epidemic.
targetString: እዞም ተግባራት ንቚጠባን ካልኦት ጽላታት እታ ሃገርን ኣዝዮም ኣዕንውቲ እኳ እንተኾኑ ቁጽሪ ሕደስቲ ሕሙማት እናጎደለ ይመጽእ፡ እዚ ድማ እቲ ለበዳ እናንከየ ይመጽእ ምህላዉ አመልክት እዩ።
en-mt: Although these measures are devastating for the economy and other sectors of the country, the number of new cases is declining, indicating that the pandemic is declining.

sourceString: The most optimistic estimate is that the outbreak will end by March and the downswing phase will last for 3-4 months.
targetString: እቲ ኣዝዩ ንጽበዮ ዘለና ትስፉው ገምጋም፡ ምስፍሕፋሕ ኣብ መጋቢት  ክውድእን፡ እቲ ናይ ምጉዳል ገጽ/ደረጃ ድማ ካብ 3-4 ወርሒ ኣብ ዝወስድ ግዜ ቀስ ኢሉ ክቕጽል ኢዩ።
en-mt: he most extensive review of the expansion we are looking forward to will be completed in March and the reduction phase will continue to slow down in 3-4 months.

sourceString: However, some other experts are not that optimistic.
targetString: ገለ ክኢላታት ግና ሕጂ’ውን ተስፋ ዝህብ ነገር የለን በሃልቲ እዮም።
en-mt: However, some experts still have no hope.

sourceString: Paul Hunter, et al., estimated that COVID-19, which seems substantially more infectious than SARS, will not end in 2020.
targetString: ፖል ሃንተርን ካልኦትን (Paul Hunter, et al) ፡እቲ ካብ SARS ንላዕሊ ኣዝዩ ተመሓላላፊ ዝኾነ ሕማም ኮቪድ-19 ኣብ 2020 ክጠፍእ ከም ዘይክእል ይግምት።
en-mt: Paul Hunter, et al. (Paul Hunter, et al.) estimates that COVID-19, the most communicable disease than the SARS, will not be eradicated by 2020.

sourceString: Ira Longini, et al., established a model to predict the outcome of the epidemic and suggested that SARS-CoV-2 could infect two-thirds of the global population.
targetString: Ira Longiniን ካልኦትን ሳዕቤናት እዚ ሕማም ዝንበ ሞዴል/ንድፊ ከም ዝመሃዙን SARS-CoV-2: ክልተ ሲሶ ካብ ህዝቢ ዓለም ክልብድ ከም ዝኽእልን ርእይቶኦም ሂቦም ኣለዉ።
en-mt: Ira Longini and others have suggested that they have designed a model that predicts the effects of the disease and that SARS-CoV-2 can be infected by two-thirds of the world's population.

sourceString: A Canadian group reported that SARS-CoV-2 was detected in both mid-turbinate and throat swabs of patients who recovered and left the hospital 2 weeks earlier, which indicates that the newly identified virus could become a cyclical episode similar to influenza.
targetString: ኣብ ካናዳ ዝርከቡ ናይ መጽናዕቲ ጉጅለ ከም ዝሓበርዎ፡ SARS-CoV-2 ኣብ ውሽጢ ኣፍንጫን ኣብ ላዕለዋይ ክፋል ናይ ጎሮር ናይ ዝሓወዩን ቅድሚ 2 ሰሙን ካብ ሆስፒታል ዝተፋነዉን ልኹፋት፡ ከም ዝረኸቡ ነጊሮም፡ እዚ ድማ እዚ ሓድሽ ዝተረኽበ ቫይረስ ልክዕ ከምቲ ናይ ኢንፍሊወንዛ ሓደ ሲሊደሪካዊ መስርዕ ክኽተል ተኽእሎ ኣለዎ።
en-mt: A canadian research team found SARS-CoV-2 had detected infections inside the nose and upper part of the throat recovering and discharged from hospital 2 weeks ago, which means this newly discovered virus has the same potential to follow a silidenic sequence as the flu.

sourceString: However, promising signs have occurred in China based on the declining number of new cases, indicating the current strategies might have been working.
targetString: እንተኾነ፡ ኣዝዩ ተስፋ ዝህብ ምልክታት ኣብ ቻይና ተራእዩ ኣሎ፡ እዚ ድማ እቲ ቁጽሪ መልከፍቲ ብሙግዳሉን እቲ መደባት ድማ ኣብ ግብሪ ብምውዓሉን ኢዩ፡፡
en-mt: However, there are very promising signs in China, as the number of cases has been reduced and the plans have been implemented.

sourceString: Ebola was originally predicted to cause up to a million cases with half a million deaths.
targetString: ኢቦላ (Ebola)ኢቦላ (Ebola) (Ebola) ኣብ መጀመርያ ክሳብ ሓደ ሚልዮን ሰባት ክለክፍን ፍርቂ ሚልዮም ድማ ኣደዳ ሞት ክገብርን፡ ተገሚቱ ኔሩ።
en-mt: It is estimated that Ebola will infect up to one million people and kill half a million.

sourceString: However, via strict quarantine and isolation, the disease has eventually been put under control.
targetString: እንተኾነ፡  በቲ ጥብቂ ናይ ምውሻብ መስርሕኝ ምግላልን፡ እዚ ሕማም ኣብ ሓጺር ግዜ ኣብ ቁጽጽር ክኣቱ ክ ኢሉ።
en-mt: However, with strict control of the disease and the disease will be brought under control soon.

sourceString: It is possible, similar to SARS-CoV, that SARS-CoV-2 might become weaker in infectivity and eventually die down or become a less pathogenic virus co-existent with humans.
targetString: ብተመሳሳሊ ናይ SARS-CoV፡ SARS-CoV-2 ድሕሪ ግዜ ናይ ምምሕልላፍ ብቕዓቱ ክጎድልን ጸኒሑ ውን ክመውትን ወይ ን ደቂ-ሰባት ዘይተጋዳኢ ክቅየርን ይኽእል ኢዩ ።
en-mt: Similarly, SARS-CoV-2 can lose its transmission quality over time and may die later or change inacdescion to humans.

sourceString: A comparison of the epidemic of COVID-19 with that of SARS and MERS is provided below (Fig. ​(Fig.55).
targetString: ምንጽጻር ናይ ኮቪድ-19 ለበዳን ምስ SARS ን MERS ን ኣብዚ ታሕቲ ተገሊጹ ኣሎ ስእሊ. ​(ስእሊ.55)።
en-mt: The comparison of the COVID-19 pandemic with SARS and MERS is described below. (Pictured.55).

sourceString: SARS-CoV-2 is highly transmittable through coughing or sneezing, and possibly also through direct contact with materials contaminated by the virus.
targetString: SARS-CoV-2 ብሰዓልን ምህንጣስን ኣዝዩ ኢዩ ዝላባዕ፡ ከምኡ`ውን በቲ ቀጥታ ርክብ ምስቶም በዚ ቫይረስ ዝተለኽፉ ንብረታት ውን ይመሓልእለፍ ኢዩ።
en-mt: SARS-CoV-2 is very spread by coughing and sneering and is also transmitted directly to property that is infected.

sourceString: The virus was also found in feces, which raises a new possibility of feces-to-mouth transmission.
targetString: እዚ ቫይረስ ኣብ ቀልቀል እውን ብምርካቡ ካብ ቀልቀል ናብ ሰብ ይሓልፍዶ ይኸውን ዝብል ሓድሽ ሕቶ ኣለዓዒሉሎ።
en-mt: It raises a new question about whether the virus can spread from the virus to humans.

sourceString: A recent study on 138 cases reported that 41% of the cases were possibly caused by nosocomial infections, including 17 patients with other prior diseases and 40 health-care providers.
targetString: ናይ ቀረባ መጽናዕቲ ኣብ 138 ግዳያት ከም ዝሓበሮ፡ 41% ናይ ግዳያት ብናይ ኣፍንጫ መልከፍቲ ተመሓላሊፉ፡ ካብ ዚኦም ድማ 17 ካልእ ተወሳኺ ሕማም ዝነበሮም ኮይኖም፡ 40 ድማ ናይ ጥዕና ኣገልግሎት ወሃብቲ።
en-mt: A recent study found that in 138 cases, 41% of cases were transmitted by nasal infections, 17 of whom had another disease and 40 were health care providers.

sourceString: Thus, great precaution should be used to protect humans, especially health-care providers, social workers, family members, colleagues, and even bystanders in contact with patients or infected people.
targetString: ስለዚ፡ ን ደቂ-ሰባት ንክልኻል ዓቢ ጥንቃቀ ክግብር ኣለዎ፡ ብፍላይ ድማ ነቶም፡ ናይ ጥዕና ወሃብቲ ኣገልግሎት፡ ማሕበራዊ ሰራሕተኛታት፡ መሳርሕቲ፡ ከምኡ`ውን  ምስቶም ልኹፋት ወይ ተሓከምቲ ዝኾነ ርክብ ዝጸንሖም ተመልካትቲ፡፡
en-mt: herefore, great care must be taken to protect human beings, especially healthcare providers, social workers, co-workers, and observers who have maintained contact with infected or patients.

sourceString: The first line of defense that could be used to lower the risk of infection is through wearing face masks; both the use of surgical masks and N95 respirator masks (series # 1860s) helps control the spread of viruses.
targetString: ለበዳ ንምክልኻል ዝውሰድ ናይ ፈለማ ስጉምቲ ብመገዲ ምምላስ ናይ ገጽ ማስኬራታት እዩ፣ ምጥቃም ናይ መጥባሕቲ ማስክ ከምኡውን N95 ናይ ምስትንፋስ ማስክ (ተርታ # 1860s) ምውዳይ ንምስፍሕፋሕ ለበዳ ንምቊጽጻር ይሕግዝ።
en-mt: he first step in preventing the spread of the pandemic is through the return of face masks, the use of surgical masks and N95 respiratory masks (Tr # 1860s) to help control the spread of the pandemic.

sourceString: Surgical face masks prevent liquid droplets from a potentially infected individual from traveling through the air or sticking onto surfaces of materials, where they could be passed on to others.
targetString: ናይ መጥባሕቲ ማስክታት ካብ ሕሙም ዝወጹ ኣብ ኣየር ዘለዉ ነጠብታታት ክኽልክሉዎም ይኽእሉ፡ እዚ ድማ ካብ ኣየር ወይ`ውን ናብ መሬት ካብ ዝዕልቡ፡ ናብ ካልኦት`ውን ክሓልፉ ዝኽእሉ ዝነበሩ፡  ክኸውን ይኽእል።
en-mt: Surgical masks can prevent droplets in the air from the patient, which may have passed from the air or to the ground.

sourceString: However, only N95 (series # 1860s) masks can protect against the inhalation of virions as small as 10 to 80 nm, with only 5% of the virions being able to penetrate completely; SARS-CoV-2 is similar to SARS-CoV in size and both are approximately 85 nm.
targetString: እንተኾነ፡ ነቲ ናይቶም ደቂቕቲ ካብ 10-80 nm ዝዓቀኖም ቫይረስ ብምስትንፋስ ንውሽጢ ኣካላትና ከይኣትዉ፡ N95 (series # 1860s) ዝዓይነቱ ማስክ ጥራይ ክከላኸለልና ይኽእል፡ ናይ ምዙራቕ ብቅዓቱ ድማ 5% ጥራይ ኢዩ፡  SARS-CoV-ምስ SARS-CoV ኣዝዮም ምምስሳል ኣለዎም ኣብ ዓቀን፡ ክልቲኦም ድማ ዳርጋ 85 nm ኢዮም።
en-mt: However, only N95 masks (series #1860s) can protect us from entering the body by breathing the virus that measures 10-80 nm, and only 5% of sars-CoVs are very similar to SARS-CoV, and in both doses they are about 85 nm.

sourceString: Since particles can penetrate even five surgical masks stacked together, health-care providers in direct contact with patients must wear N95 (series # 1860s) masks but not surgical masks.
targetString: ፓርቲክላት ክሳብ ሓሙሽተ ማስክ ክበስዑ ስለዝኽእሉ ምስ ሕሙማት ዝውዕሉ ሰራሕተኛታት N95 (series # 1860) እምበር ናይ መጥባሕቲ ማስክ ክወድዩ የብሎምን።
en-mt: Particlets can wear up to five masks, so patients should wear a surgical mask, not a surgical mask with n95 (series #1860).

sourceString: In addition to masks, health-care providers should wear fitted isolation gowns in order to further reduce contact with viruses.
targetString: ኣብ ክንክን ጥዕና ዝዋፈሩ ሰባት በቲ ቫይረስ ናይ ምልካፍ ዕድሎም ንምንካይ ማስክን ካብ ሕሙም ዝፈልዮ ዕቅን ክዳንን ክወዲ ይግባእ።
en-mt: In order to reduce their risk of spreading the virus, people in health care should wear masks and clothing that are different from the patient.

sourceString: Viruses can also infect an individual through the eyes.
targetString: እዚ ቫይረስ እዚ ብ ዓይኒ ኣቢሉ ውን ናብ ኣካላት ክኣቱ ይኽእል ኢዩ።
en-mt: he virus can also enter the body through the eyes.

sourceString: On January 22, 2020, a doctor was infected with SARS-CoV-2 although he wore an N95 mask; the virus might have entered his body through his inflammatory eyes.
targetString: ኣብ 22 ጥሪ 2020፡ ሓደ ዶክቶር N95 ማስክ ለቢሱ እንከሎ ብ SARS-CoV-2 ተለኺፉ፡ እቲ ቫይረስ በተን ነዲረን ዝነበራ ኣዕንቱ ጌሩ ኣትዩ ክኸውን ይኽእል ኢዩ።
en-mt: On January 22, 2020, a doctor was infected with SARS-CoV-2 while wearing a N95 mask.

sourceString: Thus, health-care providers should also wear transparent face shields or goggles while working with patients.
targetString: ስለዚ፡ እቶም ናይ ጥዕና ኣገልግሎት ወሃብቲ ማስክ ክለብሱ ኣለዎም፡ ወላውን ገጽ ዝሽፍን መከላኸሊ ወይ ጎግለ ኽጥቀሙ ኣለዎም ምስ ተለከፍቲ ኣብ ዝህልዉሉ እዋን።
en-mt: herefore, healthcare providers should wear a mask and wear face coverings or face coverings when they are infected.

sourceString: For the general public in affected or potentially affected areas, it is highly suggested that everybody wash their hands with disinfectant soaps more often than usual, try to stay indoors for self-quarantine and limit contact with potentially infected individuals.
targetString: ኣብቲ ብ ናይ ቫይረስ መልከፍቲ ዝተጸልወ ቦታ ዘሎ ዝነብር ሓፋሽ ወይ ህዝቢ፡ ኣእዳዉ ካብ ካልእ ግዜ ንላዕሊ ብዝሒ ዘለዉ ግዜን ብ ማይን ሳሙናን ጌሩ ኣጽርዩ ክሕጸብ ይምከር፡ ካብዚ ለበዳ ንምክልኻል ድማ ብዝተኻእለ መጠን ኣብ መንበሪ ምጽናሕ ይምረስ ምስ ካላእ ሰብ ብፍላይ ድማ ተለኺፎም ከይኮኑ ዝጥርጠሩ ሰባት ውን ርክባት ካብ ምግባር ምቁጣብ ዝሓሸ ኢዩ።
en-mt: It is recommended that the public or public living in an area affected by the virus wash their hands with soap and water more than ever before, and to prevent the spread of the pandemic, staying in a home as much as possible is better than avoiding contact with others, especially people suspected of being infected.

sourceString: Three feet is considered an appropriate distance for people to stay away from a patient.
targetString: ሰባት ካብ ሕሙም ናይ ሰለስተ ጫማ ርሕቀት ክሕልዉ ኣለዎም።
en-mt: People should maintain a three-foot distance from the patient.

sourceString: These actions are effective methods to lower the risk of infection as well as prevent the spread of the virus.
targetString: እዞም ምንቅስቃሳት ውጽኢታውያን መንገዲታት ነቲ ደረጃ ናይ ሓደጋ ናይ ሕማም ንሙግዳል ኢዮም፡ ከምኡ`ውን ምክልካል ነቲ ምስፍሕፋሕ ናይ ሕማም።
en-mt: hese movements are effective ways to reduce the risk level of disease and prevent the spread of the disease.

sourceString: Although SARS-CoV-2 came as a new virus to the human world, its high homology to SARS-CoV as reported on 7 January 2020 should have caused high alert to China based on her deep memory of the SARS outbreak in 2003.
targetString: ዋላኳ SARS-COV-2 ከም ሓድሽ ቫይረስ ንወዲስብ እንተተቐልቀለ SARS-COV ልዑል ተኽእሎ ዝምድና (ሆሞሎጂ) ከም ዘለዎ ብ 7 ጥሪ 2020 ምግላጹ ነታ ናይ 2003 ዝኽሪ ሕማም SARS-COV ዘለዋ ቻየና ልዑል ናይ መጠንቅቕታ ደወል እዩ።
en-mt: Although SARS-COV-2 has emerged as a new virus for a child, the revelation on January 7, 2020 that SARS-COV has a high potential relationship (homology) is a high alarm bell for Chayena, who has a 2003 SARS-COV memory.

sourceString: However, not until 19 January 2020 did the director of the Center of Disease Control of Wuhan comfort the citizens by saying that the novel virus has low contagiousness and limited reproductivity from human to human and that it is not a problem to prevent and contain the disease.
targetString: እንተኾነ እቲ ዳይረክቶር ናይ ምቁጽጻር ሕማማት ኣብ ዉሃን፡ እቲ ኖቨል ኮሮናቫይረስ ውሑድ ዓቀን ንናይ ምልባዕ ከም ዘለዎ፡ ካብ ሰብ ናብ ሰብ ብዙሕ ከምዘይላባዕ፡ ከምኡ`ውን ነቲ ሕማም ክትከላኸሎን ክትፍውሶን ጸገም ከምዘይኮነ፡ ብምባል ነቶም ነበርቲ ክሳብ 19 ጥሪ 2020 ኣብ ዘሎ ግዜ ከጸናንዕ ኣይፈተነን።
en-mt: However, the Director of Disease Control in Wuhan did not try to comfort residents until January 19, 2020, saying that the novel coronavirus had limited spread, that it had little to spread, that it was not a problem to prevent and treat the disease.

sourceString: This message remarkably relaxed the alarm of the public, especially when the entire country was preparing for the Spring Festival, and the critical time was missed to contain the disease at its minimal scale in Wuhan.
targetString: እዚ መእኽቲ፡ ነቲ ኣነበረ መጥንቀቅታታት ናብ ህዝቢ ከም ዝዛነ ጌርዎ፡ ብፍላይ ድማ እቲ መላእ ህዝቢ ነቲ ናይ ጽድያ ፈስቲቫል ኣብ ዝጽበየሉ እዋን፡ እቲ ኣሸጋሪ ግዜ ናይ ዉሃን  ድማ ነቲ ሕማም ናብ ዝተሓተ ደረጃኡ ከጉድሎ ኣብ ዘይከኣለሉ እዋን ኔሩ።
en-mt: his was a time when the entire population was waiting for the spring festival and Wuhan's difficult time was unable to reduce the disease to its lowest level.

sourceString: The disease control agencies in China may take this hard lesson and make critical improvements in the future.
targetString: ኤጀንሲ ምቊጽጻር ሕማማት ቻይና ካብዚ ትምህርቲ ብምውሳድ ኣብ ቀጻሊ ወሳኒ ምምሕያሻት ይገብራ ኣለዋ።
en-mt: China's Disease Control Agency is continuing to make significant improvements, taking the lessons from this.

sourceString: For example, these agencies should be (1) more careful when making public announcements as every word counts to citizens and can change their attitude and decisions; (2) more sensitive and reactive to unusual information from clinics rather than waiting for formal reports from doctors or officials; (3) more restrictive to contain a potential epidemic at its early stage rather than attempting to comfort the public; and (4) more often to issue targeted and effective drills to increase the public's awareness about epidemic diseases and to test and improve the response system of the society periodically.
targetString: ንኣብነት እዞም ኤጀንሲታት (1) ህዝባዊ መግለጺ ኣብ ዝገብርሉ እዋን ጥንቁቓት ክኾኑ ይግባኣ፥ ምኽንያቱ ነፍሲ ወከፍ ቃልን ኣጋውልን ውሳነን ዜጋታት ክትጸሉ ስለ እትኽእል (2): ኣብ ክንዲ ካብ ዶክተራትን ሰብመዚን ዝመጽእ ወግዓዊ ጸብጻብ ካብ ክሊኒካት ንዝመጽእ ዘይንቡር ሓበሬታ ዝያዳ ተኣፈፍትን ግብረ መልሲ ዝህቡን ኢዮም: (3) ኣብ ክንዲ ህዝቢ ኽትእብድ ምፍታን ኣብ ፍልማዊ ደረጅኡ ዘሎ ዕቑር ተኽእሎ ለበዳ ንምዕጋት: (4) ህዝቢ ብዛዕባ ሕማማት ለበዳ ዘለዎ ግንዛበ ኽዓቢ ንምግባርን በብግዚኡ ዝህሉ ስርዓተ ግብረመልሲ ሕብረተሰብን ንምምርማር ሽቶ እተገብረሎምን ውጽኢታውያንን ታዕሊማት ምክያድ።
en-mt: For example, these agencies should be careful when making a public statement, because each word, phrase, and decision-making of citizens can be affected; (2) they are more vulnerable and responsive to unconventional information from clinics rather than official reports from doctors and officials; (3) to prevent the potential of a pandemic at its inception, rather than trying to deceive the public.  (4) To develop a target-specific and effective practice to increase public awareness of the pandemic and to examine the current social response system.

sourceString: The outbreak of COVID-19 caused by the novel virus SARS-CoV-2 started in the end of December 2019.
targetString: ብሓድሽ ቫይረስ SARS-CoV-2 እተላዕለ COVID-19 ኣብ ምዝዛም ታሕሳስ 2019 እዩ ጀሚሩ
en-mt: HE NEW SARS-CoV-2 virus began in December 2019.

sourceString: In less than two months, it has spread all over China and near 50 other countries globally at the time of this writing.
targetString: ኣብ ትሕቲ 2 ወርሒ፡ ኣብዛ ሕጂ ንጽሕፈላ ዘለና እዋን፡ ኣብ መላእ ቻይናን ዳርጋ 50 ሃገራትን ተስፋሕፊሑ።
en-mt: In less than two months, it has spread throughout China and almost 50 countries.

sourceString: Since the virus is very similar to SARS-CoV and the symptoms are also similar between COVID-19 and SARS, the outbreak of COVID-19 has created a sense of SARS recurring.
targetString: እዚ ቫይረስ ምስ SARS-CoV ኣዝዩ ተመሳሳሊ ስለ ዝኾነ፡ እቶም ኣብ መንጎ ኮቪድ-19 ን SARSን ዘለዉ  ምልክታት ድማ  ተመሳሰቲ ስለ ዝኾኑ፡ እዚ ምስፍሕፋሕ ናይ ኮቪድ-19 ስምዒት ምምላስ ናይ SARS ፈጢሩ።
en-mt: ecause the virus is very similar to SARS-CoV and the symptoms between COVID-19 and SARS are similar, this spread of COVID-19 has led to the return of SARS.

sourceString: However, there are some remarkable differences between COVID-19 and SARS, which are essential for containing the epidemic and treating the patients.
targetString: እንተኾነ ኣብ መንጎ ኮቪድ-19 ን SARS ጉሉሕ ዝኾነ ፍልልይ ኣሎ፡ እዚ ድማ ነቲ ለበዳ ኣብ ምቁጽጻርን ተሓከምቲ ድማ ግቡእ ሕክምን ኣብ ምሃብን ዓቢ ተራ ኣለዎ።
en-mt: However, there is a significant difference between COVID-19 and SARS, which plays an important role in controlling the pandemic and providing patients with appropriate treatment.

sourceString: COVID-19 affects more elderly individuals than youth and more men than women, and the severity and death rate are also higher in elderly individual than in youth.
targetString: ኮቪድ-19 ካብቶም መንእሰያት  ንላዕሊ ነቶም ሽማግለታት ኣዝዩ ይጸልዎ፡ከምኡ`ውን ካብ ደቂ-ኣንስትዮ ንላዕሊ ን ደቂ-ተባዕትዮ።
en-mt: COVID-19 has a greater impact on the elderly than young people and for men more than women.

sourceString: SARS has higher mortality than COVID-19 (10.91% versus 1.44%).
targetString: SARS ካብ ኮቪድ-19 ንላዕሊ ናይ ሞት ሓደጋ ከስዕብ ይኽእል (10.91% ምስ/ብኣንጻር 1.44%).
en-mt: SARS can lead to more risk of death than COVID-19 (10.91% with/opposite 1.44%).

sourceString: COVID-19 patients transmit the virus even when they are symptomless whereas SARS patients do so usually when they are severely ill, which causes much greater difficulty to contain the spread of COVID-19 than SARS.
targetString: ልኹፋት ናይ ኮቪድ-19፡ ወላ`ውን ምልክታት ኣብ ዘይብሎም ግዜ ቫይረስ ከመሓላልፉ ይኽእሉ ኢዮም፡ ብኣንጻሩ ልኹፋት SARS ኣብቲ ኣዝዮም ዝሓሙሉ እዋን ኢዮም ከመሓላልፉ ዝጅምሩ፡ እዚ ድማ ንምስፍሕፋሕ ኮቪድ-19 ንምቁጽጻር ኣዝዩ ከቢድ ይገብሮ ምስ SARSብምንጽጻር።
en-mt: Covid-19 infections can also spread the virus when there are no symptoms, on the contrary, sars begin to spread when they are very sick, making it very difficult to control the spread of COVID-19 compared to SARS.

sourceString: This partially explains why SARS-CoV-2 spread much faster and broader than SARS-CoV.
targetString: እዚ ድማ ብከፊል፡ ስለምንታይ SARS-CoV-2 ካብ SARS-CoV ንላዕሊ ብቁልጡፍ የስፋሕፍሕ ይነግር።
en-mt: his is partly why SARS-CoV-2 is spreading faster than SARS-CoV.

sourceString: The regular RNA assay for SARS-CoV-2 can be negative in some COVID-19 patients.

sourceString: Given such rapid progress in research on COVID-19, several critical issues remain to be solved, as follows:

sourceString: Where did SARS-CoV-2 come from?

sourceString: Although 96% genetic homolog was found between SARS-CoV-2 and two bat SARS-like CoVs, we still cannot conclude that SARS-CoV-2 is from bats.

sourceString: Zoonotic origins of human coronaviruses

sourceString: Mutation and adaptation have driven the co-evolution of coronaviruses (CoVs) and their hosts, including human beings, for thousands of years.

sourceString: Before 2003, two human CoVs (HCoVs) were known to cause mild illness, such as common cold.

sourceString: The outbreaks of severe acute respiratory syndrome (SARS) and the Middle East respiratory syndrome (MERS) have flipped the coin to reveal how devastating and life-threatening an HCoV infection could be.
targetString: SARS  ናይ MERS  መርስን ማዕረ ክንደይ ኣዕናውን ንህይወት ዘስግእን ኸግህድን  ናይ HCoV  መልከፍቲ ንምግላጽ።

sourceString: The emergence of SARS-CoV-2 in central China at the end of 2019 has thrusted CoVs into the spotlight again and surprised us with its high transmissibility but reduced pathogenicity compared to its sister SARS-CoV.
targetString: ኣብ ምሞዕባል ወይ ምጅማር ናይ SARS-CoV-2 ኣብ ማእከላይ ቻይና ኣብ መወዳእታ ናይ 2019 ነቲ CoVs ከም እንደገና ኣቃልቡ ክረክብ ኣኽኢልዎ ጥራይ ዘይኮነ፡ ንዓና ድማ በቲ ናይ ምስፍሕፋሕ ተኽእሎታቱ ኣዚና ከም እንግረም ጌሩና፡ እዚ ግን ነቲ ነቲ ናይ ሕማም ሰበባት ውን ኣጉዲሉ ኢዩ ምስ SARS-CoV ክነጻጸር እንከሎ።
en-mt: In the development or launch of SARS-CoV-2 in central China by the end of 2019, not only enabled the CoVs to be re-introduced by the end of 2019, but it also made us very surprised by its spread potential, but this has also reduced the incidence of malaria compared to SARS-CoV.

sourceString: HCoV infection is a zoonosis and understanding the zoonotic origins of HCoVs would serve us well.
targetString: መልከፍቲ HCoVs  ዙኖሲስ መበቆል ናይ HCoVs  ምርድኡ ጽቡቕ ከገልግለና ይኽእል።

sourceString: Most HCoVs originated from bats where they are non-pathogenic.
targetString: እቶም ዝበዝሑ HCoVs ካብ መንካዕ ዝተበገሱ ኮይኖም፡ መንካዕ ግን ሕማም ናይ ምምዕባል ጠንቂ ክትከውን ተኽእሎ የብላን።

sourceString: The intermediate reservoir hosts of some HCoVs are also known.
targetString: ናይ ገለ HCoVs  ማእከላይ መዕቆቢ'ውን ተፈሊጡ ኣሎ።

sourceString: Identifying the animal hosts has direct implications in the prevention of human diseases.
targetString: ምልላይ ምዕቆቢ እንስሳታት ኣብ ምክልኻል ናይ ሰባት ሕማም ቀጥታዊ ርክብ ኣለዎ።

sourceString: Investigating CoV-host interactions in animals might also derive important insight on CoV pathogenesis in humans.
targetString: ኣብ ናይ እንስሳታት ዝርከብ መዕቆቢ ናይ CoV ምልዉዋጥ ብምርማር፡ኣገዳሲ ዝኮነ ኣረኣእያ ኣብ ናይ ሰባት ኮቭ ፓቴጅ የምጽእ።
en-mt: By examining cov exchange in animal shelters, it brings an important perspective on human cove pathage.

sourceString: In this review, we present an overview of the existing knowledge about the seven HCoVs, with a focus on the history of their discovery as well as their zoonotic origins and interspecies transmission.
targetString: ኣብዚ ትንተና፡ ብዛዕባ እቶም ሸውዓተ ናይ ቅድም/ዝሓለፉ HCoVs ሓፈሻዊ መግሊጺ ንህብ፡ ቀንዲ ናትና ኣተኮሩ ድማ ኣብቲ ርክበታትን ናቶም ዞኖቲካዊ መበቆልን ምምሕልላፍ ተእኽእሎታትን ኣብ ታርኽ ብምሙርካስ መግለጺ ንህብ
en-mt: In this analysis, we provide a general overview of the seven previous/previous HCoVs and our main focus is on making statements based on the relationships and their zoological origins and transmission opportunities on Tarch.

sourceString: Importantly, we compare and contrast the different HCoVs from a perspective of virus evolution and genome recombination.
targetString: ከም ኣገዳሲ ድማ፡ ምምስሳልን ምፍልላይን ናይቶም ዝተፈላለዩ HCoVs ብዓይኒ ናይ ቫይረስ ፍልቀትን ናይ ጂን ምምስራሕን ክረአ ይኽእል ኢዩ።
en-mt: As important, the similarities and divisions of different HCoVs can be seen through the eyes of viral evolution and gene processing.

sourceString: The current CoV disease 2019 (COVID-19) epidemic is discussed in this context.
targetString: እዚ እዋናዊ ሕማም ለበዳ ኮቪድ-19 ኣብዚ ኩነት እዚ ተዘትይሉ እዩ።

en-mt: In also, the demands for successful change in shelters of life, the hidden message of viral evolution in serious diseases are revealed.

sourceString: Coronaviruses (CoVs) belong to the family Coronaviridae, which comprises a group of enveloped, positive-sensed, single-stranded RNA viruses.
targetString: ኮሮና ቫይረሳትን (CoVs)  ኮሮናቪሪዳ ዚበሃሉ ጉጅለ ዝምደቡ ኮይኖም፡ ን ሽፉናት፡ንጽል RNA ዘለዎም  ቫይረሳት ድማ የጠቓልሉ።
en-mt: CoVs are grouped together with coronaviruses and include single RNA viruses.

sourceString: These viruses harbouring the largest genome of 26 to 32 kilobases amongst RNA viruses were termed “CoVs” because of their crown-like morphology under electron microscope.
targetString: እዞም ቫይረሳት ዘዕቑብሉ እቲ ዝዓበየ ጂኖም ናይ 26 ክሳብ 32 ኪሎቤይዝ ኣብ መንጎ RNA ቫይረሳት ዘሎ ``CoVs `` ተሰምዮም እዮም።እዚድማ ብምኽንያት ኣኽሊላዊ መሰል ስነመዛርዕ ኣብ ትሕቲ ኤለክትሮን ማይክሮስኮፕ እዩ።
en-mt: hese viruses contain the largest genome of 26 to 32 kilobeuses between RNA viruses have been named 'CoVs', which are under the electron microscope because of the crown privilege.

sourceString: Structurally, CoVs have non-segmented genomes that share a similar organization.
targetString: ብ ኣቀራርጻ፡ CoVs ዘይተመቕለ ጂኖምስ  ኣለዎም፡ንሱ ኸኣ ተማሳሳሊ ውድብ ይካፈል።
en-mt: CoVs have unparpared genomes, and they share the same organization.

sourceString: Approximately two thirds of the genome contain two large overlapping open reading frames (ORF1a and ORF1b), which are translated into the pp1a and pp1ab replicase polyproteins.
targetString: ብገምጋም 2/3ናይ ሕነተ-ሰረት፡2 ዓበይቲ ዝተደራረበ ክፉት ንባብ መትሓዚ( ORF1a and ORF1b)፡ይሕዝ ናብ pp1a ን pp1ab  ቅዳሕ ፖልይፕሮቲንስ ይትርጎሙ።
en-mt: On average, it holds 2/3 of the 2 large overlapping open readings (ORF1a and ORF1b) and translates to pp1a and pp1ab copies of poliproteins.

sourceString: The polyproteins are further processed to generate 16 non-structural proteins, designated nsp1~16.
targetString: እዚ ፖሊፕሮቲን ድሕሪ ብዙሕ መስርሕ ቅርጺ-ዘይብሉ ፕሮቲን nsp1~16 ዝተባህለ ኣመንጭዩ ኢዩ።

sourceString: The remaining portion of the genome contains ORFs for the structural proteins, including spike (S), envelope (E), membrane (M) and nucleoprotein (N).

sourceString: The 2019 novel HCoV (2019-nCoV), which has subsequently been renamed SARS-CoV-2, is the causative agent of the ongoing epidemic of coronavirus disease 2019 (COVID-19), which has claimed more than 3,120 lives and infected more than 91,000 people as of March 3, 2020.

sourceString: In this review we present an overview of the zoonotic origins, interspecies transmission and pathogenesis of HCoVs.

sourceString: Particularly, we highlight and discuss the common theme that parental viruses of HCoVs are typically non-pathogenic in their natural reservoir hosts but become pathogenic after interspecies transmission to a new host.
targetString: ብፍሉይ፡ ኣብዚ ልሙድ ኣረስቲ ነተኩሮሉን ንዘራረበሉን እዚ ወለዳዊ ቫይረሳት ናይ HCoVs  ኣብቲ ተፈጥራዊ  መዕቆሪ መዕቆቢኦም ብዓይነቱ ሰበብ ሕማም ኣይኮኑን።ድሕሪ ሓድሕዳዊ ናይ ጂር ምትሕልላፍ ናብ ሓድሽ መዕቆቢ ግን ሰበብ ሕማም ይኾኑ።

sourceString: We also review the trend of HCoV evolution in which the increase in transmissibility often comes with the decrease in pathogenicity.

targetString: ናይ እንስሳ CoVs  ካብ መወዳእታ 1930 ታት ኣትሒዙ ተፈሊጢ።
en-mt: Animal CoVs have been known since the late 1930s.

sourceString: Before the first isolation of HCoV-229E strain B814 from the nasal discharge of patients who had contracted common cold, different CoVs had been isolated in various infected animals, including turkey, mouse, cow, pig, cat and dog.
targetString: ቅድሚ ናይ መጀመርያ ምፍላይ ናይ HCoV-229E ገመድ ካብ ናይ ኣፍንጫ ምዙራቕ ናይ ተሓከምቲ፡ ምስ ልሙድ ሰዓል ዝተተሓሓዘ ዝተፈላለዩ CoVs ካብ ዝተፈላለዩ ዓይነት እንስሳታት ተፈልዮም ኢዮም፡ ከም ኣብነት ታርኪ፡ ኣንጭዋ፡ ብዕራይ፡ ሓሰማ፡ ድሙ፡ ከምኡ’ውን ከልቢ።
en-mt: Prior to the first separation of HCoV-229E cables from patients' nose-spinal cords, various CoVs associated with common coughs were distinguished from a variety of animals, such as tarki, mouse, bull, pig, cats and dog.

sourceString: In the past decades, seven HCoVs have been identified.
targetString: ኣብ ዝሓለፈ ዓሰርተ  ዓመታት፡ሸዉዓተ HCoVs  ተለልዮም ኣሎዉ።
en-mt: Seven HCoVs have been identified in the past decade.

sourceString: A brief summary of the history of HCoV discovery in chronological order (Table ​1) would be informative and instructive.
targetString: ጽማቕ መምርሒ ታሪኽ ናይ HCoV ቫይረስ ርኽበት ነናይ ግዚኡ ብመስርዕ ኣብ (ሰንጠረጅ 1) ኣብራህን መሃርን ምኾነ ኔሩ።
en-mt: a good guide to the discovery of the HCoV virus in its current form (Figure 1).

sourceString: The first HCoV-229E strain was isolated from the respiratory tract of patients with upper respiratory tract infection in the year of 1966, and was subsequently adapted to grow in WI-38 lung cell lines.
targetString: እቲ ናይ መጀመርያ HCoV-229E ምምጣጥ ካብቲ ናይ ምስትንፋስ ስርዓት ናይ ተሓከምቲ ዝተፈልየ ኮይኑ ፡ እዚ ድማ ብፍላይ ነቲ ላዕለውይ ናይ ምስትንፋስ ስርዓት ብከላ ኣብ ዓመተ 1966 ዝውክል ኢዩ፡ ከሙኡውን ብተኸታታሊ ናይ ሳንብእ WI-38 ዋህዮታት መስመራት/ጭሕጋራት ከስዕብ ተኽእሎታት ኣለዎ።
en-mt: he first HCoV-229E is different from the respiratory system in patients, which specifically represents the upper respiratory system of pollution in 1966 and has the potential to result in a series of lung WI-38 cell lines.

sourceString: Patients infected with HCoV-229E presented with common cold symptoms, including headache, sneezing, malaise and sore-throat, with fever and cough seen in 10~20% cases.
targetString: እቶም በዚ ናይ HCoV-229E ዝተለኽፉ ተሓከምቲ፡ ካብ 10~20% ግዳያት ናይ ልሙድ ሰዓል ምልክታት፡ ረስኒ፡ ከምኡ’ውን ሰዓል ዝኣመሰሉ ምልክታት ኣርእዮም።
en-mt: Patients infected with this HCoV-229E showed symptoms such as 10–20% of cases of common cough, fever symptoms and cough.

sourceString: Later in 1967, HCoV-OC43 was isolated from organ culture and subsequent serial passage in brains of suckling mice.
targetString: ጸኒሑ ኣብ 1967 HCoV-OC43  ካብ ህዋስ ምርባሕን ዝስዕብ ተኻታታሊ መተሓላለፊ ኣብ ኣእምሮ ናይ ውልዶ ኣናጹ ተፈልዩ ኔሩ።
en-mt: Later in 1967, HCoV-OC43 was separated from cells and the following transmission in the brain of the birth mother.

sourceString: The clinical features of HCoV-OC43 infection appear to be similar to those caused by HCoV-229E, which are symptomatically indistinguishable from infection with other respiratory tract pathogens such as influenza A viruses and rhinoviruses.
targetString: እቶም ክሊኒካዊ መስርሓት ናይ HCoV-OC43 ረኽስታት ፡ ምስቲ ብሰንኪ HCoV-229E ዝወጽእ ረኽሲታት ተመሳሳሊ ኢዩ፡ እዚ ድማ ምስ ነቲ ብሰንኪ ኢንፍሊወንዛ A ቫይረስን ፡ ራይኖ-ቫይረስን ዝወጽእ ረኽሲ፡ ዝኾነ ኣማቲን መፈላለዪን ናይ ረኽሲ ዘይብሉ ኢዩ
en-mt: The clinical processes for HCoV-OC43 infections are similar to infections caused by HCoV-229E, which do not have a difference between amite and non-infection from influenza A virus and rhino-virus infections

sourceString: Both HCoV-229E and HCoV-OC43 are distributed globally, and they tend to be predominantly transmitted during the season of winter in temperate climate.
targetString: ክልቲኦም HCoV-229E  ን HCoV-OC43  ን ኣብ ኩሉ እልዓለም ተዘርጊሖም።ኣብ ግዜናይ ሓጋይ ወቕቲ ማእከላይኩነታት ኣየር ን ቕድመ ዕብለላ ዝተማሕላለፈ ባህሪ ኣርእዮም።
en-mt: Both HCoV-229E and HCoV-OC43 were distributed all over the world, showing a pre-sworn quality during the winter season.

sourceString: Generally, the incubation time of these two viruses is less than one week, followed by an approximately 2-week illness.
targetString: ብሓፈሻ ናይዞም ክልተ ቫይረሳት ትሕቲ ሓደ ሰሙን ዝጽለዉሉ  ትሕቲ ሓደ ሰሙን እዩ፡ብገምጋም ከኣ 2 ሰሙን ናይ ሕማም ግዜ።
en-mt: In general, the two viruses are affected by less than one week and an average of 2 weeks of sickness.

sourceString: According to a human volunteer study, healthy individuals infected with HCoV-229E developed mild common cold.
targetString: ብመንጽር መጽናዕቲ ወለንታውያን ሰባት፡ጥዑያት ውልቀሰባት ብ HCoV-229E  ተለኺፎም፡ናብ ሰዓል ውን ማዕቢላ።
en-mt: According to the study of volunteers, healthy individuals have been infected with HCoV-229E and developed into coughs.

sourceString: Only a few immunocompromised patients exhibited severe lower respiratory tract infection.
targetString: ዉሑድ ኢምዩኖቾምፕሮሚስድ ሕሙማት ጥራይ ከቢድ ታሕተዋይ ናይ ምስትንፋስ መተሓላለፍቲ መልከፍቲ ኣርእዮም።
en-mt: Only a limited number of patients showed severe lower respiratory infections.

sourceString: SARS, also known as “atypical pneumonia”, was the first well documented HCoV-caused pandemic in human history and the etiological agent is SARS-CoV, the third HCoV discovered.
targetString: ሳርስ ውን ዘይልሙድ ኒሞንያ ተባሂሉ ይጽዋዕ እዩ።እቲ መጀመርያ ጽቡቕ ዝተሰነደ HCoV  ኣብ ታሪኽ ሰባትኣዝዩ ዝተላበዐን ጠንቁ SARS-CoV -2 ን እዩ፡ሳልሳይ SARS-CoV ተረኺቡ።
en-mt: SARS is also called abnormal pneumonia, and the first well-documented HCoV has been found to be the most common SARS-CoV-2 in human history.

sourceString: The first case of SARS can be traced back to late 2002 in Guangdong Province of China.
targetString: እዚ መጀመርታ ኩነት ናይ SARS  ኣብ ጋዋንግ ኣውራጃ ናይ ቻይና ፡ ናብቲ ናይ መወዳእታ 2002 ክጽብጸብ ክኢሉ።
en-mt: he first case of SARS in Gawang province of China was reported to the last of 2002.

sourceString: The SARS epidemic resulted in 8,096 reported cases with 774 deaths, spreading across many countries and continents.
targetString: ተላባዒ SARS  ምዝርጋሕ ኣብ ብዙሓት ሃገራትን ኣህጉራትን ናይ 8,096 ልኹፋት ምስ 774 ምዉታት ኣስዒቡ።
en-mt: The spread of the infectious SARS has resulted in 8,096 deaths in many countries and continents along with 774 dead.

sourceString: Apart from the super-spreaders, it was estimated that each case could give rise to approximately two secondary cases, with an incubation period of 4 to 7 days and the peak of viral load appearing on the 10th day of illness.
targetString: ካብቶም ኣዝዮም ንጡፋት ኣማሓላለፍቲ፡ ነፍሲ ወከፍ ግዳይ ብውሑዱ ን ነፍሲ ወከፍ 2 ሰባት ካልኣዊ ግዳያት ክገብሮም ተኽእሎታት ኣለዎን ክግምገም ድማ ይኽእልን፡ እዚ ድማ ካብ 4 ክሳብ 7 ናይ ውሸባ መዓልቲ ኸምኡውን እቲ ጥርዚ ናይ ቫይረስ ጽዕነት ዝረኣየሉ ግዜ ኣብ 10ይ መዓልቲ ክኸውን ከምዝኽእል ተገምጊሙ
en-mt: Among the most active cases is that each case has the potential and can be assessed for at least 2 second cases, which can be between 4 and 7 quarantine days and the 10th day of the virus outbreak.

sourceString: Patients infected with SARS-CoV initially present with myalgia, headache, fever, malaise and chills, followed by dyspnea, cough and respiratory distress as late symptoms.
targetString: ብ SARS-CoV ዝተፐኽፉ ሕሙማት መጀመርያ ዝተረኽቡ፡ ሚላጅያ፡ሕማም ርእሲ፡ ረስኒ፡ ቀጨውጨውን ገብገብታን ኣስዒቡ ዳይስፕንያ፡ ሰዓል፡ናይ ምስትንፋስ ጸገም፡ከም ናይ መወዳእታ ምልክታት እዮም።
en-mt: He was the first to be diagnosed with SARS-CoV, which causes headaches, fever, coughing and difficulty breathing.

sourceString: Lymphopenia, deranged liver function tests, and elevated creatine kinase are common laboratory abnormalities of SARS.
targetString: ሊፎፐንያ፡ስራሕ ፈተናታት ነውጺ ጸላም ከብዲን ክብ ዝበለ ክሬቲንኪናሰናይ ሳርስ ዘይንቡርልሙድ ስነ መርመራ እዮም።
en-mt: Lephopenia is a test of the liver, the liver, the high creatinkina, sars, and the abnormality of the test.

sourceString: Diffuse alveolar damage, epithelial cell proliferation and an increase of macrophages are also observed in SARS patients.
targetString: ዕንወት ትንሓግ ኢፒትኤሊያልዋሃዮ ምብዛሕ  ን ተወሳኺ ማክሮፋጅስ ኣብ ሕማም SARS ትራእዩ።
en-mt: Hemorrhage and additional macrophages are found in SARS.

sourceString: Approximately 20-30% of patients subsequently require intensive care and mechanical ventilation.
targetString: ዳርጋ 20-30% ናይ ሕሙማት ከም ውጽኢቱ ጽዑቕ ክንክን ንመካኒካዊ ናይ ምስትንፋስ ሓገዝ የድልዮም።
en-mt: As a result, about 20-30% of patients require intensive care for mechanical ventilation.

sourceString: In addition to lower respiratory tract, multiple organs including gastrointestinal tract, liver and kidney can also be infected in these severe cases, usually accompanied with a cytokine storm, which might be lethal particularly in immunocompromised patients.
targetString: ከም ተወሳኺ ትሑት ናይ ምስትንፋስ ምትሕለላፍ፡ብዙሓት ህዋሳት ከም ባዓል ኣሞዑታዊምትሕልላፍ፡ጸላም ከብዲን ኩሊትን ውን ኣብ ጽንኩር ኩነት ክትንከፋ ይኽእላ እየን።ኩሉ ግዜ ምስ ስቶኪናዊ ማዓት ዝሓብር ፍሉይ ዘይምሕር ሕማም ክኸውን ይኽእል እዩ።
en-mt: In addition to low respiratory transmission, many senses, such as ammonian transmission of dark liver and kidneys, can also be affected by severe conditions, and it can always be a special untreatable disease associated with stoic mast.

sourceString: The virus was first isolated from the open lung biopsy of a relative of the index patient who travelled to Hong Kong from Guangzhou.
targetString: እቲ ቫይረስ ን መጀመርታ ግዜ ካብቲ ክፉት ናይ ሳንቡእ ባዮፍሲ ዘመድ ናይቲ ሓባሪ ተሓካሚ ካብ ኵኣንዙ ናብ ሆን-ኮንግ ዝተጋዕዘ ፡ ተነጺሉ ኢዩ።
en-mt: For the first time, the virus has been isolated from the infected patient's close relative to Hong Kong.

sourceString: Since then, tremendous efforts have been dedicated to HCoV research.
targetString: ካብ ሽዑ፡ናይ ኤችኮቭ መጽናዕቲ ሓይል ጻዕሪ ተወፍይሉ ኣሎ።
en-mt: Since then, the study of Hiv has been conducted.

sourceString: HCoV-NL63 was isolated from a 7-month-old child from the Netherlands during late 2004.
targetString: ኣብ መወዳአታ 2004 ወዲ 7 ወርሒ ህጻን ካብ ኔዘርላንድ  ካብ HCoV-NL63 ተወሺቡ።
en-mt: At the end of 2004, a seven-month-old baby from the Netherlands was discharged from HCoV-NL63.

sourceString: It was initially found to be prevalent in young children, the elderly and immunocompromised patients with respiratory illnesses.
targetString: እዚ ሕማም  ቀንዲ ንቆልዑ፡ ኣረጋውያን ንሕማማት ናይ ምጽዋር ዓቕሞም ዝደኸመ ሕሙማት ብፍላይ ድማ ናይ ስርዓተ ምስትንፋስ ሕማም ዘለዎም  ከጥቅዕ እዩ ተረኺቡ።
en-mt: he disease has been found to affect children, the elderly, patients who are weakened to cope with diseases, especially those with respiratory diseases.

sourceString: Presentation of coryza, conjunctivitis, fever, and bronchiolitis is common in the disease caused by HCoV-NL63.
targetString: ኣብ ብ HCoV-NL63 ዝመጽእ ሕማም ህላወ ናይ ኮርያዛ፡ ነድሪ ኮንጃክቲቫ፡ረስንን ነድሪ ጉርጉማን ልሙዳት እዮም።
en-mt: In HCoV-NL63, the presence of Korean inflammatory conjaktiva fever and inflammation of Gurguma are common.

sourceString: Another independent study described the isolation of the same virus from a nasal specimen from an 8-month-old boy suffering from pneumonia in the Netherlands.
targetString: ኣብ ነዘርላድ ንሓደ 8 ወርሒ ዝገበረ ህጻን ብኒሞንያ ሕማም ዝሳቀ ምፍላይ ናይ ሓደ ዓይነት ቫይረስ ካብ ኣፍንጫኣዊ መርኣይ ካልእ ዝተፈለየ መጽናዕቲ ገሊጽዎ።
en-mt: In the Netherlands, an 8-month-old child suffering from pneumonia has described the separation of a type virus from a nasal sample.

sourceString: Although it was identified in Netherlands, it is actually distributed globally.
targetString: ወላ’ካ ኣብ ነዘርላንድ እንተተፈልጠ፡ ኣብ ዓለም ምሉእ ኢዩ ኣስፋሕፊሑ ዘሎ።
en-mt: Although it is known in the Netherlands, it is widespread worldwide.

sourceString: It has been estimated that HCoV-NL63 accounts for approximately 4.7% of common respiratory diseases, and its peak incidence occurs during early summer, spring and winter.

sourceString: HCoV-NL63 is associated with obstructive laryngitis, also known as croup.

sourceString: In the same year, HCoV-HKU1 was isolated from a 71-year-old man who had been hospitalized with pneumonia and bronchiolitis in Hong Kong.

sourceString: All these four community-acquired HCoVs have been well adapted to humans and are generally less likely to mutate to cause highly pathogenic diseases, though accidents did occur for unknown reasons as in the rare case of a more virulent subtype of HCoV-NL63, which has recently been reported to cause severe lower respiratory tract infection in China.

sourceString: Generally, when these HCoVs acquire the abilities to transmit efficiently and to maintain themselves continuously within humans, they also become less virulent or pathogenic.

sourceString: MERS-CoV was first isolated in 2012 from the lung of a 60-year-old patient who developed acute pneumonia and renal failure in Saudi Arabia.
targetString: MERS-CoV መጀመርያ ኣብ 2012 ተገሊሉ፡ እዚ ድማ ካብ ብ ሳንቡእ ዝመጽእ ሕማም ወዲ 60 ዓመት ተሓካሚ ፡ ከቢድ ናይ ኒሞንያን ናይ ኩሊት ውድቀት ዝተራእየሉ ኣብ ሱዕዲ ዓረብ ኢዩ።
en-mt: MERS-CoV was first isolated in 2012, in Saudi Arabia, where a 60-year-old patient from lung disease experienced severe pneumonia and kidney failure.

sourceString: Whereas most of the laboratory-confirmed cases originate from the Middle East, imported cases with occasional secondary spreads to close contacts have been reported in various European countries and Tunisia.

en-mt: As a result, most confirmed laboratory conditions have been reported from the Middle East to close relations with the occasional re-distribution of news in several European countries and Tunisia.

sourceString: Another secondary outbreak occurred in South Korea in 2015 with 186 confirmed cases.

sourceString: Clinical manifestations of MERS resemble those of SARS, characterized by progressive acute pneumonia.

sourceString: Unlike SARS, many patients with MERS also developed acute renal failure, which is thus far unique for MERS among HCoV-caused diseases.

sourceString: More than 30% of patients present with gastrointestinal symptoms, such as diarrhea and vomiting.

sourceString: As of February 14, 2020, over 2500 laboratory confirmed cases were reported with a high case fatality of 34.4%, making MERS-CoV one of the most devastating viruses known to humans.
targetString: ክሳብ ሎሚ ለካቲት 14፡ 2020፡ 2500 ግዳያት ብ ላባራቶሪ ዝተረጋገጸ ተመዝጊቡ ኣሎ፡ ምስ ኣዝዩ ልዑል ሞት ናይ ግዳያት 34.4% ተጸብጺቡ፡ እዚ ድማ MERS-CoV ሓደ ካብቶም ኣዕነውቲ ዓይነት ቫይረስ ን ደቂ-ሰባት ይገብሮ።
en-mt: As of today, February 14, 2020, 2500 cases have been documented by laboratory confirmed cases, with an extremely high mortality rate of 34.4%, making MERS-CoV one of the devastating virus types for humans.

sourceString: During middle to late December 2019, clusters of pneumonia patients retrospectively known to be associated with SARS-CoV-2 infection were detected in Wuhan, Hubei Province, China.

sourceString: World Health Organization declared the ongoing outbreak of lower respiratory tract infection caused by SARS-CoV-2 a Public Health Emergency of International Concern and also named the disease COVID-19.

sourceString: Although SARS-CoV and SARS-CoV-2 are very similar due to high nucleotide sequence homology of 82%, they cluster into different branches in the phylogenetic tree.

sourceString: SARS-CoV-2 is apparently less pathogenic but more transmissible compared to SARS-CoV and MERS-CoV.

sourceString: Comparing and contrasting SARS-CoV-2 with the other six HCoVs reveal similarities and differences of great interest.
targetString: ተወዳዳሪን ተነጻጻርን  SARS-CoV-2   ምስ ካልኦት ሽድሽተ ኤችኮቭ ዓብይ ኣገዳስነት ናይ ተመሳሳልነትን ፍልልያትን የርኢ።

sourceString: First, the incubation period and the duration of the course of HCoV disease are very similar.

sourceString: In this regard, SARS-CoV-2 follows the general trend of the other six HCoVs.

sourceString: Second, the severity of symptoms of COVID-19 lies between SARS-CoV and the four community-acquired HCoVs (i.e. HCoV-229E, HCoV-OC43, HCoV-HKU1 and HCoV-NL63).

sourceString: On the other hand, studies in Middle East have shown that dromedary camels are seropositive for MERS-CoV-specific neutralizing antibodies, same as camels of Middle East origin in multiple African countries.
targetString: በቲ ሓደ ወገን፡ ኣብ ማእከላይ ምብራቕ ኣብ ኣግማል ዝተገብረ መጽናዕቲ ኣመልኪቱ፡ናይ ማእከላይ ምብራቕ መበቆሎም ኣግማል ንብዙሓት ኣብ ኣፍሪቃ ሃገራት ዘለዉ ሓደ ዝመንጉዶኦም ኣግማል ሲሮፖዚትን MERS-CoV ዝበረደ ጸረ ኣካል እዮም።
en-mt: A study of camels in the Middle East, on the other hand, found that camels of Middle Eastern origin are an antidote to many African countries that have suffered from one of their own, syropods and MERS-CoV.

sourceString: Live MERS-CoV identical to the virus found in humans was isolated from the nasal swabs of dromedary camels, further indicating that camels serve as the bona fide reservoir host of MERS-CoV.
targetString: ከም MERS-CoV ምስ ኣብ ሰባት ዝተረኽበ ዓይነት ቫይረስ ተመሳሳሊ፡ ካብቲ ናይ ኣፍንጫዊ ቅምሶ ናይ ድሮመድርይ ዓሌት ገመል ተገሊሉ፡ እዚ ድማ ኣግማል ከም ሓቀኛታት ኣኣንጋዲ መዕቆሪ ናይ MERS-CoV ከም ዝኾኑ የረጋግጽ።
en-mt: Similar to the MERS-CoV virus found in humans, it has been isolated from the nasal strain of camels, confirming that camels are the true shelter of MERS-CoV.

sourceString: It is also noteworthy that generally mild symptoms but massive virus shedding were observed in camels experimentally infected with MERS-CoV.
targetString: ካልእን ክንግንዘቦ ዘለና ነገር ድማ፡ ኣብ ናይ ሕክምን ኣገባብ ብ MERS-CoV ዝተለኽፋ ኣግማል ፈኪስ ዝኾነ ምልክታትን ሰፊሕ ሸፈነ ናይ ቫይረስን፡ ከምዝተራእየ።
en-mt: It is also important to note that there have been signs of MERS-CoV-infected camels, mild symptoms and a wide range of viral infections.

sourceString: Notably, infected camels shed viruses not only through respiratory route but also through fecal-oral route, which is also the main route for virus shedding from bats.
targetString: ክስትውዓለሉ ዘለዎ ዝተለኽፉ ኣግማል ብናይ ምስትንፋስ መገዲ ጥራይ ዘይኮነ ግናኸ ብናይ ኣፍ ቀልቀል መገዲ ቫይረሳት የውጽእ። ካብ መንካዓት ቀንዲ መንገዲ መውጽኢ ቫይረስ እዩ።

sourceString: However, questions still remain since many confirmed cases of MERS have no contact history with camels prior to symptom onset, plausibly ascribed to human-to-human transmission or unknown transmission routes involving unrecognized animal species that harbour MERS-CoV.

sourceString: Several recent studies based on metagenomic sequencing have suggested that a group of endangered small mammals known as pangolins (Manis javanica) could also harbour ancestral beta-CoVs related to SARS-CoV-2.

sourceString: To conclude, the most effective way to prevent viral zoonosis is for humans to stay away from the ecological niches of the natural reservoirs of the zoonotic viruses.
targetString: ንምጥቕላል እቲ ቐንዲ ውጺኢታዊ ዝኾነ መንገዲቫይራል ዙነሲስ ንምክልኻል፡ሰባት ክጥንቀቑሉ ዘለዎም ካብ ኢኮሎጂካል ምድግጋፍ ናይ መዕቆቢ ዞነቲክ ቫይረሳት ምርሓቕ እዩ።
en-mt: he most effective way to prevent zoonosis is to avoid ecological support for sanctuary zonetic viruses.

sourceString: Several pieces in the puzzle of the zoonotic origin of SARS-CoV-2 are still missing.
targetString: ገለ ገለ ጭራማት ናይ ግድላት ናይ ዞኖቲካዊ መበቆል ናይ SARS-CoV-2፡ ክሳብ ሕጂ ኣይተረኽቡን ወይ ጠፊኦም ኣለዎ።
en-mt: Some of the problems of the zonotic origin of SARS-CoV-2 have not yet been found or have disappeared.

sourceString: First, if bats transmit an ancestral virus of SARS-CoV-2 to pangolins, it will be of interest to see under what circumstances bats and pangolins could share the same ecological niche.
targetString: መጀመርያ፡ እንተ ድኣ መንካዓት ንጥንታዉያን ቫይረስ ናይ SARS-CoV-2  ናብ ጺሕራታት ኣማሓላሊፈን፡ኣብ ትሕቲ ከመይ ዝበለ ኩነታት መንካዓትን ጽሒራታትን ሓደ ዓይነት ሓድሕዳዊ ዝምድና ናይ ከባቢኦም ክካፈሉ ይኽእሉ ክትፈልጥ ኣገዳሲ ይገብሮ።
en-mt: First of all, if you have infected the ancient SARS-CoV-2 virus, it is important to know that under what conditions, bats and viruses can share the same local relationship.

sourceString: Second, if bats play a more direct role in human transmission, how humans get into contact with bats should be determined.
targetString: ካልአይ፡ናብ ሰባት ንምትሕልላፍ መንካዕ ቀጠታዊ ተራ ትጻወት እንተደኣ ኮይና፡ሰባትብከመይ ምስ መንካዕ ይራኸቡ ክውሰን ኣለዎ።
en-mt: If the second is to play a regular role in transmitting bats to humans, people must determine how they interact with bats.

sourceString: Third, if a third mammal acts as the true intermediate host, how it interacts with the different species including humans, bats and pangolins has to be clarified.
targetString: ሳልሳይ፡ እንተድኣ እቲ 3ይ መጥበዊ ከም ማእከላይ ኣኣንጋዲ መመሓላለፊ ተቀሚጡ ፡ ምስ ዝተፈላለዩ ዓሌታት ከም ፡ ሰባት፡ ዓሌት መንካዕን ፓንጎሊን ዝሓወሰ፡ ከመይ ይተሓባበርከም ዝኾነ ክፍለጥ ኣለዎ።
en-mt: hirdly, if the 3rd mammal sits as a central transmitter, it should be known how it cooperates with different races, such as people, bats, species and pangolins.

sourceString: Finally, since many mammals including domestic animals might be susceptible to SARS-CoV-2, both surveillance and experimental infection should be conducted.
targetString: ኣብ መወዳእታ፡ ወላ’ካ ዝበዝሑ መጥበውቲ ን እንስሳ ዘቤት ዘጠቃለሉ ን SARS-CoV-2 ቁዓት እንተኾኑ፡ ኩሎም ናይ መጽናዕቲን ቅየሳን መልከፍቲ ፈተነታት ክግበሩ ኣለዎም
en-mt: In the end, even if most mammals are sensitive to SARS-CoV-2, all studies and testing tests should be conducted.

sourceString: Should it be a bat, a pangolin or another mammal, it is expected that SARS-CoV-2 or its parental viruses that are almost identical will be identified in its natural hosts in future.
targetString: ክኸዉን ዘለዎ መንካዕ ድያ፡ጽሒራ ወይ ካልእ መጥበዉቲ ትጽቢት ይግበረሉ ፡እዚ SARS-CoV-2  ወይ ወለዳዊ ቫይረሳቱ ዳርጋ ተመሳሳልቲ ዝኾኑ ኣብ ተፈጥራዊ መዕቆቢኡ ክፍለጡ እዮም
en-mt: It is expected that the SARS-CoV-2 or its native viruses are almost the same in natural environments.
