sourceString: Continued investigations in this area will elucidate the evolutionary pathway of SARS-CoV-2 in animals, with important implications in the prevention and control of COVID-19 in humans.
targetString: ቀጻሊ መርመራታት ኣብዚ ዓውዲ ነቲ ፍልቀትታዊ መንገዲ ን መስርዕ ን ናይ SARS-CoV-2 ኣብ እንስሳታት፡ ምስ ኣገዳሲ ኣፋፍኖታትን ናይ ምቁጹጻር መስርህሓትን ኣብ ኮቪድ-19 ናይ ሰባት፡ መብርሂ ክህብ ኢዩ
en-mt: In this field, ongoing tests will explain the evolution of SARS-CoV-2 in animals, along with important controls and control procedures for COVID-19.

sourceString: Updating the diagnostic criteria of COVID-19 “suspected case” and “confirmed case” is necessary
targetString: ምሕዳስ ናይ መርመራዊ መዐቀኒ/መምዘኒ ናይ ኮቪድ-19 ‘’ዝጥርጠር ተርእዮ’’ ከምኡውን ‘’ልኹፋት ግዳያት’’ ኣዝዩ ኣገዳሲ ኢዩ።
en-mt: The renewal of the diagnostic criteria/criteria for COVID-19 is 'suspicious' and 'vulnerable cases' are very important.

sourceString: On 6 February 2020, our team had published a rapid advice guideline for diagnosis and treatment of 2019 novel coronavirus (2019-nCoV) infection, and this guideline provided our experience and make well reference for fighting against this pandemic worldwide.
targetString: ኣብ ለካቲት 6, 2020፡ ጉጅለና፡ ሓደ ቅልጡፍ ናይ ምዕዶ መምርሒ ምርመራን ምፍዋስን ናይ 2019 ኖቨል ኮሮና-ቫይረስ (2019-nCoV) መልከፍቲ፡ ዝብል ጽሑፍ ሓቲማ፡ እዚ መምርሒ ድማ ኩሉ ናትና ተመክሮ ዝሓቆፈን ብሉጻት ዝኾኑ መወከሲትስት ብምቅራብ ድማ ዓለማዊ ናይ ለበዳ ቃልሲ ኣኵስክ ኣተባቢዑ።
en-mt: On February 6, 2020, our team published a quick guide to diagnosis and treatment of the 2019 Novel Coronavirus (2019-nCoV), which encouraged the global pandemic response by providing the best references to all our experience.

sourceString: However, the coronavirus disease 2019 (COVID-19) is a new disease, our awareness and knowledge are gradually increasing based on the ongoing research findings and clinical practice experience; hence, the strategies of diagnosis and treatment are also continually updated.
targetString: እንተኾነ፡ እዚ ናይ ኮሮናቫይረስ ሕማም 2019 (ኮቪድ-19) ለበዳ፡ ሓድሽ ጉዳይ ኢዩ፡ ኣብቲ ዝካየድ ዘሎ መሰረታዊ ናይ መርመራ መጽናዕቲን ክሊኒካዊ ንጥፈታትን ብምምርካስ ድማ ፍልጠትናን ንቕሓትናን ይውስኽ ኣሎ፡ በዚ ድማ እቶም ኣገባባት ናይ ሕክምና በብቅሩብ ይሕደሱን ይምዕብሉን ኣለዉ።
en-mt: However, the 2019 coronavirus pandemic is a new issue, and our knowledge and awareness are increasing depending on the ongoing basic testing and clinical activities, so that the medical procedures are gradually being revised and developed.

sourceString: In this letter, we answered one comment on our guideline and provided the newest diagnostic criteria of “suspected case” and “confirmed case” according to the latest Diagnosis and Treatment Guidelines for COVID-19 (seventh version) that issued by the National Health Committee of the People’s Republic of China.
targetString: ኣብዚ ደብዳቢ እዚ፡ ኣብቲ መምርሒታትና ንሓንቲ ርእይቶ መልሲ ሂብና ኣሎና፡ ከምኡውን ብመሰረት ሓዲሽ ናይ መርመራን ሕክምናን መምርሒ ናይ ኮቪድ-19 (ሻብዓይ ቅዳሕ)፡ በቲ ሃገራዊ ናይ ጥዕና ኮሚቴ ናይ ህዝባዊት ሪፓብሊክ ቻይና ዝተዋህበ፡ ዝተሓደሰ/ሓዲስ ናይ መርመራ መዕቀኒ ‘’ጥርጡር ከይዝ’’ ከምኡውን ‘’ልኹፍ ከይዝ’’ ኢልና ኣዳሊና ኣሎና።
en-mt: In this letter, we have responded to an opinion in our guidelines and have prepared "not to 'cause suspicion" and 'cause' new testing measures issued by the National Health Committee of the People's Republic of China in accordance with the new COVID-19 testing and treatment guidelines (seventh copy) issued by the National Health Committee of the People's Republic of China.

sourceString: In December 2019, the 2019 novel coronavirus (2019-nCoV) has caused an outbreak, which is now officially named as the coronavirus disease 2019 (COVID-19) and the virus has been named severe acute respiratory syndrome coronavirus 2 (SARS-CoV-2).
targetString: ኣብ ታሕሳስ 2019፡ እቲ ናይ 2019 ኣገራሚ ዓይነት ኮሮና-ቫይረስ (2019-nCoV) ሓዲሽ ማዕበል ሕማም ናይ ቫይረስ ኣማዕቢሉ፡ ሕጂ ድማ ብወግዒ ናይ 2019 ሕማም ኮሮና-ቫይረስ (ኮቪድ-19) ተባሂሉ ይጽዋኦ ኣሎ፡ እዚ ቫይረስ እዚ ሓደገጃ ናይ ምስትንፋስ ኣበር ኮሮና-ቫይረስ 2 (SARS-CoV-2) ይጽዋኦ ኣሎ
en-mt: In December 2019, the 2019 amazing type of coronavirus (2019-nCoV) developed a new wave of the virus, which is now officially called the 2019 coronavirus (COVID-19), which is also known as SARS-CoV-2 respiratory infection (SARS-CoV-2).

sourceString: On 11 March 2020, WHO characterized COVID-19 as a pandemic.
targetString: ኣብ 11 መጋቢት 2020፡ ውድብ ጥዕና ዓለም (WHO) ንኮቪድ-19 ከም ዓለማዊ ለበዳ ኣዊጅዎ።
en-mt: On March 11, 2020, the World Health Organization declared COVID-19 a global pandemic.

sourceString: In order to fight against the SARS-CoV-2 infection, our team has developed a rapid advice guideline and that has been published online in Military Medical Research on 06 February 2020.
targetString: መታን ን SARS-CoV-2 ዝዓይነቱ ሕማም ንክትቃለሶ፡ እዚ ናትና ኣካላ ወይ ጋንታ ሓደ ቅልጡፍ ናይ ሓበሬታ መምርሒ ካብ ለካቲት 06, 2020 ጀሚሩ ኣብ ናይ ወተሃደራዊ ናይ ጥዕና መጽናዕትታት ኣሕቶምዎን ኣቀሚጥዎን ኣሎ።
en-mt: To combat SARS-CoV-2, this fast information guide for our body or team has been published and placed in military health studies starting February 06, 2020.

sourceString: It has attracted a great attention since published.
targetString: ኣዝዩ ብዙሕ ሰሓብነት ጌራ ኢያ ካብ ትኽፈት።
en-mt: She's got a lot of openings.

sourceString: Note however that COVID-19 is a new disease, our awareness and knowledge is gradually increasing based on the ongoing research findings and clinical practice experience; hence, the strategies of diagnosis and treatment are also continually updated.
targetString: መዘኻኸሪ፡ ወላ’እካ ኮቪድ-19 ሓድሽ ሕማም እንተኾነ፡ እቲ ናትና ኣፍልጦን ብቕዓትን ቀስ ብ ቀስ ኣብቲ ዝካየድ ዘሎ ምርምራትን ናይ ክሊኒክ ንጥፈታትን ብምሙርካስ ይዓቢ ኣሎ ፡ ስለዚ እቲ ናይ ምሕካምን ምሕዋይን ተኽእሎታት ድማ ቀስ ብ ቀስ ይዓቢ ኣሎ።
en-mt: Reminders that even though COVID-19 is a new disease, our knowledge and qualifications are gradually growing based on ongoing research and clinical activities, so the chances of treating and recovering are gradually increasing.

sourceString: For instance the Diagnosis and Treatment Guidelines for COVID-19 issued by the National Health Committee of the People’s Republic of China (http://www.nhc.gov.cn/), among 16 January 2020 to 3 March 2020, has issued a total of seven editions with some contexts being substantively changed.
targetString: ከም ኣብነት፡ ናይ ኮቪድ-19 ናይ መርመራን ሕክምናዊ ሓገዛትን መምርሒታት ብ ሃገራዊ ናይ ጥዕና ኮሚቴ ናይ ረፑብሊክ ናይ ቻይና ተዋሂቡ፡ (http://www.nhc.gov.cn/), ካብ ጥሪ 16 ክሳብ መጋቢት 3 ናይ 2020፡ ክሳብ 7 ዝበጽሑ ሕታማት ምስ ገለ ምቅይያር ናይ ጽሑፋት ተወሂቡ።
en-mt: For example, COVID-19 testing and medical assistance guidelines have been issued by the Republic of China's National Health Committee (http://www.nhc.gov.cn/) from January 16 to March 3, 2020 with some changes in publications.

sourceString: Now our guideline received a comment by Zhou et al., they introduced a simple scoring proposal based on their clinical experience.
targetString: ሕጂ ግን ዝዊ ኤት ኣል፡ ነቲ ናትና መምርሒታት ሓሳቡ ሂብሉ ኣሎ፡ እዚ ድማ ኣዝዩ ቀሊል ናይ ምክልኻል ኣገባባት ኣብቲ ናይ ክሊኒክ ንጥፈታቶ ዝተሞርከሰ ኢዩ።
en-mt: However, now, Twi et al has given thought to our guidelines, which are very simple methods of prevention based on clinical activities.

sourceString: Their work added new evidence for our guideline and also make valuable reference for this pandemic worldwide.
targetString: እቲ ስረሓቶም፡ ሓድሽ መርጋገጺ ነዚ ናትና መምርሒ ወሲኽሉ፡ ከምኡውን ጠቃሚ ዝኾነ ዓለማዊ መወከሲ ናይ ለበዳ ውን ክኸውን ክኢሉ።
en-mt: heir work has added a new test to our guidelines and has also become a useful global reference for the pandemic.

sourceString: We endorse their significant work and express our thanks.
targetString: ነቲ ኣዝዩ ጠቃሚን ኣገዳሲን ዝኾነ ስራሓቶም ኣፍልጦ ንህብ ምስጋናና ድማ ክንሰደሎም ንፈቱ፡፡
en-mt: We recognise their most important and important work and we would like to send them our thanks.

sourceString: However, their work also needs update according to the latest Diagnosis and Treatment Guidelines for COVID-19 (Trial seventh version) and recently studies.
targetString: እንተኾነ፡ ብመሰረት ሓዲሽ ናይ ሕክምና ኣገባብ መምርሒታት ን ኮቪድ-19 (ፈተነ ሻብዓይ ትርጉም)ን ናይ ቀረባ መጽናዕትታትን፡ እቲ ስረሓቶም’ውን ክሕደስ ኣለዎ።
en-mt: However, according to new medical guidelines for COVID-19 (trial 7th trial) and recent studies, their work must also be renewed.

sourceString: According to the seventh edition (3 March 2020), to confirm the suspected case needs to combine any one item of epidemiological history features with two items of clinical manifestations to make a comprehensive analysis, or needs to meet three items of clinical manifestations if without clear epidemiological history:
targetString: ብመሰረት ሻውዓይ ሕታም (3 መጋቢት 2020) ንሓደ ግዳይ ናይ ቫይረስ ክኸውን ይኽእል ኢዩ ዝተባህለ ጥርጡር፡ ሓንቲ ካብቲ ናይ ጥዕና ናይ ለበዳ ወይ ሕሉፍ መዝገቡ ምስ ክልተ ናይ ክሊኒክ ዝተራእየሉ ሓዊስካ ሓደ ገምጋም ብምሃብ ወይ ድማ ነቶም ሰለስተ ባእታታት ናይ ክሊኒክ ምብጻሓት እንተኣማሊኡ ቅድሚኡ ድማ ዝኾነ ናይ ለበዳ ታሪኽ እንተዘይብሉ፡ ጥራይ ኢዩ ሕሙም ከምዝኾነን ዘይኮነን ክረጋገጽ ዝኽእል።
en-mt: According to the seventh edition (March 3, 2020), a suspected case of a virus can only be confirmed if he or she meets one of his health epidemiology or current record with two clinical visits or meets the three clinic visits and does not have any prior pandemic history.

sourceString: Epidemiological history: (1) a history of travel or residence in Wuhan city and surrounding areas, or other communities where COVID-19 cases had been reported in the last 14 days before symptom onset; (2) a history of contact with SARS-CoV-2 infectious cases (with positive nucleic acid test); (3) a history of contacting with patients with fever or respiratory symptoms from Wuhan city and surrounding areas, or other communities where COVID-19 had been reported in the last 14 days before symptom onset; (4) a history of contacting with cluster of confirmed cases (≥ 2 cases with fever and/or respiratory symptoms occurred within 2 weeks in small areas, such as home, office, class of school, etc).
targetString: ናይ ለበዳ ታሪኽ፡ (1) ናይ መገሻ ታሪኽ ወይ መንበሪ ኣብ ከተም ዉሃንን ከባቢኣን፡ ወይ ቅድሚ 14 መዓልቲ ናይ ኮቪድ-19 ግዳያት ጸብጻብ ዘለወን ካልኦት ኮሚኒቲታት ፡ (2) ምስ SARS-CoV-2 ተመሓላላፊ ሕማም ዘለዎም ዓይነት ሰባት ዘለዎ ታሪኻዊ ርክብ (ምስ ኣወንታዊ ናይ ኒክሊክ ኣሲድ መርመራ) ና፡ (3) ምስቶም ረስኒ ወይ ናይ ምስትንፋስ ጸገማት ዘለዎም ካብ ከተም ዉሃንን ከባቢኣን ዝመጹ ወይ ካል ኦት ከተማታት ኣብዘን ዝሓለፋ 14 መዓልታት ጸብጻብ ናይ ኮቪድ-19 ዝተራእየለን፡ (4) ምስ እኩባት ሰባት ዝነበረካ ርክብ (ካብ 2 ንላዕሊ ክኾኑ ይኽእል ከምኡውን/ወይ’ውን ኣብ ውሽጢ 2 ሰሙን ምስ ኣብ ንአሽቱ ከባቢታት፡ መንበሪኻ ከም ኣብነት፡ ኦፊስ፡ ክፍሊ ናይ ትምህርቲ ወዘተ ዝነብሩ፡ ናይ ምስትንፋስ ጸገማት ዝነብሩ ናይ ምስትንፋስ ጸገም ዘጋጠሞም )
en-mt: Pandemic history: (1) travel history or residence in and around Wuhan or other community with reports of COVID-19 cases prior to 14 days ago, (2) historical contact with people with SARS-CoV-2 infectious diseases (positive nicklic acid tests) and (3) those who have come from the city of Wuhan and surrounding areas or other cities with respiratory problems or other cities have reported COVID-19 in the past 14 days. They may be more than 2 and/or have experienced respiratory problems who live in small areas of your home within 2 weeks, such as office, classroom, etc.))

sourceString: Clinical manifestations: (1) fever and/ or respiratory symptoms; (2) with imaging features of COVID-19 infection; (3) total white blood cell counts showing normal, decreased, or reduced lymphocyte count in the early onset stage.
targetString: ናይ ክሊኒክ ምርኣይ (1) ረስኒ ከምኡ’ውን / ወ ናይ ምስትንፋስ ምልክታት፡ (2) ምስ ናይ ኮቪድ-19 ገጽ ወይ መልክዕ ናይ ኢንፈኽስን ወይ ምሕላፍ ሕማም (3) ኣብቲ ናይ መጀመርያ ናይ ሕማም መልከፍቲ ግዜ እቶም ቁጽሪ ናይ ጸዓዱ ዋህዮታት ደም ስሩዕ ኢዩ፡ ዝጎደለ ኢዩ፡ ወይ ውን ጎዶሉ ቁጽሪ ናይ ልይምፋቲክ ኣለዎ።
en-mt: Clinical vision (1) fever and respiratory symptoms (2) with the appearance of COVID-19 or the form of infection or passing disease (3) the number of white blood cells is reduced regularly during the first infection, or the number of leniency is reduced.

sourceString: Diagnosing the confirmed case should base on suspected case with any one item of pathogenic or serological evidence as following: (1) real-time PCR test positive for SARS-CoV-2; (2) viral whole genome sequencing showing high homogeneity to the known novel coronaviruses; (3) positive for the specific IgM antibody and IgG antibody to SARS-CoV-2 in serum test; or a change of the SARS-CoV-2-specific IgG antibody from negative to positive, or titer rising ≥4 times in the recovery phase above that in the acute phase.
targetString: ምምርማር ናይ ሓደ ልኹፍ ኣብቶም ጥርጡራት ግዳያት ምስ ሓንቲ ኣብነት ናይ ሰበብ ሕማም ወይ ናይ ወይ ሰሮሎጂቻል (ናይ ደም መርኣያ) መረጋገጺ፡ ዝተመርኮሰ ክኸውን ኣለዎ፡ እዚ ድማ፡ (1) ሪል-ታይም PCR መርመራ ኣወንታዊ ን SARS-CoV-2 (real-time PCR test positive for SARS-CoV-2) (2) ልዑል ምምስሳላት ዘለዎ ናይ ኖቨል ኮሮና-ቫይረስ ቫይረሳዊ ምሉእ ጂናዊ መስርዕ (3)ኣወንታዊ ን ፍሉይ IgM ጸረ-ነፍሲ ከምኡውን IgG ጸረ-ነፍሲ ኣብ መርመራ ናይ ሰሩም፡ ወይ ለውጢ ናይ SARS-CoV-2-specific IgG ጸረ-ነፍሲ ካብ ኣወንታ ወኡ ኣሉታ፡ ውይ ቅልጡፍ ምውሳኽ፡ ኣብ ግዜ ናይ ሕውየት ገጽ ካብ 4 ዕጽፊ ንላዕሊ ምስ ምግዳድ ገጽ ናይ ሕማም ኣረኣኢኻ።
en-mt: Diagnosis of a infected person should be based on evidence of a suspected case with an example of preemptive disease or serological (blood sample) confirmation, which includes (1) real-time PCR test positive for SARS-CoV-2 (real-time PCR test positive for SARS-CoV-2) (2) A novel coronavirus with high similarities: a complete genetic sequence (3) positive and specific IgM anti-soul and IgG anti-soul in test or change of SARS-CoV-2-specific IgG anti-soul antibodies faster than positive. Increased facial makeup during healing periods is more than 4 times more than 4 times the suppression of the facial condition.

sourceString: We can see that the real-time PCR test for nucleic acid in respiratory tract or blood samples was added to the second (18 January 2020) and third (22 January 2020) editions.
targetString: ከምዚ ንርእዮ ዘሎና እቲ real-time PCR test for nucleic acid in respiratory tract (ሪል-ታይም መርመራ ናይ ኒክሊክ ኣሲድ ኣብ ናይ ምስትንፋስ ጎሮሮ) ወይ ናይ ደም ቅምሶ ኣብቲ ካልኣይ (18 ጥሪ 2020) ከምኡውን ሳልሳይ (22 ጥሪ 2020) ሕታማት ተወሲኹ።
en-mt: As we have seen, the real-time PCR test for nucleic acid in respiratory tract (real-time testing of nicklic acid in the throat) or blood clots have been added to the second edition (January 18, 2020) and third editions (January 22, 2020).

sourceString: The pathogenic detection of blood sample was added to the fourth (27 January 2020) and fifth (8 February 2020) editions; and then the serological evidence was added to the seventh edition.
targetString: እቲ ናይ ሰበብ ሕማም ምልላይ ናይ ቅምሶታት ደም፡ ናብቲ ራብዓይን (27 ጥሪ 2020) ከምኡውን ሓሙሻይ (8 ለካቲት 2020) ሕታማት ተወሲኹ ኢዩ፡ ቀጺሉ ድማ እቲ መረጋገጺ ናይ መርመራ ናት ደም ቅምሶታት ናብቲ ሻውዓይ ሕታም ተወሲኹ።
en-mt: he diagnosis of the disease was added to the fourth and fifth (8 February 2020) issues, followed by the confirmation of the blood samples to the seventh issue.

sourceString: These modifications based on the researchers continued work that to search for an optimal nucleic acid detection kit for rapid diagnosis, as well as the samples from respiratory tract including blood sampling, which increased the availability of different specimens, and supported bringing the specific antibody positive result into the confirmed criteria.
targetString: እቲ ምምሕያሽ ኣብዞም ዝስዕቡ ረቃሒታት ዝተሞርከሰ ኢዩ፡ ናይ ተመራመርቲ ዝተናውሐ ስራሕ ነቲ ቅልጡፍ መርመራ/ምልላይ ናይ ኒክሊክ ኣሲድ ክህበና ዝኽእል መሳርሒን፡ ከምኡ’ውን ናይቶም ካብ ጎሮሮ ዝተወስዱ ቅምሶታት፡ ናይ ደም ቅምሶ ዘጠቃለሉን (ነቲ ህላውነትን ብዝሒን ናይ ቅምሶታት ዝወሰኸ)፡ ነቲ ናይ ጸረ-ነፍሲ ዝተረጋገጻ መዐቀኒ ኣወንታዊ ውጽኢት ከም ዝህብ ዝገበረ ሓገዝ።
en-mt: he improvement is based on the following factors: Researchers' extended work on a device that can provide us with rapid testing of nickelic acids, as well as blood samples taken from the throat (increased the presence and number of samples) that contributed to positive results of anti-soul proven measures.

sourceString: Besides, there are more and more evidence that remind us to caution with the atypical symptomatic and asymptomatic patients.
targetString: ጎድኑ ጎድኒ ድማ፡ በቶም symptomatic (ሕሙማት እንከለዉ ምልክት ናይ ሕማም ዘለዎም ) ንasymptomatic (ሕሙማት እንከለዉ ምልክት ናይ ሕማም ዘለዎም ዘይብሎም) ዓይነት ተሓከምቲ ኣዚና ክንጥንቀቕ ከም ዘለና ኣዝዩ ብዙሕ መረጋገጺ የዘኻኽረና ኣሎ።
en-mt: On the other hand, it reminds us of very much reassurance that we need to be very careful with symptomatic patients (those who have symptoms while in patients) who do not have symptoms.

sourceString: Hence, the flow chart of Zhou et al. should be updated, as they classified the person without clinical symptoms as “low risk”.
targetString: ስለዚ፡ ቲ ብ ዝዊ ኤት ኣል ዝተመስረሐ ናይ ሓበሬታ ጸብጻብ ክልወጥ ኣለዎ፡ እዚ ድማ ን ውልቀሰባት ብዘይ ናይ ክሊኒክ ምልክታት ኣብ ‘’ትሑት ሓደጋ’’ ስለ ዝኸፋፈለ ኢዩ።
en-mt: Therefore, the information report based by W. et al. must be changed because it divides individuals into 'low risk' without clinical symptoms.

sourceString: The score system also needs to be verified in further clinical practice and studies.
targetString: እቲ ናይ ውጽኢት ስርዓት በቲ ናይ ክሊኒካል ንጥፈታትን መጽናዕትታትን ክረጋገጽ ኣለዎ።
en-mt: The results system must be certified by the clinical activities and studies.

sourceString: To conclude, we hope more direct evidence coming up and call for readers to provide their comments.
targetString: ንምድምዳም፡ ብዙሕ ቀጥታ መረጋገጺ ክመጽእ ንጽበ ከምኡ’ውን ደወል ካብ ኣንበብቲ ርኢቶኦም ንምዝራብ።
en-mt: We look forward to the end of the day and wait for the bells to speak from readers.

sourceString: For the diagnosis of “suspected case” and “confirmed case”, we suggest to trace and obey the newest guidelines of their home countries.
targetString: ን ኩሎም መርመራ ናይ ‘’ዝጥርጠር ተርእዮ’’ ከምኡውን ‘’ልኹፋት ግዳያት’’፡ ኣብ ሃገራቶም ዘሎ መምርሒታት ከኽብሩን ክኽተሉን ነማኽሮም።
en-mt: We advise all testing of 'suspicious' and 'potential victims' to respect and follow the guidelines in their countries.

sourceString: Our team will also timely update our guideline to offer help.
targetString: ብተወሳኺ፡ ጉጅለና በብግዚኡ ነቲ መምርሒ ከተሕድሶ ኢያ፡ በዚ ድማ ደገፍ ንገብር።
en-mt: In addition, our team will update the guidance periodically, thereby supporting it.

sourceString: Bangladesh reports five new deaths due to COVID-19, a daily highest
targetString: ባንግላዲሽ ብ ኮቪድ-19፡ ናይ 5 ሰባት ሓዲሽ ሞት ጸብጻብ ሂባ።
en-mt: Bangladesh has reported five new deaths from COVID-19.

sourceString: Yesterday, Bangladesh has confirmed five new deaths due to COVID-19 on the day.
targetString: ትማሊ፡ ባንግላዲሽ፡ ኣብ ሓደ መዓልቲ፡ ሓሙሽተ ሓደስቲ ምዉታት ብሰንኪ ኮቪድ-19 መዝጊባ።
en-mt: Yesterday, Bangladesh recorded five new deaths due to COVID-19 in a single day.

sourceString: This is the highest number of fatalities in a day due to the virus.
targetString: እዚ ድማ እቲ ዝበዝሐ ቁጽሪ ናይ ሞት ኣብ ሓደ መዓልቲ ብሰንኪ ቫይረስ ኢዩ።
en-mt: Most of the deaths are caused by the virus in one day.

sourceString: As of yesterday, Bangladesh's Institute of Epidemiology, Disease Control and Research (IEDCR) reported the number of recorded infected cases included 114 active cases and 33 recovered cases who were staying home.
targetString: ክሳብ ትማሊ፡ ናይ ባንግላዲሽ ናይ ኢፒዶሞሎጂ ናይ መጽናዕቲ ትካላት፡ ምክልኻል ሕማማትን መጽናዕትን (IEDCR) ከም ዝሓበሮ፡ ኣብ ገዛኦም ዝጸንሑ  ቁጽሪ ናይ ልኹፋት ግዳያት 114 ከምኡ`ውን ናይቶም ዝሓወዩ 33 ሙኻኑ ሓቢሩ።
en-mt: As of yesterday, bangladesh's Epidomelogy Research Institute for Disease Prevention and Research (IEDCR) found that the number of cases staying at home was 114 and 33 of the recovered.

sourceString: A total of 17 deaths have been recorded.
targetString: ብ ድምር 17 ምዉታት ተመዝጊቦም።
en-mt: A total of 17 dead were recorded.

sourceString: In an online news briefing, the director of IEDCR, Dr Meerjady Sabrina Flora, said the fatalities included four males and one female.
targetString: ኣብቲ ቀጥታ ናይ ዜና ጸብጻብ፡ ዳይረክቶር ናይ IEDCR፡ ዶክቶር. ማርጀዲ ሳብሪና ፍሎራ (Meerjady Sabrina Flora)  ከም ዝሓበረቶ፡ ሓንቲ ጋል ትርከቦም ኣርባዕተ ናይ ሞት ግዳያት ከም ዘለዉ ኢዩ።
en-mt: In the live news report, the director of the IEDCR Doctor. Meerjady Sabrina Flora said there were four deaths, including one galley.

sourceString: According to Dr Meerjady, two cases were aged above 60, two between 51 and 60, and one 41-50 years old.
targetString: ዶ/ር ሚርጃዲ (Meerjady) ከም ዝብሎ፡ ክልተ ካብቲ ዝተረኽበ ጉዳያት ዕድሚኦም ልዕሊ 60 ክኾኑ ከለዉ፡ ክልተ ኣብ ሞንጎ ክሊ ዕድመ 51-60፡ ሓደ ድማ 41-50 ኣብ ዘሎ ክሊ ዕድመ ዝርከብ ኢዩ።
en-mt: Meerjady said two of the cases were aged over 60 and two were between the ages of 51-60 and one between the ages of 41-50.

sourceString: She also said two of the victims were from Dhaka.
targetString: ክልተ ካብቶም ግዳያት ካብ ዳካ ከምዝኾነ ሓቢራ።
en-mt: She said two of the victims were from Dhaka.

sourceString: The World Health Organization (WHO) declared COVID-19 a pandemic on March 11.
targetString: ዓለምለኻዊ ውድብ ጥዕና WHO)  ን ኮቪድ-19 ተላባዒ ሕማም ምዃኑ ብ መጋቢት 11 ኣፍሊጡ።
en-mt: on March 11, the World Health Organization (WHO) declared COVID-19 a contagious disease.

sourceString: A hospital official told Anadolu Agency, a local news outlet, that one of the deceased was Jalal Saifur Rahman, a director of Bengali Anti-Corruption Commission, who was cared for at the Kuwait Maitree Hospital.
targetString: ናይ ሆስፒታል በዓል መዚ ን ኣናዶሉ ወከልቲ ኣብ ዝሃቦ ሓበሬታ (ናይ ዜና ትካል)፡ ሓንቲ ካብቶም መወትቲ ጃላል ሳፉር ራሓም (Jalal Saifur Rahman)፡ ዳይረክቶር ናይ በንጋሊ ጸረ-ብልሽውና ኮይና፡ ኣብ ኩውየት ማይትረ ሆስፒታል ክትእለ ዝጸንሐት ኢያ።
en-mt: Representatives of the Hospital's Official and Anadolu told the news agency that One of the dead, Jalal Saifur Rahman, was the director of The Anti-Corruption Of Bengali at Kuyet Maitre Hospital.

sourceString: On Saturday, in an online video announcement, Bangladeshi Road Transport and Bridges Minister Obaidul Quader said public transport would be shut down for longer than initially planned, until this coming Saturday.
targetString: ቀዳም፡ ኣብ ናይ ኦንላይን ቪድዮ መግለጺ፡ ናይ ባንግላዲሽ ናይ መጎዓዝያን ድልድላትን ሚኒስተር ኣበዱል ኵዋኣዳር (Obaidul Quader) ከም ዝገለጾ፡ ምዕጻው ናይ ህዝቢ መጎዓዝያ ካብቲ መጀመርያ ዝተመደቦ ንላዕሊ፡ ዝመጽእ ቀዳም፡ ክቅጽል ከም ዝኽእል ሓቢሩ።
en-mt: In an online video on Monday, Bangladesh's Minister of Transport and Bridges, Obaidul Quader, said the closure of public transport could continue on Monday beyond what was originally scheduled.

sourceString: This public transport shutdown had initially started on March 26 and was planned to end on Saturday, April 4.
targetString: እዚ ናይ ህዝባዊ መጓዓዝያ ምዕጻው አብ መጋቢት 26 ዝጀመረ ኮይኑ ቀዳም ዕለት 4 ሚያዝያ ክውድእ ተመዲቡ ዝነበረ ኢዩ።
en-mt: he public transport shutdown began on March 26 and was scheduled to end on April 4.

sourceString: Transport of essential goods -- medical, fuel and food -- was still allowed.
targetString: መጉዓዝያ ኣገደስቲ ኣቑሑት -- ከም ባዓል ነዳድን መግብን --- ክሳብ ሹዑ ተፈቒዶም ኔሮም።
en-mt: Essential goods - up to 600 people are allowed to travel - such as food, fuel and food ---.

sourceString: The first recorded incidents of COVID-19 infection in Bangladesh were on March 8, in two people who returned from Italy and also the wife of one of them.
targetString: እቲ ናይ መጀመርያ ኣጋጣሚ ናይ ኮቪድ-19 ልኽፈት ኣብ ባምግላዲሽ ኣብ 8 መጋቢት ተራእዩ፡ እዚ ድማ ካብ ክልተ ሰባት ካብ ጣልያን ዝተመልሱን ሰበይቲን ውሉድን ናይ ሓደ ካብኣቶምን ድማ።
en-mt: he first case of COVID-19 was reported in Baggladish on 8 March, when one of two people returned from Italy, the wife and son of one of them.

sourceString: As of March 19, these three had already recovered.
targetString: ኣብ መጋቢት 19 እዞም  ሰለስተ ድሮ ሓውዮም እዮም።
en-mt: By March 19, those three had already recovered.

sourceString: SARS-CoV-2 surpasses one million infections worldwide
targetString: ዓለምለኻዊ መልከፍቲ SARS-CoV-2  ሓደ ሚልዮን ሓሊፍ ኣሎ።
en-mt: Global cases of SARS-CoV-2 have surpassed one million.

sourceString: On Thursday, the total number of cases of the SARS-CoV-2 coronavirus infections surpassed one million worldwide, Johns Hopkins University data indicated.
targetString: ጆን ሆፕኪንስ ዩኒቨርሲቲ ሓበሬታ ከምዘመልክቶ፡ ሓሙስ ጠቕላላ ቁጽሪ ናይ SARS-CoV-2  ልኹፋት ዝተታሕዙ ብ ዓለም ደረጃ ልዕሊ ሓደ ሚልዮን በጺሑ።
en-mt: Johns Hopkins University data showed that the total number of SARS-CoV-2 cases on Thursday exceeded one million worldwide.

sourceString: At least 52 thousand deaths were linked to COVID-19, the disease caused by the coronavirus.
targetString: ብውይሑዱ 52 ሺሕ ሞት ምስ ኮቪድ-19 ዝተሓሓዝ ኢዩ፡ እዚ ድማ ኮሮና-ቫይረስ ኢዩ ጠንቁ።
en-mt: At least 52,000 deaths are related to COVID-19, the coronavirus.

sourceString: The milestone came the same day Malawi confirmed its first coronavirus infections and Zambia had its first coronavirus-related death.
targetString: እቲ ምስፍሕፋሕ በቲ ናይ መጀመርያ ልኹፍ ናይ ኮሮናቫይረስ ኣብ ማላዊን፡ ኣብ ዛምብያ ድማ ብሰንኪ ኮሮናቫይረስ ናይ መጀመርያ ምዉት ኣብ ዝተራእየሉ እዋን ተጀሚሩ።
en-mt: he spread began with the first outbreak of the coronavirus in Malawi and the first deaths from the coronavirus in Zambia.

sourceString: North Korea claimed, as of Thursday, it was one of the few countries remaining free of coronavirus infections.
targetString: ሰሜን ኮርያ ከም ዝገለጸቶ፡ ካብተን ክሳብ ሕጂ በዚ ቫይረስ ዘይተለኽፋ ውሑዳት ሃገራት ሙኻና ኢዩ።
en-mt: North Korea is one of the few countries not yet infected.

sourceString: By yesterday, the World Health Organization reported 1,051,635 confirmed cases, including 79,332 cases in the twenty four hours preceding 10 a.m. Central European Time (0800 UTC) on April 4.
targetString: ውድብ ጥዕና ዓለም፡ ክሳብ ትማሊ፡ 1,051,635 ዝተረጋገጸ መልከፍቲ ከም ዘሎ ሓቢሩ፡ እቶም 79,332 ካብዞም ግዳያት ድማ ብ ዕለት 4, ሚያዝያ፡ ብ ናይ ኤውሮጳ ኣቆጻጽራ ድሕሪ ሰዓት (0800 UTC) 10 ቅ.ቀ ኣብ ውሽጢ ዒስራን ኣርባዕተን ሰዓታት ዘጋጠመ ኢዩ።
en-mt: The World Health Organization said there had been 1,051,635 confirmed cases as of yesterday, and 79,332 of these cases occurred within twenty-four hours of The European Clock (0800 UTC) on April 4.

sourceString: In the United States, over 244 thousand coronavirus cases were recorded, linking to at least 5,900 deaths.
targetString: ኣብ ሕቡራት መንግስታት ኣሜሪካ ልዕሊ 244 ሽሕ ግዳያት ናይ ኮሮና ቫይረስ ከም ዘለዉ ተሓቢሩ፡ ካብዚኣቶም ድማ 5900 ምውታት ኢዮም።
en-mt: There are more than 244,000 cases of coronavirus in the United States, of which 5,900 have been confirmed dead.

sourceString: CBS News reported, citing Johns Hopkins University data, there were over 1,000 US deaths on Wednesday caused by coronavirus infections.
targetString: CBS ዜና ከም ዝሓበሮ፡ ጆህን ሆፕኪንስ ዩኒቨርሲቲ ብምጥቃስ፡ ኣብ ሕቡራት መንግስታት ኣሜሪካ ረቡዕ ጥራይ ብሰንኪ ኮሮናቫይረስ ልዕሊ 1000 ሞት ተመዝጊቡ።
en-mt: More than 1,000 deaths from the coronavirus were recorded in the United States on Wednesday alone, according to CBS News, citing John Hopkins University.

sourceString: Around the world, countries announced stricter measures to inhibit the disease from spreading.
targetString: ኣብ ዓለም ሙሉእ ዘለዋ ሃገራት ኣዝዩ ከቢድ ዝኾነ ሓጹራት ብምትግባር፡ ነዚ ቫይረስ ከይላባዕ ስጉምትታት ይወስዳ ኣለዋ።
en-mt: Countries around the world are taking drastic measures to prevent the spread of the virus.

sourceString: On Thursday, Sergei Sobyanin, the mayor of Moscow, extended the city lockdown to May 1.
targetString: ሓሙስ፡ ሰጀይ ሳብያኒን (Sergei Sobyanin) ዝተባህለ ኣማሓዳሪ ናይ ሞስኮ፡ ነቲ ዕጽዋ ናይ ከተማ ክሳብ ግንቦት 1 ኣናዊሕዎ።
en-mt: On Thursday, Moscow's governor, Sergei Sobyanin, extended the city lockdown until May 1.

sourceString: Nationally, President Vladimir Putin declared Russians would continue to be paid without going to work until April 30.
targetString: ብ ሃገር ደረጃ፡ ፕረሲደንት ሩስያ ቭላድሚር ፑቲን፡ ንነበርቲ ሩስያ ክሳብ 30 መጋቢት ኣብ ዘሎ እዋን ከይሰርሑ ክኽፈሉ ከም ዝኽእሉ ሓቢሩ።
en-mt: Russian President Vladimir Putin has said Russian residents will be paid for not working until March 30.

sourceString: The parliament of Portugal voted to extend the national state of emergency by 15 days; the vote passed with 215 votes in favor, ten abstentions, and one vote against.
targetString: ፓርላመንት ናይ ፖርቱጋል ነቲ ሃገራዊ ናይ እቶ-እቶ ግዝያት 15 መዓልታት ኵውስኸሉ ወሲኑ፡ እዚ ምርጫ ብ 215 ላዕለዋይ ድምጺ ኢዩ ተወሲኑ፡ ከምኡ`ውን 10 ዘይተሳታፍነትን፡  ሓደ ኣንጻር እዚ ውሳኔ`ውን ኔሮም።
en-mt: Portugal's parliament voted to increase the national entry time by 15 days, which was voted by a high of 215 votes and 10 non-participation and one against it.

sourceString: Saudi Arabia extended curfews in the holy cities of Mecca and Medina to last the entire day; previously, the curfew was only in effect between 3 p.m. and 6 a.m.
targetString: ኣብ ስዑዲ-ዓረብ፡ ኣብተን ቅዱሳት ተባሂለን ዝፍለጣ ከተማታት ሜካን ሜዲናን ኣዋጅ እቶ-እቶ ወይ ድማ ሰዓታት ኮፕሪፎኮ ኣዊጃ ኣላ፡ ቅድሚ ሕጂ እዚ ኣዋጅ ካብ ሰዓት 3 ድ.ቀ ክሳብ 6 ቅ.ቀ ጥራይ ኢዩ ዝጸንሕ ኔሩ።
en-mt: In Saudi-Arabia, the so-called holy cities of Mecca and Medina have declared a curfew, or coprifoco hours, which previously lasted only from 3 p.m. to 6 a.m.

sourceString: Thailand planned to implement a curfew between 10 p.m. and 4 a.m.
targetString: ታይላንድ ኣብ መንጎ ሰዓት 10  ድሕሪ  ቀትርን ሰዓት 4 ቅድሚ ቀትርን ናይ ሰዓታት እቶእቶን ከተተግብር መደብ ኣውጺኣ ኣላ።
en-mt: Thailand has announced plans to implement its curfew between 10 a.m. and 4 p.m.

sourceString: The governor of Ohio, Mike DeWine, announced the state had extended its stay-at-home order until May 1.
targetString: ኣማሓዳሪ ኦሃዮ ማይክ ደዋይን (Mike DeWine)፡ እቲ ግዝኣት ክሳብ ግንቦት 1 ኣብ ዘሎ ግዜ ናይ ገዛ ምዕጻዋት ከም እትቕጽሎ ሓቢሩ።
en-mt: Ohio Gov. Mike DeWine said the state would continue its home shutdown by May 1.

sourceString: Stores in Australia lower toilet paper limits per transaction
targetString: ዱካናት ኣውስትራልያ ኣብ ሓደ ሸመታ ዝግበር መጠን ወረቐት ሽቓቕ ክድርት እዩ።
en-mt: Australia's shops will reduce the amount of paper in a single store.

sourceString: On Sunday and Saturday evening, Australian store chains Woolworths and Coles lowered their purchase restrictions on toilet paper to two and one package per transaction in all stores on national level, respectively.
targetString: ቀዳምን ሰንበትን ድሕሪ ቀትሪ ኣብ ዝነበረ ግዜ ፍሉጥ ናይ ኣውስትራልያ ትካል Woolsworth and Coles: ኣብ መላእ ሃገር ኣብ ዝርከባ ጨንፈራቱ ናይ ዓይኒ ምድሪ ወረቐት ዕድጊ ገደብ ናብ ሓደን ክልተን ባኮ ከም ዘጉደለ ሓቢሩ።
en-mt: On Saturday and Sunday afternoon, the popular Australian company Woolsworth and Coles said it had reduced the cap on eye-to-paper purchases at its branches nationwide to one and two buckets.

sourceString: ALDI also introduced a one-pack limit, on Monday.
targetString: ALDI ብወገኑ ናይ ሓንቲ ባኮ ደረት ብሰኑይ ኣጽዲቑ።
en-mt: ALDI approved a one-bucket limit on Monday.

sourceString: These limitations were posted as messages on the checkouts, and on the chains' Facebook pages.
targetString: እዚ ከምዚ ዝበለ ምድራት ኣብ መውጻኢ ኣፍደገን ኣብ ገጻት ፌይስቡክ እቲ ሰንሰለትን እዩ ተለጢፉ ኔሩ።
en-mt: hese pages were posted on the outside and on the chain's Facebook page.

sourceString: Buyers were reportedly stocking up due to fears of COVID-19 in case people need to self-isolate.
targetString: ብሰንኪ ፍርሕታት ናይ COVID-19 ምናልባት ሰባት ርእሰ-ምንጻል ከየድልዮም ዓደግቲ ንብረት ይእክቡ ምንባሮም ተሓቢሩ።
en-mt: Due to the fear of COVID-19, people may be collecting property without needing self-isolation.

sourceString: On Wednesday, Woolworths also limited toilet paper purchases for home delivery to one pack per order.
targetString: ረቡዕ፡ ዎኦልዎርዝ (Woolworths) ነቲ ናብ ገዛ ብቀጥታ ዝለኣክ ናይ ሽቃቅ መሳርሒ ጠለብ፡ ኣብ ሓደ ጠለብ ዝለዓለ ሓንቲ ባኮ ጥራይ ክኸውን ኣለዎ ኢሉ።
en-mt: On Wednesday, Woolworths said the demand for the device that sent it home directly should be the highest single bucket per request.

sourceString: These changes followed the previous four-pack per transaction restriction introduced by Woolworths and Coles on March 4 and 5 respectively.
targetString: እዚ ለውጥታት ነቲ ኣብ ዝሓለፈ ሰሙናት ብ Woolworths and Coles ብ4ን 5ን መጋቢት ካብ 4 ባኮ ንላዕሊ ናይ ዘይምግዛእ ዝሓለፈ ውሳነ መቐጸልታ እዩ።
en-mt: The changes are a continuation of woolworths and Coles' decision in recent weeks to not buy more than 4 buckets on March 4 and 5.

sourceString: Coles, in its March 8 media release, reported that with the four-pack restriction in place, "many stores are still selling out within an hour of delivery", and called the demand "unprecedented", while ALDI, in a Facebook post on Tuesday, called it "unexpected".
targetString: Coles፡ ኣብ ናይ 8 መጋቢት ጋዜጣዊ መግሊጺኡ፡ እቲ ናይ ኣርባዕተ-ጥማር ቀይዲ ሃቢሩ፡ “ብዙሓት ድኳናት ገና ኣብ ውሽጢ ናይ ሓደ ሰዓት ምርጋፍ ሸይጠን ይውድኣ ኣለዋ”፣ ነቲ ጠለብ ከኣ “ቅድሚ ሕጂ ተራእዩ ዘይፈልጥ” ኢልዎ፡ ALDI ከኣ ኣብ ናይ ፈይስቡክ ልጣፍ ሰሉስ፡ “ካብ ትጽቢት ወጻኢ” ኢልዎ።
en-mt: In a March 8 press release, Coles said the four-storey restrictions were "still selling within an hour of the release," and ALDI called the demand "unprecedented" in a Facebook post on Tuesday.

sourceString: Sales went up in a "sharp increase" last week, according to a Woolworths spokesperson.
targetString: ብመሰረት ወሃቢ ቃል ዉልዎርዝስ ዝሓለፈ ሰሙን “ቁልጡፍ ወሰኽ” መሸጣታት ተራእዩ።
en-mt: According to a Woolworths spokesman, there was a "rapid increase" in sales last week.

sourceString: Costco's store in Canberra also limited the allowed amount to two packs last week.
targetString: ዝሓለፈ ሰሙን ኣብ ካምቤራ ዝርከብ ኮስቶኮ ዝብሃል መክዘን መሸጣ ናብ ክልተ ጥቕላል ጥራይ ደሪትዎ።
en-mt: Last week, the sale of the Kostoko warehouse in Cambera sold to only two packages.

sourceString: To further alleviate the shortage, Coles ordered bigger packages from suppliers and increased delivery frequency, Woolworths ordered extra stock, while ALDI made stocks for a planned Wednesday special available early.
targetString: ሕጽረት ዝያዳ ንምቅላል ኮለስ ዕብይ ዝበለ ፓኬጃት ካብ ኣቕረብቲ ኣዚዙ ናይ ዕደላ ዙራት ከኣ ወሲኩ’ሎ።ተወሳኺ ዉልዎርዝስ ብርኪ ምእዛዙን ዋልዲ ድማ ናይ ረቡዕ ፍሉይ ፕሮግራም ምኽንይት ብምግባር ናይ ብርኪ ውጥን ኣውጺኡ።
en-mt: To further alleviate the shortage, Coles ordered bigger packages from suppliers and added to the list of creditors, and Waldy issued a knee plan for Wednesday's special program.

sourceString: Russell Zimmerman, executive director of the Australian Retailers Association, said that retailers try to raise stock, but local council restrictions on the timing of truck-deliveries make it hard.
targetString: ሩሰል ዚመርማን፡ ሓላፊ ናይ ኣወስራልያዊ መሸጣ ኣሶሴሽን፡ ከም ዝሓበሮ፡ እቶም ቸርቸርቲ ነቲ ፍርያቶ ኵሱኹሉ ፈቲኖም ፡ እንተኾነ ናይ ግዜ ገደብት ናይ ከባብያዊ ቆንሲል ናይ መብጽሒ ትራክ (ተንቀሳቓሲት ተሽከርካሪት)፡ ነቲ ስራሕ ዓናቂፍዎ።
en-mt: Russel Zimmerman, head of the Austrian Sales Association, said the sellers tried to cook the product, but a time limit for the local consul's delivery truck stopped the work.

sourceString: He expects rising production costs, as suppliers try to meet demand, and fewer specials.
targetString: እቶም ኣፍረይቲ ነቲ ጠለባት ከማልኡ ስለ ዘለዎም ከም ኡውን ውሑድ ናይ ፍሉይ ጠለባት ስለ ዘሎን እቶም ኣፍረይቲ ነቲ ዋጋ ናይ ጠለባት ኵውስኹሉ ተጸብዩ ኔሩ።
en-mt: Ecause the manufacturers had to meet the requirements and there were few special requirements, the producers were expecting the price to increase.

sourceString: On Tuesday, ALDI announced that following the early release of stock, some stores can't run the Wednesday special.
targetString: ሰሉስ፡ ALDI ከም ዝሓበሮ፡ ነቲ ብኣጋ ዝተገብረ ቀረባት ብምስዓብ፡ ገሊአን መኽዘናት ረቡዕ ኣገልግሎት ኣይክህባን ኢየን።
en-mt: According to the ALDI on Tuesday, some stores will not be available on Wednesday.

sourceString: In a News.com.au report, Dr Gary Mortimer, retail expert from Queensland University of Technology, said the stores fill the stock every night.
targetString: ብመሰረት ጸብጻብ News.com.au ኪኢላ ቺርቻሮ ዕዳጋ ዶ/ር ጋሪ ሞርቲመር ካብ ክዊንስላንድ ዩኒቨርሲቲ ናይ ተክኖሎጂ: ከም ዝሓበሮ እዘን መኻዝን ብሓደ ለይቲ ነቲ ዕዳጋ ይመልኦኦ።
en-mt: According to the News.com.au expert, Dr. Gary Mortimer of the University of Queensland of Technology, fill the market overnight.

sourceString: He remarked toilet paper is a bulky item, leading to low quantity of stocks in numbers, and, when sold out, leaves vast shelf spaces empty, hardening the feeling of a shortage.
targetString: ናይ ሽቓቕ ወረቐት ገዚፍ ነገር ምዃኑን፡ ናብ ትሑት ብዝሒ ናይ ቅሙጥ ቁጽርታት ከምዘምርሕን፡ ከምኡ ድማ፡ ኣብ ዝሽየጠሉ እዋን፡ ብዙሕ ናይ ከብሒ ስፍራታት ጥራዮም ከምዝኾኑ ከምዝገበርን፡ ነቲ ናይ ሕጽረት ስምዒት ከምዘሐይልን ርእይቶ ሂቡ።
en-mt: He noted that toilet paper is a big thing and leads to low number of quantities of quantities, and that many cave places are empty when they are sold and strengthen the sense of scarcity.

sourceString: "Coles and Woolworths have a view [that] if there was plenty of stuff on the shelf, if product like toilet rolls and sanitiser could be [bought] and are there in quantities, you would probably minimise the panic" said Russell Zimmerman per ABC News.
targetString: ብመሰረት ጸብጻብ ABC News "Coles and Woolworths ኣብ መደርደሪ ብርክት ዝበለ ኣቕሑ እንተኔሩ ከም ናይ ሸቓቕ ወረቓቕቲን ሳኒታይዘርን ብብዝሒ ክግዝኡ እንድሕር ተኻኢሉን ነዚ ክቱር ራዕዲ ምንካይ ይከኣል እዩ’’ ክብል Russell Zimmerman ሓቢሩ።
en-mt: According to ABC News, "If Coles and Woolworths had a large number of items on the shelf, such as paper and sanitizer, they could be purchased in large quantities, and this extreme revelation could be reduced," said Russell Zimmerman.

sourceString: Recycled toilet paper producer Who Gives a Crap said on last Wednesday they'd run out of stock.
targetString: ብ Who Gives a Crap ዝፍለጥ ትካል መፍረ ዳግማይ ዝተመስርሐ ወረቐት ሽቓቕ ፡ ዝሓለፈ ረቡዕ ኩሉ ጥረ ነገራት ከም ዝወድአ ሓቢሩ።
en-mt: On Wednesday, a recycled paper, known as Who Gives a Crap, said it had lost everything.

sourceString: Kimberly-Clark, which makes Kleenex Toilet Tissue, and Solaris Paper which makes Sorbent, emphasized they were working 24/7 to maintain the supply, according to the News.com.au report.
targetString: ብመሰረት News.com.au report.፡ ኪምበርልይ-ክለርክ፡ ን ክለኒክስ (Kleenex) ናይ ሽቃቅ ሶፍት ዝሰርሕ፡ ከምኡውን ሶላር ፐፐር ሰፍነግ ዝሰርሕ፡ ነቲ ጠለብ ንምምላእ 24/7 ይሰርሓ ከም ዘለዋ ሓቢረን፡
en-mt: According to News.com.au report. Kimberly-Klerk, who makes Kleenex and solar per sponges, is working 24/7 to meet demand

sourceString: Domain.com, a real estate site, reported some property sellers offering free toilet paper to the first bidder on auctions in Melbourne, when fewer auctions were held because of buyers having time off on the long weekend of Labour Day.
targetString: Domain.com፡ ናይ ሪል ኢስተይት ክፋል፡ ገለ ሸየጥቲ ንብረት ኣብ መልቦርን ነቶም ናይ መጀመርያ ዓደግቲ ነጻ ናይ ሽቃቅ ወረቀት ይዕድሉ ክም ዘለዉ ሓቢሩ፡ እዚ ድማ ውሑድ መሸጣ ብሰንኪ እቶም ዓደግቲ ነዊሕ ግዚያት ናይ ስራሕ ምጽንሖም ኢዩ።
en-mt: Domain.com part of the real estate, some sellers in Melbourne said they were distributing free paper to the first buyers, which resulted in limited sales due to long-term employment of the buyers.

sourceString: The Thursday edition of NT News, a daily printed in Darwin, included an eight-page insert meant to be cut up and used as toilet paper.
targetString: እቲ ናይ ሕሙስ ሕታም ናይ ዜና NT፡ መዓልታዊ ኣብ Darwin ዝሕተም፡ ተቖሪጹ ከም ናይ ሽቓቕ ወረቐት ዘገልግል ናይ ሸሞንተ-ገጽ ወሰኽ ኣጠቓሊሉ።
en-mt: Thursday's edition of NT News included an eight-page increase that was cut off daily in Darwin and used as a toilet paper.

sourceString: The stores were originally reluctant to impose restrictions, according to a report from ABC Australia on March 3 in which they said they had no plans to introduce restrictions on the purchases.
targetString: ብመሰረት ናይ 3 መጋቢት ጸብጻብ ናይ ABC Australia ድኳናት ኣብ ፈለማ ቀይድታት ንምስግዳድ ድሉዋት ኣይነበራን ኣብቶም ዕድግታት ቀይድታት ንምግባር መደብ ከምዘይብለን ከኣ ሓቢረን።
en-mt: According to abc Australia's March 3 report, stores were initially not prepared to force restrictions and did not plan to place restrictions on the purchases.

sourceString: Russell Zimmerman added that other products are also in high demand, including masks, sanitiser, dried goods, handwash and flour.
targetString: ሩሰል ዚመርማን፡ ካልኦት ፍርያትውን ኣብ ልዑል ጠለብ ከም ዘለዉ ወሲኹ፡ እዚ ኣቶም ድማ ማስክ፡ መምከኒ ሳኒታይዘር፡ ድርቃት መሳርሒታት፡ መሕጸቢ ኢድ፡ ከም ኡውን ሓሩጭ።
en-mt: Russell Zimmerman added that other products are in high demand, such as masks, sanitizers, dry handsets, hand washing machines, and black.

sourceString: Similarly, outside of Australia, on Sunday evening online British supermarket Ocado was observed limiting purchases of Andres toilet paper to two 12-roll packs.
targetString: ብተመሳሳሊ ካብ ኣውስትራልያ ወጻኢ: ኣብ ሰንበት ዝነበረ ናይ ምሸት ኦንላይን ናይ ኢንግሊዝ ኦካዶ ሱፐር ማርኬት ዕድጊ ናይ ሽቓቕ ወረቐት ክልተ 12-ሓባ ጥራይ ኣፍቂዱ።
en-mt: Similarly, on Sunday night Online outside Australia, the English Ocado supermarket's purchase of toilet paper only allowed two 12-sister.

sourceString: World Health Organization declares COVID-19 pandemic
targetString: ውድብ ጥዕና ዓለም ለበዳ ኮቪድ-19 ኣዊጁ።
en-mt: he World Health Organization has declared a COVID-19 pandemic.

sourceString: On Wednesday, the World Health Organization (WHO) declared the ongoing outbreak of COVID-19 — the disease caused by coronavirus SARS-CoV-2 — to be a pandemic.
targetString: ረቡዕ፡ ውድብ ጥዕና ዓለም (WHO) ቀጻል ምስፍሕፋሕ ናይ ኮቪድ-19-- እቲ ብ ኮሮናቫይረስ SARS-CoV-2 ዝማዕበለ---- ለበዳ ከም ዝኾነ ኣዊጁ።
en-mt: On Wednesday, the World Health Organization (WHO) declared the continuation of the spread of COVID-19 as ---- outbreak developed by the SARS-CoV-2.

sourceString: Although the word "pandemic" only refers to how widely a disease has spread, not how dangerous specific cases are, the WHO noted the need to drive governments to action:
targetString: ወላ'ኳ "ለበዳ" ዝብል ቃል ዝርግሐ ሕማም እምበር ሓደገኛነት እቲ ሕማም ዘይውክል እንተኾነ፡ WHO ግን መንግስታት ስጉምቲ ክወስዱ የተሓሳስብ ኣሎ።
en-mt: Although the term "pandemic" does not represent the risk of the disease, but who is concerned that governments should take action.

sourceString: "All countries can still change the course of this pandemic.
targetString: ‘’ ኩለን ሃገራት ንምዕባለ ናይዚ ለበዳ ክቕይራ ሕጂውን ዕድል ኣለወን።
en-mt: "All countries still have the opportunity to change the development of the pandemic.

sourceString: If countries detect, test, treat, isolate, trace and mobilize their people in the response," said Tedros Adhanom Ghebreyesus, the Director-General of the WHO.
targetString: እንተደኣ ሃገራት ከምቲ ዶክቶር ተድሮስ ኣድሓኖም ገብረየሱስ ዳይረክቶር ጅነራል ናይ ውድብ ጥዕና ዓለም፡ ዝኣዘዞ ተከቲለንን፡ መርመራታት ኣካይደን፡ ኣወሺበን፡ ተከታቲለን፡ ከምኡውን ከምቲ ግቡእ ን ህዝበን ኣንቀሳቂሰንን፡፡
en-mt: If countries comply with the requirements of dr. Tedros Ghebreyesus, the Director General of the World Health Organization, they have conducted and conducted tests and mobilized their people as properly.

sourceString: "We are deeply concerned both by the alarming levels of spread and severity and by the alarming levels of inaction."
targetString: ‘’ በቲ ደረጃታት ናይ መጠንቀቕታታት ናይ ለበዳን ሓደጋን ከምኡውን ደረጃታት ናይ መጠንቀቕታታት ናይ ተበግሶታት ምድኑጋያት ኣዚና ኢና ተጨኒቕና ዘሎና’’።
en-mt: "We are deeply concerned by the levels of pandemic and risk alerts and the levels of warning measures."

sourceString: According to Dr. Tom Frieden, formerly the director of the United States' Centers for Disease Control and Prevention, the pandemic is "unprecedented."
targetString: ብመሰረት ዶክተር. ቶም ፍረይደን (Dr. Tom Frieden)፡ ናይ ቅድም ዳይረክተር ናይቲ United States' Centers for Disease Control and Prevention (ናይ ሕቡራት መንግስታት ኣመሪካ ማእከላት ንቚጽጽርን ምግታእን ሕማም)፡ እቲ ለበዳ “ቅድሚ ሕጂ ተራእዩ ዘይፈልጥ” እዩ።
en-mt: According to the doctor. Dr. Tom Frieden, former director of the United States Centers for Disease Control and Prevention, said the outbreak was "unprecedented."

sourceString: He said, in remarks published by CNN in February, "other than influenza, no other respiratory virus has been tracked from emergence to continuous global spread."
targetString: ኣብ ለካቲት ኣብ CNN ኣብ ዝተዋህበ መግለጺ “ ‘’ካብ ህጹጽ ናብ ቀጻሊ ዓለማዊ ዝርገሐ ዘለዎ ብዘይካ ኢንፍልወንዛ ካልእ ናይ ምስትንፋስ ቫይረስ ከምዘይተረክበ” ተገሊጹ።
en-mt: In a February statement on CNN, it was revealed that 'no respiratory virus has been detected except for influenza, which has an emergency to a continuous global spread.'

sourceString: Ghebreyesus expressed a similar view, saying "we have never before seen a pandemic sparked by a coronavirus."
targetString: ገብረየሱስ ብወገኑ " ብኮሮና ቫይረስ ዝላባዕ ለበዳ ቅድሚ ሕጂ ርኢና ኣይንፈልጥን ኢና" ክብል ተመሳሳሊ ርእይቶ ሂቡ።
en-mt: He said: "We have never seen a coronavirus pandemic before.

sourceString: He continued, "and we have never before seen a pandemic that can be controlled at the same time."
targetString: ንሱ ቀጺሉ፡ ‘’ከምኡውን ኣብ ሓደ ግዜ ክቆጻጸር ዝኽእል ዓይነት ለበዳ ፈጺምና ሪኢና ኣይንፈልጥን ኢና’’።
en-mt: He continued, "We've never seen a pandemic that can control it at the same time."

sourceString: The new status as a pandemic follows the WHO's decision in January to declare the outbreak a public health emergency of international concern.
targetString: እዚ ሓዲሽ ህሉው ኩነታት ነቲ ናይ ውድብ ጥዕና ዓለም (WHO) ኣብ ጥሪ ዝተዋህበ ውሳኔ ናይ ለበዳ ኣዋጅ ናይ ዓለም ለኻዊ ናይ ጥዕና ኢመርጀንሲ ኢዩ።
en-mt: he current situation is the result of the World Health Organization's Decision on the Pandemic in January.

sourceString: The United States' National Institute of Allergy and Infectious Disease's director, Dr. Anthony Fauci, said of the outbreak, "bottom line, it's going to get worse."
targetString: ዳይረክተር ሃገራዊ ኢንስቲትዩት ኣለርጂን ተመሓላለፍቲ ሕማማትን፡ ሕቡራት መንግስታት ኣመሪካ፡ ኣንቶኒ ፋውሲ " እዚ ለበዳ ኦሮማይ እናኸፍአ እዩ ክኸይድ" ኢሉ።
en-mt: Anthony Fauci, director of the U.S. National Institute of Allergy and Infectious Diseases, said: "This orooma epidemic is going to get worse."

sourceString: As of Thursday, Associated Press reported there were at least 126,000 cases of COVID-19 worldwide, resulting in over 4,600 deaths.
targetString: ኣሶሴትድ ፕረስ ከም ዝገለጾ ካብ ሓሙስ ጀሚሩ ኣብ ሙሉእ ዓለም ብውሑዱ 126,000 ብ COVID-19 ዝተለኽፉ ከዘለውን እዚ ድማ ናይ 4,600 ሰባት ሞት ኣስዒቡ።
en-mt: According to the Associated Press, as of Thursday, there have been at least 126,000 cases of COVID-19 worldwide, resulting in 4,600 deaths.

sourceString: The 2019–20 coronavirus pandemic is an ongoing pandemic of coronavirus disease 2019 (COVID-19), caused by severe acute respiratory syndrome coronavirus 2 (SARS-CoV-2).
targetString: 2019-20 ኮሮናቫይረስ ለበዳ፡ ዝቕጽል ዘሎ ለበዳ ናይ ኮሮናቫይረስ  ሕማም 2019 (ኮቪድ-19) ኮይኑ፡ ብ severe acute respiratory syndrome coronavirus 2  (SARS-COV-2) ዝመሓላለፍ ቫይረሳዊ ሕማም እዩ።
en-mt: 2019-20 Coronavirus pandemic is a viral disease 2019 (COVID-19) spread by severe acute respiratory coronavirus syndrome (SARS-COV-2).

sourceString: The outbreak was identified in Wuhan, China, in December 2019, declared to be a Public Health Emergency of International Concern on 30 January 2020, and recognized as a pandemic on 11 March 2020.
targetString: እቲ ቫይረስ መጀመርያ ታሕሳስ 2019 ኣብ ዉሃን ቻይና ክርከብ እንከሎ፡ ብ 30 ጥሪ 2020 ድማ ዓለማዊ ጥዕናዊ ስግኣት እዩ ተባሂሉ። ኣብ 11 መጋቢት 2020  ድማ ለበዳ ተባሂሉ ተኣዊጁ።
en-mt: The virus was first detected in Wuhan, China, in December 2019, and was declared a global health threat on January 30, 2020, and declared an outbreak on March 11, 2020.

sourceString: As of 10 April 2020, approximately 1.61 million cases of COVID-19 have been reported in 210 countries and territories, resulting in approximately 97,000 deaths.
targetString: ኣብ 10 መጋቢት 2020, ኣስታት 1.61 ሚልዮን ግዳያት ናይ ኮቪድ-19 ተመዝጊቦም፡ እዞም ግዳያት ካብ 210 ሃገራት ኮይኖም ኣስታት 97,000 ሞት ድማ ተመዝጊቡ።
en-mt: By March 10, 2020, some 1.61 million cases of COVID-19 were registered, with some 97,000 deaths from 210 countries.

sourceString: About 364,000 people have recovered.
targetString: ኣስታት 364,000 ሰባት ሓውዮም ኣለዉ።
en-mt: About 364,000 people have recovered.

sourceString: The case fatality rate has been estimated to be 4% in China, while globally ranging from 13.04% in Algeria to .08% in New Zealand.
targetString: እቲ ናይ ግዳያት ናይ ሞት መጠን ኣብ ቻይና 4% ተጸብጺቡ፡ ብዕለም ደረጃ ድማ ካብቲ ዝዓበየ 13.04% ኣብ ኣልጀርያ ናብቲ ዝተሓተ .08% ኣብ ኒው-ዚላንድ ተጸብጺቡ።
en-mt: The death rate for victims was reported in China at 4% and on a worldly scale from the largest 13.04% in Algeria to the lowest .08% in New Zealand.

sourceString: Common symptoms include fever, cough and shortness of breath.
targetString: እቶም ልሙዳት ምልክታት፡ ረስኒ፡ ሰዓል ከምኡውን ሕጽረት ምስትንፋስ ከምዝኾኑ ተሓቢሩ።
en-mt: The most common symptoms are fever, cough and shortness of breath.

sourceString: Complications may include pneumonia and acute respiratory distress syndrome.
targetString: ሕዱር ናይ ስርዓት ምስትንፋስ ጸገምን፡ ኒሞንያን ካልኦትን ነቲ ሕማም ካብ ዘጋድዱ እዮም።
en-mt: Chronic respiratory problems and pneumonia and others exacerbate the disease.

sourceString: The time from exposure to onset of symptoms is typically around five days, but may range from two to fourteen days.
targetString: ምልክታት እዚ ሕማም ንክርአ ኣስታት 5 መዓልቲ ዘድሊ'ኳ ተኾነ፡ ኣብ ብዙሓት ግን ካብ ክልተ ክሳብ ዓሰርተ ኣርባዕተ መዓልቲ ይወስድ።
en-mt: Symptoms take about 5 days to appear, but in many cases it takes two to 14 days.

sourceString: There is no known vaccine or specific antiviral treatment.
targetString: ዝኾነ ዝተፈልጠ ክታበት ወይ ፍሉጥ ጸረ-ነፍሲ መከላኸሊ የለን።
en-mt: There is no known vaccine or known anti-soul protection.

sourceString: Primary treatment is symptomatic and supportive therapy.Recommended preventive measures include hand washing, covering one's mouth when coughing, maintaining distance from other people, and monitoring and self-isolation for people who suspect they are infected.
targetString: ቀዳማይ ክንክን ናይ ሕክምና symptomatic (ምትሕልላፍ ምስ ምልክታት)ን ደጋፊን ፍወሳ ኢዩ።እቶም ውጽኢታውያን ናይ ምክልኻል ስጉምትታት እዞም ዝስዕቡ የጠቃልሉ፡ ምሕጻብ ኣእዳው፡ ምዕጻው ኣፍ ኣብ ግዜ ምስዓል፡ ኣካላዊ ምርሕሓቅ ምዝውታር፡ ከም ኡውን ነቶም ጥርጡራት ምምርማርን ምውሻብን፡ ኢዮም።
en-mt: Primary care is medical symptomatic and supportive treatment, and effective preventive measures include washing hands, closing the mouth, maintaining physical distancing during coughing, and examining and treating suspects.

sourceString: Authorities worldwide have responded by implementing travel restrictions, quarantines, curfews, workplace hazard controls, and facility closures.
targetString: ኣብ ዓለም ምሉእ ዘለዉ በዓልመዚታት እገዳ ናይ መገሻ ብምግባር፡ ብምውሻብ፡ ብምዕጻው፡ ናይ ስራሕ ሓደጋታት ምቁጽጻር ብምግባር፡ ከምኡውን ወሃብቲ ትካላት ብምዕጻው ግብረ መልሲ ሂቦም።
en-mt: Festivals around the world have responded by imposing travel bans, closing them, controlling operational risks, and closing employers.

sourceString: The pandemic has led to severe global socioeconomic disruption, the postponement or cancellation of sporting, religious, political and cultural events, and widespread shortages of supplies exacerbated by panic buying.
targetString: እዚ ለበዳ ናብ ብዙሕ ማሕበረ-ኢኮኖሚ ሽግራት ኣምሪሑ ኢዩ፡ እቲ ምውንዛፋትን ምቁራጽን ናይ ስፖርት ኣጋጣሚታት፡ ሃይማኖታዊ ምትእኽኻባት፡ ባይላዊ ኣጋጣሚታት፡ ከምኡውን ሕጽረት ናይ ጠለባት ብሰንኪዛይ ተኣደነ ናይ ፍርሒ ምዕዳግ።
en-mt: he pandemic has led to many economic problems, including the closures and disruption of sports opportunities, religious gatherings, opportunities, and a shortage of demands.

sourceString: Schools and universities have closed either on a nationwide or local basis in 193 countries, affecting approximately 99.4 percent  of the world's student population.
targetString: ቤት-ትምህርትታትን ዩኒቨርሲታትን ብ ሃገር ደረጃ ወይ ከባብያዊ ደረጃ ኣብ 193 ሃገራት ተዓጽየን ኣለዋ፡ እዚ ድማ ነቲ 99.4% ብዝሒ ናይ ተመሃሮ ኣብ ዓለምና ይሕፍን።
en-mt: Schools and universities are closed at a national level or local level in 193 countries, accounting for 99.4% of the world's student population.

sourceString: Misinformation about the virus has spread online, and there have been incidents of xenophobia and discrimination against Chinese people, other people of East and Southeast Asian descent and appearance, and others from areas with significant virus cases.
targetString: ጌጋ-ሓበሬታ ብዛዕባ እቲ ቫይረስ ኣብ ኦንላይን ይዝርጋሕ ኣሎ፡ ከምኡ’ውን ናይ ዓሌት-ጽል ኢን ዓሌታውነትን ኣብ ልዕሊ ህዝቢ ቻይና ይወርድ ኣሎ፡ ካል ኦትሰባት ናይ ምብራቅን ሰሜናዊ-ምብራቅ ኤስያን ዝዓሌቶምን ካልእ ዝብቲ ቫይረስ ዘጥቅዖ ቦታ ዝመጹን ውን፡ በዚ ዓሌታውነት ተጠቂዖምን ይጥቕዑን ኣለዉ።
en-mt: Misinformation about the virus is spreading online, as well as racial hatred and racism against the Chinese people, as other people from eastern and northeastern Asia, their ethnic groups and other ethnic groups are also being attacked and abused.

sourceString: Due to reduced travel and closures of heavy industry, there has been a decrease in air pollution and carbon emissions.
targetString: ብሰንኪ ዋሕዲ ምንቅስቓስን ምዕጻው ዓበይቲ ኢንዱስትሪታትን፡ ኣብ ብከላ ኣየርን፡ ካርቦን ዳኦክሳይድ ጋዛትን ጎዲሉ።
en-mt: The decrease in air pollution and carbon dioxide gas emissions has decreased due to a lack of movement and the closure of major industries.

sourceString: Health authorities in Wuhan, China (the capital of Hubei province) reported a cluster of pneumonia cases of unknown cause on 31 December 2019, and an investigation was launched in early January 2020.
targetString: ኣብ Wuhan፡ ቻይና (እታ ርእሲ ከተማ ኣውራጃ Hubei) ዝርከቡ ሰበ ስልጣን ጥዕና ሕልፍ ዝበሉ እኩባት ተርእዮታት ናይ ጠንቁ ዘይተፈልጠ ኒሞንያ ከምዝነበሩ ኣብ 31 ታሕሳስ 2019 ሓቢሮም፡ከምኡውን መርመራ ኣብ መጀመርያ ጥሪ ናይ 2020 ጀሚሩ።
en-mt: Health officials in Wuhan, China's capital, Hubei province, said on December 31, 2019 that a large group of people had been diagnosed with pneumonia and that testing began in early January 2020.

sourceString: The cases mostly had links to the Huanan Seafood Wholesale Market and so the virus is thought to have a zoonotic origin.
targetString: እቶም ዝበዝሑ ግዳያት ምስ ሃናን ናይ-ባሕሪ መግቢ መሸጢ ማእከል፡ ምትሕሓዝ ከም ዘለዎም ተፈሊጡ፡ በዚ ድማ እቲ ቫይረስ ካብ እንስሳ ከም ዝፎለቀ ተረጋጊጹ።
en-mt: Most of the cases were linked to Hannah's sea food shopping center, which resulted in the virus being removed from animals.

sourceString: The virus that caused the outbreak is known as SARS-CoV-2, a newly discovered virus closely related to bat coronaviruses, pangolin coronaviruses, and SARS-CoV.The earliest known person with symptoms was later discovered to have fallen ill on 1 December 2019, and that person did not have visible connections with the later wet market cluster.
targetString: ነዚ ቫይረስ ጠንቂ ዝኮነ ሳርስ (SARS-CoV-2) ተባሂሉ ዝፍለጥ እካ እንተኾነ እዚ ሓድሽ ዝተረኽበ ቫይረስ ምስ ናይ መንካዕ ኮሮና ቫይረስ፡ ፓንጎሊን ኮሮና ቫይረስ SARS-CoV ብቐረባ ዝተሓሓዝ እዩ።ዲሒሩ ከም ዝተፈልጠ እቲ ናይ መጀመርታ ምልክት ዝተራእዮ ሰብ ኣብ 1 ታሕሳስ 2019 ከምዝሓመመ ተፈሊጡ።እዚ ሰብ እዚ ምስ’ቲ ናይ ዕዳጋ ምልጋብ ርኡይ ርክብ ኣይነበሮን።
en-mt: SarS-CoV-2 is the cause of the virus, but the newly discovered virus is closely related to the pangolin-cov virus, which was discovered that the first symptom was diagnosed on December 1, 2019, when it was discovered that the first person to appear had become infected on December 1, 2019.

sourceString: Of the early cluster of cases reported in December 2019, two-thirds were found to have a link with the market.
targetString: ካብቶም ታሕሳስ 2019 እትሰነዱ ሒደት ሕሙማት፡ ክልተ ሲሶ ኣቢሎም ምስቲ ዕዳጋ ምትእስሳር ጸኒሕዎም እዩ።
en-mt: Of the few patients who signed in December 2019, two-thirds remained in contact with the market.

sourceString: On 13 March 2020, an unverified report from the South China Morning Post suggested that a case traced back to 17 November 2019, in a 55-year-old from Hubei province, may have been the first.On 26 February 2020, the WHO reported that, as new cases reportedly declined in China but suddenly increased in Italy, Iran, and South Korea, the number of new cases outside China had exceeded the number of new cases within China for the first time.
targetString: ኣብ መጋቢት 13, 2020፡ ሓደ ዘይተረጋገጸ ጸብጻብ ካብ ደቡብ ቻይና ሞርኒግ ፖስት ከም ዝሓበሮ፡ ኣብ ኣውራጃ ሁበይ ኣብ 17 ሕዳር 2019 ዝተረኽበት ጋል 55 ዓመት ልኽፍቲ እታ ናይ መጀመርያ ክትከውን ትኽእል ኢያ ኢሉ።ኣብ ሕዳር 26 2020 ፡ ውድብ ጥዕና ዓለም (WHO) ከም ዝሐብሮ ሓደሽቲ ልኹፋት ኣብ ቻይና ይጎድሉ ምህላዎምን ኣብ ኢራን፡ ደቡብ ኮርያ፡ ጣልያንን ግን በንጻሩ ይውስኹ ምህላዎም ኢዩ፡ ብተወሳኢ ቁጽሪ ሓደሽቲ ልኹፋት ካብ ቻይና ወጻኢ ምስቶም ሓደሽቲ ልኹፋት ኣብ ቻይና ዘለዉ ንላዕሊ ይውስኽ ኣሎ።
en-mt: On March 13, 2020, an unconfirmed report from south China's Morning Post said that 55 years of gael found in Hubey County on November 17, 2019 could be the first year of the spread.

sourceString: There may be substantial underreporting of cases, particularly among those with milder symptoms.
targetString: ብፍላይ ኣብ’ቶም ፎኪስ ምልክታት ሕማም ዘለዎም ገዚፍ ምሕባእ ቁጽሪ ሕሙማት ይረአ እዩ።
en-mt: he number of patients is particularly high in those with symptoms.

sourceString: By 26 February, relatively few cases had been reported among youths, with those 19 and under making up 2.4% of cases worldwide.The United Kingdom's chief scientific adviser, Patrick Vallance, estimated that 60% of the British population would need to become infected before effective herd immunity could be achieved.
targetString: ብ 26 ለካቲት ብተዛማዲ ዝወሓደ መጠነ ሞት መንእሰያት ከም እተጸብጸበ፥ 19ን ትሕቲኡን ዝዕድሜኦም ክሳብ 2.4% ኣህጒራዊ ኣሃዝ ይሕዙ ኣለዉ።ዋና ኣማኻሪ ሳየንስ ብሪጣንያ ፓትሪክ ቫላንስ ቅድሚ ውጽኢታዊ ሀርድ ኢምዩኒቲ (herd immunity) ክሳብ ዝምዕብል 60% ካብ ህዝቢ ብሪጣንያ በዚ ሕማም ክልከፍ ከም ዝኽእል ግምቱ ሂቡ።
en-mt: On February 26, a relatively smaller number of young people was reported; up to 2.4% of the age of 19 and under are holding international figures. Patrick Vallance, the UK's chief adviser for The Suns, speculated that 60% of the British population could be infected with the disease until it developed before an effective herd immunity.

sourceString: Cases refers to the number of people who have been tested for COVID-19, and whose test has been confirmed positive according to official protocols.
targetString: ግዳያት ነቲ ቁጽሪ ናይ ተመርመርቲ ናይ ኮቪድ-19 ዝነግር ኮይኑ፡ እቲ መርመራ ድማ ኣወንታዊ ምስ ዝኸውን ልኹፋት ግዳያት ንብሎም።
en-mt: It tells the number of COVID-19 test cases, and if the test is positive, it will be published.

sourceString: As of 23 March, no country had tested more than 3% of its population, and many countries have had official policies not to test those with only mild symptoms, such as Italy, the Netherlands, Spain, and Switzerland.
targetString: ክሳብ 23 መጋቢት ኣብ ዘሎ ግዜ፡ ዝኾነት ልዕሊ 3% ካብ ብዝሒ ህዝባ ዝመርመረት ሃገር የላን፡ ብዙሓት ሃገራት ከኣ ፎኪስ ምልክታት ሕማም ጥራይ ንዘለዎም ሰባት ናይ ዘይምምርማር ፖሊሲታት ጸኒሕወን፡ ከም ኢጣልያ፡ ሆላንድ፡ ስጳኛን፡ ስዊዘርላንድን ዝኣመሰላ።
en-mt: As of March 23, no country has tested more than 3% of the population, and many countries have adopted policies not to test people with symptoms, such as Italy, the Netherlands, Spain and Switzerland.

sourceString: A study published on 16 March found that in China, up to 23 January, an estimated 86% of COVID-19 infections had not been detected, and that these undocumented infections were the infection source for 79% of documented cases.
targetString: ኣብ መጋቢት 16 ዝወጸ መጽናዕቲ ከም ዝሕብሮ ክሳብ 23 ጥሪ 86% ካብ ለበዳ ኮቪድ-19 ኣይተፈልጠን፡ እዚ ዘይተሰነደ ብዝሒ ሕሙማት ድማ ኣስታት 79% ሚእታዊት ናይ ዝተሰነደ ብዝሒ ዝተለኽፉ የጠቓልል።
en-mt: A March 16 study found that as of January 23, 86% of the COVID-19 outbreak was unknown, and this undetermined number of patients included about 79% of documented cases.

sourceString: A statistical analysis published 30 March estimated that numbers of infections in Italy were considerably greater than the reported cases.
targetString: ኣብ 30 መጋቢት ዝተሓትመ ስታቲስቲካዊ ትንተና/መግለጺ፡ እቲ ልክዕ ብዝሒ ናይ ልኹፋት ኣብ ዓዲ ጣልያን ካብቲ ዝወጸ ጸብጻብ ይዓቢ ኔሩ።
en-mt: A statistical analysis published on March 30 showed that the exact number of cases in Italy was higher than the report published on March 30.

sourceString: The initial estimates of the basic reproduction number (R0) for COVID-19 were 1.4 to 2.4.
targetString: እቲ ናይ ፈለማ ገምጋም ናይቲ መሰረታዊ ቁጽሪ መፍረ (R0) ንCOVID-19 ኣብ 1.4 ክሳብ 2.4 ነይሩ።
en-mt: The initial estimate of the basic fertility number (R0) was for COVID-19 at 1.4 to 2.4.

sourceString: A study published by the US Center for Disease Control and Prevention has concluded that it may be 5.7.
targetString: ብማእከል ምቁጽጻርን ምክልኻልን ሕማማት ናይ ሕቡራት መንግስታት ኣመሪካ (US Center for Disease Control and Prevention) ዝተዘርገሐ መጽናዕቲ 5.7 ከምዝኾነ ተደምዲሙ።
en-mt: A study released by the U.S. Centers for Disease Control and Prevention concluded that it was 5.7.

sourceString: Most people with COVID-19 recover.
targetString: መብዛሕትኦም COVID-19 ዝሓመሙ ሰባት ይሓውዩ እዮም።
en-mt: Most people with COVID-19 recover.

sourceString: For those who do not, the time from development of symptoms to death has been between 6 and 41 days, with the most common being 14 days.
targetString: ምልክት ካብ ዝተራእየሉ ክሳብ ሞት ዘሎ ካብ 6 ክሳብ 41 ዘሎ መዓልትታት ኮይኑ እቲ ቀንዲ ድማ 14 መዓልትታት እዩ።
en-mt: he number of days from symptoms to death is 6 to 41 days, and the most common is 14 days.

sourceString: As of 10 April 2020, approximately 97,000 deaths had been attributed to COVID-19.
targetString: ክሳብ ሚያዝያ 17 ግዜ ኣብ ዘሎ ግዜ 97,000 ኣቢሎም ዝኾኑ ሰባት ብ ኮቪድ-19 ሞይቶም።
en-mt: As of April 17, 97,000 people have died from COVID-19.

sourceString: In China, as of 5 February about 80% of deaths were in those over 60, and 75% had pre-existing health conditions including cardiovascular diseases and diabetes.Official tallies of deaths from the COVID-19 pandemic generally refer to dead people who tested positive for COVID according to official protocols.
targetString: ኣብ ቻይና፡ ክሳብ ለካቲት 5 ኣብ ዝነበረ ግዜ፡ 80% ካብ ብዝሒ ምዉታት ልዕሊ 60 ዕድሚኦም ክኾኑ ከለዉ፡ ልዕሊ 75% ከኣ ሕዱር ናይ ስርዓት ምስትንፋስ ሕማምን ሽኮርያን ዝጸንሖም እዮም። ወግዓዊ ጸብጻብ ምዉታት ኮቪድ-19፡ በቲ ሕማም ኮቪድ ተለኺፎም ከም ዝሞቱ ንዝተረጋግጹ ሰባት ጥራይ የጠቓልል።
en-mt: As of February 5, 80% of the dead in China were over the age of 60 and more than 75% had chronic respiratory diseases and diabetes.

sourceString: The number of true fatalities from COVID-19 may be much higher, as it may not include people who die without testing - e.g. at home, in nursing homes, etc.
targetString: ብ ኮቪድ-19 ናይ ዝሞቱ ብዝሒ ካብቲ ዝግለጽ ንላዕሊ ክዛይድ ከም ዝኽእል ይግመት፡ ምኽንያቱ ብዙሓት ኣብ ገዝኦም፡ መእለዪ ሽማግለታትን፡ ብዘይመርመራ  ዝሞቱ ኣለዉ።.
en-mt: It is estimated that the number of deaths from COVID-19 may be higher than described, as many have died in their homes, nursing homes and unexployed.

sourceString: Partial data from Italy found that the number of excess deaths during the pandemic exceeded the official COVID death tally by a factor of 4-5x.
targetString: ከፊላዊ ዳታ/ሓበሬታ ካብ ኢጣልያ ከምዝረኸቦ እቲ ቁጽሪ ናይ ዝያዳ ሞት ኣብ እዋን እቲ ለበዳ ነቲ ወግዓዊ ቁጽሪ ሞት COVID 4-5x ዕጽፊ ይሓልፎ።
en-mt: According to partial data from Italy, the number of more deaths exceeds the official covid-5x death toll during the pandemic.

sourceString: A spokeswoman for the U.S. Centers for Disease Control and Prevention (CDC) acknowledged "We know that [the stated death toll] is an underestimation", a statement corroborated by anecdotal reports of undercounting in the U.S. Such underestimation often occurs in pandemics, such as the 2009 H1N1 swine flu epidemic.The first confirmed death was in Wuhan on 9 January 2020.
targetString: ኣፈኛ ማእከል ምቁጽጻርን ምክልኻልን ሕማማት (CDC) "ተጠቒሱ ዘሎ ብዝሒ ምዉታት፡ ጎደሎ ምዃኑ" ተኣሚና እያ። እዚ ኣብ ኣመሪካ ሓድሽ ተርእዮ ከም ዘይኰነ ይፍለጥ። ከምዚ ዝኣመስለ ጐደሎ ጸብጻባት ለበዳታት ኣብ ዘጋጥመሉ፡ ንኣብነት ኣብ 2009 ዘጋጠመ H1N1 ቫይረስ ግዜ፡ ብብዝሒ ዝተርኣየ ምዃኑ ይፍለጥ። እቲ ናይ መጀመርያ ግዳይ ሞት ኣብ ዉሃን ኣብ 9 ጥሪ 2020 ተረኺቡ።
en-mt: A spokeswoman for the Centers for Disease Control and Prevention (CDC) acknowledged that "the number of deaths mentioned is not a new phenomenon in the United States," and in the case of such a lack of epidemiology reports, such as the H1N1 virus in 2009, the first case was found in Wuhan on January 9, 2020.

sourceString: The first death outside mainland China occurred on 1 February in the Philippines, and the first death outside Asia was in France on 14 February.
targetString: እቲ ናይ መጀመርያ ሞት ካብ ቻይና ወጻኢ ኣብ ፊሊፒኒስ ኣብ 1 ለካቲት ተራእዩ፡ እቲ ናይ መጀመርያ ሞት ካብ ኤስያ ወጻኢ ድማ ኣብ ፈረንሳ ኣብ 14 ለካቲት ተራእዩ።
en-mt: The first death was seen outside China in the Philippines on February 1, and the first outside Asia in France on February 14.

sourceString: By 28 February, outside mainland China, more than a dozen deaths each were recorded in Iran, South Korea, and Italy.
targetString: ብለካቲት 28 ፥ ካብ ቀንዲ መሬት ቻይና ወጻኢ ፡ ኢራን፡ ደቡብ ኮርያን ኢጣልያን ነፍሲ ወከፈን በቲ ቫይረስ ልዕልሊ 12 ሰባት ከም ዝሞትወን ኣዊጀን።
en-mt: On February 28, outside the Chinese mainland, Iran, South Korea and Italy declared more than 12 deaths each.

sourceString: By 13 March, more than forty countries and territories had reported deaths, on every continent except Antarctica.Several measures are commonly used to quantify mortality.
targetString: ብ መጋቢት 13 ፡ ልዕሊ ኣርብዓ ሃገራትን ግዝኣታትን፡ ብዘይካ ኣንታርክቲካ፡ በቲ ሕማም ዝሞትወን ከም ዘለዉ ሓቢረን። ብዝሒ ሞት ንምዕቃን ዝተፈለላዩ ኣገባብት እዮም ዝውሰዱ።
en-mt: On March 13, more than 40 countries and territories said they had died from the disease, in addition to Antarctica, and different methods were taken to prevent the death toll.

sourceString: These numbers vary by region and over time, and are influenced by the volume of testing, healthcare system quality, treatment options, time since initial outbreak, and population characteristics such as age, sex, and overall health.The death-to-case ratio reflects the number of deaths divided by the number of diagnosed cases within a given time interval.
targetString: እዞም ቁጽርታት እዚኦም ብዞባን ብግዜን ይፈላለዩ፡ ከምኡ ድማ በቲ ብዝሒ ናይ ዝካየድ መርመራ፡ ብቖዓት ስርዓተ ክንክን-ጥዕና፡ ናይ ፍወሳ ኣማራጺታት፡ ግዜ ካብ ለበዳ ዝጀመረሉ ኣትሒዙ፡ ከምኡ ድማ ናይ ብዝሒ ህዝቢ ጠባያት ከም ዕድመ፡ ጾታን፡ ሓፈሻዊ ጥዕናን ዝኣመሰሉ ይጽሎ።እቲ ብዝሒ ቁጽሪ ናይ ምዉታት ናብ ግዳያት (death-to-case ratio) ነቲ ቁጽሪ ናይ ዘጋጠሙ ሞት ዝተመቕሎ እቲ ቁጽሪ ናይ ብመርመራ ዝተለለዩ ተርእዮታት ኣብ ውሽጢ ሓደ ውሁብ ንውሓት ግዜ የንጸባርቕ።
en-mt: hese numbers vary by region and time, and are influenced by the number of tests conducted, quality health care options, treatment options, time from the start of the pandemic, and population behaviors such as age, gender and general health. The number of deaths to victims (death-to-case ratio) is divided into the number of deaths, and the number of confirmed cases reflects within a given time span.

sourceString: Based on Johns Hopkins University statistics, the global death-to-case ratio is 6.0% (97,039/1,617,204) as of 10 April 2020.
targetString: ኣብቲ ካብ ናይ ጆን ሆፕኪንስ ዩኒቨርሲቲ ፡ኣብ ሚያዝያ 10 ናይ 2020 ፡ ዝወጸ ጸብጻብ ብምሙርካስ፡ ዓለማዊ ቁጽሪ ናይ ሞት ምስ ቁጽሪ ናይ ግዳያት ክነጻጸር እንከሎ 6.0% (97,039/1,617,204) ኢዩ፡፡
en-mt: According to a report from Johns Hopkins University on April 10, 2020, the world death toll is 6.0% (97,039/1,617,204) compared with the number of cases.

sourceString: The number varies by region.
targetString: እቲ ቁጽርታት በቲ ዞባታት ይፈላለ።
en-mt: The numbers vary by regions.

sourceString: In China, estimates for the death-to-case ratio decreased from 17.3% (for those with symptom onset 1–10 January 2020) to 0.7% (for those with symptom onset after 1 February 2020).Other measures include the case fatality rate (CFR), which reflects the percent of diagnosed people who die from a disease, and the infection fatality rate (IFR), which reflects the percent of infected (diagnosed and undiagnosed) who die from a disease.
targetString: ኣብ ቻይና፡ ገምጋምናት ናይቲ ምጣነ ሞት-ናብ-ተርእዮ ካብ 17.3% (ነቶም ምልክታት ሕማም ዝነበሮም 1–10 ጥሪ 2020) ናብ 0.7% ጎዲሉ (ነቶም ድሕሪ 1 ለካቲት 2020 ምልክታት ሕማም ዝነበሮም)።ካልእ ስጉምትታት ነቲ case fatality rate (CFR, መጠን ሞት ተርእዮ)፡ እቲ ሚእታዊት ናይ ብመርመራ ዝተለለዩ ሰባት በቲ ሕማም ከኣ ዝሞቱ ዘንጸባርቕ፡ ከምኡ ድማ እቲ infection fatality rate (IFR, መጠን ሞት መልከፍቲ)፡ ነቲ ሚእታዊት ናይ ዝተለኽፉ (ብመርመራ ዝተፈልጡን ዘይተፈልጡን) በቲ ሕማም ዝሞቱ ሰባት ዘንጸባርቕ።
en-mt: In China, estimates of the mortality-to-appearance decreased from 17.3% (for those who had symptoms after 1–10 January 2020) to 0.7% (for those with symptoms after February 1, 2020). Other measures reflect the case fatality rate (CFR, mortality rate), the percentage of people diagnosed with the disease and the death rate (IFR,  The mortality rate of infections reflects the percentage of people infected (diagnosed and unknown) who have died from the disease.

sourceString: These statistics are not timebound and follow a specific population from infection through case resolution.
targetString: እዚ ጸብጻባት ናይ ግዜ ገደብ የብሉን፡ ነቲ ብዝሒ ህዝቢ ምስ ተለከፍቲ ዘሎ ቁጽራዊ ዝምድና ድማ ይስዕብ።
en-mt: hese reports do not have a time limit and follow the number of people infected.

sourceString: A number of academics have attempted to calculate these numbers for specific populations.
targetString: ብዙሓት ምሁራት ነዞም ቁጽርታት ፍሉያት ኣህዛብ ክጽብጽቡ ፈቲኖም ኢዮም።
en-mt: Many scholars have tried to calculate these numbers.

sourceString: The University of Oxford's Centre for Evidence-Based Medicine estimates that the infection fatality rate for the pandemic as a whole is between 0.1% and 0.39%.
targetString: Oxford Centre-for Evidence Based Medicine ብሰንኪ ረኽሲ ለበዳ ኮሮና መጠነ ሞት ብሓፈሻ ካብ 0.1% ናብ 0.39% ክብ ምባሉ ገሊጹ።
en-mt: Oxford Centre-for Evidence-Based Medicine said the overall death rate from 0.1% to 0.39% from 0.1% to 0.39% due to corona infections.

sourceString: The upper estimate of this range is consistent with the results from the first random testing for COVID-19 in Germany, and a statistical study analysing the impact of testing on CFR estimates.
targetString: እቲ ላዕለዋይ ገምጋም ናይዚ ዝርግሐ’ዚ ምስቶም ውጽኢታት ናይቲ ቀዳማይ ናይ ሃውሪ መርመራ ናይ COVID-19 ኣብ ጀርመን ከምኡ ድማ ነቲ ጽልዋ ናይ መርመራ ኣብ CFR ዝግምግም ስታትስቲካዊ መጽናዕቲ ዝሳነ እዩ።
en-mt: he highest estimate of this prevalence is in harmony with the results of the first COVID-19 test in Germany and a statistical study that assesses the impact of the COVID-19 test on CFR.

sourceString: The WHO asserts that the pandemic can be controlled.
targetString: ውድብ ጥዕና ዓለም (WHO) እዚ ለበዳ ምቁጽጻሩ ከም ዝከኣል እዩ ዝኣምን።
en-mt: he World Health Organization (WHO) believes that the pandemic can be controlled.

sourceString: The peak and ultimate duration of the outbreak are uncertain and may differ by location.
targetString: ናይ’ዚ ለበዳ ጥርዝን ናይ መወዳእታ ደረትን ርጉጽ ዘይኮነ ኮይኑ ብቦታ’ውን ክፈላለ ይኽእል።
en-mt: he end date and end of the pandemic are uncertain and can vary depending on location.

sourceString: Maciej Boni of Penn State University stated, "Left unchecked, infectious outbreaks typically plateau and then start to decline when the disease runs out of available hosts.
targetString: ኣባል ዩኒቨርሲቲ ፐን ስቴት ዩኒቨርሲቲ ዝዀነ ማሲጂ ቦኒ ፡ "እንተደኣ ስቕ ኢልካ ርኢኻዮም ለበዳታት ብናህሪ ይውስኹ'ሞ ኣብ ዝተወሰነ ደረጃ ምስ በጽሐ ዳርጋ ጠጠዉ ይብል፡ ካብኡ ዝሕዞ ቁጽሪ ቀስ ብቀስ እናጎደለ የንቆልቁል" ክብል ገሊጹ።
en-mt: Masigi Boni, a member of Penn State University, said: "If you keep quiet, the pandemics are on the rise, and once they reach a certain level, they are almost gone, and the number of cases gradually decreases."

sourceString: But it's almost impossible to make any sensible projection right now about when that will be".
targetString: ኣብ'ዚ ሕጂ እዋን ምዓስ ከም ዝኸዉን ጭቡጥ ገምጋም ምሃብ ኣዝዩ ኣሸጋሪ እዩ።
en-mt: It's hard to estimate when it will happen right now.

sourceString: The Chinese government's senior medical adviser Zhong Nanshan argued that "it could be over by June" if all countries can be mobilized to follow the WHO's advice on measures to stop the spread of the virus.
targetString: ላዕለዋይ  ኣማኻሪ ጥዕና መንግስቲ ቻይና፡ ዞንግ ናንሻን፡ ኩለን ሃገራት ንምክልኻል እቲ ቫይረስ ኣብ ዝካየድ ዘሎ ጻዕሪ፡ መመርሒታት ውድብ ጥዕና ዓለም (WHO) እንተተኺትለን እዚ ሕማም " ኣብ ወርሒ ሰነ ክእለ" ከም ዝኽእል ገሊጹ።.
en-mt: Zhong Nanshan, the Chinese government's top health adviser, said the disease could be "likely in June" if all countries followed WHO guidelines in an effort to prevent the virus.

sourceString: On 17 March, Adam Kucharski of the London School of Hygiene & Tropical Medicine stated that SARS-CoV-2 "is going to be circulating, potentially for a year or two".
targetString: ኣብ መጋቢት 17፥ ኣዳም ኩቻርስኪ (Adam Kucharski) ካብ London School of  Hygiene&amp: Tropical Medicine: SARS-COV-2 "ንክልተ ዓመት ክጸንሕ ዩ" ክብል ተዛሪቡ።
en-mt: On March 17, Adam Kucharski of the London School of Hygiene& Tropical Medicine SARS-COV-2 said it would "last two years."

sourceString: According to the Imperial College study led by Neil Ferguson, physical distancing and other measures will be required "until a vaccine becomes available (potentially 18 months or more)".
targetString: ብመሰረት ናይ ኢፐርያል ኮለጅ መጽናዕቲ ብ ኔል ፈርጉሰን (Neil Ferguson)፡ ኣካላዊ ምርሕሓቃን ካልእ ስጉምትታትን ‘’ ክሳብ ክታበት ኣብ ዝርከብ (ካብ 18 ኣዋርሕ ንላዕ ሊ ዝወስድ)’’፡ ከም ዘድሊን ገሊጾም።
en-mt: According to an Epilepial College study by Neil Ferguson, physical distancing and other measures were needed 'until vaccines are available 'up to 18 months above Lee'.

sourceString: William Schaffner of Vanderbilt University stated, "I think it's unlikely that this coronavirus—because it's so readily transmissible—will disappear completely" and it "might turn into a seasonal disease, making a comeback every year".
targetString: ካብ Vanderbilt University ዝኾነ William Schaffner ከምዝበሎ “እዚ ኮሮና ቫይረስ--ብቐሊሉ ዝመሓላለፍ-- ስለዝኾነ ጠቕላላ ክጠፍእ ኣይኽእልን” ከምኡ’ውን “ናብ ወቕታዊ ሕማም ብምቕያር ዓመት ዓመት ክመጽእ ይኽእል”።
en-mt: William Schaffner of Vanderbilt University said: "This coronavirus - easily spreads - cannot be eradicated as a whole" and "can come year after year by turning into a seasonal disease."

sourceString: The virulence of the comeback would depend on herd immunity and the extent of mutation.
targetString: ካልኣይ ግዜ ናይ ምልባዕ ዓቕሙ ፡ ኣብ ናይ ምክልኻል ዓቕሚ ህዝቢን፡ እቲ ቫይረስ መልክዑ ናይ ምልውዋጥ ባህሪን ይምርኮስ።
en-mt: Its ability to spread again depends on the immune response of the population and the virus's changing characteristics.

sourceString: Symptoms of COVID-19 can be relatively non-specific and infected people may be asymptomatic.
targetString: ምልክታት  ኮቪድ-19 ዘይንጹራት ክኾኑ ይኽእሉ እዮም ጥራይ ዘይኮነ ዝተለኽፉ ሰባት'ውን ምልክታት ዘየርእዩ ክኾኑ ይኽእሉ እዮም።
en-mt: Not only can the symptoms of COVID-19 be vague, but infected people may not show symptoms.

sourceString: The two most common symptoms are fever (88%) and dry cough (68%).
targetString: እቶም ክልተ ቀንዲ ምልክታት ሕማም ረስኒ (88%) ከምኡ ድማ ቃንዛ ጎረሮ (68%) እዮም።
en-mt: The two main symptoms were fever (88%), and sore throat soreness (68%).

sourceString: Less common symptoms include fatigue, respiratory sputum production (phlegm), loss of the sense of smell, shortness of breath, muscle and joint pain, sore throat, headache, chills, vomiting, hemoptysis, diarrhea, or cyanosis.The WHO states that approximately one person in six becomes seriously ill and has difficulty breathing.
targetString: ብዙሕ ልሙድ ዘይኮነ ምልክታት ከም ድኻም፡ ናይ ምስትንፋስ sputum production (phlegm)፡ ናይ ምጭናው ጸገም፡ ሕጽረት ትንፋስ፡ ቃንዛ መላግቦ፡ ዕረ ጎሮሮ፡ ሕማም ርእሲ፡ ቁሪ፡ ተምላስ፡ ውጽኣት፡ hemoptysis,or cyanosis የጠቓልል።ውዱብ ጥዕና ዓለም ከምዝገለጾ ሓደ ካብ ሹዱሽተ ብጽኑዕ ይሓምምን ናይ ምስትንፋስ ጸገም የጋጥሞን።
en-mt: Many uncommon symptoms include fatigue, respiratory sputum production (phlegm), difficulty breathing, shortness of breath, sore throat, headaches, diarrhea, hemoptysis,or cyanosis, according to world health organizations.

sourceString: The U.S. Centers for Disease Control and Prevention (CDC) lists emergency symptoms as difficulty breathing, persistent chest pain or pressure, sudden confusion, difficulty waking, and bluish face or lips; immediate medical attention is advised if these symptoms are present.Further development of the disease can lead to severe pneumonia, acute respiratory distress syndrome, sepsis, septic shock and death.
targetString: እቲ U.S. Centers for Disease Control and Prevention (CDC, ናይ ሕቡራት መንግስታት ኣመሪካ ማእከላት ንምቊጽጻርን ምግታእን ሕማም) ናይ ህጹጽ ምልክታት ሕማም ኢሉ ዝዘርዘሮም ጸገም ምስትንፋስ፡ ቀጻሊ ናይ ኣፍልቢ ቃንዛ ወይ ጸቕጢ፡ ሃንደበታዊ ድንግርግር፡ ጸገም ብእግሪ ምኻድ፡ ከምኡ ድማ ሰማያዊ ሕብሪ ገጽን ከናፍርን እዮም፣ እንተድኣ እዞም ምልክታት ሕማም እዚኦም ኣለዉ ኾይኖም ቀጥታዊ ሕክምናዊ ቆላሕታ ይምከር።ተወሳኺ ምዕባለ ናይቲ ሕማም ናብ ከቢድ ኒሞንያ፡ ከቢድ ሕማም ጸቕጢ ምስትንፋስ፡ ሰፕሲስ፡ ሰፕሲሳዊ ወቕዕን ሞትን ከምርሕ ይኽእል።
en-mt: The U.S. Centers for Disease Control and Prevention (CDC, U.S. Centers for Disease Control and Prevention) listed as emergency symptoms: breathing, persistent chest pain or pressure, sudden numbness, difficulty walking, and blue face and lips color, if these symptoms exist, direct medical attention is recommended.

sourceString: Some of those infected may be asymptomatic, with no clinical symptoms but with test results that confirm infection, so researchers have issued advice that those with close contact to confirmed infected people should be closely monitored and examined to rule out infection.
targetString: ገለ ካብዞም ዝተለኹ asymptomatic (ምልክታት ሕማም ዘይብሎም ልኹፋት) ኢዮም፡ እንተኾነ ምስቲ ልኹፍ ምኻን ዝሕብር ናይ መርመራ ውጽኢት፡ እቶም ተመራመርቲ ፡ ምስፍሕፋሕ ንምግታእ ነቶም ምስ ልኹፋት ዝኾነ ርክበት ዝገበሩ ዓሚቕ መርመራ ክገብሩ ከም ዘለዎም ሓቢሮም ።
en-mt: Some of the cases are asymptomatic (without symptoms), but with the spread of the infection, the researchers suggested that they should take a thorough test to curb the spread.

sourceString: Chinese estimates of the asymptomatic ratio range from few to 44%.
targetString: ኣብ ቻይና ዘሎ ብዝሒ ምልክታት ዘየርእዩ ሰባት ካብ ዉሑድ ክሳብ 44% ይበጽሕ።
en-mt: in China, the number of people who do not show symptoms ranges from least 44%.

sourceString: The usual incubation period (the time between infection and symptom onset) ranges from one to 14 days; it is most commonly five days.As an example of uncertainty, the estimate of the fraction of people with COVID-19 who lost their sense of smell was initially 30% and later fell to 15%.
targetString: ንቡር ናይ ሕቑፎ ግዜ (ካብ መልከፍቲ ክሳብ ምልክታት ዝርኣየሉ ግዜ) ካብ ሓደ ክሳብ 14 መዓልቲ እዩ፡ ኣብ ዝበዝሐ ግና ሓሙሽተ መዓልቲ ይወስድ። እቲ ሓበሬታ ክሳዕ ክንደይ ዘይንጹር ምዃኑ ንምብራህ ንኣብነት ብኮቪድ-19 ተለኺፎም ናይ ምሽታት ዓቕሞም ዝጎደለ 30% ነይሩ ድሒሩ ግና ናብ 15% ጎዲሉ።
en-mt: he normal duration of infection (from infection to symptoms) lasts from one to 14 days, but usually takes five days, and to illustrate how vague the information is, for example, the evening capacity of those infected with COVID-19 was reduced by 30%, but later decreased to 15%.

sourceString: Some details about how the disease is spread are still being determined.
targetString: ገለ መግለጺታት ብዛዕባ እዚ ሕማም ከምይ ዝመሓላለፍ ዝተፈልጡ ኣለዉ።
en-mt: Some explanations have been made about how the disease is spread.

sourceString: The disease is believed to be primarily spread during close contact and by small droplets produced during coughing, sneezing, or talking; with close contact being within 1 to 2 metres (3 to 6 feet).
targetString: እቲ ሕማም ብቐንዱ ኣብ እዋን ጥቡቕ ርክብ ከምኡ ድማ ብመገዲ ንኣብ እዋን ምስዓል፡ ምህንጣስ፡ ወይ ምዝራብ ዝፍጠሩ ንኣሽቱ ነጠብታታት ከምዝመሓላለፍ ይእመን፣ ጥቡቕ ርክብ ዝብሃል ኣብ ውሽጢ 1 ክሳብ 2 ሜትሮ እዩ (3 ክሳብ 6 ጫማ)።
en-mt: The disease is mainly transmitted during close contact and through small droplets caused by coughing, sneering or speaking, so-called close contact within 1 to 2 meters (3 to 6 feet).

sourceString: Studies have found that an uncovered coughing can lead to droplets travelling up to 4.5 metres (15 feet) to 8.2 metres (27 feet).
targetString: መጽናዕትታት ከም ዘገልጽዎ ብዘይ መሸፈኒ ምስዓል ካብ 4.5 ሜተር ( 15 ጫማ) ክሳብ 8.2 ሜተር (27 ጫማ) ዝበጽሕ ነጠብታ ክፈጥር ይክእል።
en-mt: Studies have shown that unmasked can produce droplets ranging from 15 feet [4.5 m] (15 ft) to 8.2 meters (27 ft).

sourceString: Some have proposed that the virus may also be transmitted by small droplets that stay for more prolonged periods in the air, that may be generated during speech.Respiratory droplets may also be produced during breathing out, including when talking, though the virus is not generally airborne.
targetString: ገለ ገለ ሰባት ውን፡ እዚ ቫይረስ ኣብ ኣየር ዝተናውሐ ግዜ ብዝጸንሑ ካብ ዘረባ ዝተበገሱ ነጠብጣብ ክመሓላለፍ ከም ዝኽእል ነጊሮም።እዞም ናይ ምስትንፋስ ነጠብጣባት ኣብ ግዜ ምስትንፋስ’ውን ክትዛረብ ምስ ትጂምር ክፍጠሩ ይኽእሉ ኢዮም፡፡
en-mt: Some have also suggested that the virus can be transmitted by speech-based droplets that stay in the air for a long time, and these respiratory droplets can also develop when breathing.

sourceString: The droplets can land in the mouths or noses of people who are nearby or possibly be inhaled into the lungs.
targetString: እቶም ነጠብጣብ ኣፍ ወይ ኣፍንጫ ናይቶም ጥቓኻ ዘለዉ ሰባት ክዓልብ ይኽእል ኢዩ፡ በዚ’ውን ናብ ሳንቡእ ክሓልፍ ይኽእል።
en-mt: he droplets of the mouth or nose of people near you can land and pass through the lungs.

sourceString: Some medical procedures such as intubation and cardiopulmonary resuscitation (CPR) may cause respiratory secretions to be aerosolized and thus result in airborne spread.
targetString: ገለ ሕክምናዊ ኣገባባት ከም ኢንቱበሽን cardiopulmonary resuscitation (CPR, ሳንቡእን ልብን ናብ ውነ ምምላስ) ናይ ምስትንፋስ ጸረርታታት ክንጸጉ ክገብር ይኽእል በዚ ምኽንያት ከኣ ናይ ትንፋስ ምምሕልላፍ ከስዕብ ይኽእል።
en-mt: Some medical procedures, such as intubation cardiopulmonary resuscitation (CPR, lung and heart resuscitation) can cause respiratory rejection, resulting in respiratory transmission.

sourceString: It may also spread when one touches a contaminated surface, including skin, and then touches their eyes, nose, or mouth.
targetString: እዚ ሕማም ሓደ ሰብ ዝተበከለ ግዳማዊ ክፋል ከም ቆርበት ዝኣመሰለ ተንኪፉ መሊሱ ዓይኑ፡ ኣፍንጩኡ ወይ ኣፉ ምስዝትንክፍ ክልሕም ይኽእል።
en-mt: he disease can infect a person if a person touches an infected part of the skin, such as the skin, and touches his eyes, nose or mouth again.

sourceString: While there are concerns it may spread by faeces, this risk is believed to be low.
targetString: ስክፍታትት እካ እንተሎ ውሑድ ሓደጋ ዘለዎ ብ ቀልቀል ክመሓላለፍ ይኽእል እዩ።
en-mt: If there are any risks, a small risk can be transmitted.

sourceString: The Government of China denied the possibility of faecal-oral transmission of SARS-CoV-2.The virus is most contagious during the first three days after onset of symptoms, although spread may be possible before symptoms appear and in later stages of the disease.
targetString: መንግስቲ ቻይና ነቲ ብ ቀልቀል ክመሓላላአፍ ይኽእል ኢዩ ዝተባህለ SARS-CoV-2 ተቃዊምዎ።እዚ ቫይረስ ኣብተን መጀመርያ ሰለስተ መዓልታት ምልክታት ክረኣየካ ካብ ዝጂምር፡ ኣዝዩ ተመሓላላፊን ሐደጋጃን ኢዩ፡ ብተወሳኺ ድሕሪ ምሕዋይካ ውን ምትሕልላፍ ናይ ምህላው ተሕእሎ ኣሎ።
en-mt: he Chinese government has opposed SARS-CoV-2, which is very contagious and risky if symptoms occur in the first three days, and it can also be transmitted after recovering.

sourceString: People have tested positive for the disease up to three days before onset of symptoms suggesting transmission is possible before developing significant symptoms.
targetString: በዚ ቫይረስ ዝተለኽፉ ሰባት፡ ሰለስተ መዓልቲ ቅድሚ ዝዀኑ ምልክታት ምርኣዮም ፡ ዉጽኢት መርመራኦም ኣወንታዊ ምዃኑ ተፈሊጡ፡ እዚ ድማ እቲ ሕማም ገና ንጹር ምልክታት ከየርኣየ ክመሓላለፍ ከም ዝኽእል'ዉን የርኢ።
en-mt: People infected with the virus tested positive three days before they showed symptoms, indicating that the disease could still be spread without showing clear symptoms.

sourceString: Only few reports of laboratory-confirmed asymptomatic cases exist, but asymptomatic transmission has been identified by some countries during contact tracing investigations.
targetString: ብላባራቶሪ ከም ዝተረጋገጸ፡ ዝተለኽፉ ግን ምልክታት ዘይብሎም ውሑዳት ኢዮም ብቁጽሪ፡ እንተኾነ እዚ ናይ ኣሲምፕቶቲክ ምትሕልላፍ (ምትሕልላፍ ብዘይ ምልክታት) ከም’ዘሎ ገለ ሃገራት ኣጽኒዐን ኣለዋ።
en-mt: Laboratories have confirmed that few have been infected but have no symptoms, but some countries have confirmed that this asymptotic transmission is present.

sourceString: The European Centre for Disease Prevention and Control (ECDC) states that while it is not entirely clear how easily the disease spreads, one person generally infects two to three others.The virus survives for hours to days on surfaces.
targetString: እቲ European Centre for Disease Prevention and Control (ECDC, ኤውሮጳዊ ማእከል ንምግታእን ምቊጽጻርን ሕማም) እቲ ሕማም ከመይ ገይሩ ብቐሊሉ ከምዝመሓላለፍ ምሉእ ንምሉእ ንጹር’ኳ እንተዘይኮነ፡ ሓደ ሰብ ብሓፈሻ ንኽልተ ወይ ሰለስተ ካልኦት ሰባት የመሓላልፍ።እቲ ቫይረስ ኣብ ዝባናት ካብ ሰዓታት ክሳብ መዓልታት ብህይወት ክጸንሕ ይኽእል።
en-mt: The European Centre for Disease Prevention and Control (ECDC, the European Centre for Disease Control and Control) is not entirely clear on how the disease spreads easily, but one person generally transmits two or three others, and the virus can survive hours to days in the back.

sourceString: Specifically, the virus was found to be detectable for up to three days on plastic (polypropylene) and 304 stainless steel, for one day on cardboard, and for up to four hours on copper.
targetString: ብፍሉይ፡ እዚ ቫይረስ ኣብ ፕላስቲክ (polypropylene) ን ሰለስተ መዓልቲ ጸኒሑ፡ ከምኡውን 304 ኣብ ኣቻዮ፡ ን ሓደ መዓልቲ ኣብ ካርቶን፡ ከምኡውን ክሳብ ኣርባዕተ ሰዓታት ኣብ ኮፐር።
en-mt: he virus has been in plastic for three days and 304 in Achaio for one day on a cardboard and up to four hours in copper.

sourceString: This, however, varies based on the humidity and temperature.Pets and other animals have tested positive for COVID-19.
targetString: እንተኾነ እዚ፡ ኣብ ጠሊን ዋዒን ይምርኮስ።እንስሳ ዘቤትን ካልኦት እንስሳታትን ናይ ኮቪድ-19 ብ ኣወንታ ተመርሚሮም።
en-mt: However, this depends on humidity and humidity, with pets and other animals tested positive for COVID-19.

sourceString: There is no evidence animals can pass the virus on to humans, though British authorities advise washing one's hands after contact with animals, like after contact with other surfaces infected people could have touched.
targetString: ወላ'ኳ እቲ ቫይረስ ካብ እንስሳታት ናብ ሰብ ከም ዝመሓላለፍ ዘረጋግጽ ዝኾነ መርትዖ እንተዘይተረኽበ፡ ከምቲ ንሰብ ድሕሪ ምትንካፍካ ትሕጸብ፡ እንስታት ምስ ተንከፍካ ውን ንቅድመ-መጠንቀቕታ ክሕጽቡን ጽሬት ክሕልውን፡ሰበ ስልጣን ብሪጣንያ ይምዕዱ።
en-mt: Although there is no evidence that the virus is transmitted from animals to humans, British authorities are urging women to wash and keep a pre-warning and hygiene when touching them.

sourceString: Severe acute respiratory syndrome coronavirus 2 (SARS-CoV-2) is a novel virus, first isolated from three people with pneumonia connected to the cluster of acute respiratory illness cases in Wuhan.
targetString: ከቢድ ናይ ምስትንፋስ ስንድሮም ኮሮናቫይረስ-ክልተ (Severe acute respiratory syndrome coronavirus 2 (SARS-CoV-2)) ኖቨል ኮሮና ቫይረስ ኮይኑ፡ መጀመርያ ካብ ዝዓይነቱ ከቢድ ናይ ምስትብፋስ ሕማም ካብ ዝነበሮም ግዳያት ኣብ ዉሃን ምስ ኒሞንያ ዝተሓሓዝ፡ ሰለስተ ሰባት ክፈሊ ኪኡሉ።
