targetString: ግብረ-መልሲ ናይ ዓባይ ብሪጣንያ ነዚ ቫይረስ፡ ኣብ መጀመርያ ኣዝዩ ዝተዛነየ ኢዩ ኔሩ፡ ከም ኡውን ክሳብ 18 መጋቢት 2020፡ መንግስቲ ብሪጣንያ ዝኾነ ዓይነት ተበግሶታት ከም ማሕበራዊ ምርሕሓቅ ወይ ናይ ተቀማጦ ምውሻብ ከተግብር ኣይፈተነን ።
en-mt: he UK's response to the virus was initially very limited, and as of 18 March 2020, the UK government did not attempt to implement any initiatives such as social distancing or resident distancing.

sourceString: As a result, the government received criticism for the perceived lack of pace and intensity in its response to concerns faced by the public.On 16 March, Prime Minister Boris Johnson made an announcement advising against all non-essential travel and social contact, suggesting people work from home where possible and avoid venues such as pubs, restaurants, and theatres.
targetString: ከም ውጽኢቱ፡ እቲ መንግስቲ ነቲ ኣለዎ ተባሂሉ ዝተሓስበ ዋሕዲ ቅልጣፈን ሓይልን ናይቲ ግብረመልሲ ነቶም ንህዝቢ ዝገተምዎም ሻቕሎታት ነቐፌታ ተቐቢሉ።ኣብ 16 መጋቢት፡ ቀዳማይ ምኒስተር ቦሪስ ጆንሰን (Boris Johnson) ኣንጻር ኩሎም ዘይ-ኣድለይቲ መገሻታትን ማሕበራዊ ርክባትን ዝመክር ኣዋጅ ሂቡ፡ ሰባት ኣብ ዝክኣለሉ ኣጋጣሚ ካብ ገዛ ክሰርሑ ሓሳብ ሂቡ ከም ፓብ፡ ኣብያተ-ምግብን፡ ትያትራትን ዝኣመሰሉ ቦታታት ከኣ ከወግዱ መኺሩ።
en-mt: As a result, the government accepted criticism for the supposed lack of speed and power of the response to concerns it had been published to the public.On March 16, Prime Minister Boris Johnson issued a decree advising against all non-necessity travel and social contact, suggesting that people work from home whenever possible, and to avoid places such as pubs, restaurants and theatres.

sourceString: On 20 March, the government announced that all leisure establishments such as pubs and gyms were to close as soon as possible, and promised to pay up to 80% of workers' wages to a limit of £2,500 per month to prevent unemployment in the crisis.On 23 March, the Prime Minister announced tougher social distancing measures, banning gatherings of more than two people and restricting travel and outdoor activity to that deemed strictly necessary.
targetString: ኣብ መጋቢት 20 ፥ መንግስቲ ኩለን መዘናግዒ ማእከላት ከም ባራትን ጂምናዝየምን ዝኣመሰላ ብቅልጡፍ ክዕጸዋን፡ ን 80% ኣቢሉ ዝኸውን ክሳራ ደሞዝ ሰራሕተኛታት ድማ ክሳብ ናይ መወዳእታ ደረጃኡ $2500 ንወርሒ ንነፍሲወከፍ ሰራሕተኛ ክስልዕ ምዃኑን ኣፍሊጡ። ኣብ መጋቢት 23 ድማ ቀዳማይ ሚኒስተር እታ ሃገር ጽኑዕ ማሕበራዊ ሕጋጋት ፡ ከም እገዳ ኩሉ ህዝባዊ ኣኼባታት ካብ ክልተ ሰባት ንላዕሊ፡ ኣዝዩ ኣገዳሲ ተዘይኮይኑ ኩሉ ምንቅስቓሳት ጠጠው ክብልን ኣዊጁ።
en-mt: On March 20, the government announced that all leisure centers, such as bars and gymnasiums, would be closed immediately and that about 80% of workers' pay losses would be $2500 per month for each employee until its final stage, and on March 23, the country's prime minister announced that strict social laws, such as the ban on all public gatherings, would be suspended, if not too important, for more than two people.

sourceString: Unlike previous measures, these restrictions were enforceable by police through the issuing of fines and the dispersal of gatherings.
targetString: ዘይከም ዝሓለፉ ስጉምትታት፡ እዞም ሓጹራት ብ ሓይሊ ናይ ፖሊስ፡ መቅጻዕቲ ብምውሳንን ፡ ዝተኣከቡ ፋሕ ምባልን፡ ተተግቢሮም።
en-mt: As in the past, these measures have been implemented by the police force to determine and disperse.

sourceString: Most businesses were ordered to close, with exceptions for businesses deemed "essential", including supermarkets, pharmacies, banks, hardware shops, petrol stations, and garages.
targetString: ብዘይካ ‘’ኣገደስቲ’’ ንግዳዊ ትካላት ከም ሱፐር ማርኬት፡ ፋርማሲ፡ ባንክታት፡ መሸጢ ሃርድ ወየር፡ እንዳ ነዳዲን ጋራጃትን መብዛሕተአን ንግዳዊ ትካላት ክዓጸዋ ተኣዚዘን።
en-mt: In addition to 'important' businesses, such as supermarkets, pharmacies, banks, hard wires, oil and garages, most businesses have been ordered to close.

sourceString: On 20 January, the first known case of COVID-19 was confirmed in the Pacific Northwest state of Washington in a man who had returned from Wuhan on 15 January.
targetString: ኣብ 20 ጥሪ፡ እቲ ናይ መጀመርያ ዝተፈልጠ ግዳይ ናይ ኮቪድ-19 ኣብ ደቡባዊ-ምዕራብ ናይ ዋሺንግቶን ተረኺቡ፡ እዚ ሰብኣይ ካብ ከተማ ዉሃን ኣብ 15 ጥሪ ኢዩ ተመሊሱ።
en-mt: On January 20, the first known case of COVID-19 was found in the southwest of Washington, where the man returned from Wuhan on January 15.

sourceString: The White House Coronavirus Task Force was established on 29 January.
targetString: ናይ ጻዕዳ ህንጻ (White House) ናይ ኮሮና-ቫይርስ ሓይሊ ዕማም ኣብ 29 ጥሪ ተመስሪታ።
en-mt: he White House's Coronavirus Task Force was established on January 29.

sourceString: On 31 January, the Trump administration declared a public health emergency, and placed restrictions on entry for travellers from China.
targetString: ኣብ ጥሪ 31፡ መንግስቲ ትራምፕ ህዝባዊ ናይ ጥዕና ኢመርጀንሲ ኣዊጁ: ካብ ቻይና ንዝመጹ ገያሾ ድማ ኣጊድዎም።
en-mt: On January 31, the Trump government announced a public health emergency and banned travelers from China.

sourceString: On 28 January 2020, the Center for Disease Control—the leading public health institute of the U.S. government—announced they had developed their own testing kit.
targetString: ኣብ 28 ጥሪ 2020፡ ማእከል ናይ ሕማማት ምክልኻል-- መራሒ ናይ ህዝባዊ ጥዕና ኣብ መንግስቲ ኣሜሪካ-- ናይ ውልቆም መመርመሪ መሳርሒ ከም ዘማዕበሉ ገሊጹ።
en-mt: On January 28, 2020, the Center for Disease Control - the leader of public health in the U.S. government - said they had developed their own testing equipment.

sourceString: Despite doing so, the United States had a slow start in testing, which obscured the true extent of the outbreak at the time.
targetString: ዋላ’ኳ ከምኡ እንተተገብረ፡ ሕቡራት መንግስታት ኣመሪካ ኣብ መርመራ ቀሲ ኢላ እያ ጀሚራ፡ እዚ ከኣ ነቲ ሓቀና ዝርግሐ ናይቲ ለበዳ ኣብቲ ግዜ’ቲ ከምዝኽወል ገይርዎ።
en-mt: Despite this, the United States has begun testing, which has kept the true spread of the pandemic hidden at that time.

sourceString: Testing was marred by defective test kits produced by the federal government in February, a lack of federal government approval for non-government test kits (by academia, companies and hospitals) until the end of February, and restrictive criteria for people to qualify for a test until early March (a doctor's order was required thereafter).
targetString: መርመራታት ብሰንኪ እቲ ፈደራላዊ መንግስቲ ብዕሊ ዘፍርዮ ብልሽዉ መሳርሒታት፡ ን ብሕታዊንን ትካላት መመርመሪ ኣቕሑ (ብሆስፒታላትን ኩባንያታትን ላዕለዎት ትካላት ትምህርቲን ዝቐረበ) ክሳብ ወርሒ ለካቲት ብምኽልካሉን፡ ከምኡ'ዉን ክሳብ መጋቢት ኣብ ዘሎ እዋን ወልቃዊ መርመራ ምክልካሉን (ክትምርመር ተኾንካ ናይ ዶክተር ፍቓድ ክህልወልካ ኣለዎ)፡ መርመራታት ብግቡእ ኣይተሰላሰለን።
en-mt: Tests have not been properly considered due to the federal government's corrupt equipment produced by private and regulatory agencies (proposed by hospitals, companies and higher education institutions) until February, and the prohibition of personal testing by March (if you have to have a doctor's license to be tested).

sourceString: By 27 February, The Washington Post reported fewer than 4,000 tests had been conducted in the United States.
targetString: ኣብ 27 ለካቲት፡ ዋሺንግተን ፖስት ከም ዝሓበሮ፡ ኣብ ሕቡራት መንግስታት ኣሜርኪ ትሕቲ 4000 ልኹፋት ተመዝጊቦም።
en-mt: On February 27, less than 4,000 registered in the United States.

sourceString: By 13 March, The Atlantic reported that less than 14,000 tests had been conducted.
targetString: ክሳብ 13 መጋቢት ኣብ ዝነበረ ግዜ፡ The Atlantic ከምዝሓበሮ ትሕቲ 14,000 መርመራታት ተኻይዶም።
en-mt: As of March 13, fewer than 14,000 tests were carried out.

sourceString: On 22 March, the Associated Press reported: "Many people who have symptoms and a doctor's order have waited hours or days for a test."After the first death in the United States was reported in Washington state on 29 February, Governor Jay Inslee declared a state of emergency, an action that was soon followed by other states.
targetString: ኣብ 22 መጋቢት፡ እቲ Associated Press ከምዚ ዝስዕብ ሓቢሩ፥ “ብዙሓት ምልክታት ሕማምን ናይ ዶክተር ትእዛዝን ዘለዎም ሰባት ንመርመራ ሰዓታት ወይ መዓልታት ተጸብዮም።” ድሕሪ እቲ ቀዳማይ ሞት ኣብ ሕቡራት መንግስታት ኣመሪካ ኣብ ክፍለ ሃገር ዋሽንግተን ኣብ 29 ለካቲት ምሕባሩ፡ ኣመሓዳሪ ክፍለሃገር ጀይ ለንስለ (Jay Inslee) ህጹጽ ኣዋጅ ኣዊጁ፡ እቲ ስጉምቲ ከኣ ከይዶንጎየ ብካልኦት ክፍላተሃገር ተሳዒቡ።
en-mt: On March 22, the Associated Press reported: "Many people with symptoms and a doctor's prescription waited hours or days for testing." After the first death in washington, U.S.A., on February 29, Gov. Jay Inslee declared a state of emergency, and the move was followed by other states.

sourceString: Schools in the Seattle area cancelled classes on 3 March, and by mid-March, schools across the country were shutting down.On 6 March 2020, the United States was advised of projections for the impact of the new coronavirus on the country by a group of epidemiologists at Imperial College London.
targetString: ኣብ ሲያትል ዝርከባ ቤት-ትምህርትታት ኩሎም ክፍልታት ኣብ 3,መጋቢት ተቃሪጾም፡ ኣብ መፋርቅ ናይ መጋቢት ድማ ኣብ መላእ ሃገር ዘለዉ ቤት-ትምህርትታት ተቃሪጾም፡፡ ኣብ መጋቢት 6, 2020 ሕቡራት መንግስታት ኣሜሪካ: ብ ጉጅለ ክኢላታት ናይ ኢፒዶሞሎጂ (epidemiologists) ምውንጫፍ ብዝሒ ተለከፍቲ ናይ ኮሮና-ቫይረስ ከጋጥም ከም ዝኽእል ተመኺራ ኢያ።
en-mt: Schools in Seattle were all cut off on March 3, and schools across the country were cut off in mid-March, and on March 6, 2020, the United States was consulted by a team of epidemiologists that the number of coronavirus infections could occur.

sourceString: On the same day President Trump signed the Coronavirus Preparedness and Response Supplemental Appropriations Act, which provided $8.3 billion in emergency funding for federal agencies to respond to the outbreak.
targetString: ኣብ ተመሳሳሊ ዕለት ፕረሲደንት ትራምፕ ንኮሮና ቫይረስ ዝምልከት ን ንምድላውን ግብረመልስን ብጽሒት ቀረብን ዝምልከት ኣዋጅ ፈሪሙ።እዚ ኣዋጅ ን ህጹጽ እዋን ዝውዕል 8.3 ቢልየን ዶላር ገንዘባዊ ደገፍ ንናይ ፈደራል ተወከልቲ ነዚ ለብዒ ኣዋዲዱ።
en-mt: On the same day, President Trump signed a declaration on the preparation, the torture, and supply of the coronavirus, which allocated $8.3 billion in emergency financial support to federal representatives for the epidemic.

sourceString: Corporations imposed employee travel restrictions, cancelled conferences, and encouraged employees to work from home.
targetString: ኮርፐረሽናት ብወገነን ሰራሕተኛታተን ከይገሹ ብምእጋድን፡ ኩሉ ኣኼባታት ደው ብምባልን፡ ኣብ ገዝኦም ኮይኖም ክዓዩ የተባብዓ ኣለዋ።
en-mt: Companies are encouraged to work from home by banning their employees from travelling and stopping all meetings.

sourceString: Sports events and seasons were cancelled.On 11 March, Trump announced travel restrictions for most of Europe, excluding the United Kingdom, for 30 days, effective 13 March.
targetString: ስፖርታዊ ንጥፈታትን ዓመታዊ መደባትን ተሰሪዙ ኣሎ። ብ11 መጋቢት ትራምፕ ብዘይካ ካብ ዓባይ ብሪጣንያ ኩሉ በረራታት ንዉሽጢ ሃገር ደው ክብልን ካብ 13 መጋቢት ጀሚሩ ተግባራዊ ከም ዝኸዉንን ኣዊጁ ኣሎ።
en-mt: Sporting events and annual events have been cancelled, and on March 11, Trump announced that all flights except the UK would be suspended domestically and that they would take effect from March 13.

sourceString: The following day, he expanded the restrictions to include the United Kingdom and Ireland.
targetString: ኣብ ዝቐጸለ መዓልቲ፡ ን ዓባይ ብሪጣንያ ዉን ኣብቲ እገዳ ኣእትይዋ።
en-mt: The next day, the UK imposed the ban.

sourceString: On 13 March, he declared a national emergency, which made federal funds available to respond to the crisis.
targetString: ኣብ መጋቢት 13 ሃገራዊ ሓደጋ ኣዊጁ እዚ ድማ ናይ ፈደራል ገንዘብ ነቲ ዘሎ ቅልውላው ግብረመልሲ ክህብ ገይርዎ።
en-mt: On March 13, he declared a national emergency, which caused federal funding to respond to the crisis.

sourceString: Beginning on 15 March, many businesses closed or reduced hours throughout the U.S. to try to reduce the spread of the virus.
targetString: ካብ 15 መጋቢት ጀሚሩ፡ ብዙሓት ቢዝነሳት፡ ኣብ መላእ ኣሜሪካ፡ ንምስፍሕፋሕ ናይ ቫይረስ ንምግታእ፡ ናይ ስራሕ ሰዓታተን ኣሒጺረንኦ፡፡
en-mt: As of March 15, many businesses have shortened their working hours to curb the spread of the virus across the United States.

sourceString: By 17 March, the epidemic had been confirmed in all 50 states and in the District of Columbia.On 23 March, it was reported that New York City had 10,700 cases of the coronavirus, more than the total number of cases in South Korea.
targetString: ኣብ 17 መጋቢት፣ እቲ ለበዳ ኣብ 50 ክፍለ-ግዝኣታትን ምምሕዳር ኮሎምብያን ኣስፋሕፊሑ።ኣብ 23 መጋቢት፡ ከተማ ኒው-ዮርክ ከባቢ 10,700 ግዳያት ናይ ኮሮና-ቫይረስ ከም ከምዝተራእያ ተረጋጊጹ፡ እዚ ድማ ካብቲ ኣብ መላእ ደቡብ-ኮርያ ዝነበረ ብዝሒ ተለከፍቲ ዝዓቢ ኢዩ።
en-mt: On March 17, the epidemic spread in 50 states and the Colombian administration, and on March 23, New York City confirmed that about 10,700 cases of the coronavirus had been reported, greater than the number of cases across South Korea.

sourceString: On 25 March, the governor said that social distancing seemed to be working, as estimates of case doubling slowed from 2.0 days to 4.7 days.
targetString: ኣብ መጋቢት 25፡ እቲ ኣማሓዳሪ ማሕበራዊ ምርሕሓቅ ኣብ ግብሪ ዝወዓለ ይመስል ኢሉ ተዛሪቡ ፡ እዚ ድማ እቲ ጸብጻብ ናይ ግዳያት ዕጽፊ ዝነበረ ክጎድል ጀሚሩ ካብ 2.0 መዓልታት ናብ 4.7 መዓልታት።
en-mt: On March 25, the manager said social distancing appeared to have been implemented - a doubling of the victim report, from 2.0 days to 4.7 days.

sourceString: As of 28 March, there were 32,308 confirmed cases in New York City, and 672 people had died from the virus.On 26 March, the United States was reported to have more confirmed coronavirus infection cases than any other country in the world, including China and Italy.As of 8 April, 400,335 cases have been confirmed in the United States, and 12,841 people have died.
targetString: ክሳብ 28 መጋቢት ኣብ ዝነበረ ግዜ፡ 32,308 ዝተረጋገጹ ተርእዮታት ኣብ ከተማ ኒው ዮርክ ነይሮም፡ ከምኡ ድማ 672 በቲ ቫይረስ ሞይቶም።ኣብ 26 መጋቢት፡ ሕቡራት መንግስታት ኣመሪካ ልዕሊ ዝኾነት ሃገር ኣብ ዓለም፡ ንቻይናን ኢታልያን ዘጠቓለለ፡ ዝያዳ ዝተረጋገጹ ተርእይቶታት መልከፍቲ ኮሮናቫይረስ ነይርዋ።ክሳብ 8 ሚያዝያ ኣብ ዝነበረ ግዜ፣ 400, 335 ተርእዮታት ኣብ ሕቡራት መንግስታት ኣመሪካ ተረጋጊጾም፡ 12, 841 ከኣ ሞይቶም።
en-mt: As of March 28, there were 32,308 confirmed cases in New York City, as well as 672 deaths, and on March 26, the United States had more confirmed coronavirus infections than any other country in the world, including China and Italy.

sourceString: Per media reports on 30 March, U.S. President Trump has decided to extend social distancing guidelines until 30 April.
targetString: ብመሰረት ናይ መራከቢ ብዙሃን ጸብጻባት ኣብ መጋቢት 30፡ ፕረሲደንት ኣመሪካ ትራምፕ (Trump) ነቶም ናይ ማሕበራዊ ርሕቀት መምርሒታትክሳብ 30 ሚያዝያ ከናውሖም ወሲኑ።
en-mt: According to media reports, on March 30, US President Trump decided to extend the social distancing guidelines by April 30.

sourceString: On the same day, the USNS Comfort, a hospital ship with about 1000 beds, made anchor in New York.
targetString: ኣብታ መዓልቲ ድማ USNS COMFORT (ዓባይ ሕክምናዊት መርከብ ምስ 1000 ዝበጽሕ ዓራት ዘለዋ)፡ ኣብ ኒው-ዮርክ በጺሓ።
en-mt: Later that day, the USNS COMFORT (a large medical ship with a bed of about 1,000) arrived in New York.

sourceString: On 3 April, the U.S. had a record 884 deaths due to the coronavirus in a 24-hour period.
targetString: ሚያዝያ 3፡ ኣብ  ሕቡራት መንግስታት ኣመሪካ፡ ክብረወሰን ብዝሰበረ ቁጽሪ፡ 844 ሰባት ኣብ ዉሽጢ 24 ስዓታት ሞይቶም።
en-mt: On April 3, 844 people in the United States died in 24hrs.

sourceString: In the state of New York the cases have exceeded 100,000 people on 3 April.The White House has been criticized for downplaying the threat and controlling the messaging by directing health officials and scientists to coordinate public statements and publications related to the virus with the office of Vice-President Mike Pence.
targetString: ኣብ ኒው ዮርክ ስቴት ጥራይ ብዝሒ ሕሙማት ብ 3 ሚያዝያ ልዕሊ 100,000 በጺሑ። White House ግቡእ ሓበሬታ ብዘይምሃቡን ኣብቲ ጉዳይ ሸለልትነት ብምርኣዩን፡ ክኢላታት ሕክምናን ስነፍልጠኛታትን ድማ ሓበሬታኦም ብመገዲ ቤት ጽሕፈት ማይክ ፐንስ ክመሓላለፍ ምግባሩን፡ ኣደዳ ነቐፌታ ኮይኑ እዩ።
en-mt: In New York State alone, the number of patients reached more than 100,000 on April 3, when the White House was criticized for failing to provide adequate information and negligence in the case, and for medical and scientific experts transferring their information through Mike Pence's office.

sourceString: Overall approval of Trump's management of the crisis has been polarized along partisan lines.
targetString: ብሓፈሻኡ ኣተሓሕዛ እዚ ለበዳ ኣብ መንጎ ስልፍታት ዓብዪ ፍልልያት ከምዝፈጠረ ይፍለጥ።
en-mt: Overall, the pandemic has caused significant differences between the pandemic.

sourceString: Some U.S. officials and commentators criticized the U.S. reliance on importation of critical materials, including essential medical supplies, from China.
targetString: ገለ ላዕለዎት መራሕቲን ወሃብቲ ርእይቶን ሕቡራት መንግስታት ኣመሪካ፡ ኣመሪካ ኣገደስቲ ናይ ሕክምና ናውቲ ካብ ቻይና ምግዝኣን ኣብኣ ብምምርኳሳን ብትሪ ነቒፎም።
en-mt: Some senior leaders and donors in the United States have strongly criticized the u.s. for its rule of essential medical supplies from China and its reliance on it.

sourceString: An analysis of air travel patterns was used to map and predict patterns of spread and was published in The Journal of Travel Medicine in mid-January 2020.
targetString: ምርምር ናይ ኣየር ጉዕዞ ፓተርን፡ ነቲ ካርታን ናይ ለበዳ ምስፍሕፋሕ ፓተርንን ወይ መስርዕ ንምልላይ ተጠቂሞምሉ፡ እዚ ድማ ኣብ መፋርቅ -ጥሪ 2020፡ ናይ ጉዕዞ መድሃኒት ዝተባህለ ጆርናል ተሓቲሙ።
en-mt: Air Travel Path Research was used to identify the map and the spread of the pandemic, or queues, which were published in the journal Travel Medicine in mid-January 2020.

sourceString: Based on 2018 information from the International Air Transport Association, Bangkok, Hong Kong, Tokyo, and Taipei had the largest volume of travellers from Wuhan.
targetString: በመሰረት ናይ 2018 ጸብጻብ ኣህጉራዊ ማሕበር መጎዓዝያ ነፈርቲ ፡ ኣብ ዉሃን ዝበዝሐ ገያሾ ዘአንገዳ  ከተማታት፡ ባንኮክ፡ ሆንግ ኮንግ፡ ቶክዮ ከምኡ ውን ታይፐይ ምዃነን  ይገልጽ።
en-mt: According to a 2018 report by the International Airlines Association, the majority of passengers in Wuhan were Bangkok, Hong Kong, Tokyo and Taipei.

sourceString: Dubai, Sydney, and Melbourne were also reported as popular destinations for people travelling from Wuhan.
targetString: ዱባይ፡ ሲድኒ፡ ን መልበርን፡ ን ካብ ዉሃን ዝተበገሱ ሰባት ፍሉጣት መብጽሖታት ከም ዝነበራ ተሓቢረን።
en-mt: Dubai, Sydney and Melbourne have been reported to have made famous promises to people from Wuhan.

sourceString: Bali was reported as least able among the 20 most popular destination cities in terms of preparedness, while cities in Australia were considered most able.Australia released its Emergency Response Plan for Novel Coronavirus (COVID-19) on 7 February.
targetString: ባሊ፡ ካብተን ነቲ ሕማም ንምክልኻል ምድላዋተን ዘጻፈፋ ኣስታት 20 ከተማታት ክትከውን ከላ፡ ከተማታት ኣውስትራልያ ድማ ኸኣ ዝሃወ ናይ ምድላው ዓቕሚ ዘለወን እየን ተባሂለን። ኣውስትራልያ ነዚ ሓድሽ ለበዳ ኖቨል ኮሮናቫይረስ (ኮቪድ-19) ንምክልኻል፡ ኣብ ለካቲት 7 ጀሚራ ናይ ምክልኻል ዋትን ከምዝሓንጸጸት ይፍለጥ።
en-mt: Bali is one of about 20 cities that have written off their preparations for the disease, while Australian cities have been designated as having a better preparation for the new novel coronavirus (COVID-19) outbreak, which began on February 7.

sourceString: It stated that much was yet to be discovered about COVID-19, and that Australia would emphasize border control and communication in its response to the pandemic.
targetString: ከም ዝተገልጸ፡ ብዙሕ ብዛዕባ ኮቪድ-19 ክፍለጥ ኔርዎ ኣወስትራልያ ድማ ከም ግብረ መልሲ ናይ ለበዳ፡ ናይ ዶብ ምቁጽጻራትን ርክባትን ክትገብር ኔርዋ።
en-mt: He knew a lot about COVID-19 and Australia had to take border controls and contacts in response to the pandemic.

sourceString: On 21 March, a human biosecurity emergency was declared in Australia.
targetString: ኣብ 21 መጋቢት፡ ኣብ ኣወስትራልያ ናይ ደቂ-ሰባት ባዮሰኪሪቲ ኢመርጀንሲ ተኣዊጁ።
en-mt: On March 21, human bioscience was declared in Australia.

sourceString: Owing to the effective quarantine of public transport in Wuhan and Hubei, several countries have planned to evacuate their citizens and diplomatic staff from the area, primarily through chartered flights of the home nation, with Chinese authorities providing clearance.
targetString: ኩሉ ህዝባዊ መጎዓዝያታት ምዕጻዉ ተኸቲሉ፡ ካልኦት ሃገራት ካብ ሁበይን ውሃንን ዜጋታተንን ዲፕሎማሰኛታተንን ንምውጻእ ምስ መንግስቲ ቻይና ብምትሕብባር መደባተን ሓንጺጸን ኣለዋ።
en-mt: Following the closure of all public transport, other countries have developed their plans in cooperation with the Chinese government to evacuate their citizens and diplomats from Hubi and Water.

sourceString: Canada, the United States, Japan, India, Sri Lanka, Australia, France, Argentina, Germany, and Thailand were among the first to plan the evacuation of their citizens.
targetString: ካናዳ፡ ሕቡራት መንግስታት ኣሜሪካ፡ ጃፓን፡ ሂንዲ፡ ስሪ-ላንካ፡ ኣወስትራልያ፡ ፈረንሳ፡ ኣርጀንቲና፡ ጀርመንን ታይላንድን ካብተን ናይ መጀመርያ ህዝበን ናይ ምምላስ መደብ ዝገበራ ኢየን።
en-mt: Canada, the United States, Japan, Hindi, Sri Lanka, Australia, France, Argentina, Germany and Thailand are among the first to return.

sourceString: Pakistan has said that it will not be evacuating any citizens from China.
targetString: ፓኪስታን ዝኾኑ ዜጋታት ካብ ቻይና ክተውጽእ ከምዘይኮነት ሓቢራ።
en-mt: Pakistan has said it will not expel any citizens from China.

sourceString: On 7 February, Brazil evacuated 34 Brazilians or family members in addition to four Poles, a Chinese person, and an Indian citizen.
targetString: ኣብ 7 ለካቲት ብራዚል 34 ብራዚላውያንን ወይ ኣባላት ስድራቤቶምን ብተወሳኺ ኣርባዕተ ፖላንዳውያን ሓደ ቻይናውን ሓደ ህንዳውን ዝርከብዎም ኣውጺኣ።
en-mt: On 7 February, Brazil evacuated 34 Brazilians or their family members, in addition to four Poles, one Chinese and one Indian.

sourceString: The citizens of Poland, China, and India deplaned in Poland, where the Brazilian plane made a stopover before following its route to Brazil.
targetString: እታ ናይ ብራዚል ነፋሪት ኣብ ዝዓረፈትሉ ቅድሚ ናብ ብራዚል ጉዕዞ ምቕጻላ፡ ተቀማጦ ናይ ፖላንድ፡ ቻይና፡ ከምኡውን ሂንዲ ኣብ ፖላንድ ወሪዶም።
en-mt: he Brazilian plane landed in Poland, China and Hindi before continuing its journey to Brazil.

sourceString: Brazilian citizens who went to Wuhan were quarantined at a military base near Brasília.
targetString: ናበርቲ ናይ ብራዚል ፡ ካብ ዉሃን ዝተመልሱ ኣብ ወተሃደራዊ መዓስከር ጥቃ ብራዞልያ ዝርከብ ተወሸቦም።
en-mt: razil's Nartie returned from Wuhan at a military base near Brazzolia.

sourceString: On the same day, 215 Canadians (176 from the first plane, and 39 from a second plane chartered by the U.S. government) were evacuated from Wuhan to CFB Trenton to be quarantined for two weeks.
targetString: በታ መዓልቲ፡ 215 ካናዳውያን (175 ካብታ ቀዳመይቲ ነፋሪት፡ 39 ድማ ካብታ ብመንግስቲ ኣመሪካ ዝተኣዛዘት ነፋሪት) ካብ ዉሃን ናብ CFB ትረተን ን ክልተ ሰሙን ከም ዝዕቆቡ ተገይሩ።
en-mt: On that day, 215 Canadians (175 from the first plane and 39 from the US government-ordered flight) were quarantined from Wuhan to CFB Trent for two weeks.

sourceString: On 11 February, another plane of 185 Canadians from Wuhan landed at CFB Trenton.
targetString: ኣብ ለካቲት 11፡ 185 ካናዳውያን ዝጸዓነት ነፋሪት ካብ ውሃን ተበጊሳ ናብ CFB ትርንተን ዓሊባ።
en-mt: On February 11, a plane carrying 185 Canadians crashed from water to CFB, Trington.

sourceString: Australian authorities evacuated 277 citizens on 3 and 4 February to the Christmas Island Detention Centre, which had been repurposed as a quarantine facility, where they remained for 14 days.
targetString: ኣብ 3ን 4ን ለካቲት ሰበስልጣን ኣውስትራልያ 277 ዜጋታት ናብ’ቲ ከም መሳለጢ ናይ መወሸቢ ክኸውን ዝተመርጸ ደሴት ክሪስትማስ ዝብሃል መቐየዲ ማእከል ኣግዒዛ ን 14 መዓልትታት ኣብኡ ኣጽኒሓቶም።
en-mt: On February 3 and 4, Australian authorities moved 277 people to a convertion centre on Christmas Island, which was chosen as a shelter, where they remained for 14 days.

sourceString: A New Zealand evacuation flight arrived in Auckland on 5 February; its passengers (including some from Australia and the Pacific) were quarantined at a naval base in Whangaparoa, north of Auckland.
targetString: ኣብ 5 ለካቲት ናይ ኒው-ዚላንድ መምለሲት ነፋሪት ኣብ Auckland (ኣውኩላንድ) ዓሊባ፡ ተሳፈርታ ድማ (ካብ ኣወስትራልያን ፓቺፊክን ዝመጹ ሓዊስካ) ኣብ ናቫል-ባይዝ ኣብ Whangaparoa (ዋንጎፕራ)፣ ሰሜን Auckland (ኣውኩላንድ) ተወሺቦም።
en-mt: On February 5, a New Zealand return plane landed in Auckland (Auculand), and its passengers (fire from Australia and Pacific) were stranded at Naval-Bayze at Whangaparoa (Wangoprra), North Auckland (Auckland).

sourceString: On 15 February, the United States announced that it would evacuate Americans aboard the cruise ship Diamond Princess.
targetString: ኣብ ለካቲት 15፡ ሕቡራት መንግስታት ኣመሪካ፡ ኣብ መዛወሪት መርከብ Diamond Princess ዝነበሩ ዜጋታታ ክፋነዉ ኣዚዛ።
en-mt: On February 15, the United States ordered the dissecting of its citizens aboard the Diamond Princess cruise ship.

sourceString: On 21 February, a plane carrying 129 Canadian passengers who had been evacuated from Diamond Princess landed in Trenton, Ontario.
targetString: ኣብ ጥሪ 21 ካብ ዳያሞንድ ፕሪንሰስ ዝነቐለት 129 ገያሾ ዝሓዘት ነፋሪት ናይ ካናዳ ኣብ ተረንቶን ፡ ኦንታርዮ ዓሊባ።
en-mt: On January 21, a Canadian plane carrying 129 passengers took off from Daymond Princess, landing in Terenton, Ontario.

sourceString: In early March, the Indian government began evacuating its citizens from Iran.On 14 March a South African Airways aircraft chartered by the South African Government repatriated 112 South African citizens.
targetString: ኣብ መጀመርታ መጋቢት፡ መንግስቲ ህንዲ ንዜጋታቱ ካብ ኢራን ከውጽእ ጀሚሩ።ኣብ 14 መጋቢት ብመንግስቲ ደቡብ ኣፍሪቃ ቻርተር ዝተገብረት ናይ South African Airways ነፋሪት 112 ዜጋታት ደቡብ ኣፍሪቃ ኣውጺኣ።
en-mt: In early March, the Indian government began evacuating its citizens from Iran.On March 14, a South African Government-chartered South African Airways plane evacuated 112 South African nationals.

sourceString: Medical screening was performed prior to departure, and four South Africans who were showing signs of coronavirus were left behind to mitigate risk.
targetString: ቅድሚ ንቕሎ ሕክምናዊ መርምራ ተኻይዱ፡ ምልክታት ኮሮናቫይረስ ዘርእዩ ዝነበሩ ኣርባዕተ ደቡብ ኣፍሪቃውያን ስግኣተ-ሓደጋ ንምንካይ ከምዝተርፉ ተገይሮም።
en-mt: Four South Africans who showed symptoms of the coronavirus before a medical examination have been at risk.

sourceString: Only South Africans who tested negative were repatriated.
targetString: በቲ ቫይረስ ከም ዝተለኸፉ እተረጋገጸ ደቡብ-ኣፍሪቃውያን ጥራይ እዮም ንዓዶም ከም ዝምለሱ ተገይሩ።
en-mt: Only South Africans who have been confirmed to have been infected have returned home.

sourceString: Test results cleared all the South Africans, including the flight crew, pilots, hotel staff, police and soldiers involved in the humanitarian mission who, as a precautionary measure, all remained under observation and in quarantine for a 14-day period at The Ranch Resort.
targetString: ኣብ The Ranch Resort ዝነበሩ ኣባላት፡ ሰራሕተኛታት፡ ፓሊስን ወተሃደራትን፡ ሰራሕተኝታት ሆተልን ካብ ደቡብ ኣፍሪቃ ዝተበገሱ፡ ካብዚ ቫይረስ ነጻ ምዃኖም ተረጋጊጹ፡ እዞም ን14 መዓልቲ ተወሺቦም ዝጸንሑ ኣባላት ን ሰብኣዊ ሓገዝ እዮም ናብቲ ቦታ ተንቀሳቒሶም ነይሮም።
en-mt: Police officers, soldiers and hotel workers at The Ranch Resort were confirmed to have been free of the virus from South Africa, and members who had been stranded for 14 days were moved for humanitarian assistance.

sourceString: On 20 March, the United States began to partially withdrawal its troops from Iraq due to the pandemic.
targetString: ኣብ መጋቢት 20፡ ኣሜሪካ ብሰንኪ ለበዳ ኣብ ዒራቅ ዘለዉ ወተሃደራታ በብቁሩብ ክትስሕብ ጀሚራ።
en-mt: On March 20, the U.S. began withdrawing troops in Iraq due to the pandemic.

sourceString: On 5 February, the Chinese foreign ministry stated that 21 countries (including Belarus, Pakistan, Trinidad and Tobago, Egypt, and Iran) had sent aid to China.
targetString: ኣብ 5 ለካቲት፡ ሚኒስትሪ ወጺኢ ጉዳያት ቻይና ከም ዝሓበሮ፡ 21 ሃገራት (በላሩስ፡ ፓኪስታን፡ ትሪንዳድን ቶባጎን፡ ግብጺን ኢራንን ዘጠቃልለ) ናብ ቻይና ሓገዝ ሰዲደን።
en-mt: On February 5, China's foreign ministry said 21 countries (including Belarus, Pakistan, Trinidad and Tobago, Egypt and Iran) sent aid to China.

sourceString: Some Chinese students at American universities joined together to help send aid to virus-stricken parts of China, with a joint group in the greater Chicago area reportedly managing to send 50,000 N95 masks to hospitals in the Hubei province on 30 January.The humanitarian aid organization Direct Relief, in coordination with FedEx, sent 200,000 face masks along with other personal protective equipment, including gloves and gowns, by emergency airlift to the Wuhan Union Hospital by 30 January.
targetString: ገለ ገለ ኣብ ናይ ኣሜርካ ዩኒቨርሲታት ዘለዉ ቻይናውያን ተመሃሮ፡ ነቲ ብ ቫይረስ ኣዝዩ ተጠቂዑ ዘሎ ክፋል ናይ ቻይና ንምሕጋዝ ጉጅለታት ፈጢሮም፡ ኣብ ከባቢ ቺካጎ ዝርከቡ ጉጅለ ድማ 50,000 N95 ዝዓይነቱ ማስክ ነተን ኣብ ምምሕዳር ሁበይ ዝርከባ ሆስፒታላት ኣብ ጥሪ 30 ሰዲዶም።ናይ ግብረ-ሰናይ ማሕበራት ምስ FedEx ብምትሕብባር፡ 200,000 ናይ ገጽ ማስክታት፡ ናይ ውልቂ መከላኸሊ ናውቲ ን: ጋንቲን :ጋውንን ዘጠቃለለ፡ ብ 30 ጥሪ፡ ብ ኢመርጀንሲ በረራ ብቀጥታ ናብ ናይ ዉሃን ሕብረት ሆስፒታል፡ ሰዲዶም።
en-mt: Some Chinese students at American universities have created groups to help the most affected part of China, while a group in the Chicago area sent 50,000 N95 masks to hospitals in the Hubey administration on January 30.Charities have partnered with FedEx to provide 200,000 facial masks, personal protective materials and Gantin. On January 30, Gaun was sent directly to Wuhan Union Hospital by an emergency flight.

sourceString: On 5 February, Bill and Melinda Gates announced a $100 million donation to the WHO to fund vaccine research and treatment efforts along with protecting "at-risk populations in Africa and South Asia".
targetString: ኣብ 5 ለካቲት ቢልን መሊንዳ ገይትስን ንምወላ ናይ ክታበት መጽናዕትን ንክንክንን ዝውዕል ን ውድብ ጥዕና ዓለም (WHO) ‘’ነቶም ኣብ ሓደጋ ቦታ ኣብ ኣፍሪቃን ደቡብ ኤስያን’’ ዝውዕል100 ሚሊዮን ዶላር ከምዘበርከቱ ገሊጾም።
en-mt: On February 5, Bill and Melinda Gates announced that they would donate $100 million to the World Health Organization (WHO) for vaccine research and care "for those at risk in Africa and South Asia."

sourceString: Interaksyon reported that the Chinese government donated 200,000 masks to the Philippines on 6 February, after Senator Richard Gordon shipped 3.16 million masks to Wuhan.
targetString: ኢንተርስክይሰን (Interaksyon) ከምዝሓበሮ መንግስቲ ቻይና 200,000 ማስኬራታት ንፍሊፒንስ ኣብ ዕለት 6 ለካቲት ከምዝለገሰ ሓቢሩ፡ ድሕሪ ሰነተር ሪቻርድ ጎርዶን (Richard Gordon) 3.16 ሚልዮን ማስኬራታት ናብ Wuhan (ዉሃን) ምስዳዱ።
en-mt: Interaksyon said the Chinese government had donated 200,000 masks to the Filipinos on February 6, after Senator Richard Gordon sent 3.16 million masks to Wuhan (Wuhan).

sourceString: On 19 February, the Singapore Red Cross announced that it would send $2.26 million worth of aid to China.
targetString: ኣብ 19 ለካቲት፡ ናይ ሲንጋፖረ ቀይሕ መስቀል ከም ዝሓበሮ፡ ናይ 2.26 ሚልዮም ዝዓቀኑ ደገፍ ናብ ቻይና ከም እትሰድድ ኣፍሊጣ።
en-mt: On February 19, the Singapore Red Cross announced that it would send 2.26 million-strong support to China.

sourceString: Japan donated one million face masks to Wuhan, Turkey dispatched medical equipment, Russia sent more than 13 tonnes of medical supplies to Wuhan, Malaysia announced a donation of 18 million medical gloves to China, Germany delivered various medical supplies including 10,000 Hazmat suits, and the United States donated 17.8 tons of medical supplies to China and promised an additional $100 million in financial support to affected countries.After cases in China seemed to stabilize, the country has been sending aid to various nations hit by the pandemic.
targetString: ጃፓን ሓደ ሚልዮን ማስኬራታት ንWuhan ለጊሳ፡ ቱርኪ ሕክምናዊ መሳርሒ ሰዲዳ፡ ሩስያ ልዕሊ 13 ቶን ሕክምናዊ ቀረባት ናብ Wuhan ሰዲዳ፡ ማለይዝያ 18 ሚልዮን ሕክምናዊ ጓንትታት ንቻይና ለጊሳ፡ ጀርመን ዝተፈላለዩ ሕክምናዊ ቀረባት ሰዲዳ 10, 000 Hazmat ክዳውንቲ ዘጠቓለለ፡ ሕቡራት መንግስታት ኣመሪካ ከኣ 17.8 ቶን ሕክምናዊ ቀረባት ንቻይና ለጊሳ ተወሳኺ $100 ሚልዮን ገንዘባዊ ሓገዝ ንዝተተንከፋ ሃገራት ተመባጺዓ።ኣብ ቻይና ዝነበሩ ተርእዮታት ዝረጋግኡ ዘልዉ ድሕሪ ምምሳሎም፡ እታ ሃገር ናብ ዝተፈላለያ በቲ ለበዳ ዝተተንከፋ ሃገራት ሓገዝ ክትሰድድ ጸኒሓ።
en-mt: Japan donated one million masks to Wuhan, Turkey sent medical equipment, Russia sent more than 13 tons of medical supplies to Wuhan, Malayzia donated 18 million medical gloves to China, Germany exported various medical supplies, 10, The United States, which includes 17.000 Hazmat clothing, has donated 17.8 tons of medical supplies to China and pledged an additional $100 million in financial aid to affected countries after phenomena in China appeared to be stabilizing.

sourceString: In March, China, Cuba and Russia sent medical supplies and experts to help Italy deal with its coronavirus outbreak.
targetString: ኣብ መጋቢት፡ ቻይና፡ ኲባን ሩስያን ንኢጣልያ: ኣብ ናይ ኮሮናቫይረስ ለበድኣ ንምሓጋዝ ሕክምናዊ ቀረባትን ክኢላታትን ሰዲደን።
en-mt: In March, China, Cuba and Russia sent medical supplies and experts to help Italy in the coronavirus crisis.

sourceString: Businessman Jack Ma sent 1.1 million testing kits, 6 million face masks, and 60,000 protective suits to Addis Ababa, Ethiopia for distribution by the African Union.
targetString: ኣብ ቢዝነስ ዝተዋፈረ Jack Ma 1.1 ሚልዮን ናይ መመርመሪ መሳርሒ፡ 6 ሚልዮን ናይ ገጽ ማስክን 60,000 ናይ መከላኸሊ ኣልባሳትን ብ መንገዲ ሕብረት ኣፍሪቃ ኣቢሉ ንኽከፋፈል ናብ ኣዲስ ኣበባ ኢትዮጵያ ልኢኽዎ።
en-mt: Business-based Jack Ma sent 1.1 million testing equipment to Ethiopia's New Flower to distribute 6 million face masks and 60,000 protective clothing through the African Union Route.

sourceString: He later sent 5,000 testing kits, 100,000 face masks and 5 ventilators to Panama.
targetString: ጸኒሑ 5000 መመርመሪ መሳርሒን 100,000 ናይ ገጽ ማስክን ከምኡውን 5 ቨንትሌተራት ናብ ፓናማ ሰዲዱ።
en-mt: Later, he sent 5,000 detectors, 100,000 facial masks, and 5 ventrils to Panama.

sourceString: Ma also donated medical supplies to Canada.The Netherlands, Spain, Turkey, Georgia, and the Czech Republic expressed their concerns over Chinese-made masks and test kits.
targetString: ማ (Ma); ን ካናዳ’ውን ናይ ሕክምና መሳርሒ ኣወፍዩላ ኢዩ።ነዘርላንድስ፡ ስጵኛ፡ ቱርኪ፡ ጆርጅያ፡ ከምኡውን ቸክ-ሪፑብሊክ ነቲ ኣብ ቻይና ተሰሪሑ ዝተዋህበን ንብረት ኣመስጊነን።
en-mt: M (Ma) He also donated medical equipment to Canada, and the Netherlands, Spain, Turkey, Georgia, and the Czech Republic thanked the property that had been made in China.

sourceString: For instance, Spain withdrew 58,000 Chinese-made coronavirus testing kits with an accuracy rate of just 30%, meanwhile, the Netherlands recalled 600,000 Chinese face masks which were defective.
targetString: ንኣብነት፡ ስጳኛ 30% ጥራይ ብልክዕ ናይ ምምርማር ዓቕሚ ዘለዋ 58,000 ኣብ ቻይና እተሰርሐ መመርመሪ ኮሮና-ቫይረስ ኣቕሑ ካብ ዕዳጋ ስሒባ። እዚ ከምዚ ኢሉ ከሎ፡ ነዘርላንድ'ዉን 600,000 ኣብ ቻይና እንተመስርሐ ዘይብቑዕ ማስክ ካብ ዕዳጋ ኣልያ።
en-mt: For example, Spain has withdrawn 58,000 Chinese-made coronavirus testing products from the market, with a capacity of just 30% accurately, saying that the Netherlands has 600,000 masks from the market if it works in China.

sourceString: Belgium recalled 100,000 unusable masks, thought to be from China, but were in fact from Colombia.
targetString: በልጅም ኣብ ጥቕሚ ክውዕሉ ዘይክእሉ 100,000 ማስኬራታት ስሒባ፡ ንሳቶም ካብ ቻይና ከምዝመጹ ተሓሲቦም ነይሮም ኣብ ሓቂ ግን ካብ ኮሎምብያ ዝመጹ እዮን ነይሮም።
en-mt: Belgium attracted 100,000 masks that could not be used, but in reality, Ion from Colombia.

sourceString: On the other hand, Chinese aid has been well-received in parts of Latin America and Africa.On 2 April, the World Bank launched emergency support operations for developing countries.
targetString: ብካልእ መንገዲ ድማ፡ ናይ ቻይና ሓገዛት ኣብ ክፋላት ናይ ላቲን ኣሜሪካን ኣፍሪቓን ብዙሕ ተቀባልነት ረኺቡ ኢዩ።ኣብ 2 ሚያዝያ፡ ዓለማዊ ባንክ፡ ነተን ኣብ ምምዕባል ዘለዋ ሃገራት ቅልጡፍ ገንዘባዊ ሓገዝ ኣዚዙን ኣተግቢሩን።
en-mt: On April 2, the World Bank ordered and implemented rapid financial aid to developing countries.

sourceString: The WHO has commended the efforts of Chinese authorities in managing and containing the epidemic.
targetString: ውድብ ጥዕና ዓለም (WHO) ንሰበ ስልጣን ቻይና ኣብ ቁጽጽርን ኣተሓሕዛን እዚ ኣህጉራዊ ለበዳ ዝገበርዎ ስራሕ ኒኢዱ።
en-mt: he World Health Organization (WHO) has condemned Chinese authorities for their work in controlling and handling the international pandemic.

sourceString: The WHO noted the contrast between the 2002–2004 SARS outbreak, where Chinese authorities were accused of secrecy that impeded prevention and containment efforts, and the current crisis where the central government "has provided regular updates to avoid panic ahead of Lunar New Year holidays".
targetString: ውድብ ጥዕና ዓለም (WHO) ነቲ ኣብ መንጎ ናይ 2002-2004 ናይ SARS ዝተፈጥረ ምስፍሕፋሕ፡ ቻይናውያን ከም ምስጢር ብምሓዞም ዝሕመዩሉን፡ ምስዚ ማእከላይ መንግስቲ ‘’ስሩዕ ዝኾነ ሓበሬታ መታን ህዝቢ ድሕሪ ናይ ወርሒ ሓዳስ ዓመት ዘሎ ዕረፍቲ፡ ከይሽበር’’ ዘዳልወሉ ዘሎ ህሉው ቅልውላዋት ኣነጻጺሩ መዝጊብዎ ኣሎ።
en-mt: The World Health Organization (WHO) has compared the current crises between the 2002-2004 SARS, in which the Chinese were sick of keeping it a secret and preparing the central government for 'regular information so that the public will not be shocked by the new year's holiday.'

sourceString: On 23 January, in reaction to the central authorities' decision to implement a transportation ban in Wuhan, WHO representative Gauden Galea remarked that while it was "certainly not a recommendation the WHO has made", it was also "a very important indication of the commitment to contain the epidemic in the place where it is most concentrated" and called it "unprecedented in public health history".On 30 January, following confirmation of human-to-human transmission outside China and the increase in the number of cases in other countries, the WHO declared the outbreak a Public Health Emergency of International Concern (PHEIC), the sixth PHEIC since the measure was first invoked during the 2009 swine flu pandemic.
targetString: ኣብ 23 ጥሪ፡ ከም ግብረ-መልሲ ናይቲ ብ ማእከላይ በዓል መዚ ዝተዋህበ፡ ናይ መጎዓዝያ ምቁራጽ ዝጠልብ ውሳኔ፡ ወኪል ውድብ ጥዕና ዓለም (WHO) ጓደን ጋለኢ ወላ’ካ ‘’ውድብ ጥዕና ዓለም (WHO) ነቲ ዝተገብረ ኣይደግፎ’’ እቲ ውሳነ ግን ‘’ኣዝዩ ኣገዳሲ ምልክት ናይ ተገዳስነት ንምቁጽጻር ናይዚ ለበዳ ኣብቲ ኣዝዩ ብዝሒ ተለከፍቲ ዘለዉዎ ቦታ’’ ክትብል ገሊጻ፡ ከምኡውን ‘’ ቅድሚኡ ዘይተራእየ ማሕበራዊ ናይ ጥዕና ታሪኽ’’ ክትብል ውን ወሲኻ።ኣብ ጥሪ 30፡ ካብ ቻይን ወጻኢ ድሕሪ ካብ ሰብ ናብ ሰብ ከም ዝተመሓላለፈ ምርግጋጽን ምውሳኽ ናይ ተለከፍቲ ኣብ ካል ኦት ሃገራትን፡ ውድብ ጥዕና ዓለም (WHO) ነዚ ምስፍሕፋሕ፡ ዓለም-ለኻዊ ጉዳይ ህዝባዊ ናይ ጥዕና ኢመርጀንሲ (PHEIC) ክብል ኣዊጁ፡ ሻዱሻይ PHEIC ድሕሪ እቲ ቀዳማይ ተበግሶ ኣብ 2009 ናይ ስዋይን ፍሉ ለበዳ።
en-mt: In response to a decision by the Central Authority on January 23, the Who's representative (WHO) Guaden Gallai's 'Who) does not support what has been done', but the decision described it as 'the most important sign of interest in controlling the outbreak in the most infectious places', and added: ''Unprecedented social health history'. he World Health Organization (WHO) declared the expansion of the World Health Emergency (PHEIC) the sixth PHEIC after the first outbreak of swine flu in 2009.

sourceString: WHO Director-General Tedros Adhanom said that the PHEIC was due to "the risk of global spread, especially to low- and middle-income countries without robust health systems.
targetString: ዋና ዳይረክተር ውድብ ጥዕና ዓለም (WHO) ቴድሮስ ኣድሓኖም፡ PHEIC " ንምክልኻል ዓለማዊ ዝርግሐን ብፍላይ ኣብ ትሑት ኣታዊን ማእከላይ ኣታዊን ዘለወን ሃገራት" ምኻኑ ገሊጹ።
en-mt: Who Director-General Tedros Adhanom Ghebreyesus pheic said PHEIC was "to protect the global spread, especially in low-income and middle-income countries."

sourceString: In response to the implementations of travel restrictions, Tedros stated that "there is no reason for measures that unnecessarily interfere with international travel and trade" and that the "WHO doesn't recommend limiting trade and movement."
targetString: ከም ግብረ-መልሲ ናይ ሓጹራት ሕጋጋት መገሻ፡ ቴድሮስ ከም ዝሓበሮ ‘’ዝኾነ ዘየድሊ ምትዕንቃፋትን ምዕጻውን ናይ ኣሁጉራዊ መገሻን ንግዲን፡ ብዘይ ምኽንያት ክህሉ ዘድሊ ኣኡኮነን’’ ከም ኡውን ‘’ውድብ ጥዕና ዓለም (WHO) ዝኾነ ምዕጻዋት ናይ ንግዲን ምንቅስቃስን ክግበር ኣየማኽርን’’ ኢሉ።
en-mt: In response to short travel laws, Tedros said that 'unnecessary disruptions and closures of international travel and trade are necessary without justification' and 'The World Health Organization (WHO) does not recommend any closure of trade and movement.'

sourceString: On 5 February, the WHO appealed to the global community for a $675 million contribution to fund strategic preparedness in low-income countries, citing the urgency to support those countries which "do not have the systems in place to detect people who have contracted the virus, even if it were to emerge".
targetString: ኣብ ለካቲት 5፡ WHO ንድኻታት ሃገራት ንስትራተጂካዊ ምድላው ዝኸውን $675 ሚልዮን ሓገዝ ካብ ማሕበረ ሰብ ዓለም ሓቲቱ። እዚ ሓገዝ ነተን" ቫይረስ እንተተራእየ ውን ኣብ ምምርማሩ ክሽገራ ይኽእላ 'የን" ዝበለን ሃገራት ዝውዕል ምኻኑ ጠቒሱ።
en-mt: On February 5, the WHO requested $675 million in aid from the international community for strategic preparation for poor countries, citing countries that could be "hard to diagnose" if the virus is detected.

sourceString: Tedros further made statements declaring that "we are only as strong as our weakest link" and urged the international community to "invest today or pay more later".On 11 February, the WHO in a press conference established COVID-19 as the name of the disease.
targetString: ቴድሮስ፡ ‘’ንሕና፡ ልክዕ ክንድቲ ብርታዐና ዝኸውን ድኻም ኣሎና’’ ክብል መደረ ሂቡ፡ ነቶም ዓለማዊ ማሕበረሰብ ድማ ‘’ወይ ሕጂ ምስራሕ ኢዩ፡ ወይ ድማ ጸኒሕካ ብብዝሒ ዋጋ ምኽፋል ኢዩ’’ ዝብል መጠንቀቕታ ውን ሂቡ።ኣብ 11 ለካቲት፡ ውድብ ጥዕና ዓለም (WHO)፡ ኣብ ጋዜጣዊ ኣኼባ፡ ኮቪድ-19 ዝብል ስያመ ናይቲ ሕማም ስም ከም ዝኸውን ኣጽዲቑ።
en-mt: Tedros gave a speech saying' We're tired just like our strengths' and warning the global community that 'it's either work now or it's going to cost you a lot later'. On February 11, the World Health Organization (WHO) approved the name of the disease at a COVID-19 press conference.

sourceString: On the same day, Tedros stated that UN Secretary-General António Guterres had agreed to provide the "power of the entire UN system in the response".
targetString: በታ መዓልቲ ቴድሮስ፡ " ኩሉ ሓይሊ  ሕቡራት ሃገራት (UN) ንምክልኻል እዚ ሕማም" ከወሃህድ ምዃኑ ዋና ጸሓፊ እቲ ውድብ  ኣንቶንዮ ጉቴረዝ ከም ዝገለጸሉ ሓቢሩ።
en-mt: On that day, UN Secretary-General Antonio Guterres said "all UN forces would be deployed to prevent the spread of the disease."

sourceString: A UN Crisis Management Team was activated as a result, allowing coordination of the entire United Nations response, which the WHO states will allow them to "focus on the health response while the other agencies can bring their expertise to bear on the wider social, economic and developmental implications of the outbreak".
targetString: ናይ ውድብ ሕቡራት ሃገራት UN Crisis Management Team ቆይማ ምትሕብባር ናይ ውድብ ሕቡራት ሃገራት መልሰ ተግባር ከተደልድል፡ ከምቲ ውድብ ጥዕና ዓለም (WHO) ዝበሎ "ኣብ ጉዳይ ጥዕና ኣተኲራ ክትሰርሕ፥ ካልኦት ኣካላት ድማ ክኢላተልታተን ብምውፋይ ኣብ ምፍታሕ ማሕበራዊ፥ ቁጠባዊን ልምዓታዊን ብድሆታት እዚ ተላባዒ ሕማም" ከተተኩር እያ።
en-mt: he UNITED NATIONS Crisis Management Team will continue to work on "health issues and other stakeholders will focus on solving the social, economic and practical challenges of this pandemic," the UN Crisis Management Team said.

sourceString: On 14 February, a WHO-led Joint Mission Team with China was activated to provide international and WHO experts on the ground in China to assist in the domestic management and evaluate "the severity and the transmissibility of the disease" by hosting workshops and meetings with key national-level institutions and to conduct field visits to assess the "impact of response activities at provincial and county levels, including urban and rural settings".On 25 February, the WHO declared that "the world should do more to prepare for a possible coronavirus pandemic," stating that while it was still too early to call it a pandemic, countries should nonetheless be "in a phase of preparedness".
targetString: ኣብ ለካቲት 14፡ ውድብ ጥዕና ዓለም (WHO)-ዝመርሖ ሓባራዊ ሚሽን ምስ ቻይና ተጀሚሩ፡ እዚ ድማ ዓለማዊ ኮይኑ ፡ ክኢላታት ውድብ ጥዕና ዓለም (WHO) ምስ ቻይና ኣብ ዘቤታዊ ምሕደራ ከምኡ’ውን ነቲ’’ጉድኣትን ምትሕልላፋትን ናይዚ ሕማም’’ ኣብ ምምርማርን ምፍታሽን ክተሓጋገዙ ዝተወደበ ኢዩ፡ ብተወሳኺ ነዚ ሚሽን ንምትግባር፡ ዎርክሾባትን ምዝርራባትን ምስቶም ቀንዲ ሃገራዊ-ደረጃ ዘለዎም ክፍሊ-ትምህርትታት ከምኡውን ነቲ ‘’ጽልዋ ናይ ግብረ-መልሲ ንጥፈታት ኣብ ዞባታትን ኣውራጃታትን ፡ ን ከተማን ገጠርን ዘጠቃለሉ’’ ምብጻሓት ምግባርን ምግምጋምን የተግብር።ኣብ 25 ለካቲት፡ ውድብ ጥዕና ዓለም (WHO) ‘’ ዓለም ን ቀጺሉ ዝመጽእ ለበዳ ንምድላው ንጥፈታታ ክትውስኸሎም ከም ዘለዋ ሓቢሩ’’ ፡ ወላካ ለበዳ ክንብሎ እዋኑ እንተዘይኮነ ‘’ሃገራት ግን ብዘየገድስ’’ሓባራዊ ምድላው ክገብራ’’ ውን ኣጠንቂቁ።
en-mt: On February 14, a joint mission led by the World Health Organization (WHO) began with China, a global one, organized by WHO experts to work with China on domestic governance and to help investigate and investigate the 'damage and transmission of the disease'. For the implementation of workshops and discussions, it implements and evaluates visits with the main national-level departments, as well as the 'impact of response activities in regions and provinces and cities and rural areas.' He also warned that the world should increase its activities to prepare for the next pandemic, 'although it is not the time to call it an epidemic, 'but 'countries should make joint preparations regardless'.

sourceString: In response to a developing outbreak in Iran, the WHO sent a Joint Mission Team there to assess the situation.On 28 February, WHO officials said that the coronavirus threat assessment at the global level would be raised from "high" to "very high", its highest level of alert and risk assessment.
targetString: ውድብ ጥዕና ዓለም (WHO) ከም ግብረመልሲ ናይ’ቲ ኣብ ኢራን እናወሰኸ ዝመጸ ለበዳ፡ ነቲ ኩነታት ንምግምጋም ሐደ ሓባራዊ ጉጅለ ልኡኽ ናብ’ታ ሃገር ሰዲዱ።ኣብ ለካቲት 28: ሰብ መዚ ውድብ ጥዕና ዓለም (WHO) ከምዝበሎ ፡ ናይ ኮሮና-ቫይረስ ናይ መጠንቀቅታ ገምጋማ ብ ዓለማዊ ደረጃ ካብ ‘’ዝልዓለ’’ ናብ ‘’ኣዝዩ ዝልዓለ’’ ደረጃ ክድይብ ከምዝኽእል ገሊጾም።
en-mt: In response to the growing outbreak in Iran, the World Health Organization (WHO) sent a joint delegation to the country to assess the situation, and in February 28, the World Health Organization (WHO) said its coronavirus warning assessment could rise from 'high' to 'extremely high' globally.

sourceString: Mike Ryan, executive director of the WHO's health emergencies program, warned in a statement that "This is a reality check for every government on the planet: Wake up.
targetString: ማይክ ሪያን፡ ፈጻሚ ጉዳያት ናይ ውድብ ጥዕና ዓለም (WHO) ኢመርጀንሲ መደባት፡ ‘’ ን ነፍሲ ወከፍ መንፍስቲ ናይዚ ዓለም ናይ ሓቅነት መምዘኒ ኣለዎ’፡ ንበራበር ክብል መጠንቀቕታ ሂቡ።
en-mt: Mike Ryan, executive affairs executive of the WHO's Emerging Programmes, has warned that "every spiritual being in the world has a real criteria for authenticity."

sourceString: This virus may be on its way and you need to be ready," urging that the right response measures could help the world avoid "the worst of it".
targetString: ቫይረስ ኣብ መንገዲ ክህሉ ይኽእል ኢዩ፡ ንስኻ ድማ ክትዳሎ ኣሎካ ‘’ ነቲ ቁኑዕ ግብረ-መልሲ ምምካር ን ዓለምና ‘’ካብ ዝኸፈአ ደረጃ’’ ክከላከለላ ይኽእል’’።
en-mt: A virus can be on the road and you have to be prepared '' advice for the right response can protect the world from 'the worst'.

sourceString: Ryan further stated that the current data did not warrant public health officials to declare a global pandemic, saying that such a declaration would mean "we're essentially accepting that every human on the planet will be exposed to that virus."
targetString: ርያን፡ ብተወሳኺ ከም ዝሓበሮ፡ እዚ ዘሎ ህሉው ሓበሬታ ነቶም ናይ ጥዕና ኣማሓደርቲ ናይ ለበዳ ኣውጅ ክነግሩ ኣየታኣማማመኖምን፡ እዚ ምስ ዝእወጅ ፡ ኩሉ ዓሌት ናይ ወዲ ሰብ ኣብ ዓለም ዘሎ ነዚ ቫይረስ ዝተቃለዐ’’ ከም ሙኻኑ ስለ ዘስምዕ ኢዩ።
en-mt: Rhian also said that the current information does not convince health officials to announce a pandemic, because when it is announced, all races of the human race in the world are exposed to the virus.

sourceString: On 11 March, the WHO declared the coronavirus outbreak a pandemic.
targetString: ኣብ መጋቢት 11፡ ውድብ ጥዕና ዓለም ኮሮና-ቫይረስ ለበዳ ሙኻኑ ኣዊጁ።
en-mt: On March 11, the World Health Organization declared the coronavirus pandemic.

sourceString: The Director-General said that the WHO was "deeply concerned both by the alarming levels of spread and severity, and by the alarming levels of inaction".The WHO has faced significant criticism for what is seen as inadequate handling of the pandemic, including the late declaration of a public health emergency and the classification of the virus as a pandemic.
targetString: እቲ ሓፈሻዊ ዳይረክተር WHO (ዓለማዊ ውድብ ጥዕና) “በቲ ዘሻቅል መጠን ለበዳን ክብደቱን ከምኡ ድማ በቲ ዘተሓሳስብ መጠን ተግባር-ኣልቦነት ብኽልቲኦም ኣዝዩ ስክፍታ ከምዘለዎ” ሓቢሩ።እቲ WHO (ዓለማዊ ውድብ ጥዕና) ዘይእኹል ኣተሓሕዛ ናይቲ ለበዳ ኣርእዩ ብዝብል ከቢድ ነቐፌታ ወሪድዎ፡ ንሳቶም ደንግዩ ህዝባዊ ህጹጽ እዋን ብምእዋጁን ነቲ ቫይረስ ደንጉዩ ከም ዓለማዊ ለበዳ ምእዋጁን የጠቓልል።
en-mt: he director general of the WHO (World Health Organization) said he was "deeply concerned by both of them for the alarming rate of the pandemic and its severity and the alarming rate of unemployment," which has been heavily criticized by the WHO for demonstrating the ineffable treatment of the pandemic, which includes declaring a public emergency and declaring the virus a slow global pandemic.

sourceString: The backlash included a petition for the WHO Director-General Tedros Adhanom to tender his resignation, signed by 733,000 people as of 6 April.
targetString: ሓደ ካብቲ ሳዕቤናት ዳይረክተር ውድብ ጥዕና ዓለም (WHO) ክወርድ ዝጠልብ ናይ 733,000 ሰባት ፌርማ ዘለዎ ስምዕታ ኣብ ሚያዝያ 6 ምቕራቡ እዩ።
en-mt: One of the consequences is that the Director-Of-The-World Health Organization (WHO) submitted a signature of 733,000 people on April 6.

sourceString: On 26 March 2020, dozens of UN human rights experts emphasized respecting the rights of every individual during the COVID-19 pandemic.
targetString: ኣብ 26 መጋቢት 2020፡ ብርክት ዝበሉ ናይ ሕቡራት ሃገራት (UN) ክኢላታት ሰብኣዊ መሰላት ኣብ ግዜ ለበዳ ኮቪድ-19 ክኽበር ጻውዒት ኣቕሪቦም።
en-mt: On 26 March 2020, the United Nations (UN) human rights experts called for respect during the COVID-19 pandemic.

sourceString: The expert group stated that everyone is entitled to life-saving interventions and the government holds this responsibility.
targetString: እቲ ጉጅለ ክኢላታት፡ ኩሉሰብ ናይ ህይወት ኣድሕን መሰል ከም ዘለዎ ብምጥቃስ፡ መንግስቲ ድማ ነዚ ሓላፍነት ዝስከም ምዃኑ ሓቢሩ።
en-mt: The panel of experts pointed out that everyone has the right to lifesaving, and that the government is responsible for that.

sourceString: The group stressed that the lack of resources or health insurance should never serve as a justification for discrimination against a specific group.
targetString: እቲ ጉጅለ ጸቒጡ ከምዝተዛረበሉ ዋሕዲ ናይ ምንጭታት/ጸጋታት ጥዕና ወይ መድሕን ከም ምኽኒት ናይ ኣድልዎ ኣንጻር ሓደ ውሱን ጉጅለ ከገለግል የብሉን።
en-mt: according to the group, a lack of health sources/health insurance should not be used as a reason for discrimination against a specific group.

sourceString: The experts underscored that every individual has the right to health, including people with disabilities, belonging to minority groups, older people, internally displaced people, the homeless, those living in extremely poor conditions, people in detention, as well as refugees and other unspecified groups in need of government support.
targetString: እቶም ክኢላታት ከም ዘስመሩሉ፡ ኩሉ ዓይነት ሰብ ናይ ጥዕና መሰል ኣለዎ፡ እዚ ድማ ነዞም ዓይነታት ሰባት የጠቃልል፡ ጎዶሎ ኣካል ዘለዎም፡ ናይ ማይኖሪቲ ጉጅለ ኣባላት ዝኾኑ፡ ዓበይቲ ሰባት፡ ገዛ ዘይብሎም፡ ኣብ ኣዝዩ ድካ ከባቢ ዝነብሩ፡ ኣብ ቤት-ማእሰርቲ ዘለዉ፡ ከምኡ’ውን ስደተኛታትን ካልኦት ናይ መንግስቲ ሓገዝ ዝደልዩን፡ ክኾኑ ይኽእሉ።
en-mt: According to experts, everyone has the right to health, which includes these types of people, including adults who are members of a majority group who are homeless, living in very poor environments, in prison, and refugees and others who need government assistance.

sourceString: International governmental organizations are addressing the economic and social impacts of the COVID-19 crisis.
targetString: ዓለም-ለኻዊ መንግስታዊ ማሕበራት፡ቅልውላው ኮቪድ-19 ኣብ ኢኮኖሚን ማሕበራዊን ዘምጽኦ ጽልዋ ይግምግማ ኣለዋ።
en-mt: International government organizations are assessing the impact of the COVID-19 crisis on the economy and socially.

sourceString: The Organisation for Economic Co-operation and Development has launched a platform to provide timely and comprehensive information on policy responses in countries around the world, as well as viewpoints and advice.
targetString: ውድብ ምትሕግጋዝ ንቁጠባን ምዕባለን (Organization for Economic Co-operation and Development) ሃገራት ዓለም እዋናዊ ሓበሬታን፡ ፓሊሲን ኣተሓሕዛ እዚ ሕማምን ዝርክበሉ ባይታ ከምዝፈጠረ ሓቢሩ።
en-mt: he Organization for Economic Co-operation and Development (Organization for Economic Co-operation and Development) says countries around the world have created an environment for up-to-date information and policies on dealing with the disease.

sourceString: From policies to strengthen health systems and the world economy to addressing the effects of lockdown and restrictions on travel, the digital hub includes a Country Policy Tracker, and aims to help countries learn from each other and to facilitate a co-ordinated global response to the coronavirus challenge.
targetString: ዲጂታላዊ ማእከል፡ ንመድለዪ(Tracker) ሃገራዊ ፖሊሲ ዘካተተ ኮይኑ፡ ካብ ፖሊሲ ምጥንኻር ጥዕናውን ቁጠባውን ስርዓታትን ዓለምን ክሳብ ምርኣይ ሳዕቤን ምዕጻውን ምድራት መገሻታትን የጠቓልል።ዕላሙኡ ድማ ሃገራት ካብ ንሓድሕደን ክምሃራን ምስላጥ ውሁድ ዓለማዊ ግብረመልሲ ነዚ በዳሂ ሕማም ኮሮና ቫይረስ።
en-mt: The Digital Center for Search (Tracker) includes national policy, from strengthening policy, health and economic systems and the world to the sight of the consequences of closure and the land of travel, with the intent of countries to learn from one another, a combination of global response to this challenging coronavirus disease.

sourceString: The Chinese government has been criticized by the United States, UK Minister for the Cabinet Office Michael Gove, and Brazil President Jair Bolsonaro's son Eduardo Bolsonaro for its handling of the pandemic, which began in the Chinese province of Hubei.
targetString: መንግስቲ ቻይና ብሰንኪ ኣታሓሕዛ ናይ’ዚ ኣብ ዞባ ሁበይ ናይ ቻይና ዝጀመረ ዓለማዊ ለበዳ ካብ ሕቡራት መንግስታት ኣመሪካ፡ ጸሓፊ ካቢነ ዓባይ ብሪጣንያ ማይክል ጎቭን ኤድዋርዶ ቦልሶናሮ ወዱ ንፕረሲደንት ብራዚል ጃየር ቦልሶናሮ ይውቀስ ኣሎ።
en-mt: he Chinese government is blaming Brazilian President Jair Bolsonaro for the handling of the pandemic that began in The Hubey region of China.

sourceString: A number of provincial-level administrators of the Communist Party of China (CPC) were dismissed over their handling of the quarantine efforts in Central China, a sign of discontent with the political establishment's response to the outbreak in those regions.
targetString: ብዙሓት ኣብ ኣውራጃዊ-ጽፍሒ ዘለዉ ኣመሓደርቲ ናይቲ Communist Party of China (CP, ዴሳዊ ሰልፊ ቻይናC) ነቶም ናይ ውሸባ ጻዕርታት ኣብ ማእከላይ ቻይና ብዘርኣይዎ ኣተሓሕዛ ተባሪሮም፡ እዚ ከኣ ምልክት ናይ ዘይዕግበት ኣብ ናይቲ ፖለቲካዊ ውድብ ግብረመልሲ ነቲ ለበዳ ኣብዞም ዞቦታት እዚኦም እዩ።
en-mt: Many of the governors of the Communist Party of China (CP, Communist Party of ChinaC) have been fired for their handling of the quarantine efforts in central China, a sign of dissatisfaction in the political organization's response to the pandemic in these regions.

sourceString: Some commentators believe that this move was intended to protect Chinese Communist Party general secretary Xi Jinping from the public's anger over the coronavirus outbreak.
targetString: ገለ ገለ ተንተንቲ ፡ እዚ ን መራሒ ናይ ቻይና ኮሚኒስታዊ ፓርቲ ዚን ፒንግ ኣብ ጉዳይ ኣተሓሕዛ እዚ ለበዳ ኮሮናቫይረስ ንዝወርዶ ዘሎ ነቐፌታ ንምህዳእ ዝተገብረ ምዃኑ ይገልጹ።
en-mt: Some analysts say the move was aimed at calming criticism of Chinese Communist Party leader Zien Ping on the coronavirus pandemic.

sourceString: Some Chinese officials, e.g. Zhao Lijian rejected an earlier acknowledgement of the coronavirus outbreak starting in Wuhan, in favour of conspiracy theories about the COVID-19 originating from the U.S. or Italy.
targetString: ገለ ከም ዛሆ ሊጂያን ዛኣመሰሉ ሰበስልጣን ቻይና ኮሮና ቫይረስ ካብ ዉሃን ከም ዝተበገሰ ኣቐዲሙ ዝተዋህበ መረዳእታ ብምንጻግ፡ COVID-19 ብ ውዲት ሕቡራት መንግስታት ኣመሪካ ወይ ጣልያን ዝመጸ ሙኻኑ ይገልጹ።
en-mt: Some Chinese authorities, such as Zaho Lijian Zaha, denied previous evidence that the coronavirus originated from Wuhan, saying COVID-19 was caused by a U.S. or Italian conspiracy.

sourceString: The U.S. administration of Donald Trump has referred to the coronavirus as "Chinese virus" or "Wuhan virus" saying that China's "censorship supercharged a virus that has now turned into a global pandemic", which has in turn been criticized by some critics as racism and "distract[ing] from his administration's failure to contain the disease".
targetString: ምምሕዳር ዶናልድ ትራምፕ ናይ ሕቡራት መንግስታት ኣሜሪካ ኮሮና ቫይረስ ናይ “ቻይና ቫይረስ” ወይ “ዉሃን ቫይረስ” ከም ዝኾነ ብምግላጽ ናይ ቻይና ልዕሊ ‘’መጠን ሳንሱር ናይ’ቲ ቫይረስ ናብ ዓለማዊ ለብዒ ከምዝለወጦ’’ ገሊጹ።እዚ ጉዳይ ብገለ ነቐፍቲ ምስ ዓሌትነት ብምትሕሓዝ እቲ ምምሕዳር ‘’ኣብ ኣታሓሕዛ እቲ ሕማም ዝነበሮ ጉድለት ንምጥምዛዝ ሙኻኑ ገሊጾም’’።
en-mt: Donald Trump's administration said the U.S. coronavirus was the "China virus" or "Wuhan virus" and that China's 'excessive amount of censorship' had turned it into a global pandemic, a case that some critics have said has been linked to racism that the administration has 'exaggerated its deficiencies in the way it handled the disease.'

sourceString: The Daily Beast obtained a U.S. government cable outlining a communications stratagem with apparent origins in the National Security Council, with the strategy being quoted as "Everything is about China.
targetString: እቲ Daily Beast ዝረኸቦ ናይ መንግስቲ ኣመሪካ ምስጢራዊ ሓበሬታ መበቆሉ ካብቲ National Security Council (ሃገራዊ ቤት-ምኽሪ ጸጥታ) ምዃኑ ርኡይ ዝኾነ፡ “ኩሉ ብዛዕባ ቻይና” ዝብል ስትራተጂ እዩ።
en-mt: he U.S. government's "Everything About China" strategy, which identifies classified information from the National Security Council, comes from the National Security Council.

sourceString: We're being told to try and get this messaging out in any way possible, including press conferences and television appearances."Outlets such as Politico, Foreign Policy, and Bloomberg have claimed that China's efforts to send aid to virus-stricken countries is part of a propaganda push for global influence.
targetString: ነዚ መልእኽቲ፡ ብዝተኻእለና መጠን፡ ብዝኾነ መገዲ፡ከምኡ'ውን ብጋዜጣዊ ዋዕላን ተለቪዥንን ከነብጽሖ እዩ ተነጊሩና። " መጽሄታት Politico, Foreign Policy, and Bloomberg ቻይና ን ብኮሮና ቫይረስ ዝተጠቕዓ ሃገራት ትገብሮ ዘላ ሓገዝ ዓለማዊ ጽልውኣ ንምዕዛዝ ትገብሮ ዘላ ፕሮፖጋንዳ እዩ ክብላ ይጠቕሳ"።
en-mt: We were told to deliver this message as much as possible, as well as by newspaper conferences and television: "Politico, Foreign Policy, and Bloomberg magazines cite China's assistance to countries affected by the coronavirus as propaganda to influence its global influence."

sourceString: EU foreign policy chief Josep Borrell warned that there is "a geo-political component including a struggle for influence through spinning and the 'politics of generosity'".
targetString: ናይ ኤውሮጳዊ ሕብረት (EU) ናይ ወጻኢ ጉዳያት ሓላፊ፡ ጆሰፍ ቦረል፡ ‘’ጅኦ-ፖለቲካዊ ክፋል፡ ን ጽልዋ ናይ ምንባር ዝቆመ ናይ ‘ፖለቲካ ልግሲ’’ከምዘሎ ኣጠንቂቁ።
en-mt: EU foreign affairs chief Joseph Borrell has warned of a "geopolitical component" and "political generosity" that will stop the influence of living.

sourceString: Borrell also said that "China is aggressively pushing the message that, unlike the US, it is a responsible and reliable partner."
targetString: "ዘይከም ሕቡራት ምንግስታት ኣመሪካ፡ ቻይና ሓላፍነታዊትን ተተኣማምንን መሻርኽቲ እያ ዝብል ሓበሬታ ቻይና ጸቒጣ ትሰርሓሉ ኣላ" ከብል ቦረል ጠቒሱ።
en-mt: "Unlike the United States, China is pressing for information that China is a responsible and reliable partner," Borrell said.

sourceString: China has also called for the US to lift its sanctions off of Syria, Venezuela and Iran, while reportedly sending aid to the latter two countries.
targetString: ቻይና ከም ተወሳኺ ነቲ እገዳ ናይ ሶርያ፡ ቨንዚዌል፡ ኢራንንን፡ ኣሜሪካ ከተልዕሎ ጸዊዓ፡ ናብዘን ዳሕረዎት ክልተ ሃገራት ሓገዛትን ደገፋትን እናሰደደት።
en-mt: China has also called on the United States to lift the sanctions, including Syria's Venziwal iran and iran, sending aid and support to the last two countries.

sourceString: Jack Ma's donation of 100,000 masks to Cuba was blocked by US sanctions on 3 April.
targetString: ናይ ጃክ ማ (Jack Ma's) 100,000 ናይ ማስክታት ወፈያ፡ በቲ ናይ ኣሜሪካ እገዳ ናይ 3, ሚያዝያ ተቃሪጹ።
en-mt: Jack Ma's donation of 100,000 masks was cut off by the US ban on April 3.

sourceString: US authorities have also been accused of diverting aid meant for other nations to their own country.
targetString: ሰበ-ስልጣን ሕቡራት መንግስታት ኣመሪካ፡ ንካልኦት ሃገራት ዝግባእ ረድኤት ናብ ሃገሮም ከም ዘበልዎ'ዉን ይኽሰሱ እዮም።
en-mt: U.S. officials are accused of providing aid to other countries.

sourceString: And there have been mask-related disputes reported between other countries, such as Germany, Austria and Switzerland; and the Czech Republic and Italy.
targetString: ኣብ መንጎ ካልእ ሃገራት ምስ ማስኬራ ዝተኣሳሰሩ ክርክራት ነይሮም፡ ኣብ ከም ጀርመን፡ ኦስትርያን ስዊዘርላንድን ዝኣመሰላ ሃገራት፣ ከምኡ ድማ ቸክ ሪፓብሊክን ኢጣልያን።
en-mt: Masks have been linked to other countries in countries such as Germany, Austria and Switzerland, as well as the Czech Republic and Italy.

sourceString: In addition, Turkey seized hundreds of ventilators destined for Spain.
targetString: ከም ተወሳኺ፡ ቱርኪ ን ስጵኛ ዝተሓስበ ኣማኢት ቨንትሌተራት ወሪሳቶ/መንዚዓቶ።
en-mt: urkey has also inherited hundreds of vents to Spain.

sourceString: In early March, the Italian government criticized the European Union's lack of solidarity with coronavirus-affected Italy.
targetString: ኣብ መጀመርያ መጋቢት፡ መንግስቲ ጥልያን ኣብ ግዜ መልከፍቲ ብ ኮሮና-ቫይረስ ኣብ ጥልያን ፡ ሕብረት ኤውሮጳ ሓድነት ከምዘይገበረ ትነቅፍ።
en-mt: In early March, the Italian government criticized the EU's lack of unity in Italy during the coronavirus outbreak.

sourceString: Maurizio Massari, Italy's ambassador to the EU, said that "Only China responded bilaterally.
targetString: ኣምሳደር ኢጣልያ ንኤዉሮጳዊ ሕብረት፡ ማዉሪዝዮ ማዛሪ፡ "ቻይና ጥራይ ሓጊዛትና" ክብል ገሊጹ።
en-mt: Italy's ambassador to the European Union, Maurizio Mazzarri, said: "Only China has helped us."

sourceString: Certainly, this is not a good sign of European solidarity."
targetString: ብርግጽ: እዚ ምስ ኤውሮጳ ዘሎ ጥምረት ጹቡቕ ከምዘየሎ ምልክት እዩ’’።
en-mt: Of course, the situation in Europe is not good.

sourceString: On 22 March, after a phone call with Italian Prime Minister Giuseppe Conte, Russian president Vladimir Putin arranged the Russian army to send military medics, special disinfection vehicles, and other medical equipment to Italy.
targetString: ኣብ መጋቢት 22፡ ድሕሪ ናይ ተለፎን ዝርርብ ምስ ናይ ኢጣልያ ቀዳማይ ሚኒስተር ጂሰፐ ኮንተ፡ ፕረሲደንት ሩስያ ቭላድሚር ፑቲን፡ ናይ ሚሊታሪ ሕክምናዊ መሳርሒ፡ተንቀሳቀስቲ መምከኒ መሳርሒታትን ካልእ ናይ ሕክምና መሳርሒን፡ ናብ ኢጣልያ ንምስዳድ ንወተሃደራት ሩስያ ኣዳልይዎም።
en-mt: On March 22, after a telephone conversation with Italian Prime Minister Giseppe Conte, Russian President Vladimir Putin arranged for Russian troops to send military medical equipment, portable equipment, equipment and other medical equipment to Italy.

sourceString: Italy's La Stampa newspaper cited an anonymous "high-level political source" that 80 percent of Russia's aid was "useless or of little use to Italy".
targetString: ናይ ኢጣልያ ጋዜጣ La Stampa ስሙ ዘይተጠቕሰ “ልዑል ደረጃ ዘለዎ ፖለቲካዊ ምንጪ” ብምጥቃስ 80 ካብ ሚእቲ ናይ ሩስያ ሓገዝ “ጥቕሚ ኣልቦ ወይ ንኢጣልያ ውሑድ ሓገዝ ዘለዎ እዩ” ከምዝበለ ሓቢራ።
en-mt: The Italian newspaper La Stampa quoted an unnamed "high-level political source" and reported that 80 percent of Russian aid was "useless or with little help for Italy."

sourceString: The source accused Russia of embarking on a "geopolitical and diplomatic" charm offensive.
targetString: እቲ ምንጪ "ሩስያ ኣብ ጂኦ-ፖለቲካዊን ዲፕሎማስያዊን" ጸወታ  ከምዝኣተወት እዩ ዝኸስስ።
en-mt: The source accused "Russia of being involved in a geopolitical and diplomatic" game.

sourceString: The President of Lombardy, Attilio Fontana, and Italian Foreign Minister Luigi Di Maio dismissed the media reports and expressed their gratitude.
targetString: እቲ ፕረሲደንት ናይ Lombardy, Attilio Fontana, ምኒስተር ወጻኢ ጒዳያት ኢጣልያ ልዊጂ ዲ ማዮ (Luigi Di Maio) ነቶም ናይ መራኸቢ ብዙሃን ጸብጻባት ኣወጊዶምም ምስጋንኦም ከኣ ገሊጾም።
en-mt: The president of Lombardy, Attilio Fontana, Italian Foreign Affairs Minister Luigi Di Maio, dismissed the media reports and expressed gratitude.

sourceString: Russia also sent a cargo plane with medical aid to the United States.
targetString: ሩስያ'ዉን ናይ ሕክምና መሳርሒታት ዝጸዓነት ናይ ጽዕነት ነፋሪት ንኣመሪካ ከም ዝለኣኸት ይፍለጥ።
en-mt: Russia has sent a cargo plane carrying medical equipment to the US.

sourceString: Kremlin spokesman Dmitry Peskov said that "when offering assistance to US colleagues, [Putin] assumes that when US manufacturers of medical equipment and materials gain momentum, they will also be able to reciprocate if necessary."
targetString: ኣፈኛ ክረምሊን ደሚትሪ ፔስኮቭ ከምዚ ይብል "ንኣመሪካዉያን ኣሕዋትና ክንሕግዝ ከለና፡ ኣብ መጻኢ፡ ማለት ናብ ንቡር ብቕዓትን ፍርያት ምስ ተመልሳ፡ ትካላት መፍረ ናዉቲ ሕክምና ኣመሪካ ከም ዝሕግዛና ስለ ንኣምን እዩ።"
en-mt: Kremlin spokesman Dmitry Peskov said: "When we help our American brothers, we believe that american medical supplies will help us in the future, when they return to normal qualifications and products."

sourceString: The planned NATO "Defender 2020" military exercise in Germany, Poland, and the Baltic states, the largest NATO war exercise since the end of the Cold War, will be held on a reduced scale.
targetString: ብ "Defender 2020" ዝፍለጥ ኣብ ጀርመን፡ ፖላንድን ሃገራት ባልቲክን ክካየድ ተመዲቡ ዝነበረ፡ ብኔቶ ዝተወደበ ድሕሪ ዝሑል ኲናት ካብ ዝየኻየዱ ልምምዳት ዝዓበየ ምዃኑ እተገልጸ ወተሃደራዊ ልምምድ፡ ብትሑት ተሳትፎ ክካየድ ምዃኑ ተገሊጹ።
en-mt: Known as "Defender 2020," a NATO-organized military exercise scheduled for Germany, Poland and the Baltics was described as one of the largest post-Cold War exercises.

sourceString: The Campaign for Nuclear Disarmament's general secretary Kate Hudson criticized the Defender 2020 exercise: "In the current public-health crisis, it jeopardizes the lives not only of the troops from the US and the many European countries participating but the inhabitants of the countries in which they are operating."The Iranian government has been heavily affected by the virus, with around two dozen parliament members infected as well as fifteen other current or former political figures.
targetString: ዋና ጸሓፊት ናይ ወፍሪ ንክለራዊ ብረት-ምፍታሕ ከይት ሁድሰን፡ ነቲ ምክልኻል ናይ 2020 ንጥፈታት ፡ ‘’ ኣብዚ ህሉው ማሕበራዊ ናይ ጥዕና ሽግራት ዘለዎ ኩነታት፡ ነቶም ተሳተፍቲ ናይ ኣሜሪካ ወተሃደራትን ካልኦት ናይ ኤውሮጳ ሃገራትን ጥራይ ዘይኮነ፡ ነቶም ነበርቲ ናይተን ክሰርሑለን ኢሎም ዝኸዱ ዘለዉ ሃገራት’ውን ኣብ ሓደጋ ናይ ሂወቶም ጥዕና የእቲዮሞም’’ ብምባል ነቒፋቶ።‘’ መንግስቲ ናይ ኢራን ድሮ በዚ ቫይረስ ብከቢድ ተጎዲኡ ኢዩ፡ ምስ ዳርጋ ክልተ ደርዘን ምልካፋት ናይ ኣባላት ባይቶን፡ ዓሰርተ ሓሙሽተ ካልኦት ናይ ቅድምን ሕጂን ፖለቲካውያንን ፡።
en-mt: Hudson, secretary-general of the campaign for the release of the 2020 campaign, criticized the prevention of the 2020 activities 'in the current social health problems that put the participants not only American soldiers and other European countries at risk of their lives, but also the residents of countries where they are going to work.'

sourceString: Iran's President Hassan Rouhani wrote a public letter to world leaders asking for help on 14 March 2020, saying that his country is struggling to fight the outbreak due to lack of access to international markets as a result of the United States sanctions against Iran.The outbreak has prompted calls for the United States to adopt social policies common in other wealthy countries, including universal health care, universal child care, paid family leave, and higher levels of funding for public health.
targetString: ብ መጋቢት 14,2020 ፕረዚደንት ኢራን ሓሰን ሮሃኒ፡ ንማሕረስብ ዓለም ብወግዒ ደብዳበ ጽሒፉ፡ ብሰንኪ እቲ ኣመሪካ ኣብ ልዕሊ ሃገሩ ኣጽኒዓቶ ዘላ እገዳ ንምክልኻል እቲ ሕማም ተጸጊሞም ከም ዘለዉን ሓቢሩ። ብተወሳኺ ሕቡራት መንግስትታት ኣመሪካ ከምቲ ካልኦት ሃብታማት ሃገራት ዝገብርኦ ናይ ማሕበራዊ ድሕነት ፖሊሲታት ከም ድሕነት ቆልዑ፡ ህዝባዊ ኣገልግሎት ጥዕናን፡ ዝኽፈሎ ዕረፍቲን ከምኡ'ዉን ተወሳኺ  ባጀት ህዝባዊ ኣገልግሎት ጥዕና ክዉስኽን ርእይቶ ቀሪቡ።
en-mt: On March 14, 2020, Iranian President Hassan Rouhani formally wrote to the world's assembly, telling them that they had been hampered by the U.S. sanctions on his country, and that the United States, like other wealthy nations, had proposed social welfare policies, such as child safety, public health services and paid leave, as well as additional public health services budgets.

sourceString: Political analysts anticipated it may negatively affect Donald Trump's chances of re-election in the 2020 presidential election.Diplomatic relations between Japan and South Korea worsened due to the pandemic.
targetString: ትራምፕ ኣብ ፕረዚደንታዊ ምርጫ 2020 ዳግማይ ንክዕወት ከምዘይሕግዞ ትጽቢት ተንተንቲ ፓለቲካ እዩ። ዲፕሎማስያዊ ዝምድና ጃፓንን ደቡብ ኮርያን ብሰንክ'ዚ ለበዳ ከም ዝሻሕከረ'ዉን ይፍለጥ።
en-mt: Analysts expect Trump not to win the 2020 presidential election again, and the diplomatic relations between Japan and South Korea have been plagued by the pandemic.

sourceString: South Korea criticized Japan's "ambiguous and passive quarantine efforts" after Japan announced anybody coming from South Korea will be placed in two weeks' quarantine at government-designated sites.
targetString: ደቡብ ኮርያ ነቲ ናይ ጃፓን ‘’ዘይፍሉጥን ዘይንጡፍ ናይ ውሸባ ጻዕሪ።ነቂፋቶ፡ ድሕሪ እቲ ጃፓን ነቶም ካብ ደቡብ ኮርያ ዝመጻ ናይ ክልተ ሰሙን ግዴታዊ ውሽባ ክግበር ከም ዘለዎ ምንጋራ።
en-mt: South Korea criticized Japan's 'unknown' and inactive quarantine efforts after Japan told those from South Korea that it would have to impose two weeks of mandatory quarantine.

sourceString: The South Korean society was initially polarized on President Moon Jae-in's response to the crisis.
targetString: ሕብረተሰብ ደቡብ ኮርያ መጀመርታ ብናይ ፕረሲደንት Moon Jae-in ግብረ-መልሲ ነቲ ቅልውላው ተኸፋፊሉ ነይሩ።
en-mt: South Korean society was initially divided in response to President Moon Jae-in.

sourceString: Many Koreans signed petitions either calling for the impeachment of Moon over what they claimed to be government mishandling of the outbreak, or praising his response.The pandemic has allowed countries to pass emergency legislation in response.
targetString: ብዙሓት ኮርያውያን ን ፕረሲደንት ሙን መንግስቱ ብምኽንያት ጉጉይ ኣተሓሕዛ ናይ’ዚ ለብዒ ካብ ስልጣኑ ክወርድ ዝጠልብ ወይ ን ግብረ መልሱ ዘሞግስ ወረቓቕቲ ፈሪሞም።ከም ግብረ መልሲ ናይ’ዚ ዓለማዊ ለብዒ ብዙሃት ሃገራት ናይ ህጹጽ እዋን ድንጋገ ከእውጃ ገይርወን።
en-mt: Many Koreans have signed papers calling on President Moon to resign because of his government's mishandle in the pandemic or praise his response, in response to the global pandemic, with many countries declaring a state of emergency.

sourceString: Some commentators have expressed concerns that it could allow governments to strengthen their grip on power.
targetString: ገለ ገለ ጋዜጠኛታት፡ እዚ: መንግስታት ነቲ ስልጣኖም መሐየሊ ክጥቀሙሉ ከም ዝኽእሉ፡ ሓቢሮም።
en-mt: Some journalists have suggested that governments can use their power.

sourceString: In Hungary, its parliament voted to allow the prime minister, Viktor Orbán, to rule by decree indefinitely, suspend parliament as well as elections and punish those deemed to have spread false information about the virus and the government's handling of the crisis.
targetString: ባይቶ ሃንጋሪ ቀዳማይ ሚኒስተር ኣታ ሃገር Victor Orban ብኣዋጅ ንዘይተወሰነ ግዜ ከመሓድርን ባይቶን ምርጫን ከደስክልን ፡ ብዛዕባ እቲ ቫይረስን ኣታሕዛ መንግስቲን ናይ ሓሶት ሓበሬታ ንዝዝርግሑ ክቐጽዕን ኣድሚጹ።
en-mt: Hungary's parliament has voted to impose indefinite elections and punish those who spread false information about the virus and the government.

sourceString: The coronavirus outbreak has been blamed for several instances of supply shortages, stemming from globally increased usage of equipment to fight the outbreaks, panic buying, and disruption to factory and logistic operations.
targetString: እዚ ናይ ኮሮና-ቫይረስ ለበዳ ንብዙሕ ናይ ቀረባት ሕጽረት ኣቃሊዑ ኢዩ፡ እዚ ድማ ካብቲ ዓለማዊ ልዕለ ተጠቃምነት ናይ ንብረታት ን ለበዳ ንምቅላስ ፡ ፍርሒ ዘንቀዶ ምዕዳግ፡ ከምኡውን ዘይስሩዕ ኣካይዳ ናይ ትካላትን ሎጂስቲካዊ ስረሓትን ፡ ዝነቀለ ወይ ዝተበገሰ ኢዩ።
en-mt: he coronavirus pandemic has exposed many shortages of supplies, stemming from the global super-use of assets, fears of buying, and irregular practices of organizations and logistical operations.

sourceString: The United States Food and Drug Administration has issued warnings about shortages of drugs and medical equipment due to increased consumer demand and supplier disruption.
targetString: እቲ United States Food and Drug Administration (ምምሕዳር ምግብን መድሃኒትን ናይ ሕቡራት መንግስታት ኣመሪካ) ብዛዕባ ሕጽረታት ናይ መድሃኒታን ሕክምናዊ መሳርሒታትን ብሰንኪ ዝወሰኸ ናይ ኣህላኺ ጠለብን ምቊራጽ ቀረብን መጠንቀቕታታት ኣውጺኡ።
en-mt: The United States Food and Drug Administration (Food and Drug Administration of the United States) issued warnings about shortages of medicines and medical equipment due to increased demand and supply cuts.

sourceString: Several localities also witnessed panic buying that led to shelves being cleared of grocery essentials such as food, toilet paper, and bottled water, inducing supply shortages.
targetString: ኣብ ብዙሓት ከባቢታት ፍርሒ ከም ዝተኣታተወን ብሰንኩ ድማ ኣስፔዛታት ከም መግቢ፡ ናይ ሽቓቕ ወረቐት፡ ዕሹግ ማይን ብብዝሒ ከም ዝተዓደገን፡ ሕጽረት ከም ዘጋጠመን ተገሊጹ።
en-mt: In many areas, fears have been introduced, resulting in large purchases of asparaguses such as food, toilet paper and water, and shortages.

sourceString: The technology industry in particular has been warning about delays to shipments of electronic goods.
targetString: ኢንዱስትሪ ተክኖሎጂ ብፍላይ  ኣብ ጽዕነት ኣቕሑት  ምድንጓያት ከጋጥም ምዃኑ ክሕብር ቀንዩ እዩ።
en-mt: He said the technology industry is facing delays, especially in the cargo industry.

sourceString: According to WHO director-general Tedros Adhanom, the demand for personal protection equipment has risen 100-fold.
targetString: ብመሰረት ሓበሬታ ናይ ውድብ ጥዕና ዓለም ሓላፊ ኣቶ. ቴድሮስ ኣድሓኖም፡ ጠለባት ናይ ሕክምና መሳርሒታት ብ 100 ዕጽፊ ከምዝወሰኸ ተፈሊጡ።
en-mt: According to the World Health Organization's chief of staff. It has been reported that the number of medical devices has increased by 100 times.

sourceString: This demand has led to the increase in prices of up to twenty times the normal price and also induced delays on the supply of medical items for four to six months.
targetString: ምውሳኽ ጠለባት ናብ ምውሳኽ ዋጋታት ክሳብ ዕስራ ዕጽፊ ናይቲ ንቡር ዋጋታት ክኸውን ኣኽኢሉ፡ ከምኡ’ውን ኣብቲ ቀረባት ናይ ሕክምና መሳርሒታት ካብ ኣርባዕተ ክሳብ ሽዱሽተ ወርሒ ምድንጋያት ከምዝህሉ ጌሩ።
en-mt: Increased demands to increase prices allowed prices up to twenty times normal, and resulted in four to six months of delays in medical equipment in the supplies.

sourceString: It has also caused a shortage of personal protective equipment worldwide, with the WHO warning that this will endanger health workers.
targetString: እዚ ኩነት ብዓለም ደረጃ ሕጽረት ውልቃዊ መከላኸሊ ኣቕሑ ብምፍጣሩ ውድብ ጥዕና ዓለም (WHO) ሰራሕተኛታት ንሓደጋ ናይ ጥዕና ከምዝተቓልዑ የጠንቅቕ።
en-mt: he World Health Organization (WHO) has warned that workers are at risk of health problems as a global shortage of personal protective goods.

sourceString: In Australia, the pandemic provided a new opportunity for daigou shoppers to sell Australian products into China.
targetString: እዚ ለበዳ ኣብ ኣውስትራልያ ንዝርከቡ ሸቃጦ ዳያጉ ፍርያት ኣውስትራልያ ንቻይና ክመጹ ዕድል ከፊትሎም።
en-mt: the pandemic has opened the door for Australian consumers to come to China.

sourceString: The activity has created a shortage of baby formula in some supermarkets and was subsequently banned by the Australian government.Despite the high prevalence of COVID-19 cases in Northern Italy and the Wuhan region, and the ensuing high demand for food products, both areas have been spared from acute food shortages.
targetString: እዚ ንጥፈት ኣብ ገለ ሱፐር ማርኬታት ሕጽረት ናይ ቆልዑ ክሬም ከም ዘስዓበን መንግስቲ ኣውስትራልያ ድማ ብኡ ንብኡ ከም ዝኸልከሎን ይፍለጥ።ብዝሒ መልከፍቲ ኮቪድ-19 ኣብ ዉሃንን ሰሜን ኢጣልያን፡ ንጠለብ መግብታት ብዝተዓጻጸፈኳ እንተኣንሃሮ፡ ዝኾነ ሕጽረት ግና ኣየጋጠመን።
en-mt: his activity has led to a shortage of children's cream in some supermarkets and the Australian government has immediately blocked the number of COVID-19 cases in Wuhan and northern Italy, but no shortage has been experienced.

sourceString: Measures by China and Italy against the hoarding and illicit trade of critical products have been successful, avoiding acute food shortages that were anticipated in Europe as well as in North America.
targetString: ብ ቻይናን ጥልያንን ዝተወስዱ ስጉምትታት፡ ኣንጻር እቶም ፡ኣገደስቲ ንብረታት ወይ መግብታት ብዘይ ግቡእ ክዕቅቡን፡ ክሸጡን ዝፈተኑ፡ ዕዉት ኔሩ።ኣብ ኤውሮጳን ሰሜን ኣሜሪካን ከጋጥም ዝተሓስበ ከቢድ ናይ መግቢ ሕጽረት ውን ከየጋጥም ዝተወስደ ስጉምቲ ሓጋዚ ኔሩ።
en-mt: Measures taken by China and Italy were successful against attempts to improperly store and sell important goods or foods, and measures to avoid severe food shortages in Europe and North America were helpful.

sourceString: Northern Italy with its significant agricultural production has not seen a large reduction, but prices may increase according to industry representatives.
targetString: ሰሜን ኢጣልያ ምስ ዘለዋ ዓበይቲ ሕርሻታት ፡ ኣብ ፍርያት ዝመጸ ምጉዳል የለን፡ እንትኾነ ዋጋታት ግና ክውስኽ ከምዝኽእል ወከልቲ ኢንዱስቱሪታት ይሕብሩ።
en-mt: There are no reductions in yields with large farms in northern Italy, but prices are likely to rise, industry representatives say.

sourceString: Empty food shelves were only encountered temporarily, even in Wuhan city, while Chinese government officials released pork reserves to assure sufficient nourishment of the population.
targetString: ናይ መግቢ መኻዚኖ ጥርሑ ክኸውን ኣብ ውሑድ ግዚያት ጥራይ ኣጋጢሙ፡ ወላውን ኣብ ከተማ ዉሃን፡ መንግስቲ ቻይና ውን ዝተዓቀበ ስጋ ሓሰማ: ጠለባት ንከማልእ ናብ ህዝቢ ቀሪቡ ኢዩ።
en-mt: It has only been a few years since the food supply was empty, and in Wuhan, the Chinese government has also approached the public to meet the demands for preserved pork.

sourceString: Similar laws exist in Italy requiring food producers to keep reserves for such emergencies.
targetString: ኣፍረይቲ ምግቢ ንከምዚኦም ዝኣመሰሉ ህጹጽ እዋናት መግቢ ክኽዝኑ ዝጠልቡ ተመሳሰልቲ ሕግታት ኣብ ኢጣልያ ኣለዉ።
en-mt: In Italy, there are similar laws that require food producers to store food for such emergencies.

sourceString: Damage to the global economy has been felt in China: according to a media report on 16 March, the economy in China was very hard hit in the first two months of 2020 due to the measures taken by the government to curtail virus spread, and retail sales plunged 20.5%.
targetString: ቁጠባዊ ወቕዒ ንቻይና ኣረኻኺቡላ እዩ፡ ብመሰረት ጸብጻባት ሚድያ ኣብ መጋቢት 16፥ ነቲ ለበዳ ንምክልኻል ብዝተወስደ ናይ ምዕጻው ስጉምቲ ኣብ ቀዳሞት ኣዋርሕ 2020 ቁጠባ ቻይና ኣዝዩ ተሃስዩ እዩ፡ ከም መርኣያ ናይዚ ድማ መሸጣ ሃለኽቲ ብ 20.5% ጎዲሉ።
en-mt: An economic hit has infected China, according to media reports, on March 16; the Chinese economy has been hit hardest in the first months of 2020 by a shutdown measure to prevent the outbreak, and as a sample of this, wholesale sales fell by 20.5%.

sourceString: As mainland China is a major economy and manufacturing hub, the viral outbreak has been seen to pose a major destabilizing threat to the global economy.
targetString: ቀንዲ ሃገረ ቻይና ዓባይ ማእከል ቁጠባን ምስናዕን ስለዝኾነት፡ እቲ ለበዳ ቫይረስ ኣብቲ ዓለማዊ ቁጠባ ከም ዓቢ ዘይምርግጋእ ዝፈጥር ስግኣት ክርአ ጸኒሑ።
en-mt: China is the main economic and economic center, and the pandemic has been seen as a major threat to the global economy.

sourceString: Agathe Demarais of the Economist Intelligence Unit has forecast that markets will remain volatile until a clearer image emerges on potential outcomes.
targetString: ኣጋተ ዳማሪስ ናይ ኢኮኖሚ ኢንተሊጀንስ ዩኒት/ክፍሊ ፡ ክሳብ ሓደ ንጹር ስእሊ ዝፍጠር ዕዳጋታት ዓለምና: ክሳብ ፍሉጥ ዝኾነ ነገር ዝፍጠር፡ ኣዝዩ ክቀያየር ሙኻኑ ገሚታ።
en-mt: He said that the world's markets will change dramatically until a clear picture is created.

sourceString: In January 2020, some analysts estimated that the economic fallout of the epidemic on global growth could surpass that of the 2002–2004 SARS outbreak.
targetString: ኣብ ጥሪ 2020 ገለል ተንተንቲ፡ ቁጠባዊ ሃስያ እዚ ለበዳ፡ ካብቲ ብ SARS 2002-2004 ዝወረደ ክሳራታት ንላዕሊ ክዛይድ ከምዝኽእል ኣሚቶም።
en-mt: In January 2020, neutral economists predicted that the pandemic could be more than the LOSSES suffered by SARS 2002-2004.

sourceString: One estimate from an expert at Washington University in St. Louis gave a $300+ billion impact on the world's supply chain that could last up to two years.
targetString: ካብ ሓደ ኣብ ዋሺንግቶን ዩኒቨርሲቲ ዝርከብ ክኢላ ኣብ St. Louis፡ ልዕሊ 300+ ቢልዮን ዶላር ዝግመት ጽልዋ ኣብ ናይ ዓለም ናይ ቀረብ ሰንሰለት ኣበርኪቱ፡ እዚ ድማ ክሳብ ክልተ ዓመት ክጸንሕ ይኽእል።
en-mt: From an expert at Washington University, he contributed an estimated $300+ billion of impact on St. Louis's global supply chain, which can last up to two years.

sourceString: The Organization of the Petroleum Exporting Countries (OPEC) reportedly "scrambled" after a steep decline in oil prices due to lower demand from China.
targetString: ማሕበር ለኣኽቲ ነዳዲ ሃገራት (OPEC) ጠለብ ነዳዲ ዘይቲ ብፍላይ ኣብ ቻይና ኣዝዩ ብምጉዳሉ "ሰንከልከል" ከም ዝበለ ተሓቢሩ።
en-mt: The Association of The Petroleum Exporting Countries (OPEC) reportedly "staggered" as demand for oil was cut sharply, particularly in China.

sourceString: Global stock markets fell on 24 February due to a significant rise in the number of COVID-19 cases outside mainland China.
targetString: ዓለማዊ ዕዳጋ ብርኪ ብምኽንያት ካብ ቀንዲ መሬት ቻይና ወጻኢ ዘጋጠመ ምንሃር ቊጽሪ ሕሙማት COVID-19 ብ 24 ለካቲት ምውዳቕ ዋጋ ኣርእዩ’ሎ።
en-mt: he global market fell on February 24 due to a drop in the number of COVID-19 cases outside the Chinese mainland.

sourceString: On 27 February, due to mounting worries about the coronavirus outbreak, various U.S. stock indexes including the NASDAQ-100, the S&P 500 Index, and the Dow Jones Industrial Average posted their sharpest falls since 2008, with the Dow falling 1,191 points, the largest one-day drop since the financial crisis of 2007–08.
targetString: ብሰንኪ እናዓበየ ዝኸደ ስግኣት ለበዳ ኮሮና ፡ኣብ ለካቲት 27 ዝተፈላለያ ናይ ብርኪ ኣመልከቲ (stock indexes ) ከም NASDAQ-100, the S&P 500 Index, and the Dow Jones Industrial Average ቅልጡፍ ምውራድ ብርክታተን ዝሕብር ካብ 2008 ዘርጊሐን።Dow 1,191 ነጥብታት ብምውራድ እዚ ድማ ካብ’ቲ ኣብ 2007-08 ዝነበረ ፊናንስያዊ ቅልውላው እቲ ዝዓበየ ምውራድ ኣብ ሓደ መዓልቲ ኮይኑ ኣሎ።
en-mt: Because of the growing threat of the coronavirus pandemic, 27 different knee indexes released in February 2008, such as NASDAQ-100, the S&P 500 Index, and the Dow Jones Industrial Average, which reported the rapid drop in their knees, with Dow dropping 1,191 points, the biggest one-day drop since the 2007-08 financial crisis.

sourceString: All three indexes ended the week down more than 10%.
targetString: ኩሉ ኣሃዱታት፡ ካብ ዝሓለፈ ሰሙን ናይ 10% ጎደሎ ኣመዝጊቡ።
en-mt: All units were up 10% from last week.

sourceString: On 28 February, Scope Ratings GmbH affirmed China's sovereign credit rating, but maintained a Negative Outlook.
targetString: ኣብ 28 ለካቲት፡ ተማኒ ዋጋ GmbH (Scope Ratings GmbH) ን ናይ ቻይና ልኡላዊ ትመና ዋጋ ኣረጋጊጹ፡ እንተኾነ ኣሉታዊ ዝኾነ ጠመተ ረኺቡ።
en-mt: On February 28, The Scope Ratings GmbH confirmed the value of China's sovereign trust, but found a negative look.

sourceString: Stocks plunged again based on coronavirus fears, the largest fall being on 16 March.
targetString: ቀረባት ከም እንደገና፡ ብሰንኪ ፍርሒ ናይ ኮሮና-ቫይረስ፡ ኣንቆልቂሉ፡ እዚ ድማ እቲ ዝዓበየ ምንቁልቃል ዝተመዝገበ ኣብ መጋቢት 16 ኢዩ።
en-mt: recently declined due to fear of the coronavirus, the largest drop on record on March 16.

sourceString: Many consider an economic recession to be likely.
targetString: ብዙሓት ሰባት ቊጠባዊ ምንቊልቋል ክህሉ ልዑል ተኽእሎ ከምዘሎ ይቖጽሩ።
en-mt: Many people think there is a high possibility of economic decline.

sourceString: Economist Mohamed El-Erian praised central banks' and states' timely emergency measures.
targetString: ምሁር ስነ-ቚጠባ Mohamed መሓመድ አል-አራን (El-Erian) ናይ ማእከላይ ባንክታትን ናይ ክፍላተሃገርን ኣብ ግዚኡ ዝተገብሩ ናይ ህጹጽ እዋን ሕግታት ንኢዱ።
en-mt: Economist Mohamed al-Araan (El-Erian) has called on central banks and state governments to adopt state emergency laws.

sourceString: Central banks are reacting more quickly than they did to the 2008 financial crash.
targetString: ሃገራውያን ባንክታት ካብ’ቲ ናይ 2008 ፊናንስያዊ ውድቀት ብዝያዳ ሕጂ ቅልጡፍ ግብረመልሲ የርእያ ኣሎዋ።
en-mt: National banks are responding faster than the 2008 financial crisis.

sourceString: Tourism is one of the worst affected sectors due to travel bans, closing of public places including travel attractions, and advice of governments against any travel all over the world.
targetString: ቱሪዝም ሓደ ካብቶም ብሰንኪ ናይ መገሻ ክልከላታት፡ ምዕጻው ህዝባዊ ቦታታት ንናይ መገሻ ሰሓብነታት ዘጠቓለለ፡ ከምኡ ድማ ናይ መንገስታት መምርሒ ኣንጻር መገሻ ኣብ መላእ ዓለም ቀንዲ ብሕማቕ ተጸልዮም ካብ ዘለዉ ጽላታት እዩ።
en-mt: Tourism is one of the most badly affected tablets around the world due to travel restrictions, the closure of public spaces, including travel attractions, and the Roads Against Travel Directive.

sourceString: As a consequence, numerous airlines have cancelled flights due to lower demand, including British Airways, China Eastern Airlines, and Qantas, while British regional airline Flybe collapsed.
targetString: ከም ዉጽኢቱ ድማ፡ ብዙሓት መገድታት ኣየር፡ ብሰንኪ ሕጽረት ተጐዓዝቲ በረራታትን ጠጠዉ ከምዘበላ ተሓቢሩ። ገለ ካብዚኣተን British Airways, China Eastern Airlines, and Qantas, ክኾና ከለዋ፡ ኣብ ብሪጣንያ ትዓዪ ዝነበረት መገዲ ኣየር Flybe ድማ ኣብ ዕዳጋ ወጺኣ።
en-mt: As a result, many airlines reportedly lost flights and flights because of a shortage of passengers, some of them British Airways, China Eastern Airlines, and Qantas, while Flybe, which operated in Britain, went on the market.

sourceString: The impact on the cruise line industry was at a level never seen before.
targetString: ኣብ ልዕሊ ናይ ቱሪዝም መራክብ ዘስዓቦ ጽልዋ ኣብ ታሪኽ ተራእዩ ኣይፈልጥን።
en-mt: The impact on tourist shipping has never been seen in history.

sourceString: Several train stations and ferry ports have also been closed.
targetString: ብዙሓት መንገዲ ባቡራትን ወደባትን ውን ተዓጽየን ኢየን።
en-mt: Many roads, trains and ports have also been closed.

sourceString: The epidemic coincided with the Chunyun, a major travel season associated with the Chinese New Year holiday.
targetString: እቲ ለበዳ ምስቲ ኣብ ቻይና ዝካየድ ናይ ሓድሽ ዓመት ቸንዩን ፈስቲቫል ልን ጻዕቂ ምንቅስቓስን ዝረኣየሉን ወቕቲ እዩ ኣጋጢሙ።
en-mt: he pandemic occurred during the Chinese New Year's Eve festival and the Festival of China.
