sourceString: A number of events involving large crowds were cancelled by national and regional governments, including annual New Year festivals, with private companies also independently closing their shops and tourist attractions such as Hong Kong Disneyland and Shanghai Disneyland.
targetString: ን ብዙሓት ሰባት ክእክቡ ዝኽእሉ ዝነበሩ ኣጋጣሚታት ብ ሃገራዊን ኣውራጃውን/ከባብያውን መንግስቲ ተሰሪዞም ኢዮም፡ ነቲ ዓመታዊ ዝግበር ናይ ሓደሽ ዓመት ጽምብል ዝሓቆፈ፡ ናይ ውልቂ ትካላት ከም ሆን-ኮንግ ዲስኒ-ላንድን ሻንጋይ ዲስኒ-ላንድን ባዕላተን ናይ ምዕጻው ስጉምቲ ወሲደን።
en-mt: Opportunities to gather more people have been cancelled by national, provincial and local governments, and private companies such as Hong Kong DisneyLand and Shanghai Disney-Land have taken steps to shut down the annual New Year's celebrations.

sourceString: Many Lunar New Year events and tourist attractions have been closed to prevent mass gatherings, including the Forbidden City in Beijing and traditional temple fairs.
targetString: ብዙሓት ብምኽንያት ሉናር ሓድሽ ዓመት ክካየዱ ተመዲቦም ዝነበሩ መደባት፡ ከም ናብ Forbidden City ምብጻሕን ኣብ ጥንታዊ ቤተ መቕደስ ምእካብን ዝበሉ ንጥፈታት ተዓጽዮም ኣለዉ።
en-mt: Many plans for the New Year due to the Lousar have been blocked by activities such as visiting The Forbidden City and attending an ancient temple.

sourceString: In 24 of China's 31 provinces, municipalities and regions, authorities extended the New Year's holiday to 10 February, instructing most workplaces not to re-open until that date.
targetString: ሰብ መዚ ቻይና ኣብ 24 ካብ 31 ናይ ቻይና ኣውራጃታትን ምምሕዳራትን ዞባታትን በዓል ሓድሽ ዓመት ናብ 10 ለካቲት ብምንዋሕ፡ ክሳብ እዚ ዕለት እዚ ዝበዝሐ ናይ ስራሕ ቦታታት ከይክፈት ኣዚዞም።
en-mt: Chinese authorities have extended the New Year's holiday from 24 of China's 31 provinces and municipalities to February 10 and ordered most jobs not open until this date.

sourceString: These regions represented 80% of the country's GDP and 90% of exports.
targetString: እዘን ዞባታት 80% ናይ’ታ ሃገር ጠቕላላ ጃምላዊ እቶትን (GDP) 90% ሰደድን ይውክላ።
en-mt: hese regions represent 80% of the country's gross domestic product (GDP) and 90% of exports.

sourceString: Hong Kong raised its infectious disease response level to the highest and declared an emergency, closing schools until March and cancelling its New Year celebrations.The retail sector has been impacted globally, with reductions in store hours or temporary closures.
targetString: ሆንግ-ኮንግ ነቲ ኣማሓላላፊ ሕማም ዝኸውን መልሲ ናብ ዝለዓለ ደረጃ ናይ ኢመርጀንሲ ኣዕብያቶ፡ ቤት-ትምህርቲታት ክሳብ መጋቢት ዓጽያቶ ፡ ናይ ሓዲሽ ዓመት ጽንብል ውን ሰሪዛቶ።እቲ ናይ መሸጣ ክፍሊ ብ ዓለም ደረጃ ተጸልዩ ኢዩ፡ እዚ ድማ ብሰንኪ ምውሓድ ሰዓታት ቀረብ ናይ መኽዘንን ግዝያዊ ምዕጻውን ኢዩ።
en-mt: Hong Kong has increased its response to the infectious disease to the highest level of emergency, closed schools until March and canceled the New Year's ceremony, which has been affected globally by the lack of hours of storage and temporary closures.

sourceString: Visits to retailers in Europe and Latin America declined by 40%.
targetString: ብዝሒ ዓደግቲ ኣብ ድኳናት ኤዉሮጳን ኣመሪካን ብ 40% ጐዲሉ።
en-mt: he number of shoppers in European and AMERICAN stores has decreased by 40%.

sourceString: North America and Middle East retailers saw a 50–60% drop.
targetString: ኣብ ሰሜን ኣሜሪካን ማእከላይ ምብራቅን ዝርከቡ ንግዲታት ናይ 50-60% ምጉዳል/ምውዳቕ ጌሮም።
en-mt: Trading in North America and the Middle East fell 50-60%.

sourceString: This also resulted in a 33–43% drop in foot traffic to shopping centres in March compared to February.
targetString: ምስ ለካቲት ክነጻጸር ከሎ ንዕዳጋ፡ ማእከላት ብእግሪ ናይ ዝጎዓዙ  ብዝሒ  ካብ 33-43% ምንቁልቋል ኣብ መጋቢት ኣስዒቡ።
en-mt: Compared to February, the number of pedestrians shopping centers fell by 33-43% in March.

sourceString: Shopping mall operators around the world imposed additional measures, such increased sanitation, installation of thermal scanners to check the temperature of shoppers, and cancellation of events.According to a United Nations Economic Commission for Latin America estimate, the pandemic-induced recession could leave between 14 and 22 million more people in extreme poverty in Latin America than would have been in that situation without the pandemic.
targetString: ኣብ መላእ ዓለም ዝርከባ ዓበይቲ መሸጢ ሃለኽቲ ንብረታት፡ ጽኑዕ ናይ ጽሬት መምርሒታት፡ ከም መጽረዪ ኢድ ምጥቃም፡ መመርመሪ ሙቐት ሰብነት ዝዕቅኑ መሳሪሕታት ምውዳድ፡ ከምኡ ውን ገለ ንጥፈታት ደው ምባልን ዝኣመሰለ ስጉምቲ ይወስዳ ኣለዋ።  በመሰረት ኮሚሽን ናይ ላቲን ኣሜሪካ ናይ ሕቡራት ሃገራት (United Nations Economic Commission for Latin America)  ዘቕረቦ ጸብጻብ፡ እዚ ለበዳ ዘስዓቦ ቁጠባዊ ድስካለ ካብ 14 ክሳብ 22 ሚሊዮን ዝበጽሕ ህዝቢ ናይ ላቲን ኣሜሪካ፡ ኣብ ትሕቲ ሕሱም፡ድኽነት ክገድፎ ምዃኑ ይግምገም፡ እዞም ክንድዚ ዝኣክሉ ነበርቲ ላቲን ኣሜርካ ድኽነቶም ብዝገደደ መልክዑ ኵውስኽ ይኽእል ኢዩ።
en-mt: Major asset sales around the world are taking measures such as hand sanity measures, testing, equipment measuring body temperature measurements, and stopping certain activities. According to a report by the United Nations Commission on economic performance by the United Nations Economic Commission for Latin America, it estimates that between 14 and 22 million people in Latin America will leave Latin America in extreme poverty. he U.S. may increase its poverty.

sourceString: In January and February 2020, during the height of the epidemic in Wuhan, about 5 million people in China lost their jobs.
targetString: ኣብ ቻይና ኣብ ጥርን ለካቲትን ናይ 2020 ኣብ እዋን ዝርገሐ ናይ’ቲ ለበዳ ኣብ ውሃን፡ ኣስታት 5 ሚልዮን ሰባት ስርሖም ሲኢኖም።
en-mt: About 5 million people lost their jobs in China during the spread of the pandemic in January and February 2020.

sourceString: Many of China's nearly 300 million rural migrant workers have been stranded at home in inland provinces or trapped in Hubei province.In March 2020, more than 10 million Americans lost their jobs and applied for government aid.
targetString: ዝበዙሑ ካብቶም ናይ ቻይና ናይ ገጠር ስደተኛታት: 300 ሞልዮን ዝበጽሑ: ሰራሕተኛታት ኣብ ብዙሓት ኣውራጃታት ኣብ ውሽጢ ገዛውቲን ኣብ ሁበይ ድማ፡ ተወሺቦም ኣለዉ።ኣብ መጋቢት 2020, ልዕሊ 10 ሚልዮን ኣመሪካውያን ስርሖም ስኢኖም ናይ መንግስቲ ሓገዝ ውን ሓቲቶም።
en-mt: More than 300 million workers from China's rural immigrants are stranded in many provinces and in Hubey, where more than 10 million Americans lost their jobs and sought government assistance.

sourceString: The coronavirus outbreak could cost 47 million jobs in the United States and unemployment rate may hit 32%, according to estimates by the Federal Reserve Bank of St. Louis.The lockdown in India has left tens of millions of Indian migrant workers (who are paid through daily wages) unemployed.The survey from the Angus Reid Institute found that 44% of Canadian households have experienced some type of unemployment.Nearly 900,000 workers lost their jobs in Spain since it went into lockdown in mid-March 2020.
targetString: ብመሰረት ጸብጻብ ፈደራል ባንክ ሳኢንት ሉዊዝ፡ ብሰንኪ ለበዳ ኮሮና ቫይረስ 47 ሚሊዮን ሰባት ክባረሩ ከም ዝኽእሉን፡ ሽቕለት ኣልቦነት ድማ ብ 32% ክውስኽ ከምዝኽእልን ኣሚቱ። ኣብ ህንዲ፡ እቲ ዕጽዋ ብሚልዮናት ንዝቑጸሩ (ብመዓልታዊ ደሞዝ) ዝናበሩ ሰራሕተኛታት ካብ ስራሕ ኣልዩ። ብ Angus Raid Institute ዝተኻየደ መጽናዕቲ ከም ዝሕብሮ 44% ካብ ካናዳውያን ስድራቤታት ብ ሻቅለት ኣልቦነት ከም ዝተጸልዋ ሓቢሩ። ኣብ ስጳኛ ኣስታት 900,000 ኣቢሎም ዝኾኑ ሰራሕተኛታት፡ እታ ሃገር ካብ መፋርቕ መጋቢት 2020 ጀሚራ ኣብ ዕጽዋ ካብ ትኣቱ ፡ ካብ ስርሖም ደው ኢሎም ኣለዉ።
en-mt: According to the Federal Bank of Saint Luiz, 47 million people could be expelled from the coronavirus pandemic and unemployment could rise by 32%; in India, the lockdown has left millions of workers (on daily wages) unemployed, and a study by the Angus Raid Institute found that 44% of Canadian households had been affected by unemployment. Heir work is stopped.

sourceString: During the second half of March, 4 million French workers applied for temporary unemployment benefits and 1 million British workers applied for a universal credit scheme.Almost half a million companies in Germany have sent their workers on a government-subsidized short-time working schemes known as Kurzarbeit.
targetString: ኣብ ካልኣይ ፍርቂ ወርሒ መጋቢት፡ 4 ሚልዮን ፈረንሳዉያን ግዚያዊ ናይ ሽቕለት-አልቦነት ካሕሳ ክሓቱ ከለዉ፡ 1 ሚልዮን ዝዀኑ እንግሊዛዉያን ድማ ሓባራዊ ናይ ለቓሕ ሕቶ ኣቕሪቦም። ኣስታት ፍርቂ  ሚልዮን ዝዀና ትካላት ጀርመን ድማ ብመንግስቲ ዝተደጎመ "ኩራዝርቤት" ተባሂሉ ዝፍለጥ ናይ ሓገዝ መደብ፡ ፍርቂ ደሞዞም ከምዝኽፈሉ ብምግባር ኣፋንዮሞም።
en-mt: In the second half of March, 4 million French people applied for temporary unemployment compensation, while 1 million British companies filed a joint loan, and nearly half a million German companies paid half their salaries in a government-sponsored aid program known as "Currabet."

sourceString: The German short-time work compensation scheme has been adopted by France and Britain.
targetString: ናይ ጀርመን: ሓጺር-ግዜ ናይ ስራሕ ካሕሳ መደብ፡ ብ ፈረንሳን ዓባይ ብሪጣንያን’ውን ተሳዒቡ።
en-mt: Germany's short-term job compensation scheme was also followed by France and the UK.

sourceString: The performing arts and cultural heritage sectors have been profoundly affected by the pandemic, impacting organizations' operations as well as individuals—both employed and independent—globally.
targetString: እቶም ናይ ስነጥበብን ባህሊን ምውርራሳት ክፍልታት በዞም ዝስዕቡ ህልው ኩነታት ምክንያታት ኣዝዮም ኢዮም ተጎዲኦም ዘለዉ፡ እዚኦም ድማ፡ ብሰንኪ ለበዳ፡ ስረሓት ናይ ጸለውቲ ማሕበራትን ውልቀሰባትን -ስራሕ ዝተቆጸኡን ዘይተቆጸሩን-ብ ዓለም ደረጃ: ኢዮም።
en-mt: Sections of the arts and culture heritage sectors are severely affected by the following current situation, which are globally affected by the pandemic, the work of praying associations and individuals - who have been suspended and unregulated - worldwide.

sourceString: Arts and culture sector organizations attempted to uphold their (often publicly funded) mission to provide access to cultural heritage to the community, maintain the safety of their employees and the public, and support artists where possible.
targetString: ናይ ባህሊን ጥበብን ማሕበራዊ ክፍሊ፡ ነቲ ናቶም ሚሽን ክድግፍዎ (ብ ህዝቢ ገንዘባዊ ሓገዝ ዝረክብ)፡ ነቲ ኮሚኒቲ ናይ ባህላዊ ውርሻ ክዕዘብዎ ፍቃድ ክህቡ፡ ናይ ሰራሕተኛታቶም ጥዕና ክከታተሉ ከሙ ውን ነቶ ናይ ጥበብ ክኢላታት ደገብ ኣብ ዘድልዮም ክሕግዝዎም ይፍትኑ ኣለዉ።
en-mt: he Department of Culture and Arts are trying to support their mission (which receives public financial assistance), to allow them to observe the community of cultural heritage, to monitor the health of their employees, and to help them where they need the support of art experts.

sourceString: By March 2020, across the world and to varying degrees, museums, libraries, performance venues, and other cultural institutions had been indefinitely closed with their exhibitions, events and performances cancelled or postponed.
targetString: ኣብ መጋቢት 2020፡ ብ ደረጃ ዓለም ቤተ-መዘክራት፡ ቤት-ንባባት፡ ቤት-ምርኢት፡ ከምኡውን ባህላዊ ማእከላት ንዘይ ተወሰነ ግዜ ናይ ኤግዚቢሽን፡ ኣጋጣሚኣታት፡ ከም ኡውን ምር ኢታት ኣገልግሎት ኣቃሪጸን ወይ ኣውንጺፈን።
en-mt: In March 2020, at the world level, museums, libraries, exhibitions and cultural centers opened or closed exhibition opportunities indefinitely, such as exhibitions and exhibitions.

sourceString: In response there were intensive efforts to provide alternative services through digital platforms.Another recent and rapidly accelerating fallout of the disease is the cancellation of religious services, major events in sports, and other social events, such as music festivals and concerts, technology conferences, and fashion shows.
targetString: ከም ግብረ-መልሲ ፡ ጽዑቕ ቃዕርታት ነቲ ናይ ኣማራጺ ኣገልግሎታት ብ ዲጂታላዊ መሳርሒ ተፈቲኑ ኢዩ።ካልእ ናይ ቀረባን ቅልጡፍ ምውዳቕን ናይዚ ሕማም ድማ፡ በቶም ምቁራጻት ናይ ሃይማኖታዊ ምትእክካባት፡ ዓበይቲ ናይ ስፖርት ጸውታታት፡ ከምኡውን ካልእ ማሕበራዊ ኣጋጣሚታት ከም ሙዚቃ፡ ፈስቲቫላትን ኮንሰርትታትን፡ ናይ ተክኖሎጂ ኮንፈረንሳትን ምርኢት ፋሽንን የጠቃልል።
en-mt: In response, intensive blankets have been tested on alternative services with digital equipment, and other near and immediate falls of the disease include the interruption of religious gatherings, major sporting events, and other social occasions such as music, festivals and concerts, technological conferences, and fashion shows.

sourceString: The film industry has also experienced disruption.The Vatican announced that Holy Week observances in Rome, which occur during the last week of the Christian penitential season of Lent, have been cancelled.
targetString: ኢንዱስትሪ ፊልም'ውን ገለ ምዝንባል ኣጋጢምዎ ኣሎ። ቫቲካን ብወገና ናይ ክርስትያን ቅድስቲ ሰሙን ተባሂላ ትፍለጥ ዓመታዊት በዓል ከምዝሰረዘት ኣፍሊጣ ኣላ።.
en-mt: The film industry has also suffered some disturbances, with the Vatican announcing that it has canceled an annual festival known as Christian Holy Week..

sourceString: Many dioceses have recommended older Christians to stay at home rather than attending Mass on Sundays; some churches have made church services available via radio, online live streaming or television while others are offering drive-in worship.
targetString: ብዙሓት መራሕቲ ሃይማኖት፡ ነቶም ብዕድመ ዝደፍኡ ኣመንቲ ኣብ ግዜ ጽዑቕ ምትእክካብ ናይ ሰንበት መደብ ኣብ ገዝኦም ኮፍ ክብሉ ሓቢሮም፡ ገለ ገለ ቤት-ክርስትያናት’ውን ነቲ ኣገልግሎታተን ብ ራድዮ፡ ኦንላይን ቀጥታዊ ፈነወ፡ ወይ ተለቪዥን ጌረን የመሓላልፈኦ ኣለዋ፡ ብተወሳኺ ናይ ገዛ ኣገልግሎት’ውን ይህቡ ኣለዉ።
en-mt: Many religious leaders have told elderly believers to stay at home during Sunday's mass gathering, while some churches are also broadcasting their services via radio, online, live or television, and are also providing home services.

sourceString: With the Roman Catholic Diocese of Rome closing its churches and chapels and St. Peter's Square emptied of Christian pilgrims, other religious bodies also cancelled services and limited public gatherings in churches, mosques, synagogues, temples and gurdwaras.
targetString: ሰበኻ ሮማን ካቶሊክ ናይ ሮማ ምዕጻው ኣብያተ ክርስትያናትን: ናይ ጾሎት ቦታታን ብምክያድ ሜዳ ቁዱስ ጴጥሮስ ድማ ካብ ናይ ክርስትያናት ንግደት ናጻ ተገይሩ።ካልኦት ናይ ሃይማኖት ኣካላት ውን ኣገልግሎታተን ደው ብምባል ኣብ ኣብያተ ክርስትያናት፡ መሳጊድ፡ ሲናጎጋትን ቤተ መቕደስን ጉዋርድዋርስን ህዝባዊ ምትእኽኻብ ኣቃሪጸን።
en-mt: Roman Catholic preachers conducted Roman closing churches and synagogues, and St. Peter's field was exempt from Christian trafficking, and other religious bodies stopped their services and burned public gatherings in churches, synagogues, synagogues, and Guwardars.

sourceString: Iran's Health Ministry announced the cancellation of Friday prayers in areas affected by the outbreak and shrines were later closed, while Saudi Arabia banned the entry of foreign pilgrims as well as its residents to holy sites in Mecca and Medina.
targetString: ናይ ኢራን ሚኒስተሪ ጥዕና፡ ኣብቲ ብ ቫይረስ ዝተጸልወ ቦታታት፡ ናይ ዓርቢ ጸሎት ክቃረጽ ጸዊዑ፡ ቀጺሉ ድማ ቅዱስ-ቦታታት ተዓጽዩ፡ ብተወሳኺ ስዑዲ-ዓረብካብ ደገ ንዝመጹ በጻሕቲን ኣጊዳ ከም ኡውን ናብ መካን ከዲናን ዝግበር ምብጻሓት በቶም ነበርቲ ኣቃሪጻቶ።
en-mt: Iran's health ministry has called for Friday prayers to be burned at virus-affected sites, followed by the closure of sacred sites, and Saudi Arabia has banned visitors from outside and cut off visits to Mecca by residents.

sourceString: The pandemic has caused the most significant disruption to the worldwide sporting calendar since the Second World War.
targetString: እዚ ለበዳ ድሕሪ ካልኣይ ኲናት ዓለም፡ዝኸፍአ ምዃኑ ዝተገልጸ ናይ ስፖርታዊ ንጥፈታት መደባትን ካላንደራትን ምዝባል ኣስዒቡ ኣሎ።
en-mt: he pandemic has led to the decline of sports programs and calendars described as the worst since World War II.

sourceString: Most major sporting events have been either cancelled or postponed, including the 2019–20 UEFA Champions League, 2019–20 Premier League, UEFA Euro 2020, 2019–20 NBA season, and 2019–20 NHL season.
targetString: እቶም ዓበይቲ ናይ ስፖርት ኣጋጣሚታት ተቃሪጾምን ተወንዚፎምን ኢዮም፡ ነቲ ናይ 2019-20 ቻምፒዮንስ ሊግ ፡ 2019-20 ፕሪመር ሊግ፡ UEFA Euro 2020፡ 2019–20 NBA ወቅቲ፡ ከምኡውን 2019–20 NHL ወቅቲ፡ ዘጠቃለለ።
en-mt: The major sporting events have been interrupted and cancelled and include the 2019-20 Champions League, 2019-20 Premier League, UEFA Euro 2020, 2019–20 NBA seasons and 2019–20 NHL seasons.

sourceString: The outbreak disrupted plans for the 2020 Summer Olympics, which were originally scheduled to start at the end of July; the International Olympic Committee announced on 24 March that the event will be "rescheduled to a date beyond 2020 but not later than summer 2021".Casinos and other gaming venues worldwide have closed and live poker tournaments have been either postponed or cancelled.
targetString: እዚ ለበዳ ንመደባት ኦሊምፒክስ 2020 ከም ዘዘናበለ ይፍለጥ። ኣብ መጀመርያ ሓምለ 2020 ክጅመር ተወጢኑ ዝነበረ መደብ፡ "ድሕሪ 2020 ግና ቅድሚ ክረምቲ 2021" ከነካይዶ ኢና ክብል ኣብ 24 መጋቢት፡ ኣህጉራዊ ኮሚተ ኦሊምፒክስ ገሊጹ ኣሎ። ብተወሳኺ ካዚኖታትን ካልእ ናይ ዉሽጢ ገዛ ጸወታ ማእከላትን፡ ከምኡ'ዉን ናይ ጠላዕ ብቐጥታ ክመሓላለፍ ዝተሓስበ ጸወታን፡ ተቛሪጾሞ ወይ ተሰጋጊሮም ኣለዉ።
en-mt: The outbreak has disrupted the 2020 Olympic Games program, which was scheduled to begin in early July 2020 but "before the summer of 2021," said the International Olympic Committee on March 24, adding that casinos and other indoor games and games planned for direct transmission of gambling have been suspended or postponed.

sourceString: This has led many gamblers to move online, with many online gambling sites reporting significant increases in their rates of new sign-ups.The entertainment industry has also been affected, with various music groups suspending or cancelling concert tours.
targetString: እዚ ድማ ን ብዙሕት ተጣላዕቲ ናብ ኦንላይን ክግዕዙ ጌሩ፡ ብ መጠኑ ድማ ብዙሓት ናይ ኦንላይን ጠላዕ ዘጻውታ ሳይታት ብዝሒ ናይ ተጠቀምቲ ከም ዝተራእየ ሓቢረ።ናይ ምዝንጋዕ ኢንዳስትሪ ውን ተጸልዩ ኢዩ፡ እዚ ድማ ገለ ናይ ሙዚቃ ባንድታት ነቲ ናይ ኮንሰርት ምብጻሓት ኣወንዚፈንኦ።
en-mt: his has led to the move of many players online, and in proportion to the number of online gambling sites, the entertainment industry has also been affected, which has resulted in some music bands cancelling concert visits.

sourceString: Many large theatres such as those on Broadway also suspended all performances.
targetString: ብዙሓት ዓበይቲ ቲያትራት ከም ን ኣብነት ኣብ ብሮድወይ (Broadway) ዘለዉ ኩሉ ስረሓቶም ኣወንዚፎሞ።
en-mt: Many major theaters, such as Broadway, have lost all their work.

sourceString: Some artists have explored ways to continue to produce and share work over the internet as an alternative to traditional live performance, such as live streaming concerts or creating web-based "festivals" for artists to perform, distribute, and publicize their work.
targetString: ገለ ስነ-ጥበባዊያን ፍርያቶም ብመንገዲ ኢንተርነት ናብ ትዓዘብቲ ዘብጽሕሉ መንገዲ ፈጢሮም ኣለዉ፡ ገለ ካብኡ ብቐጥታ ዝመሓላለፍ መደባትን ብገጻት ኢንተርነት ዝካየዱ ፈስቲቫላት የጠቓልል።
en-mt: Some artists and their products have created a way to reach audiences via the Internet, including directly broadcast programming and festivals run through online pages.

sourceString: Online, numerous coronavirus-themed Internet memes have spread as many turn to humour and distraction amid uncertainty.
targetString: ኣብ ኢንተርነት ኣብ ርእስቲ ዘይርግጹነቱ ንኮሮና ቫይረስ ዝምልከት ብዙሕ ኣርእስትታት ናብ ዋዛታትን ኣቓልቦ ምርሳዕን ገጹ ከይዱ እዩ።
en-mt: Here are a lot of topics on the internet about the coronavirus that have gone to jokes and forget-how.

sourceString: Since the outbreak of COVID-19, heightened prejudice, xenophobia, and racism have been noted toward people of Chinese and East Asian descent, and against people from hotspots in Europe, the United States and other countries.
targetString: ምስፍሕፋሕ ናይ ኮቪድ-19 ካብ ዝጂምር፡ ጽልኢ፡ ጽልኢ-ጋኖትን ዓሌትነትን፡ ናብ ህዝቢ ቻይናን መበቆል ምብራቕ ኣፍሪቃ ዘለዎምን፡ ከም ኡውን ኣንጻር እቶም ኣብ ሓደገኛ ኩነታት ኣብ ኤውሮጳ፡ ኣሜሪካን ካል ኦት ሃገራትን ዝነበሩ ወሪዱ ኢዩ፡፡
en-mt: he spread of COVID-19 has spread from widespread hatred and racism to the people of China and those of East African origin and against those in dangerous situations in Europe, the United States and other countries.

sourceString: Incidents of fear, suspicion, and hostility have been observed in many countries, particularly in Europe, East Asia, North America, and the Asia-Pacific region.
targetString: ኣብ ብዙሓት ሃገራት ብፍላይ ኣብ ኤውሮጳን ምብራቕ ኤስያን ሰሜን ኣሜሪካን ኤስያ ፓስፊክን ተርእዮ ፍርህን ምጥርጣርን ጽልእን ተራእዩ እዩ።
en-mt: Fear, doubt, and hatred have been observed in many countries, especially in Europe, East Asia, North America, and the Asia Pacific.

sourceString: Reports from February (when the majority of the cases had still been confined to China) have documented racist sentiments expressed in various groups worldwide of Chinese people deserving the virus or receiving what has been claimed as justified retribution.
targetString: ጸብጻባት ካብ ለካቲት ከም ዝሕብሮ (ዝበዝሑ ናይቶም ግዳያት ኣብ ቻይና ኣብ ዝነበሩሉ) ኣብ ብዙሓት ጉጅለታት ናይ ዓለም፡ ቻይና እቲ ቫይረስ ከም ዝግባኣ ወይ ውን እዚ ቫይረስ ኣብ ቻይና ምህላዉ ቅኑዕ ኢዩ፡ ዝብሉ ዓሌታዊ ስምዒታት ተራእዩ።
en-mt: Reports from February (where most of the cases were in China) showed racial feelings in many parts of the world that china was infected or that the virus was right to exist in China.

sourceString: Some countries in Africa have also seen a rise in anti-Chinese sentiment.
targetString: ገለ ሃገራት ኣብ ኣፍሪቃ፡ ጸረ-ቻይና ስሚዒታት ተራእይወን።
en-mt: There have been anti-Chinese feelings in Africa.

sourceString: Many residents of Wuhan and Hubei have reported discrimination based on their regional origin.
targetString: ብዙሓት ነበርቲ ናይ ዉሃንን ሁበይን፡ ዓሌትነት ኣብ መበቆሎም ዝተሚርከሰ ከም ዝተራእየ ሓቢሮም።
en-mt: Many residents of Wuhan and Hubey have said that their origins have been affected.

sourceString: There has been support for the Chinese, both on and offline, and towards those in virus-stricken areas.
targetString: ንቻይናውያን ኣብ ኦንላይንን ካብ ኦንላይን ወጻእን ደገፍ ነይሩ ከምኡ ድማ ነቶም ኣብ ብቫይረስ ዝተጠቕዑ ከባቢታት።
en-mt: here was support for Chinese online and off-line, as well as in infected areas.

sourceString: Following the progression of the outbreak to new hotspot countries, people from Italy, the first country in Europe to experience a serious outbreak of COVID-19, could also be subjected to suspicion and xenophobia.Citizens in countries including Malaysia, New Zealand, Singapore, and South Korea initially signed petitions lobbying to ban Chinese people from entering their countries in an effort to stop the disease.
targetString: ነቲ ቀጻልነት ናይ ምስፍሕፋሕ ናብተን ሓደሽቲ ኣብ ሓደጋ ዘለዋ ሃገራት ብምስዓብ፡ ን ህዝቢ ናይ ዓዲ ጥልያን፡ እታ ናይ መጀመርያ ሃገር ኣብ ኤውሮጳ ብኣዝዩ ከቢድ ምስፍሕፋሕ ናይ ኮቪድ-19 ዝተጠቅዐት፡ ናብ ጥርጠረን ዓለታውነትን ከቃልዕም ይኽእል ኢዩ።ነበርቲ ናይ ማለዥያ፡ ኒው-ዚላንድ፡ ሲንጋፖር፡ ከም ኡውን ደቡብ-ኮርያ፡ ካብ መጀመርያ ነቲ ምስፍሕፋሕ ናይ ሕማም ንምግታእ ነቲ ካብ ቻይና ዝመጽእ ህዝቢ ናብ ሃገራትን ከይ ኣቱ ዝእግድ ጥርዓን ዝሓዘ ጽሑፍ ፈሪመናሉ።
en-mt: y following the steady spread of the spread to the newest at-risk countries, it could expose the people of Italy, the first country in Europe to the most severe spread of COVID-19, into doubt and nationalism, with residents of Malaysia, New Zealand, Singapore and South Korea signing a petition banning people from China from entering countries and countries to curb the spread of the disease from the beginning.

sourceString: In Japan, the hashtag #ChineseDontComeToJapan trended on Twitter.
targetString: ኣብ ጃፓን ሃሽ-ታግ #ChineseDontCometoJapan ኣብ ትዊተር ብብዝሒ ተራእያ።
en-mt: In Japan, hash-tag #ChineseDontCometoJapan has been widely seen on Twitter.

sourceString: Chinese people as well as other Asians in the United Kingdom and the United States have reported increasing levels of racist abuse, as well as assaults.
targetString: ኣብ ኣመሪካን ዓባይ ብሪጣንያን ዝርከቡ ቻይናውያንን ካልኦት ኤስያውያንን ኣብ ልዕሊኦም ዝወርድ ዓሌታዊ ዓመጽን መጥቓዕትን እናወሰኽ ምምጻኡ ተገሊጹ።
en-mt: There has been an increase in ethnic violence and attacks against Chinese and other Asians in the US and the UK.

sourceString: U.S. president Donald Trump has faced criticism for referring to the coronavirus as the "Chinese Virus", a term considered by critics to be racist and anti-Chinese.
targetString: ፕረዚደንት ትራምፕ፡ ን ኮሮና ቫይረስ "ቻይና ቫይረስ"ኢሉ ብምጽውዑ ዓሌታዊን ጸረ ቻይናን ዝኾነ ቃል ተጠቂካ ተባሂሉ፡ ኣደዳ ነቐፌታ ኮይኑ እዩ።
en-mt: rumin has called the coronavirus a "China virus" and has been criticized for using racist and anti-Chinese words.

sourceString: Protesters in Ukraine attacked buses carrying Ukrainian and foreign evacuees from Wuhan to Novi Sanzhary.
targetString: ኣብ ዩክሬን፡ ሰልፈኛታት ካብ ውሃን ን ኖቪ ሳንዛሪ ብ ኣውቶቡስ ዝጎዓዙ ዝነበሩ ወጻእተኛታት ኣጥቂዖም።
en-mt: In Ukraine, protesters attacked foreigners traveling by bus from Water and Novi Sanzari.

sourceString: Students who come from Northeast India, which shares a border with China, and study in major Indian cities have reportedly experienced harassment related to the coronavirus outbreak.
targetString: ካብቲ ምስ  ቻይና ዘዳውብ ሰሜናዊ ምብራቕ ህንዲ መጺኦም፡ ኣብ ዓበይቲ ከተማታት ህንዲ ዝመሃሩ ተምሃሮ ካብ፡ ምስቲ ለበዳ ብምትሕሓዝ  መጥቃዕቲን ተነጽሎን ከም ዝወረዶም ተሓቢሩ።
en-mt: Students from northeastern India,along India's border with China, were reportedly attacked and isolated in major cities.

sourceString: The Bharatiya Janata Party's State unit president in West Bengal Dilip Ghosh stated that the Chinese had destroyed nature and "that's why the God took revenge against them."
targetString: ፕረዚደንት ሰልፊ Bahartiya Janta Party State ኣብ ምዕራብ በንጋል ኣቶ ደሊፕ ጎሽ፡ ቻይና ን ተፈጥሮ ስለዝበደለት " ኣምላኽ ይቐጽዓ ኣሎ" ክብል ገሊጹ።
en-mt: he president of the Bahartiya Janta Party State in west Bengal, Mr. Delip Ghosh, said "God is punishing" China for wronging nature.

sourceString: The remarks were later condemned by the Chinese consulate in Kolkata, calling it "erroneous".In China, xenophobia and racism agains non-Chinese residents has been inflamed by the pandemic, with foreigners described as "foreign garbage" and targeted for "disposal".
targetString: ኣብ ካልካታ ዝነበረ ቆንስል ቻይና ዝውሃብ ዝነበረ መግለጺታት “ጉጉይ” ብምባል ኮኒንዎ።ብሰሪ እዚ ዓለማዊ ለብዒ ኣብ ቻይና ኣብ ልዕሊ ካልኦት ዜጋታት ጽልእን ዓሌትነትን ተጋሃሂሩ እዩ ብተወሳኺ ወጻእተኛታት ናይ “ግዳም ጛሓፍ” ተባሂሎም “ንግዳም ክወጹ” ተሃዲኖም እዮም።
en-mt: The Chinese consulate in Calcutta condemned statements as "wrong," and as a result of the global pandemic, hatred and racism against other citizens in China have been exposed and foreigners have been forced to "go out on the business."

sourceString: Many newspapers with paywalls have removed them for some or all of their coronavirus coverage.
targetString: ገለ ብክፍሊት ዘርእያ ጋዜጣታት ብኸፊል ወይ ብምሉኡ ናይ ኮሮና ቫይረስ ሽፈነታት ኣቋሪጸን።
en-mt: Some newspapers have suspended partial or all coverage of the coronavirus.

sourceString: Many scientific publishers made scientific papers related to the outbreak available with open access.
targetString: ብዙሓት ኣሕተምቲ ኣጽናዕቲ ሳይንስ፡ ኣብቲ ቅሉዕ መርበብ ብዝረኸብዎ ሓበሬታ፡ ብዙሕ ሳይንሳዊ ጽሑፋት ምስ ምስፍሕፋሕ ዝተሓሓዝ ኣሕቲሞም ኣለዉ።
en-mt: Many science research publishers have published many scientific papers related to the expansion of information obtained on the open web.

sourceString: Some scientists chose to share their results quickly on preprint servers such as bioRxiv.
targetString: ገለ ገለ ተመራመርቲ ፡ ነቲ ውጽኢቶም ቀልጢፎም ከመሓላልፍዎ መሪጾም፡ ከም ኣብነት bioRxiv።
en-mt: Some researchers have chosen to quickly pass on their results, such as bioRxiv.

sourceString: Emerging infectious disease – Infectious disease of emerging pathogen, often novel in its outbreak range or transmission mode
targetString: ሓድሽ ተላባዒ ሕማም ዝበሃል- ብ ሰበብ-ሕማም (Pathogen) ዝመሓላለፍ ወይ ብናይ ዝርግሐ ዓቕሙ ወይ`ውን ብናይ ምምሕልላፍ ክእለቱ ፍሉይ ሓድሽን ምስ ዝኸውን እዩ።
en-mt: A new infectious disease is referred to as pathogen transmitted by pathogen or by its widespread or transmission capacity.

sourceString: Globalization and disease – Overview of globalization and disease transmission
targetString: ግሎባውነትን ሕማምን – ሓፈሻዊ መግለጺ ናይ ግሎባውነትን ምምሕልላፍ ሕማምን
en-mt: Globality and Disease - General Description of Globalization and Disease Transmission

sourceString: List of epidemics and pandemics – A list of death tolls due to infectious disease
targetString: ዝርዝር ናይ ለበዳታትን ዓለማዊ ለበዳታትን – ዝርዝር ናይ ብዝሒ ሞት ብሰንኪ ተመሓላላፊ ሕማም
en-mt: List of epidemics and global pandemics - list of deaths caused by infectious diseases

sourceString: Wildlife smuggling and zoonoses – Health risks associated with the trade in exotic wildlife
targetString: ናይ እንስስሳ ዘገዳም ምሽጥን ዞኖሰስን (ምምሕልላፍ ናይ ሕማም ካን እንስሳ ናብ ሰብ) - ዓቢ ሓደጋ ምን ንግዲ ናይ እንስሳ ዘገዳም ዝተሓሓዝ።
en-mt: he sale and zoning of wildlife (transmission of diseases to humans) - a great risk of the trade of wildlife.

sourceString: Laboratory testing for the respiratory coronavirus disease 2019 (COVID-19) and the associated SARS-CoV-2 virus includes methods that detect the presence of virus and those that detect antibodies produced in response to infection.
targetString: እቲ ናይ መመርመሪ ላባራቶሪታት ናይዞም ናይ ምስትንፋስ ኮሮና ቫይረስ ሕማም ናይ 2019 (ኮቪድ-19)ን ሓጋዚኡ ዝኾነ SARS-CoV-2 ቫይረስን ፡ ነቶም ኣብ ውሽጢ ዝርከቡ ቫይረስ ህላውነቶም ብምርግጋጽን፡ ብሰንኪ እቲ ረክሲ ዝወጹ ጸረ-ነፍሲ ን ብምጥቃም ናይቲ ቫይረስ መልከፍቲ ናይ ሓደ ሰብ ከረጋግጽ ይኽእል።
en-mt: he testing laboratories can confirm a person's infection by confirming the existence of the 2019 respiratory coronavirus disease (COVID-19) and its assistant SARS-CoV-2 virus and using anti-inflammatory drugs released from the infection.

sourceString: The presence of viruses in samples is confirmed by RT-PCR, which detects the coronavirus'  RNA.
targetString: ህላውነት ናይ ቫይረስ ኣብቲ ቅምሶታት በታ RT-PCR ኡዩ ዝረጋገጽ፡ እዚ ድማ ነቲ ናይቲ ቫይረስ RNA ድሕሪ ምልላያ ኢዩ።
en-mt: he existence of the virus in the samples is confirmed by RT-PCR UYU after detecting the virus RNA.

sourceString: This test is specific and is designed to only detect the RNA of the SARS-CoV-2 virus.
targetString: እዚ መርመራ ን RNA ናይ SARS-CoV-2 ቫይረስ ንምምርማር ተባሂሉ ዝተመስረሐን ዝተነድፈን ኢዩ።
en-mt: he test was designed to test RNA from the SARS-CoV-2 virus.

sourceString: It is used to confirm very recent or active infections.
targetString: ነቲ ናይ ቀረባ ወይ ንጡፍ ምልካፋት ንምርግጋጽ ይጠቅም ኢዩ።
en-mt: It is used to check for near-term or active symptoms.

sourceString: Detection of antibodies (serology) can be used both for diagnosis and population surveillance.
targetString: ምልላይ ናይ ጸረ-ነፍሳት (serology) ፡ ከም መመርመሪን መከታተሊ ናይ ህዝቢን ፡ ክንጥቀመሉ ንኽእል ኢና።
en-mt: Detection of antibiotics (serology) can be used as a test and a public monitoring tool.

sourceString: Antibody tests show how many people have had the disease, including those whose symptoms were too minor to report or who were asymptomatic.
targetString: እቲ ናይ ጸረ-ነፍሲ መርመራ ከም ዘነጽሮ፡ ነቶም ምልክታት ናይ ሕማሞም ኣዝዩ ትሑት ዝኾነን ፡ ዳርጋ ምልክታት ዘይብሎም ን ሓዊሱ ክንደይ ሰባት ከም ዝሓመሙ ኣነጺሩ።
en-mt: he anti-inflammatory test showed how many people were sick, with very low symptoms and almost no symptoms.

sourceString: An accurate mortality rate of the disease and the level of herd immunity in the population can be determined from the results of this test.

sourceString: Due to limited testing, as of March 2020 no countries had reliable data on the prevalence of the virus in their population.

sourceString: This variability is also likely to be significantly affecting reported case fatality rates, which are likely to be significantly over-estimated in some countries.
targetString: እዚ ምፍልላያት ነቲ ዓቀናዊ ጸብጻብ ናይ ግዳያት ኣዝዩ ክጸልዎ ኢዩ፡ እዚ ድማ ኣብ ገለ ገለ ሃገራት ብብዝሒ ልዕለ-ዓቀናዊ ጸብጻብ ክስዕብ ውን ይኽእል ኢዩ።

sourceString: Using real-time reverse transcription polymerase chain reaction (rRT-PCR) the test can be done on respiratory samples obtained by various methods, including nasopharyngeal swab or sputum sample.

en-mt: However, no amount has been determined, and the collection and processing of samples must be followed by the CDC guidelines.

sourceString: In Russia, the COVID-19 test was developed and produced by the State Research Center of Virology and Biotechnology VECTOR.
targetString: ኣብ ሩስያ፡ እቲ ናይ ኮቪድ-19 መመርመሪ መሳርሒ ብ ሃገራዊ መመረሪ ማእከል ናይ ቫይረስን ባዮተክኖሎጂን ዝማዕበለ ኢዩ ኔሩ
en-mt: In Russia, COVID-19 testing equipment has been developed by the National Testing Center for Viruses and Biotechnology

sourceString: On 11 February 2020 the test was registered by the Federal Service for Surveillance in Healthcare.On 12 March 2020, Mayo Clinic was reported to have developed a test to detect COVID-19 infection.On 13 March 2020, Roche Diagnostics received FDA approval for a test which could be performed within 3.5 hours in high volume, thus allowing one machine to do approximately 4,128 tests in a 24-hour period.
targetString: ኣብ ለካቲት 11, 2020፡ እቲ መርመራ ብ ናይ ፈደራል ኣገልግሎት ወሃብቲን ናይ ሕክምና ተቆጻጸርቲን፡ ተዋሂቡ። ኣብ 12, መጋቢት 2020, ማዮ ክሊኒክ ነቲ ኮቪድ-19 ዝተባህለ ቫይረስ ዘለሊ መሳርሒ ምሂዙ። ኣብ መጋቢት 13, 2020፡ ሮቸ ናይ መርመራ ኣካል፡ ብ FDA ተቀባልነት ረኪቡ፡ ኣብ ውሽጢ 3.5 ሰዓታት ብዝሒ ዘለዎ መርመራታት ከተካይድ እትኽእል መሳርሒ ብምምሃዙ ኢዩ፡ ከምኡውን ሓንቲ ማሺን ዳርጋ 4,128 መርመራታት ኣብ ውሽጢ 24 ሰዓታት ከተካይድ ከም እትኽእል ተፈሊጡ።
en-mt: On February 11, 2020, the test was given to federal service providers and medical regulators, and on March 12, 2020, the Mayo Clinic invented a device that detected the COVID-19 virus, and on March 13, 2020, Roche's testing body was approved by the FDA and developed a device capable of carrying out a number of tests within 3.5 hours, and a machine could conduct nearly 4,128 tests within 24 hours.

sourceString: On 19 March 2020, the FDA issued emergency use authorization (EUA) to Abbott Laboratories for a test on Abbott's m2000 system; the FDA had previously issued similar authorization to Hologic, LabCorp, and Thermo Fisher Scientific.
targetString: ኣብ መጋቢት 19, ናይ 2020፡ FDA ናይ ኢመርጀንሲ ምጥቃም ፍቓድ (EUA) ብምሃብ፡ ነቲ ላባራቶሪታት ን መርመራ ከዳልዎ ኣብ Abbott's m2000 ሲስተም፡ ቅድሚ ሕጂ ውን FDA ብ ተመሳሳሊ ን ሆሎጂክ፡ ላብቾርፕ፡ ከምኡውን ተርሞ ፊሸር ሳይንቲፊክ ፡ ፍቓድ ሂቡ
en-mt: On March 19, 2020, the FDA granted emergeny use authorization (EUA) to prepare laboratories for testing in Abbott's m2000 system, and the FDA has previously approved the same for Horological Labchorp and Thermo Fisher scientific.

sourceString: On 21 March 2020, Cepheid similarly received EUA from the FDA for a test that takes about 45 minutes.
targetString: ኣብ መጋቢት 21, 2020፡ ሰፈይድ፡ ብተመሳሳሊ EUA ካብ FDA ተቀቢሉ፡ እቲ መርመራ ድማ 45 ደቃይቅ ጥላይ ወሲድሉ።
en-mt: On March 21, 2020, the EUA received a similar EUA from the FDA, and the test took 45 minutes of shadow.

sourceString: The FDA has approved a test that uses isothermal nucleic acid amplification technology instead of PCR.
targetString: FDA፡ ኣብ ክንዲ PCR ፡ ኣይዞተርማል ኑክለይ ኣሲድ እተጉልሕ ናይ ተክኖሎጂ ብምጥቃም እትሰርሕ መመርመሪት ኣጽዲቑ ኣሎ፡
en-mt: FDA approved a test that works using technology that highlights acid rather than PCR isothermal nuclei

sourceString: Since this does not require a series of alternating temperature cycles this method can deliver positive results in as little as five minutes and negative results in 13 minutes.
targetString: እዚ ኣገባብ እዚ ፡ ተኻታታሊ ምቅይያር ናይ ሙቀት ስለ ዘየድልዮ፡ ኣብ ውሽጢ 5 ደቂቅ ኣወንታዊ መልሲ ክህብ ይኽእል ኣብ 13 ደቃይቅ ድማ ኣሉታዊ መልሲ ክህብ ይኽእል።
en-mt: Since there is no need for a continuous change in temperature, it can respond positively within 5 minutes and respond negatively in 13 minutes.

sourceString: There are currently about 18,000 of these machines in the U.S. and Abbott expects to ramp up manufacturing to deliver 50,000 tests per day.A test which uses a monoclonal antibody which specifically binds to the nucleocapsid protein (N protein) of the novel coronavirus is being developed in Taiwan, with the hope that it can provide results in 15 to 20 minutes just like a rapid influenza test.
targetString: ኣቢ ሕጂ እዋን ኣስታት 180 ካብዘን ማሺናት ኣብ ሕቡራት መንግስታት ኣሜሪካ (U.S.) ኣለዋ፡ ኣቦት ድማ 50.000 መርመራታት ኣብ መዓልቲ ከበጻጽሕ ተስፋ ይገብር ኣሎ። ሞኖክሎናል ጸረ-ነፍሲ ዝጥቀም ን ነቲ ኒክሎስፒድ ፕሮቲን (N protein) ናይ ኖቨል ኮሮናቫይረስ ዝሽፍንን ፡መመርመሪ መሳርሒ ኣብ ታይዋን ተማሂዙ ኣሎ፡ በዚ ድማ ፡ ልክዕ ከምቲ ቅልጡፍ ናይ ኢንፍሊወንዛ መርመራ፡ ኣብ ውሽጢ 15-20 ደቃይቅ መልሲ ክህብ ከም ዝኽእል ይግመት።
en-mt: Abby now has about 180 of these machines in the United States (U.S.) and Abbott hopes to deliver 50.000 tests a day.A testing tool that uses monoclonal anti-insecticides and covers the Nicklospid protein of the novel coronavirus has been developed in Taiwan, so it is estimated that a rapid flu test can respond within 15-20 minutes.

sourceString: A March 2020 literature review concluded that "chest radiographs are of little diagnostic value in early stages, whereas CT [computed tomography] findings may be present even before symptom onset."
targetString: ኣብ 20 መጋቢት ዝተገብረ ናይ ሊተርቸር ምርመራ ከም ዘነጽሮ፡`` ናይ ኣፍልቢ ራድዮግራፍ ስእልታት፡ ኣብቲ ናይ መጀመርያ ደረጃ፡ ውሑድ ዓቐን ናይ መርመራ ይህቡና፡ እቶም ናይ CT [computed tomography] ግን ወላ ውን ወላውን ምልክታት ከይተራእየ ውጽኢት ናይ መርመራ ክህቡና ይጂምሩ``።
en-mt: A February 20 test revealed that "chest radiography" gives us a small amount of testing in the early stages, while CT [computed tomography] begins to give us test results even without symptoms."

sourceString: Typical features on CT include bilateral multilobar ground-glass opacificities with a peripheral, asymmetric and posterior distribution.
targetString: እቶም ቀንዲ ክፋላት ናይ CT እዞም ዝስዕቡ ኢዮም፡ ባይላተራል ማልቲቦላር፡ ግራውንድ ግላስስ ኦፖቺፊቺቴስ ማስ ፐሪፈራል፡ ኣሳይመትሪክ ምስ ፖስቶሬር ዲስትሪቡሽን።
en-mt: The main components of CT are: bylatheral multibolar ground, glas opochyphychites, mas peripheral asymmetric with posterior distillation.

sourceString: Subpleural dominance, crazy paving and consolidation develop as the disease evolves.
targetString: ዓብላልነት ናይ ሳብፕሉራል ፡ ጽሉል ፓቪን ከምኡውን ጽንዓት፡ ሕማም ምስ ፈሎቀ ይምዕብል።
en-mt: Increased absorptiveness, shadowy pavin, and endurance develop when disease is diagnosed.

sourceString: A study comparing PCR to CT in Wuhan at the point of origin of the current pandemic has suggested that CT is significantly more sensitive than PCR, though less specific, with many of its imaging features overlapping with other pneumonias and disease processes.
targetString: ኣብ ዉሃን ፡ እታ ማእከል/መበገሲ ለበዳ ዝኾነት ከተማ፡ ዝተገብረ መጽናዕቲ ናይ ምንጽጻር PCR ናብ CT ከም ዝሕብሮ፡ CT ካብ PCR ንላዕሊ ንጥፍቲ ኢያ ኢሉ፡ ወላ`ካ እቲ ናይ ምስ ኣል ባህሪኡ ስቲ ናይ በዓል ኒሞንያን ካልኦት ዓይነት ሕማማትን ዝደራረብ እንተኽዕነ
en-mt: A comparison PCR to CT in Wuhan, the epicenter of the pandemic, suggests that CT is more active than PCR, even if it is related to al's characteristics, stymied pneumonia and other diseases.

sourceString: As of March 2020, the American College of Radiology recommends that "CT should not be used to screen for or as a first-line test to diagnose COVID-19".As of March 2020, the CDC recommends PCR for initial screening.
targetString: ኣብ መጋቢት 2020፡ ናይ ኣሜሪካ ኮለጅ ናይ ራድዮሎጂ ``CT ን ምኽልካል ወይ ከም ቀዳማይ መስመር ናይ ኮቪድ-19 መመርመሪ ክንጥቀመሉ ኣይንኽእልን ኢና`` ኣብ መጋቢት 2020፡ CDC ን PCR ናይ መወዳእታ ምክልኻል ክተተግብል ጸዊዑ
en-mt: In March 2020, the American College of Radiology has called for the CDC to implement final immunization for PCR by March 2020

sourceString: Part of the immune response to infection is the production of antibodies including IgM and IgG.
targetString: ሓደ ክፋል ናይ ስርዓት ምጽዋር ናይ ረኽሲ፡ ምፍራይ ጸረ-ነፍሳት ን IgM ን IgG፡ ዘጠቃለለ ኢዩ።
en-mt: Part of the systemic resistance to infection includes antibiotics and IgM.

sourceString: These can be used to detect infection in individuals starting 7 days or so after the onset of symptoms, to determine immunity, and in population surveillance.Assays can be performed in central laboratories (CLT) or by point-of-care testing (PoCT).
targetString: እዚኦም ድማ ነቲ ናይ ውልቀ-ሰባት ረኽሲታት ካብቲ ምልክታት ክረኣየሉ ዝጀመረ 7ይ መዓልቲ ወይ ብድሕሪኡ፡ ከለልዮ ከም ዝኽእል ተፈሊጡ። እቲ መርመራታት ኣብ ማእከል ላባራቶሪታት (CLT) ወይ`ውን ብ ናይ ነጥበ-መርመራ (PoCT) ክካየድ ይኽእል ኢዩ።
en-mt: hese can be detected on or after the 7th day after the symptoms begin to appear, and tests can be conducted at a laboratory (CLT) or through a point-of-control (PoCT).

sourceString: The high-throughput automated systems in many clinical laboratories will be able to perform these assays but their availability will depend on the rate of production for each system.
targetString: እቲ ዓቢ ሓሳብ ነቲ ናይ ክሊኒክ ላባራቶሪ ኣውቶማቲክ መስርሕ ከም ዝሕዝ ጌርዎ፡ ፡ እዘን ላባራቶሪ ድማ ነዚ ዕዮታት ክዓያ ኢየን ፡ እቲ ህላውነተን ግን ኣብቲ መጠንን ብዝሒን ፍርያት ናይቲ ሲስተም ይምርኮስ
en-mt: he big idea is that the clinical laboratory has automated the process, and these laboratories will perform these tasks, but their existence depends on the size and quantity of the product of the system.

sourceString: For CLT a single specimen of peripheral blood is commonly used, although serial specimens can be used to follow the immune response.
targetString: እዚ ናይ CLT ናይ ውልቂ ቅምሶ/ኣብነት ናይ ፐሪፈራል ደም ፡ ልሙድ ተጠቃምነት ኢዩ ዘለዎ፡ ከም ተወሳኺ እቶም ሰያል ቅምሶታት ነቲ ናይ ምጽዋር ዓቅሚ ምስዕብ ይጠቅሙ ኢዮም
en-mt: This CLT personal sample/example of peripheral blood is commonly used, as well as the sharp samples are used to increase the resistance

sourceString: For PoCT a single specimen of blood is usually obtained by skin puncture.
targetString: ን PoCT፡ ንጽል ቅምሶ ናይ ደም ብ ሓንቲ ንእሽተይ ናይ ቆርበት ነኻል ክትኣቱ ትኽእል ኢያ።
en-mt: A single blood sample for PoCT can be inserted with a small amount of skin.

sourceString: Unlike PCR methods an extraction step is not needed before assay.On March 26, 2020, the FDA named 29 entities that provided notification to the agency as required and are now therefore able to distribute their antibody tests.
targetString: በ ኣንጻር ናይ PCR መኝገዲ፡ ናይ ምጽማቕ ደረጃ ቅድሚ መርመራ ኣየድልን ኢዩ፡ ኣን መጋቢት 26, 2020, FDA ነተን ን ኣጀንሲ ከ ኣድላይነቱ ኣገዳሲ ሓበሬታ ዝሃባ 29 ኣሃዱታት ሰምዩ ኣሎ፡ ሕጂ ድማ ነቲ ጸረ-ነፍሳት መርመራ ክዝርገሓኦ ጀሚረን ኣለዋ
en-mt: No pre-testing is required against the PCR's grading phase, Ann March 26, 2020, FDA has heard of 29 units that have given The Age of Essential Information and are now starting to extend the antibiotic test

sourceString: As of April 7, 2020, only a single test has been approved by the FDA under an emergency use authorization.In late March 2020, Euroimmun Medical Laboratory Diagnostics and Epitope Diagnostics received European approvals for their test kits, which can detect IgG and IgA antibodies against the virus in blood samples.
targetString: ክሳብ መጋቢት 7, 2020፡ ትሕቲ ናይ ኢመርጀንሲ ሓላፍነታዊ ተጠቃምነት FDA ሓንቲ መርመራ ጥራይ ኣካይዳ። ኣብ መወዳእታ ናይ መጋቢት 2020, ኢሮንዩም ናይ ሕክምና ላባራቶሪ መመርመሪ ን ኤፒቶፕ መመርመሪን ፡ ናይ ኤውሮጳ ኣፍልጦ ረኺቦም ነቲ መመርመሪ መሳርሒታት ክምስርሑ ክቕጽሉ፡ እዚ ድማ ነቶም IgG ን IgA ን ዝበሃሉ ጸረ-ነፍሳት ኣንጻር ናይ ቫይረስ ኣብ ናይ ደም ቅምሶታት ከለልዩ ዝእሉ መሳርሒታት ኢዮም።
en-mt: As of March 7, 2020, there has been only one test under the Emergency Responsible Use FDA, and by the end of March 2020, the Iroyum Medical Laboratory Test and epitope testing have been recognized by Europe and will continue to develop the testing equipment, which are devices that can detect antibiotics called IgG and IgA against viruses in blood clots.

sourceString: The testing capacity is several hundred samples within hours and therefore much faster than the conventional PCR assay of viral RNA.

sourceString: Drive-through centers have helped South Korea do some of the fastest, most-extensive testing of any country.In Germany, the National Association of Statutory Health Insurance Physicians said on 2 March, that it had a capacity for about 12,000 tests per day in the ambulatory setting and 10.700 had been tested in the prior week.

sourceString: A first lab survey revealed that as of calendar week 12/2020 a total of at least 483,295 samples were tested up to and including week 12/2020 and 33,491 samples (6.9%) tested positive for SARS-CoV-2.In Israel, researchers at Technion and Rambam Hospital developed and tested a method for testing samples from 64 patients simultaneously, by pooling the samples and only testing further if the combined sample is found to be positive.In Wuhan a makeshift 2000-sq-meter emergency detection laboratory named "Huo-Yan" (Chinese: 火眼, or "Fire Eye" in English) was opened on 5 February 2020 by BGI, which can process over 10,000 samples a day.
targetString: እቲ ናይ መጀመርያ ናይ ላባራቶሪ ገምጋም፡ ከም ዘነጽሮ ክሳብ መበል 12 ሰሙን ናይ 2020፡ ብገምጋም ዳርጋ 483,295 ቅምሶታት ተመርሚሩ፡ ኣብ መበል 12 ሰሙን ከኣ 33,491 (6.9%) ብ ኣወንታ ተመርሚሩ ን SARS-CoV-2። ኣብ እስራአኤል ተመራመርቲ ኣብ ተክኖን ን ራምቦምን ሆስፒታት ፡ ን 64 ቅምሶታት ተኸታታሊ ክምርምር ዝኽእል መሳርሒ ኣማዕቢሎም፡ እዚ ድማ ነቲ ቅምሶታት ብምስሓብን፡ እቲ ቅምሶ ኣወንታ እንተኾይኑ ዳግማይ ብምምርማርን ጥራይ ድማ ኣካይዶሞ። ኣብ ዉሃን ናይ ኢመርጀንሲ መለለዪ ላባራቶቲ ፡ 200 ትር ኪ.ሜ ዝዓቀኑ፡ ``ሁዎ-ያን`` (Chinese: 火眼, ወይ "Fire Eye" ብ እንግሊዘኛ)፡ ኣብ 05 ለካቲት 2020 ብ BGI ተከፊቱ፡ እዚ ላባራቶሪ 10,000 ቅምሶታት ኣብ መዓልቲ ክምርምር ከም ዝኽእል ተፈሊጡ።
en-mt: The first laboratory assessment, which identified approximately 483,295 samples, was analyzed by the 12th week of 2020, and 33,491 (6.9%) positively tested SARS-CoV-2 by Israeli researchers in Technonon. Rambom and hospitals developed a device that could test 64 samples in a row, drawing the samples and re-testing whether the samples were positive.  יהוה, or "Fire Eye" in English) was opened by BGI on February 5, 2020, and it was revealed that the laboratory could test 10,000 samples per day.

sourceString: With the construction overseen by BGI-founder Wang Jian and taking 5-days, modelling has show cases in Hubei would have been 47% higher and the corresponding cost of the tackling the quarantine would have doubled if this testing capacity hadn't come on line.

sourceString: By 4 March 2020 the daily throughput totals were 50,000 tests per day.Open source, multiplexed designs released by Origami Assays have been released that can test as many as 1122 patient samples for COVID19 using only 93 assays . en-mt: On March 04, 2020, the daily thought tests were 50,000 a day, with open sources developing a device that could test up to 1122 COVID-19 patients' samples spread by Otigami Asay with 93 tests, and these recommended designs could work smoothly in a small laboratory without the need for liquid holders.

sourceString: This has led some authors to explore sample preparation protocols that involve heating samples at 98 °C (208 °F) for 5 minutes to release RNA genomes for further testing.On 31 March it was announced United Arab Emirates was now testing more of its population for Coronavirus per head than any other country, and was on track to scale up the level of testing to reach the bulk of the population.

en-mt: This is through the exchange of incentive capabilities for mass laboratory purchases from group 42 and BGI (in 'Huwo-Yan' imperial detection laboratory in China).

sourceString: Constructed in 14 days, the lab is capable of conducting tens of thousands RT-PCR tests per day and is the first in the world of this scale to be operational outside of China.
targetString: ኣብ ውሽቲ 14 መዓልታት ዝተሰርሐ ላባራቶሪ ፡ ኣማኢት ኣሽሓት RT-PCR መርመራ ኣብ ሓደ መዓልቲ ክግበር ይከኣል፡ ካብ ቻይና ወጻኢ ድማ ኣብ ዓለም እቲ ናይ መጀመርያ ብ ከምዚ ዓቀን መርመራ ዝገብር ዘሎ ላባራቶሪ ኢዩ።
en-mt: Hundreds of thousands of RT-PCR tests can be done in one day in a 14-day laboratory, and it is the world's first laboratory outside China.

sourceString: Different testing recipes targeting different parts of the coronavirus genetic profile were developed in China, France, Germany, Hong Kong, Japan, and the United States.
targetString: ዝተፈላለዩ መመርመሪ መንገዲታት ን ዝተፈላለዩ ናይ ኮሮና-ቫይረስ ጀነቲካዊ ፕሮፋይል ዝዓለመ ኣብ ቻይና፡ ፈረንሳ፡ ጀርመን፡ ሆንግ-ኮንግ፡ጃፓን፡ ሕቡራት መንግስታት ኣሜሪካን ማዕቢሎም ኢዮም፡፡
en-mt: A variety of coronavirus genetic profiles have been developed in China, France, Germany, Hong Kong, Japan and the United States.

sourceString: The World Health Organization adopted the German recipe for manufacturing kits sent to low-income countries without the resources to develop their own.
targetString: ውድብ ጥዕና ዓለም ነቲ ኣብ ጀርመን ዝተወሃሃደ መመርመሪ መሳርሒታት፡ ነተን ኣብ ትሑት-ድረጃ ናይ መነባብሮ ዘለወን ሃገራት ነናተን ከመስርሓ ዓቅሚ ዘይብለንን፡ ሰዲዱለን።
en-mt: he World Health Organization (WHO) has sent integrated testing equipment in Germany to countries that do not have the capacity to operate in low-income countries.

sourceString: The German recipe was published on 17 January 2020; the protocol developed by the United States Centers for Disease Control was not available until 28 January, delaying available tests in the U.S.China and the United States had problems with the reliability of test kits early in the outbreak, and these countries and Australia were unable to supply enough kits to satisfy demand and recommendations for testing by health experts.
targetString: እቲ ናይ ጀርመን መምርሒ ኣብ ጥሪ 17, 2020 ተሓቲሙ፡ እቲ ብ ሕቡራት መንግስታት ኣመሪካ ዝማዕበለ ፕሮቶኮል ናይ ምቁጽጻር ሕማም ክሳብ ጥሪ 28 ኣይነበረን፡ ኣተደናጎየ ቀረባት ናይ መመርመሪ መሳርሒታት ኣብ ቻይናን ኣብ ሕቡራት መንግስታት ኣሜሪካ (U.S.)ን ፡ ኣብ መጀመርያ ምስፍሕፋሕ ናይቲ ሕማም ፡ ናይቲ መሳርሒ ብቅዓት ዝጎደለ ብምንባሩ፡ ጸልዩዎ ኢዩ፡ እዘን ሃገራትን ኣወስትራልያን ከኣ ነቲ ብ ናይ ሕክምና ክላታት ዝሕተት ዝነበረ ጠለባት ናይ መመርመሪ መሳርሒታት ፡ ከማሎኦኦ ኣይከኣላን
en-mt: The German directive was published on January 17, 2020, and the U.S. -developed disease control protocol did not exist until January 28, delaying the supply of testing equipment in China and the United States (U.S.) He initially prayed about the incompetence of the device for the spread of the disease, and these countries and Australia were unable to meet the requirements of testing equipment required by medical teams.

sourceString: In contrast, experts say South Korea's broad availability of testing helped reduce the spread of the novel coronavirus.
targetString: ከም ተጻራሪ፡ ተመራመርቲ ፡ምህላው ብብዝሒ ናይ መመርመሪ መሳርሒታት ኣብ ደቡብ ኮርያ፡ ነዚ ኖቨል ኮሮና-ቫይረስ ከይስፋሕፍሕ ኮልኪልዎ ኢዩ።
en-mt: According to researchers, a large number of testing tools have prevented the spread of the coronavirus in South Korea.

sourceString: Testing capacity, largely in private sector labs, was built up over several years by the South Korean government.
targetString: እቲ ናይ ምምርማር ዓቀን፡ ብገፊሑ ኣብ ናይ ውልቂ ላባራቶሪታት፡ ቅድሚ ገለ ዓመታት ብ መንግስቲ ደቡብ ኮርያ ተሃኒጹ።
en-mt: he testing was widely developed in private laboratories by the South Korean government a few years ago.

sourceString: On 16 March, the World Health Organization called for ramping up the testing programmes as the best way to slow the advance of COVID-19 pandemic.High demand for testing due to wide spread of the virus caused backlogs of hundreds of thousands of tests at private U.S. labs, and supplies of swabs and chemical reagents became strained.
targetString: ኣብ መጋቢት 16፡ ውድብ ጥዕና ዓለም ነቲ ናይ መመርመሪ መሳርሒታት ምምዕባል መደባት ክሰፍሕ ደልዩ፡ እዚ ድማ ብሰንኪ እቲ ካብ ንቡር ወጻኢ ምስፍሕፋሕ ናይ ኮቪድ-19 ኢዩ። ብዝሒ ጠለባት ኮቪድ-19 መርመራታት ፡ኣብ ናይ ሕቡራት መንግስታት ኣሜሪካ (U.S.) ላባራቶሪታት፡ ናይ ፡ ሕጽረት ናይ መመርመሪታት መሳርሒ ኣኸቲሉ፡ እቶም ፍርያት ናይ መወልወሊታትን ከሚካላዊ መጽረዪታት ድማ ተዋጢሩ።
en-mt: On March 16, the World Health Organization (WHO) wanted to expand testing equipment programs, which was caused by an out-of-normal spread of COVID-19 testing, which included shortage testing equipment in U.S. (U.S.) laboratories and the products of birth control and chemical filters.

sourceString: In March 2020 China reported problems with accuracy in their test kits.
targetString: ኣብ መጋቢት 2020፡ ቻይና ኣብቶም ዘፍረየቶም መመርመሪ መሳርሒታት ጸገማት ከም ዘሎ ሓቢራ።
en-mt: In March 2020, China reported problems with its testing equipment.

sourceString: In the United States, the test kits developed by the CDC had "flaws;" the government then removed the bureaucratic barriers that had prevented private testing.Spain purchased test kits from Chinese firm  Shenzhen Bioeasy Biotechnology Co Ltd, but found that results were inaccurate.
targetString: ኣብ ሕቡራት መንግስታት ኣሜርካ፡ እቶም ብ CDC ዝማዕበሉ መመርመሪ መሳርሒታት ``ሽግራት`` ኔርዎም፡ ብድሕሪኡ ግን መንግስቲ ነቲ ዘይተዓጻጸፍ ሕጊ ናይ ውልቂ ላባራቶሪ ምርመራ ፡ክቕይሮ ተገዲዱ ። ስጳኛ ካብ ቻይና ካምፓኒ ሸንዘን ባዪኢዚ ባዮተክኖሎጂ ብሕ.ትካ ዝተባህለ ትካል መመርመሪ መሳርሒታት ገዚኣ እንተኾነ ግን እቶም መሳርሒታት ጸገማት ኔርዎም።
en-mt: In the United States, the CDC-developed testing equipment had 'problems', followed by the government being forced to change the uncompensated privacy laboratory inspection law.Spain bought testing equipment from China's Campaign Shenzen Bayezi Biotechnology, a testing equipment company called Taka, but the devices had problems.

sourceString: The firm explained that the incorrect results may be a result of a failure to collect samples or use the kits correctly.
targetString: እቲ ትካል ከም ዝሓበሮ እቲ ጌጋ ውጽኢት ብሰንኪ እቲ ቅምሶታት ብዘይ ግቡእ ምእካቡ ወይ`ውን ነቲ መሳርሒ ብጉቡእ ዘይንጥቃሙ ሙኻኑ ሓቢሩ
en-mt: he company said the error resulted from the improper collection of the samples or the misuse of the equipment.

sourceString: The Spanish ministry said it will withdraw the kits that returned incorrect results, and would replace them with a different testing kit provided by Shenzhen Bioeasy.80% of test kits the Czech Republic purchased from China gave wrong results.Slovakia purchased 1.2 million test kits from China which were found to be inaccurate.
targetString: ናይ ስጳኛ ሚኒስትሪ ከምዝሓበሮ፡ ነቲ ጌጋ ሓበሬታ ዝህብ መሳርሒታት ክትመልሶ ሙኻናን፡ ብኻልእ ካብ ሸንዘን ዝመጸ ሓድሽ መመርመሪ መሳርሒ ክትትክኦ ሙኻናን ሓቢሩ። 80% እቲ ካብ ቻይና ዝተዓደገ ናይ መመርመሪ መሳርሒታት፡ ጌጋ ሓበሬታ ሂቡ። ስሎቫክያ ድማ 1.2 ሚልዮን መመርመሪ መሳርሒ ካብ ቻይና ዓዲጋ፡ እንተኾነ ግን ውጺእታውነቱ ኣዝዩ ትሑት ኢዩ።
en-mt: Spain's ministry said it was determined to return the misinformation devices and replace them with a new testing tool from Shenzhen, 80% of the testing equipment purchased from China gave incorrect information, and Slovakia bought 1.2 million testing equipment from China, but its effectiveness was very low.

sourceString: Prime Minister Matovič suggested these be dumped into the Danube.Ateş Kara of the Turkish Health Ministry said the test kits Turkey purchased from China had a "high error rate" and did not "put them into use."The UK purchased 3.5 million test kits from China but in early April 2020 announced these were not usable.
targetString: ቀዳማይ ሚኒስተር ማቶቪች ከም ዝሕብሮ፡ ናብ ዳኑበ ክጉሓፍ ከም ዘለዎ ኣነጺሩ። ኣተሽ ኮራ ናይ ቱርኪ ናይ ጥዕና ሚኒስተር ሳኢድ እዞም መመርመሪ መሳርሒታት ካብ ቻይና ዝተገዝኡ ``ብዙሕ ጸገም ኣለዎ`` ኣብ ስራሕ ድማ ኣይወዓሉን።``ዓባይ ብሪጣንያ ኣስታት 3.5 ሚልዮን መሳርሒታት ካብ ቻይና ዓዲጋ ፡ ኣብ መጋቢት 2020 ግን ኣብ ጥቕሚ ከም ዘይወዓሉ ሓቢራ።
en-mt: Prime Minister Matovic said it should be dumped to The Danube. Atesh Kora, Turkey's health minister, Saeed, said these testing equipment had been purchased from China 'a lot of problems' and were not in operation.' The UK bought about 3.5 million devices from China but were not in use in March 2020.

sourceString: Testing, followed with quarantine of those who tested positive and tracing of those with whom the SARS-CoV-2 positive people had had contact, resulted in positive outcomes.
targetString: ምምርማር፡ ምስ ምውሻብ ናይቶም ብ ኣወንታ ዝተመርመሩን ምክትታል ነቶም ምስ SARS-CoV-2 ዘለዎም ዓይነት ሰባት ዝተራኸቡን ዝተሰነየ ኣገባብ፡ ኣዝዩ ኣወንታዊ ዝኾነ ውጽኢት ሂቡ
en-mt: Testing, along with the selection of positively tested and monitoring of people who have been in contact with SARS-CoV-2, yielded very positive results.

sourceString: Researchers working in the Italian town of Vò, the site of the first COVID-19 death in Italy, conducted two rounds of testing on the entire population of about 3,400 people, about ten days apart.
targetString: ኣብ ናይ ዓዲ ጣልያን ከተማ ቮኦ ዝርከቡ ተመራመርቲ፡ ኣብታ ናይ መጀመርታ ሞታ ናይ ኮቪድ-19 ዝተራእየላ ከተማ፡ 2 ዙርያ ናይ መርመራታት ኣብ መላእ 3400 ሰባት ናይታ ከተማ፡ ኣብ ናይ ዓሰርተ መዓታት ፍልልይ፡ ኣካይዶም።
en-mt: Researchers in the Italian city of Voo conducted 2 rounds of tests in the city where the first covid-19 death occurred, with 3,400 people across the city separated in ten days.

sourceString: About half the people testing positive had no symptoms, and all discovered cases were quarantined.
targetString: ካብቶም 50% ብ ኣወንታ ዝተመርመሩ ዝኾነ ምልክት የብሎምን፡ እቶም ኩሎም ዝተበጽሑ ግዳያት ድማ ተወሺቦም ኣለዉ።
en-mt: Of the 50% who were tested positively, there was no sign of any symptoms and all the cases that have been reported have been evacuated.

sourceString: With travel to the commune restricted, this eliminated new infections completely.
targetString: ምስዚ ምጉዓዝ ናብቲ ናይ ኮሚኒ ዝተሓዘአ፡ እዚ ነቲ ሓዲሽ ምልካፍ ሙሉእ ብ ሙሉእ ክኣልዮ ይኽእል።
en-mt: With this move, it is possible to fully share the new community.

sourceString: With aggressive contact tracing, inbound travel restrictions, testing, and quarantining, the 2020 coronavirus pandemic in Singapore has proceeded much more slowly than in other developed countries, but without extreme restrictions like forced closure of restaurants and retail establishments.
targetString: ብ ኣዝዩ ዝተራቀቀ ምክትታል፡ ዘይተገደበ ውሸባ፡ መርመራታት፡ ምዕጻውን፡ እዚ ናይ 2020 ለበዳ ኮሮና-ቫይረስ ኣብ ሲንጋፖር፡ ምስ ካልኦት ሃገራት ኣወዳዲርካ ብ ኣዝዩ ዝዛሓለ መጠን ኢዩ ገስጊሱ ፡እንተኾነ መጠኑ ዝሓለፈ ምሕጻርን ከም ኣብነት፡ ኣስገዳዲ ምዕጻው ሪስቶራንታት ን መሸጢ ክፍልታትን፡ ኣይተተግበሩን።
en-mt: he 2020 coronavirus pandemic in Singapore has caused a much higher rate than in other countries, but it has not been implemented, such as the imposing closure of restaurants and retail stores.

sourceString: Many events have been cancelled, and Singapore did start advising residents to stay at home on 28 March, but schools reopened on time after holiday break on 23 March.
targetString: ብዙሓት ኣጋጣሚታት ተዓጽዮም ኢዮም ከምኡውን ሲንጋፖር ነቶም ነበርታ ክሳብ 28 መጋቢት ክዕጸዉ ከም ዘለዎም ነጊራ ኣላ፡ እንተኾነ ናይ ቤት-ትምህርትታት ምኽፋት ድሕሪ ዕረፍቲ መጋቢት 23 ኢዩ።
en-mt: Many cases have been closed and Singapore has told residents that they must close by March 28, but schools will reopen after the Lockdown on March 23.

sourceString: Several other countries have also managed the pandemic with aggressive contact tracing, inbound travel restrictions, testing, and quarantining, but with less aggressive lock-downs, such as Iceland and South Korea.

sourceString: A statistical study has found that countries that have tested more, relative to the number of deaths, have much lower case fatality rates, probably because these countries are better able to detect those with only mild or no symptoms.

sourceString: WHO recommends that countries that do not have testing capacity and national laboratories with limited experience on COVID-19 send their first five positives and the first ten negative COVID-19 samples to one of the 16 WHO reference laboratories for confirmatory testing.

sourceString: Hand washing (or handwashing), also known as hand hygiene, is the act of cleaning one's hands for the purpose of removing soil, grease, microorganisms, or other unwanted substances.

sourceString: Hand washing with soap consistently at certain "critical moments" during the day prevents the spread of many diseases, for example diarrhoea and cholera, which are transmitted through fecal–oral route.
targetString: ኣብ እዋን ቀትሪ ኣእዳውካ ብሳምና ደጋጊምካ ምሕጻብ፡ ዝርግሐ ብዙሓት ብቀልቀልን ብኣፍን ክመሓላለፉ ዝኽእሉ ከም ውጽኣትን ሸሮኽን ዝኣመሰሉ ሕማማት ክከላኸል ይኽእል ኢዩ።

sourceString: People can also become infected with respiratory diseases such as influenza or the common cold, for example, if they do not wash their hands before touching their eyes, nose, or mouth (i.e., mucous membranes).
targetString: ደቂ ሰባት ቅድሚ ዓይኖም፡ ኣፍንጭኦም ወይ ኣዶም( ከም ኣብነት ንፍጣዊ ሽፋናት) ምሓዞም ኣእዳዎም ምስዘይሕጸቡ ከም በዓል  ሰዓል ዝኣመሰሉ ናይ ምስትንፋስ ሕማማት ክጥቅዑ ይኽእሉ ኢዮም።
en-mt: When humans do not wash their hands before their eyes, noses or adomins (such as for a quick cover), they can become infected with respiratory diseases, such as cough.

sourceString: The five critical moments during the day where washing hands with soap is important include: before and after defecation, after cleaning a child's bottom or changing nappies, before feeding a child, before eating and before and after preparing food or handling raw meat, fish, or poultry.

sourceString: Medical hand hygiene refers to hygiene practices related to medical procedures.
targetString: ሕክምናዊ ናይ ኢድ ጽሬት፡ ነቲ ናይ ሕክምና ናይ ጽሬት ንጥፈታት ኢዩ ዘመልክይ።

sourceString: Hand washing before administering medicine or medical care can prevent or minimize the spread of disease.
targetString: ቅድሚ መድሃኒት  ምሃብ ወይ ጥዕና ሓገዝ ምሃብና፡ኢድ ምሕጻብ እቲ ቀንዲ መከላኸሊ ወይ መጉደሊ ምስፍሕፋሕ ሕማም እዩ።
en-mt: Washing your hands before administering medication or health assistance is the most preventable preventive measure.

sourceString: The main medical purpose of washing hands is to cleanse the hands of pathogens (bacteria, viruses, or other microorganisms that can cause disease) and chemicals which can cause harm or diseases.
targetString: ቀንዲ ሕክምናዊ ዕላማ ናይ ኣእዳው ምሕጻብ ነቶም ደቀቕቲ ተጋዳእቲ  ታህዋኣስያን ወይ ሰበባት ሕማም (ባክተርያ፡ ቫይረስ፡ ወይ ሕማም ዘስዕቡ ታህዋኣስያን ክኾኑ ይኽእሉ)  ምጽራይ ወይ ምእላይ ኢዩ ፡ ከምኡ`ውን ነቶም ኣብ ኢድ ዝጸንሑ ሕማም ዘስዕቡ ከሚካላት ክኣልዮም ይኽእል።
en-mt: He main medical purpose of hand washing is to clean or care for microorhoids (which may be bacteria, viruses or disease-causing tawai), and can remove chemicals that cause disease in the hand.

sourceString: This is especially important for people who handle food or work in the medical field, but also an important practice for the general public.
targetString: እዚ ብፍላይ መግቢ ዝኣልዩ ወይ ኣብ ሕክምናዊ ስራሕ ዝሰርሑ ኣገዳሲ እዩ። ከምኡ'ውን ብሓፈሻ ን ህዝቢ ጠቓሚ ምልምማድ እዩ።
en-mt: his is especially important for those who cook food or work in medical work, and it is a useful practice for the general public.

sourceString: Hand washing has many health benefits, including minimizing the spread of influenza, coronavirus, and other infectious diseases; preventing infectious causes of diarrhea; decreasing respiratory infections;
targetString: ኢድ ምሕጻብ ብዙሕ ጥዕናዊ ጥቕሚ ኣለዎ፡ ካብኣቶም እዞም ዝስዕቡ ኢዮም;ምጉዳል ምስፍሕፋሕ ሕማም ዓባይ ሰዓል፡ኮሮና ቫይረስን ተላባዕቲ ሕማማትን ምጉዳል ተማሓላለፍቲ ጠንቂ ውጽኣት፡ምጉዳል  ናይ ስርዓተ ምስትንፋስ ሕማማት።
en-mt: Hand washing has many health benefits, among them: reducing the spread of tB, coronavirus and infectious diseases, reducing the spread of infectious diseases and reducing respiratory diseases.

sourceString: and reducing infant mortality rate at home birth deliveries.
targetString: ከምኡ`ውን ምጉዳል መጠን ናጽላዊ ሞት ኣብ ቤት ዝውለዱ ዕሸላት።
en-mt: and reduced the rate of home birth.

sourceString: A 2013 study showed that improved hand washing practices may lead to small improvements in the length growth in children under five years of age.
targetString: ናይ ኢድ ምሕጻብ ልምምድ ንእሽቶ ለውጢ ኣብ ዕቤት ትሕቲ ሓሙሽተ ዓመት ሕጻናት ከምዘምጽእ ኣብ 2013 ዝተኻየደ መጽናዕቲ ኣርእዩ።
en-mt: A 2013 study showed that hand washing practices lead to small changes in the growth of children under five.

sourceString: In developing countries, childhood mortality rates related to respiratory and diarrheal diseases can be reduced by introducing simple behavioral changes, such as hand washing with soap.
targetString: ኣብዘን ዝምዕብላ ዘለዋ ሃገራት፡ መጠነ ሞት ናይ ቆልዑ ምስ ናይ ምስትንፋስ ሽግራት ንዝተሓሓዝ ቀሊል ዝኾነ ናይ ባህርያት ለውጢ ብምግባር፡ ከም እኒ ኢድ ምሕጻብ፡ ክጎድል ይኽእል ኢዩ።
en-mt: In developing countries, the death rate of children can be reduced by making simple changes in behaviors related to respiratory problems, such as hand washing.

sourceString: This simple action can reduce the rate of mortality from these diseases by almost 50%.
targetString: እዚ ቐሊል ግብረመልሲ መጠን ናይ ሞት፡ካብዞም ሕማማት ብ ዳርጋ 50% ክቕንስ ይኽእል።
en-mt: His simple response can reduce the death rate of these diseases by almost 50%.

sourceString: Interventions that promote hand washing can reduce diarrhoea episodes by about a third, and this is comparable to providing clean water in low income areas.
targetString: ምሕጻብ ኣእዳው ንውጽኣት ብ ሓደ ሲሶ ከጉድሎ ይኽእል፡ እዚ ድማ ምስቲ ምቕራብ ጽሩይ ማይ ናብቶም ድኻታት ስድራ-ቤታት ዝነብሩሉ ፡ ዝመሳሰል ኢዩ።
en-mt: Hand washing can reduce diarrhea by one-third, similar to the supply of clean water to poor families.

sourceString: 48% of reductions in diarrhoea episodes can be associated with hand washing with soap.Hand washing with soap is the single most effective and inexpensive way to prevent diarrhea and acute respiratory infections (ARI), as automatic behavior performed in homes, schools, and communities worldwide.
targetString: ከም ኣውቶማቲካዊ ጠባይ፡ ኣብ ገዛ፡ ቤት ትምህርትን ሕብረተሰብን እንገብሮ፡ ዓለምለኻዊ 48% ምጉዳል ፍጻመታት ውጽኣት ምስ ብሳምና ኢድ ምሕጻብ ክተሓሓዝ ይከኣል እዩ።ምሕጻብ ኢድ ብ ሳምና ቀንዲ ንጽል ኣድማዕን ሕሱርን መንገዲ መከላኸሊ ውጸኣትን ብርቱዕ ናይ ምስትንፋስ መልከፍትን (ARI) እዩ።
en-mt: An international 48% reduction in diarrhea, such as automated behavior, at home, school, and society can be associated with hand washing with soap.Hand washing is the main single, effective and insidical way of preventive exit and severe respiratory illness (ARI).

sourceString: Pneumonia, a major ARI, is the number one cause of mortality among children under five years old, taking the lives of an estimated 1.8 million children per year.
targetString: ፔኑሞንያ ቀንዲ ARI ፡ ቀዳማይ ጠንቂ ናይ ሞት ኣብ መንጎ ትሕቲ 5 ዓመት ቆሉዑትን ፡ብ 1.8 ሚልዮን ኣብ ዓመት ዝግመት ሂወት ቆልዑት ዝወስድን  እዩ።
en-mt: Penimonia is the primary cause of ARI's death among children under 5 years old and takes 1.8 million children's lives a year.

sourceString: Diarrhea and pneumonia together account for almost 3.5 million child deaths annually.
targetString: ውጽኣትን ኒሞንያን፡ ኣብ ዓመት ጠንቂ ሞት ናይ 3,5 ሚልዮን ሰባት ኢዮም።
en-mt: Diarrhea and pneumonia cause 3.5 million deaths a year.

sourceString: According to UNICEF, turning hand washing with soap before eating and after using the toilet into an ingrained habit can save more lives than any single vaccine or medical intervention, cutting deaths from diarrhea by almost half and deaths from acute respiratory infections by one-quarter.
targetString: ብመሰረት UNICEF ኢድ ምሕጻብ ብሳምና፡ ቅድሚ ምብላዕን ድሕሪ ሽንቲ ቤት ምጥቃምን ናብ ዘይቅየር ልምዲ ምቕያር ካብ ብኽታበት ወይ ሕክምናዊ ትግበራ ንላዕሊ ብዙሕ ሂወት የድሕን ካብ ብ ውጽኣት ዝሞቱ ፡ከባቢ ፍርቂ ከምኡ ውን ሞት ብቕልጡፍ ናይ ስርዓት ምስትንፋስ ብስለት ብሓደ ርብዑ።
en-mt: According to UNICEF, hand washing before and after using a urinary tract to an unchanged practice before and after using a urinary tract saves many lives more than a vaccine or medical application: from dysentery, around half, and death, rapid system respiratory maturation by one-quarter.

sourceString: Hand washing is usually integrated together with other sanitation interventions as part of water, sanitation and hygiene (WASH) programmes.
targetString: ኢድ ምሕጻብ ምስ ካለኦት ናይ ጽርየት ተግባራት ከም ሓደ ክፋል ናይ ማይ ጽርየት (WASH) ጥዕናዊ መደባት ዝተተሓሓዘ እዩ።
en-mt: Hand washing is associated with other cleaning activities, such as part of water sanitary (WASH) health programs.

sourceString: Hand washing also protects against impetigo which is transmitted through direct physical contact.
targetString: ኢድ ምሕጻብ ካብ ኢምፔቲጎ (impetigo) ብኣካላዊ ምትንኻፍ ዝማሓላለፍ ሕማም ይከላኸለልና።
en-mt: Hand washing protects us from impetigo disease.

sourceString: A small detrimental effect of hand washing is that frequent hand washing can lead to skin damage due to drying of the skin.
targetString: ንእሽቶ ኣሉታዊ ጽልዋ ናይ ኢድ ምሕጻብ፡ ተደጋጋሚ ምሕጻብ ድርቀት ናይ ቆርበት ብምስዓብ  ሕማም ቆርበት ከኸትል ይኽእል ኢዩ።
en-mt: A small negative effect of hand washing can lead to skin disease following dry skin dryness.

sourceString: A 2012 Danish study found that excessive hand washing can lead to an itchy, flaky skin condition known as hand eczema or hand dermatitis, which is especially common among health-care workers.
targetString: ኣብ 2012 መጽናዕቲ ደንማርከኛ ከምእተረኽበ ተወሳኪ ምሕጻብ ኢድ ናብ ዘሳሒ፡ኩነታት ምቅርራፍ ቆርበት ከም ናይ ኢድ መበላይ ወይ ናይ ኢድ ነድሪ ቆርበት ይባሃል።እዚ ብፍላይ ኣብ መንጎ ሰራሕተኛታት ክንክን ጥዕና ልሙድ እዩ።
en-mt: In 2012, a Danish study found that additional hand washing is called hand washing, such as hand washing or hand inflammation, especially among healthcare workers.

sourceString: Too frequent hand washing is also seen as one of the symptoms of obsessive-compulsive disorder (OCD).
targetString: ኣዝዩ ተደጋጋሚ ኢድ ምሕጻብ ከም ሓደ ካብቶም ምልክታት ናይ ዝገደደ ስርዓት ኣልቦ (OCD) ሙኻን እዩ ዝረአ።
en-mt: Frequent hand washing is one of the symptoms of more disorderly OCD.

sourceString: There are five critical times during the day where washing hands with soap is important to reduce fecal-oral transmission of disease: after using the bathroom (urination, defecation), after cleaning a child's bottom (changing nappies), before feeding a child, before eating and before/after preparing food or handling raw meat, fish, or poultry.
targetString: ኣብ መዓልቲ ሓሙሽተ ኣገደስቲ ግዚያትኣእዳው ብ ሳሙናን ብምሕጻብ ነቲ ምምሕልላፍ ናይ ምሕማም እነጉድለለን ኣለዋ፡ እዚ አን ድማ፡ ድሕሪ ካብ ሽቃቅ ምውጻእና (ሽንቲ ደገን ልሙድ ምሻንን)፡ ድሕሪ ን ቆልዓ ምጽራይ (ምቅያር ናይ ፓምፐር)፡ ቅድሚ ን ቆልዓ ምምጋብ፡ ቅድሚ ምብላዕ ቆልዓ ወይ ድሕሪኡ፡ ድሕርን ቅድሚን መግቢ ምስራሕ ወይ`ውን ጥረ ስጋ፡ ዓሳ ወይ ዝኾነ እንስሳ ምሓዝ ክኸውን ይኽእል።
en-mt: Here are five important times a day by washing your hands with soap, which can reduce the spread of the disease after leaving the tank (urinating and regular cooking), after cleaning a child (changing a pumpkin), before eating a child or after eating a child or after cooking, or carrying fish or any animal.

sourceString: Other occasions when correct handwashing technique should be practiced in order to prevent the transmission of disease include before and after treating a cut or wound; after sneezing, coughing, or blowing your nose; after touching animal waste or handling animals; and after touching garbage.
targetString: ካልኦት መንገድታት ግቡእ ነዚ ምምሕልላፍ ናይ ሕማም ንምዕጋት ቅድምን ድሕርን ሕክምና ናይ ቁስሊ ምግባርካ፡ ድሕሪ ምስዓልካ፡ ምህንጣስካ ወይ ኣፍንጫኻ ምሓዝካ፡ እንስሳ ምሓዝካ፡ ወይውን ጎሓፍ ምሓዝካ፡  ኣጠቃቅማ ናይ ኢድ ምሕጻብ ክትግበሩ ዘለዎም፡ ነዞም ዝትጠቅሱ ኩነታት ኣብ ግምት ዘእተወ ኢዩ።
en-mt: O prevent the spread of the disease, it is important to take into account the use of hand washing before and after treatment for wounds, coughing or sneasing, possessing an animal or possessing a knife.

sourceString: In many countries, there is a low rate of hand washing with soap.
targetString: ኣብ ብዙሓት ሃገራት ውሑድ መጠን ምሕጻብ ኢድ ብሳምና ኣሎ።
en-mt: In many countries, there is very little hand washing.

sourceString: A study of hand washing in 54 countries in 2015 found that on average, 38.7% of households practiced hand washing with soap.A 2014 study showed that Saudi Arabia had the highest rate of 97 percent; the United States near the middle with 77 percent; and China with the lowest rate of 23 percent.Several behaviour change methodologies now exist to increase uptake of the behaviour of hand washing with soap at the critical times.Group hand washing for school children at set times of the day is one option in developing countries to engrain hand washing in children's behaviors.
targetString: መጽናዕቲ ናይ ኢድ ምሕጻብ ኣብ 2015፡ ኣብ 54 ሃገራት ኣብ ዝተገብረ፡ 38.7% ናይ ገዛ ንጥፈታት ምስ ሳሙና ዝተሓሓዝ ኢዩ ኢሉ። ናይ 2014 መጽናዕቲ ድማ፡ ስዕዲ ዓረብ ዝበዝሐ ቁጽሪ ናይ ሞት 97 ሚእታዊት፡ ሕቡራት መንግስታት ኣሜሪካ ኣብ ማእከላይ ደረጃ 77 ሚእታዊት፡ ቻይና እቲ ዝወሓደ መጠን 23 ሚእታዊት ተራእዩወን።  ገለ ገለ ናይ ባህርያት ለውጢ መንገድታት ክረ ኣዩ ጀሚሮም ኣለዉ፡ እዚ ድማ ኣእዳው ምሕጻብ ዘተቓለለ ኢዩ። ብ ጉጅለ ምሕጻብ ኣእዳው ኣብ ግዜ ዕረፍቲ ናይ ተመሃሮ፡ ቀንዲ ኣማራጺ ኣብ ዝምዕብላ ዘለዋ ሃገራት ልምዲ ምሕጻብ ናይ ኣእዳው ከተኣታትዋ ዕድል ዝፈጥር ኢዩ።
en-mt: A 2015 study of hand washing found that 38.7% of household activities in 54 countries were associated with soap, and a 2014 study found that the Saudis saw the highest number of deaths in the U.S. average of 97 percent of The United States' median of 77 percent in China, 23 percent. Some behavioral changes have begun to be seen, which includes hand washing. Developing countries have the opportunity to wash their hands.

sourceString: The "Essential Health Care Program" implemented by the Department of Education in the Philippines is an example of at scale action to promote children's health and education.
targetString: እቲ ``ኣገዳሲ ናይ ጥዕና መደባት``፡ ኣብ ፊሊፒንስ ክፍሊ ትምህርቲ ኣብ ግብሪ ዘውዓሎ ኣርኣያ ጥዕና ናይ ቆልዑት ንምውሳኽን ትምህርትን መለክዒ ተግባር እዩ።
en-mt: The 'important health plans' model implemented by the Department of Education in the Philippines is a standard practice for child health raising and education.

sourceString: Deworming twice a year, supplemented with washing hands daily with soap, brushing teeth daily with fluoride, is at the core of this national program.
targetString: ዳግመ- ሙማቕ  ኣብ ዓመት ክልተ ግዜ፡ ብ ኣእዳው ምሕጻብ ብምስናይ፡ ብ ፍሎራይድ ኣስናን ምሕጻይ መዓልታዊ፡ ናይዚ ሃገራዊ መደብ ቀንድን መሰራታውን ዕላማ ኢዩ።
en-mt: Re-warmth is the main and basic purpose of this national program, washing your hands twice a year, washing your teeth with fluoride every day.

sourceString: It has also been successfully implemented in Indonesia.
targetString: ኣብ ኢንዶነዥያ ውን ብዓወት ተሰሪሕሎም ኢዩ።
en-mt: They were also successful in Indonesia.

sourceString: Removal of microorganisms from skin is enhanced by the addition of soaps or detergents to water.
targetString: ምእላይ ናይ ደቀቕቲ ታህዋስያን ካብ ቆርበት፡ ሳሙናን ካልኦት መጽረይቲን ብምጥቃም ከነመሓይሾ ንኽእል ኢና።
en-mt: We can improve the care of microorganisms by using soap and other skincare.

sourceString: The main action of soaps and detergents is to reduce barriers to solution, and increase solubility.
targetString: እቲ ቀንዲ ስራሕን ምጽራይን ሳምና፡ነቶም ከልከልቲ ምሕቃቕን ሓቓቕነቱ ምውሳኽን እዩ።
en-mt: he main task of cleaning and cleaning our soap is to protect the vulnerable and increase its authenticity.

sourceString: Water alone is an inefficient skin cleanser because fats and proteins, which are components of organic soil, are not readily dissolved in water.
targetString: ማይ ጥራይ በይኑ ንቆርበት ከጽሪ ኣይክእልን ኢዩ እዚ ድማ ህላውነት ናይ ስብሒን ፕሮቲንን ስለ ዘሎ ኢዩ፡ እዚኦም ክፋላት ናይ ኦርጋኒክ ሓመድ ኣብ ማይ ክሓቁ ኣይክእሉን ኢዮም።
en-mt: Water alone cannot cleanse the skin, which is because of the existence of fats and proteins, which cannot be stored in water.

sourceString: Cleansing is, however, aided by a reasonable flow of water..
targetString: ምጽራይ ውን እንተኾነ  ብዘየቋርጽ እኹል ምፍሳስ ማይ ተሓጊዙ።
en-mt: However, it also helped to keep up with the constant flow of water.

sourceString: Solid soap, because of its reusable nature, may hold bacteria acquired from previous uses.
targetString: ድሩቅ ሳሙና፡ ከም እንደገና ክንጥቀመሉ ስለ እንኽእል፡ ካብቲ ቅድሜኻ ዝተጠቀመሉ ሰብ ባክተርያ ክጸንሖም ይኽእል ኢዩ።
en-mt: Since dry soap can be recycled, bacteria may still survive from the person who used it before.

sourceString: A small number of studies which have looked at the bacterial transfer from contaminated solid soap have concluded transfer is unlikely as the bacteria are rinsed off with the foam.
targetString: ገለ ንኣሽቱ መጽናዕትታት፡ ኣብ ናይ ባክተርያ ምምሕልላፍ ኣብ ዝተበከለ ሳሙና፡ ኣብ ዝገበርዎ ምርምር ፡ እቶም ባክተርያበቲ ፊፍ ስለ ዝእለዩ ምልካፋት ኣይከኣልን ኢዩ።
en-mt: Research on contaminated soap for the transmission of bacteria has shown that the bacteria are removed from fife, so they cannot be infected.

sourceString: The CDC still states "liquid soap with hands-free controls for dispensing is preferable".
targetString: CDC ክሳብ ሕጂ ከምዝብሎ ፈሳሲ ሳምና ንኣእዳው ምጥቃም ተመራጺ ከምዝኾነ ኢዩ።
en-mt: So far, the CDC says it is advisable to use soap for the hands.

sourceString: Antibacterial soaps have been heavily promoted to a health-conscious public.

sourceString: Correct handwashing technique recommended by the US Centers for Disease Control  for prevention of transmission of disease includes the following steps:

en-mt: It is said that soft oil protects our hands from drying, which can lead to skin damage, which increases the sensitivity to transmission.

sourceString: Various low-cost options can be made to facilitate hand washing where tap-water and/or soap is not available e.g. pouring water from a hanging jerrycan or gourd with suitable holes and/or using ash if needed in developing countries.In situations with limited water supply (such as schools or rural areas in developing countries), there are water-conserving solutions, such as "tippy-taps" and other low-cost options.
targetString: ማይ ወይ ሳምና አብ ቀረባ ወይ ብቀሊሉ ክርከበሉ አብ ዘይክእል ግዜ፡ ምሕጻብ ኣእዳው ከቃልሉ ዝኽእሉ ዝተፈላለዩ ትሑት ዋጋ ዘለዎም ኣማራጺታት ኣለዉ። ንኣብነት፡ ካብ ዝተንጠልጠለ ጀሪካን ማይ ምፍሳስ ወይ ሓምሓም ኣንኲልካ ምጥቃም ከምኡ’ውን አብ ምምዕባል ኣብ ዝርከባ ሃገራት ተሪር ናይ በረኻ ገረብ ምጥቃም ይከኣል። ድሩት ቀረብ ማይ ኣብ ዘለዎም ቦታታት(ከም ቤት-ትምህርትታት ወይ ናይ ገጠር ቦታታት)፡ ማይ ክዕቀበሎም ዝኽእሉ መፍትሒታት ከም ኣቅኒንካ ዝቅዳሕ ፈሳሲ ማይን ካልኦት ትሑት ዋጋ ዘለዎም ኣማራጺታትን አለዉ።
en-mt: There are a number of low-cost options that can alleviate washing hands when water or soap cannot be stored near or easily, such as pouring water from suspended jars or using a hot iceberg, and a hard desert tree in developing countries. In areas with limited water supply (such as schools or rural areas), solutions that can save water, such as running liquid water and other low-cost options.

sourceString: A tippy-tap is a simple technology using a jug suspended by a rope, and a foot-operated lever to pour a small amount of water over the hands and a bar of soap.
targetString: ቲፕይቶፕ (tippy-tap) ዝቐለለ ቴክኖሎጂ ብገመድ ዝተንጠልጠለ ብራኳ ምጥቃም ኣብ ልዕሊ ኢድ  ማይ ንምፍሳስ ብእግሪ ዝጽቀጥ መሳርሕን መቐመጢ ሳምናን እዩ።
en-mt: Tippy-tap is a simple technology using a rope-hanging bra to pour water over the hand.

sourceString: Effective drying of the hands is an essential part of the hand hygiene process, but there is some debate over the most effective form of drying in public washrooms.
targetString: ከምዝድለ ምድራቕ ኢድ ኣገዳሲ ክፋል ናይ ኢድ መስርሕ ጽርየት እዩ። ግን ከኣ ኣብ ናይ ህዝቢ መሕጸቢ ክፍሊ ኣብ ልዕሊ ኣዝዩ ውጽኢታዊ ዝኾነ ኣነቓቕጻ ገለ ክትዓት ኣሎ።
en-mt: Hand drying is an important part of hand washing, but in the public bathroom there is some insidious stimulus.

sourceString: A growing volume of research suggests paper towels are much more hygienic than the electric hand dryers found in many washrooms.
targetString: እቲ ዝዓቢ ዘሎ ብዝሒ ናይ መጽናዕቲታት ከም ዝሕብሮ፡ ናይ ኢድ ሽጎማኒ ካብቲ ብ ማሽናት ዝግባር ምድራቕ ኣእዳው ኣዝዩ ዝበልጽ ውጽኢት ከምዘለዎ ገሊጹ።
en-mt: According to the report, the largest number of studies has shown that handwashing performs much better than the dry hands used by machines.

sourceString: In 2008, a study was conducted by the University of Westminster, London, and sponsored by the paper-towel industry the European Tissue Symposium, to compare the levels of hygiene offered by paper towels, warm-air hand dryers and the more modern jet-air hand dryers.
targetString: ኣብ 2008 ብ ወስት ሚኒስተር ለንደን ዩኒቨርሲቲ፡ ብ ናይ ሽንቲ ቤት ሶፍት ፋብሪካ ኤውሮፓዉያን ሶፍት ሲምፖሲዩም፡ ዝተመወለ ናይ ጽሬት ደረጃ መንቀጺ ጨርቂ ወይ ሶፍት ፡ ብምዉቕ ኣየር ኢድ መድረቒታትን ዘመናዊ መድረቒ  ንምዉድዳር መጽናዕቲ ተኻይዱ።
en-mt: In 2008, a study was conducted by the Minister of London, the European Soft Symposium, for the clean-up phase of cleaning, dry cloth or soft air, hand platforms and modern platforms.

sourceString: After washing and drying hands with the warm-air dryer, the total number of bacteria was found to increase on average on the finger pads by 194% and on the palms by 254%.
targetString: ድሕሪ ኢድ ምሕጻብን ብምዉቕ ኣየር ኢድ ምንቃጽን፡ ጠቕላላ ቁጽሪ ባክተርያ  (Bacteria) ኣብ ውሽጢ ኣጻብዕቲ ብገምጋም ብ 194% ከምኡ'ውን ኣብ ከብዲ ኢድ ብ 254% ወሲኹ ተረኺቡ።
en-mt: After hand washing and drying with warm hand air, the total number of bacteria was found to have increased by 194% within the fingers, and by 254% in the abdomen.

sourceString: Drying with the jet-air dryer resulted in an increase on average of the total number of bacteria on the finger pads by 42% and on the palms by 15%.
targetString: ድርቀትን በለልታ መድረቒ ኣየርን ብ ገምጋም ጠቕላላ ምውሳኽ ቁጽሪ ባክተርያ  (Bacteria) ኣብ ኣጻብዕቲ ብ 42% ኣብ ከብዲ ኢድ ብ 15% ይውስኽ።
en-mt: Drought and air conditioning increase the total number of bacteria in the fingers by 42% in the palm of the hand by 15%.

sourceString: After washing and drying hands with a paper towel, the total number of bacteria was reduced on average on the finger pads by up to 76% and on the palms by up to 77%.The scientists also carried out tests to establish whether there was the potential for cross contamination of other washroom users and the washroom environment as a result of each type of drying method.
targetString: ድሕሪ ምሕጻብ ኢድን ብሶፍት ምድራቅን ጠቅላላ ቁጽሪ ናይ ባክተርያ  (Bacteria)  ብገምጋም ብ76% ኣብ ውሽጣዊ ኣጻብዕቲ ከምኡውን ኣብ ከብዲ ኢድ ብ77% ጎዲሉ ተረኺቡ።ስነ ፍልጠታውያን ውጽኢት ናይ ነፍስ ወከፍ ዓይነት መንቀጺ መንገዲ ንምርኣይ ካብ ሓደ ናብ ሓደ ናይ ምብካል ተክእሎ እቶም ናይ ምሕጸቢ ተጠቀምትን ናይ ምሕጸቢ ቦታን፡ምንባሩን ዘይምንባሩን መጽናዕቲ ኣካይዶም።
en-mt: After hand washing and soft washing, the total number of bacteria was found to have fallen by an average of 76% in the inner finger and stomach, and scientists studied the ability to infect each type of washing and washing site.

sourceString: The jet-air dryer, which blows air out of the unit at claimed speeds of 180 m/s (650 km/h; 400 mph), was capable of blowing micro-organisms from the hands and the unit and potentially contaminating other washroom users and the washroom environment up to 2 metres away.
targetString: እቲ መንቐጺ ኣየር፡ ነቲ ኣየር ብ ፍጥነት ናይ ንፋስ፡ ካብ 180 m/s (650 km/h; 400 mph) ክኺዶ ዝኽእል፡ ነቶም ደቀቕቲ-ታህዋኣስያን ካብ ኢድ ክኣልዮም ይኽእል ኢዩ፡ ነቶም መሕጸቢ ንብረታት ድማ ክሳብ 2 መትሮ ንሪሒቖም ክሳብ ዘለዎ በቲ ቫይረስ ክብክሎም ተኽእሎታት ኣለዎ።
en-mt: he airwape can reach the air at wind speeds of 180 m/s (650 km/h; 400 mph), and remove the small tawassians from the hands, and have the potential to infect washers as long as they are away from the virus.

sourceString: Use of a warm-air hand dryer spread micro-organisms up to 0.25 metres from the dryer.
targetString: ውዕይ ኣየር ዝጥቀሙ ናይ ኢድ መንቀጺ ምጥቃም ነቶም ቫይረስ ክሳብ 0.25 ሜትሮ ክብትኖም ተኽእሎታት ኣሎ።
en-mt: The use of hand saws that use air conditioners can disperse the virus up to 15 feet [0.25 m].

sourceString: Paper towels showed no significant spread of micro-organisms.In 2005, in a study conducted by TÜV Produkt und Umwelt, different hand drying methods were evaluated.
targetString: ናይ ወረቐት መጽረዪ ዝኾነ ናይ ቫይረስ ምስግጋር ተኽእሎ ኣየር ኣዩን። ኣብ 2005፡ ብ TÜV Produkt und Umwelt ኣብ ዝተገብረ መጽናዕቲ፡ ዝተፈላለዩ ናይ ኢድ መንቀጺ መንገድታት ተፈቲኑን ተጸኒዑን።
en-mt: A 2005 study conducted by TÜV Produkt und Umwelt found that a number of hand sanity paths were tested and studied.
